story:
Featured on:



                                                               LADIES styles

                                                                     MENS styles


Luxury, Style and Performance like no other sweatshirts: 

The Original Inside Pocket Company delivers luxury lifestyle apparel and accessories that encourages "humans" to make smarter decisions about when & where to use their technology.  We Produce Quality, Stylish and Luxury clothes with better POCKETS! We are everyday wear , not just "travel wear",  From daytime to nighttime, our products look expensive because we use expensive materials! No protypes here! 

Live life in the moment, hold a hand, not a phone.

We are extremely proud to have been selected by Art Miami, America’s foremost and No. 1 attended international contemporary art fair, who share our mission to end distracted living. Art Miami will offer attendees the opportunity to acquire branded Art Miami / TOIPC activewear at its 26th edition this December 1-6 during Art Week Miami.  Please visit us there as we are extremely excited to launch our product for the first time to the very distinguished audience at the world-renowned Art Miami fair and share our universal message of Look @ Art, not your phone. 

Our T.H.U.M.B  acronym stands for Teaching Humans Universal Mobile Behavior 


Fashion styles and Luxurious fabric for you to wear everyday with the Pockets you need daily!  

All our products are: 

1. Super premium designed sweatshirts using only the finest materials. Luxurious brushed quality fleece to keep you warm and made to last.

2. Designed with more inside pocket options for holding your most important items. While we didn't invent pockets, we lined the inside with what you need most today. Pockets to hold your everyday items and mobile device!

3. Designed and specifically fitted & developed for both a woman and a man. We are not a unisex brand. We are all individuals and have different body shapes. We offer 2 style choices for the ladies and 2 style choices for the men. We like options, we figured you would as well. Can't decide ? Buy them both.

4. Manufactured working with quality boutique factories in small "batches", the workmanship is outstanding and made so well, that we guarantee 10 year free mending in the unlikely event your sweatshirt should open at the seams. Take care of it, it will take care of you. Our products are designed for everyday life. 

5. Global partners / global cause: We produce our products in the USA and abroad. All our suppliers support this global problem with their employees and in their community. Together we can make a difference and save lives.

6. Sold direct. Premium sweatshirts of this quality with pocket deatils retail anywhere from $159-$179.  We've cut out the middleman and then spared no expense giving you more of what you need. Inside pockets! Great product, Great functionality!  

The Colors

Our sweatshirts are available in a beautiful Heather Grey & Dark Navy

The Pockets

          Mens inside pockets/Franklin has an inside chest pocket like the Perry

                                                              Ladies inside pockets

Superior comfort, workmanship & details like THUMB holes 

                                                      ON  ALL STYLES               

Our back embroidered red thumb print exclamation mark is our Call to Action

Quality and Strength

All seams are reinforced with triple needle cover stitching, allowing for stretch and movability, yet holding all seams securely. Our rib is 2x2 knit, with silky feel and added Lycra for maximum stretch and shape recovery. Zippers are anodized metal YKK 2 way zippers, the industry standard for highest quality and functionality.

Luxury &  Style like no other sweatshirts: 

We are also extremely proud to work with Prestige Imports / Lamborghini of Miami to bring more awareness to the dangers of distracted driving. We will be a particapating sponsor of the Super Trofeo Sebring Rally November 21 and the Ride2Reivive event for kids cancer in mid February. For more details, please contact me at Brad@insidepocketco.com

We donate a percentage of proceeds from each purchase from this campaign and on our website to Joel Feldman's End Distracted Driving.Org  http://www.enddd.org

#keepitinyourpocket  #EndStupidity   #Passionforlife   #holdahandnotaphone

The vision of The Original Inside Pocket Company team is to slowly, but progressively, change peoples behavior to lead a less distracted life. With your help and support we can solve one of the greatest social issues of our time. 

BUY AS A GIFT:  Apart from your everyday personal use - show someone you value their life with a gift that will encouarge and remind them to end distracted living.  Let us know that it's a Gift and we will send out a gift card. 

 The Casey  (model wearing a size medium)

The Jamie  (model wearing a size medium)

The Jamie & tote bag

The Perry & The Jamie

The Perry  (model wearing a size medium) 

The Franklin (model wearing a size medium)

Other Rewards

Magnet

Tote Bag

 Trucker Hats (2 Color Choices)

Baseball Hat

The whole shebang!

Prestige Imports Lamborghini Miami side sleeve embroidery with tote in back 

              Me with Prestige CEO Brett David and Marketing VP Valerie Kaye 

                         OUR Sizes

                    Jamie sizing runs slightly fitted & sexy by design 

           Casey Crunch Collar runs slightly fitted & sexy by design

                                    Perry "true" size chart

                                            Franklin "true" size chart

EXCHANGE POLICY

If you send your sweatshirt selection back to us, we'll fix open seams and send it back to you. Return postage is on us (meaning , shipping back to you once you've shipped it to us for mending), please give us a heads up before dropping it in the box.  Also, international customers will have to pay shipping both ways.  We also reserve the right to ask for a small increase to ship the sweatshirt out in the first place, once actual and final shipping costs have been calculated. We will not be making money on shipping and we will be transparent about these costs. We also cannot fix stains, zippers or lost strings.

Risks and challenges

Very little because our team has a combined 30+ years in the fashion industry, so we're no strangers to garment design, manufacturing and filling orders. 

All our product development is already finished, we took "the risk" and pre-funded initial production to launch our first campaign on kickstarter in March. We became a staff pick in the first hour of that campaign and we managed to ship over half our backers in the weeks following our succesful campaign. We have delivered and more than met the expectations of many consumers with a very well made luxurious product.  Check out our reveiws on our website and Facebook page! 

We produce "batches" of sweatshirts of the highest quality. Please check out the photo Gallery

THESE ARE NOT PROTOTYPES !  no guessing what fabric you will receive, our products look, feel and fit great.  Check out our reveiws! 

The Team and I THANK YOU SO much for the support! 

Please share this video with a friend and help spread the message!

hold a hand, not a phone,

Brad

story:
Padkix has added a new feature!

                               You can now attach and detach the super absorber...

          Using the most flexible, durable, and softest fabric technology available!

                   It's still 3x more effective than a regular disposable pad...

                                                The absorber doesn't shift and slide!

And the interior is so soft that it can even be used as a regular panty... during regular days without your period!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Red Bags: Have 2 different compartments for fresh panties, fresh absorbers, and used panty/absorber... it's water resistant and leak-proof! Available as an extra perk if you buy 3 or more pcs :)

 

Wash Bag: It serves as a delicates protector for your used panty and absorber during laundry... get it for free when you buy 5 or more pcs :)

 

 

 

                                         Hip size is located on the waistline.

 

 

 

                                                                    Your period game...

 

                                                        Will be changed forever!

story:
THE STORY

My name is Dave Wu and I’m a Photographer/Creative based out in New York/New Jersey. Color Blanc is a passion project I started last year with the hopes of becoming a full fledged fashion brand. After working in streetwear and fashion for several years, I realized that I had a passion for clothing. From the initial sketch to the manufacturing of the final product, I’ve learned the ins and outs of starting a fashion/lifestyle brand from the ground up.

For the last year, I’ve spent all my time and savings doing market research, designing, and testing out different factories. Now, I am ready to start the next step in the process and I need your help. 

 

THE PROCESS

Making a clothing brand is not an easy process. There are those who slap designs onto some pre-made shirts for a quick buck, and then there are those who take the time to make thought out designs come to life.  The latter, making custom cut and sew apparel, is a very tedious and expensive process. Therefore, all funding for this campaign will go towards the following:

-Raw Materials: This includes fabrics, hardware (buttons, zippers, accessories, etc). Probably one of the most labor intensive parts of the whole process. Finding the right high quality materials is just as important as the designs themselves. 

-Pattern Making: This is the process of creating stencils of each part of the design. From the collar to the sleeves, the pattern maker meticulously measures and draws out each piece to make sure it can be replicated. 

-Sample Making: This is where it all comes together. The cut out patterns are sewn together, buttons and zippers are attached, and the first design sample comes to life. 

-Grading: This is the process of creating different sizes for each design. 

This process is repeated for each individual design. Sometimes the first sample comes out just the way you pictures, but most of the time not. After many alterations to the sample or even scrapping a sample for a completely different design, the final sample is ready for production. 

Palette #000001 will be produced exclusively in Seoul, South Korea, a place known for it's rich textile history and A1 quality when it comes to manufacturing. I will be spending 3 months there this Spring designing, sourcing, and producing the samples for the inaugural collection.

 

THE IMPACT

This project has been a dream of mine for a long time. With this campaign and the samples created with it, I’ll be able to showcase to retailers to carry my clothing, shoot editorials for magazines, and create catalogs for sales/marketing. None of this can happen without the sampling process.

Ultimately, this one collection, can lead to financial stability for the company and the ability to create future collections. I would love to be able to keep on creating awesome clothing for everyone.

 

THE CHALLENGES

No project is without its challenges. To be as transparent as possible in this campaign, I’ve listed a few below:

-There is never just ONE sample. It often takes several to get a design right and that is what makes this process so labor intensive and costly. 

-The rising cost of production could affect the number of designs made. Inflation is real. 

-People might not like the designs at all (not likely, but still a possibility)

 

OTHER WAYS TO HELP

We've launched a small collection of enamel pins to raise money for the sampling process. You can purchase on our website at www.colorblanc.com.

If you can't donate monetarily, sharing on your social channels is just as helpful! Exposure is welcome :)

story:
DUO DU LONDON - WEAR A UNIQUE STATEMENT

Tshirts that keep on giving back. For every tshirt bought, we will donate £1 to Penny Brohn Cancer Care Centre. Our Garments are all organic premium cotton with hand drawn designs. Silk screen printed and embellished with Official Swarovski crystals.

WHY WE ARE DOING THIS

Duo Du London believes in offering only the best, that exists. No compromise. We are on a mission to offer unique and creative designs on durable organic garments. We refrain from the old boring, quick money making, computer generated images. Each and every one of our hand-drawn designs has gone through hours of design and development. With your help, we can all enjoy creative art on quality organic garments. 

Why should we settle for brands that sell us clothing that is deliberately designed to fall apart in a year? You should not have to worry about washing your T-shirt, and because its going to lose its shape. Most high fashion brands engineer their apparel to fall apart within a year, so you keep coming back for more. This creates a cycle of consumption and waste which has become very common lately. Clothing should be made to last a lifetime. Our aim is to change that cycle of waste, offering only the best garments with beautiful designs, that will last and be admired wherever you go!

WHAT WE NEED

Our aim is to spread the word, grow and invite you to come and have a taste of what we have produced. Will be our best achievement to set up a creative design studio, where we will continue to work tirelessly to deliver the best design apparel that will keep giving back for our cause.

WHAT YOU GET

What you will get is a quality premium organic cotton t-shirt, with a unique hand-drawn and silk screen-printed design, embellished with official Swarovski crystals. Garment that are eco-friendly, with aesthetically pleasing designs for you to cherish years and years to come.

THE STORY

Designer Danny Kay Duod grew up in Ghana, where from a young age, using his own designs, he began to personally explore the process of screen printing onto cloth. It was then that he set up a small business selling his prints to women in the local community, who would sew the designs into various items of clothing. From this sparked Danny's interest in apparel design and production.

Danny moved to the UK where he studied graphic design and architecture, then in 2012, Duo Du London was founded. From the designer's London apartment, he sketches unique, tribal-like designs using calligraphic pens and Chinese inks. The detail behind the designs is likened to tattoo artwork - with an aboriginal edge.

Danny's final images are then screen printed onto a range of carefully selected soft, organic cotton fabrics. The garments are also finished with official Swarovski crystals to add a little bit of class to the final product.

The brand is named after Danny's late mother – Duo Du London's biggest fan. The brand prides itself on its production of comfortable, high quality, yet affordable, garments. The customer is guaranteed total care from design to distribution of each item of clothing.

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

We have carefully chosen our reliable and experienced screen-printing factory based on prior relationship. We are very confident in our team and our suppliers ability to keep up with our schedule and deliver on time. Having said that, we cannot always control everything life throws at us and there are always uncertainties and risks of delay in any manufacturing process. Although very unlikely, things sometimes do take longer than expected - but we are prepared for it and are engaging in precautionary steps to prevent any such event. Throughout the duration of the project - we will keep in contact with you, frequently updating you in detail, every step of the way!

LAST WORDS

We know by this time, you've had an extensive insight into DUO DU London's mission and goal. We will never source cheap garments just to maximise profit and your contribution will get you the best gear. We will continue to surprise you with unique detailed designs. Please send us a message if you can’t find the perfect perk and we will try our best to cater to you.

email: info@duodulondon.co.uk

website: http://www.duodulondon.co.uk

youtube video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qL01EpyNFHY 

@duodulondon : instagram - facebook - twitter   #duoduit

and goal. We will never source cheap garments just to maximise profit and your contribution will get you the best gear. We will
continue to surprise you with unique detailed designs. Please send us a message if you
can’t find the perfect perk and we will try our best to cater to you.


email: info@duodulondon.co.ukwebsite: http://www.duodulondon.co.ukyoutube video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qL01EpyNFHY @duodulondon : instagram - facebook - twitter   #duoduit

story:
My name is Gam Calderon. I'm currently a student at Hillsborough community college. I love fashion, it’s been a way to be very outspoken without necessarily saying anything. I wanted to go straight into the field when I got out of high school, unfortunately, funding was a bit of an issue. I didn't give up, I'm getting all my basic classes out of the way but keeping a blog and interning for a stylist. I'm trying to make it on my own, as many of you know that's not easy! I'm planning my first big fashion show and I will be showcasing local boutiques that like me want to make a name for themselves. The fashion show will serve as a network to create business relations between designers, models and stylist all from the Tampa area. We are also showcasing local restaurants and vendors that will be selling their products to the guests. I know the fashion world can be rather superficial; therefore, I want to make this fashion show different! All of our models are diverse in their own way, we have every size, color, nationality. Our models are students from Riverview High School and Hillsborough Community College. We've also extended an invitation to "The Fashion Movement" an organization that helps girls in low income or troubled households become models. If you're a business owner and wish to do more for this campaign there are Sponsorship Opportunities. A “Twitter wall” will be created for the fashion show. This platform will bring the audience even closer with the concept of the show and the cause that it’s supporting

We are also doing a huge clothing drive the day of the event! All guest are required to bring at least two partially used pieces of clothing! Regardless if it's out of style, there's always someone in need who will gladly take it. We have partnered up with Metropolitan Ministries of Tampa to give articles of clothing to people in need. Men, Women, Children the list is endless! The feeling of doing what you love and giving to those in need at the same time has no comparison. Studies show that millions of people in America are in need of clothes. Please, help us lower this statistic. Nobody should be denied the opportunity to have clothes on their back. 

Although monetary donations are always appreciated, The House Of Gam wants to encourage everyone to donate to Metropolitan Ministries. This organization has been helping many people in need for years and we all hope that can continue to carry their humanitarian mission

To donate clothes please send all packages to Metropolitan Ministries 2002 N Florida Ave, Tampa, FL 33602 or visit www.metromin.com and find one in your community!

story:
About this project

We started Fuchsia Shoes to bring top quality handmade traditional styles shoes from Pakistan to the fashion hungry market of women’s footwear. Our brand, Fuchsia, reflects the themes behind our designs: vivid, elegant and full of life.

Fuchsia is so more than a fashion brand. Fuchsia is a movement that connects industry artisans, who have mastered the centuries old eastern art of shoe making, to the western marketplace.

Our intricate handmade embroidery is designed with the intention to fuse the western and eastern fashion in a subtle and contemporary way. Quality and comfort are our unwavering tenants - Every Fuchsia shoe is handmade by artisans who pour in their individual creativity, passion and love.


A few weeks of craftsmanship goes into every pair of fashionable shoes from Fuchsia. The process begins with an approach that blends centuries of tradition, as we start each pair with the blank slate of beautiful and individual imperfections of natural leather, with each individual craftsman lovingly and painstakingly tying each knot and sewing every seam. 






  • Facebook
  • Instagram
  • Pinterest
  • Twitter

Risks & Challenges

We have given ourselves three months to deliver the rewards. Every pair of shoe is handmade and needs human resource to make it happen. However, given the delivery record and consistent quality of our team over the past year, we are confident that our progress will not be hindered by this risk.

Throughout the manufacturing process we will be updating our backers regularly and keep them posted on our progress.

story:
Revolutionary new product SensDog is not just a collar with an Apple Watch as an embedded device, but an innovative software that was developed in collaboration with the world’s leading dog behavior laboratory. Pioneering breakthrough scientific research, SensDog team is developing and introducing a new technology platform in human-dog communication. 

Hard science Contrary to other products on the market, SensDog is not just an idea based on some scientific presumption. It’s an ongoing program where data is continuously collected and scientific results inform development of the SensDog application on an ongoing basis.

Supporting science SensDog is not just a revolutionary new product! In our research program, our ambition is to build a novel business and science management model that facilitates and supports sharing the latest research findings with the public as we believe doing so will change our and our dogs’ world for the better.

Building a community Our aim is not merely to gain resources for launching the product but also to build a community whose members could partake in the development and research process with their dogs and share our enthusiasm and passion to improve the lives of our best friends. Anybody, even those who don’t send any money, can join us! Of course, we appreciate any support that helps launch the SensDog project.

Thanks in advance :)

SensDog - contrary to today’s smart collars – works on a behavioral level. It doesn’t just say that your dog is active or passive but it knows exactly what your dog is doing. Based on this advanced behavior sensing technology SensDog as a sensdevice is able to construct a detailed yet holistic picture of your dog's emotional and physical state throughout days, months, and years.

Collecting and analyzing behavior data in real time and delivering both a summary and a detailed analysis of four aspects of your dog’s days:

Happiness - it’s about emotional balance. You can immediately know what makes your dog happy/sad, what causes them relief/stress, and how their emotions change over time. It basically tells you how your dog is feeling and why.

Wellness - it’s about body and physical wellbeing. Is your dog in good shape, sleeps and rests well, eats and drinks enough? Are there any health or weight issues that you should know in advance? Were there any behavioral changes that you should pay attention to?

Friendship -it’s about your dog’s social connections, like who is leader in the pack or in the park. How is your dog feeling about other dogs, who are their friends or loved ones?

Parentship - are you a good guardian of your furry friend? How close is your connection, are there any problems in the family? Are you getting closer over time? Did your dog’s feelings change towards you?

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We had the privilege to try SensDog on wolfs with the help of Zoltan Horkai, an expert in training wolves and well-known from the series “Zoltan the Wolf Man” that aired on Animal Planet and Discovery Channel. We conducted a comparative study with wolves at the Horkai Animal Training Center and although compared to dogs, we found minor differences, SensDog worked well with their closest natural relatives; wolves. 

New possibilities in animal training Based on our experience and discussions with animal trainers like Zoltan, SensDog could help animal trainers - especially wild animal trainers. SensDog could be useful to these trainers in solving difficult training problems even remotely, getting feedback about the animals’ critical emotional, physical, and social conditions and avoiding problems.

Hey guys, who'd like to be the next? Zoltan Horkai is fixing a prototype collar on his wolves

 

1. SENSDOG USER

PERSONAL DATA Sensdog App collects, stores and analyses data on your phone so you can access the data whenever (even without internet).

2. SENSDOG CLOUD

WORLDWIDE DATA SensDog servers collect and process data from around the world. These data inform both future research of the SensDog Lab and application development.

3. SENSDOG LAB

RESEARCH DATA SensDog team processes large amount of data collected from around the world and continues the scientific study of behavioral mechanisms to inform the next generation of SensDog devices. All the while, we keep our users connected and give them feedback about their dog’s behavior. 

4. SENSDOG SOFTWARE

DEVELOPMENT SensDog team continuously improves and upgrades SensDog software based on research results and user feedback.

Dogs around an M.R.I. machine from the lab's latest Science article (September 2016)

Prestigious academic research team Prof. Adam Miklosi and his team is one of the most successful research laboratories in the field of dog behavior which  also hosts the largest research group in the world that is dedicated to investigating dog behavior and dog-human interaction (‘Family Dog Project’). 

More than 40 researchers and students with diverse backgrounds, such as in biology, psychology, and veterinary medicine are collaborating on projects focused, beyond animal behavior, on animal robotics, behavioral ecology, bio-acoustics, cognitive neuroethology, and human-computer interaction.

Articles in Science and other scientific journals The Family Dog Project team has several papers published in high quality journals, including in the most prestigious journals like Science, Current Biology and Trends in Cognitive Sciences.

Prof. Adam Miklosi is author of several well-respected books on dog behavior such as Dog Behaviour, Evolution, and Cognition (2nd Edition, Oxford University Press) and is one of the top lecturers on the topic in the world.

He even played a role in a popular show on Sky Television as a key member of a team that trained shelter dogs to drive an airplane. Partnering with Victoria Stilwell, the show titled Dogs Might Fly aired in Great Britain in 2016.

 

 

 

 

​

From the beginning of the design process it was clear that a next generation device and the dog collar of the future deserves a unique look. This was not a simple aesthetic consideration but one that was constrained by the need for functionality, too. So, we kept it as comfortable and light as possible but also added the option to change elements in case of newly needed functions.

 

The technical specifications could vary, depending on the Apple Watch model you attach. Works with any Apple Watch model which is available now including first edition Apple Watch.

Kick off idea SensDog comes from earlier research wherein dogs – wearing harnesses with an accelerometer and GPS to allow for researchers to follow and record their behavior – were trained to work with drones to find people in emergency situations, such as an avalanche. 

Smaller device with a bigger computing capacity In the midst of many interesting results we realized that a real breakthrough necessitated a smaller device with a bigger computing capacity and advanced and reliable communication technology. Thus came the idea that instead of developing a new device, we should capitalize on the most advanced device on the market and integrating it with our innovative solutions.

Apple Watch as an embedded device This was when we decided to choose the best wearable technology and started to use the Apple Watch and Apple software technology. Doing so we avoided all hardware limitations of similar products and could focus on the software which is the most important factor when building a next generation sensdevice. 

This is a decision we will never regret! 

Collar with modular design Armed with this technology we could go back to the drawing board and make a case and a collar that not only embed the Apple Watch but extend its capabilities with a new modular design that permits future development.

The next step was the most difficult one and it took quite some time. The only known possibility of recording and analyzing the behavior of an organism at the time was a very cumbersome process that necessitates special conditions and environment.

Real time behavior recording We thus had to develop a new method that could analyze the behavior of the dog, in real time and with the precision we wanted. Everything else is history, as we are proud to introduce SensDog, the world’s first device that could do exactly this. With the new method, we can also incorporate all prior and latest scientific results, producing the first really smart device for dogs, with endless future possibilities.

 

Entrepreneur  and creative with multinational corporate and startup management experience, the head of operation. Expert on digital communication and iOS app development with extended advertising agency background with top clients and brands like PEPSI, Lays, Cheetos, Pfizer, Bayer, HERTZ, SaraLee. He has a Master's Degree in biology.

 

 

Minimizing risks The main reason why we selected Apple Watch and Apple software platform is simple: closing out as much technical issue as possible and keep focusing on the usage of the product. This decision is the key to avoid the technical traps - where most promising ideas fail - and ensure that our backers will get what and when they except, and deliver the highest possible standard of quality and consistency.

Unexpected issues We have done our best to plan for every possible issue but obviously unexpected issues can arise, but we promise that we will keep our backers informed at all times when this happen.

Deliveries We will be using signed for delivery with insurance to post out all perks, delivery times will vary from a couple of days to a week or so depending on your location in the world, a tracking number will be sent to you.

Quality Control Every product will be packed and checked by us before it is shipped to backers to avoid any issue during daily usage.

Customer Service It's part of the cooperation with our backers to answer as fast as possible to any issue arises during the usage of the product. Our beta testers get even higher care to help the communication between our researchers and developers and our first users.

 

Can I use any kind of Apple Watch model with SensDog?

SensDog works with both Apple Watch generations and both editions, so you can use your old version in the collar, or buy an earlier version very cheap on the secondary market.

Only the GPS capability is missing from the first version of Apple Watch (sometimes called edition 0) or the edition 1 of AppleWatch 2.0, all the others are exactly the same for SensDog. Most features of SensDog do not require the GPS and for the tracking of your walking and running with your dog your iPhone's GPS can be used as an approximate substitute, so this is not a serious limitation.

You need an iPhone 5 or later model which could communicate with the Apple Watch. It's not possible to run on iPad as it's not compatible with Apple Watch.

story:
IT WAS SUCH A GREAT SUCCESS AND SURPRISE NEWS FOR US. THANKS EVERYONE!!          Please also stay tuned to our page for our upcoming new project

 

As we have received many comments and feedbacks from Kickstarter that most of the backers are interested to the minutes track markings design instead of hours design. During the Indiegogo in-demand programme, all design will be upgraded to our backers' suggestion.

 

We’re using the best materials and components to build an excessively quality and modern minimal design watches. 

 Links: Watchuseek, Watchinsider, Fratellowatches, WatchTime 

 

We are offering directly via Indiegogo and Kickstarter, we are able to cut out the retail channel, middlemen markups, brand exclusivity/scarcity, and offer a US 499 real flying tourbillon watch with the most premium materials and modern minimal design watch. 

Seriously, try to find a better watch for a better price, and we’ll match it.

 

Open Heart / Open Balance  

1. Only Display balance wheel spinning back and forth.  

2. The balance wheel, the lever and the escape wheel are all at fixed locations on the movement's base plate no counteract the effects of gravity  

3. Low complication and value 

Real Flying Tourbillon:  

1. Tourbillon is a device which spiral, pallet fork and the escapement were worked on the same axis, and rotating 360 degrees,  

2. Reduce the time difference error caused by gravity  

3. A high complication with hundreds of years traditional watch craftsmanship.

 

LENVINO Watch Co. was started in 2017 Jan, a group of watch-addicts with the passion and constancy of the traditional watch craftsmanship. We believe that the most timeless and desirable timepiece must be the traditional one. We would like to awaken people’s mind about the core function of a watch, thus create our brands. 

In 2017 Dec LENVINO Watch Co. launched its first Kickstarter campaign to fund the World’s First Minimalist Design Rectangular Tourbillon Watch. After 40 days on Kickstarter, it raised a total of HK$ 427,860. The result is the most backed tourbillon project on Kickstarter history. In 2018 April, we returns to Kickstarter to launch our second project “US$149 Japan Automatic Vintage Racing Watch”. After 30 days on Kickstarter, it raised a total of HKD 1,344,752. It was such a great success and surprise result for us.   

Links: World’s First Minimalist Design Rectangular Tourbillon Watch 

Links: US$149 Japan Automatic Vintage Racing Design Watches

With the success of the first two projects, we returns to Indiegogo and Kickstarter to launch our Third collection to you. 

“LENVINO” is inspired by Legend, Tradition and Innovation. We strive to create legendary timepieces by combining traditional craftsmanship and innovative design 

We are a group of watch-addicts who have already worked in the Hong Kong watch industry for over 28 years. We specialized in the design and manufacturing of high-quality quartz and automatic watches. We have established good relationships with the world’s leading watch manufacturers specializing in luxury watches for high-end brands that retail for over US$1,000, as well as renowned watch companies in the retail market with over 400 chain stores worldwide.

 

Our ambition is to create our very own brand, which we can share with watch enthusiasts around the globe. Through “LENVINO”, we are offering high-quality products with unique and exclusive designs comparable to watches at department stores and luxury brands, but at only a fraction of their retail price. 

 

We want to share our love for watches with you. But in order to do that, we need more than just having innovative and tradition designs, quality support from a world leading manufacturing partner, and 28 years of industry experience. Your support will be instrumental in helping us achieve our dream, and we are confident you will be impressed with the design, workmanship and value that our watches offer. 

 

A tourbillon is a historic complication originally designed to improve the accuracy of pocket watches which was invented by the famous watchmaker Abraham-Louis Breguet in 1795. It is the term of a complex feature of traditional watch craftsmanship and present in a classic design of the high-end timepieces. For the purpose to let most of the watch-addicts can appreciate and enjoy for the tourbillon remarkable watch craftsmanship and complication, we used the most premium materials, reliable movement and unique design to create this authentic timepiece and also in a fraction of price to the Swiss mentors.   

Since we have a huge passion for designing unique and exclusive watches, we curated the “Tour Collection 02”. The time-tested hand-winding Tourbillon movement at its core, coupled with modern mininal designs with well-proportioned cases and sapphire crystal mirror. We also offer interchangeable genuine calf leather strap with square Croco pattern for you to choose.

 

Initially, LENVINO “Tour Collection  02” will offer you 5 color combinations and 1 new version to choose from. All watches are equipped with a hand-winding Tourbillon movement and sapphire crystal. 

You will be able to choose the design versions by the survey email within 3 working days

 

All Black- Black sandblasted dial with applied black circular brushed hour mark printed sub dial and silver-tone hands, and "Tourbillon" printed below of the brand metal plate. Circular case with rounded edges in brushed black tone. Black genuine leather strap with tone on tone stitching.

 

All Silver- Silver sandblasted dial with applied silver circular brushed hour mark printed sub dial and blue tone hands, and "Tourbillon" printed below of the brand metal plate. Circular case with rounded edges in polished silver tone. Navy blue genuine leather strap with large square Croco patter and tone on tone stitching. 

 

Black & Silver- Black sandblasted dial with applied silver circular brushed hour mark printed sub dial and hands, and "Tourbillon" printed below of the brand metal plate. Circular case with rounded edges in polished silver tone. Black genuine leather strap with large square Croco patter and tone on tone stitching. 

 

Dark Grey & Silver- Dark grey sandblasted dial with applied black circular brushed hour mark printed sub dial and hands, and "Tourbillon" printed below of the brand metal plate. Circular case with rounded edges in polished silver tone. Brown genuine leather strap with large square Croco patter and tone on tone stitching. 

 

Dark Brown & Rose Gold- Dark brown sandblasted dial with applied rose gold tone circular brushed hour mark printed sub dial and hands, and "Tourbillon" printed below of the brand metal plate. Circular case with rounded edges in polished rose gold tone. Dark brown genuine leather strap with large square croco patter and tone on tone stitching. 

 

Silver & Rose Gold- Silver sandblasted dial with applied rose gold tone circular brushed hour mark printed sub dial and hands, and "Tourbillon" printed below of the brand metal plate. Circular case with rounded edges in polished rose gold tone. Dark grey genuine leather strap with large square Croco patter and tone on tone stitching. 

You will be able to choose the design versions by the survey email within 3 working days

 

 

Inspired by a minimalistic design, we stripped away all unnecessary elements from the dial, focusing exclusively on the Flying Tourbillon. The base of the dial is decorated with matt-sandblasted finishing, giving it a grained texture effect. The indices are kept to a minimal; Hours and minutes are indicated by the printed marks on the circular brushed subdial. 

Time is displayed by the Skeleton Alpha Hands which have a hollowed base that gradually narrows into a sharp point. The Flying Tourbillon can be found at the bottom of the dial and is surrounded by a brightness and sharpness metal ring. 

 

The LENVINO “Tour Collection 02” sports a circular case with a curved bezel. The case is enclosed by a domed sapphire crystal on the front and a screw-down transparent caseback from the rear, allowing you to enjoy every movement of the Tourbillon. 

Viewed from the side, the dome crystal joins the case back flawlessly through a smooth curved surface. The streamlined case is more than just an elegant design feature – it also allows for a slimmer profile. 

The metal parts are made from 316L stainless steel, which translates to greater corrosion resistance and durability in high temperatures. 

 

Our interchangeable watch straps are made from genuine calf leather with large square croco pattern and come with polished 316L stainless steel buckles engraved with our brand name “LENVINO”. The straps have a width of 20mm x 18mm, a unisex functional length suitable for most customers, and 9 holes for adjustment.   

They are available in five different colors and designs: (1) Brown, (2) Dark Brown, (3) Dark Grey, (4) Navy Blue and (5) Black 

 

Why we choose TY800? The calibre TY800 is a spectacular Mechanical Hand Winding Off-center Real Flying Tourbillon Movement made by Sea-Gull, the only 100% government-owned factory and the largest manufacturer of watch movements and Swiss movement parts in China.   

With a power reserve of about 40 hours, the mechanisms gleam with 19 jewels as it vibrates at 21,600 beats per hour. The TY800 utilizes a flying Tourbillon which differs from a conventional Tourbillon in that it relies on a cantilevered single support instead of a full bridge. The Tourbillon cage rotates 360 degrees every minute, with its tail capturing each second that passes.

The caliber TY800 movement is delicately and skillfully hand crafted from over 100 finely crafted components, 70 of which comprise the most complicated part of the movement – the Balance Bridge. The front and back of the main plate are decorated with the Swiss “Perlage manuelle” and “Côte de Genève”, respectively.  

As mentioned previously, the caliber TY800 is a manual wind and not an automatic movement. There are two reasons for this. First, the rotor in an automatic movement would obstruct the visual of the carriage at the 6 o’clock position through the exhibition caseback. Second, a manual wind Tourbillon is thinner than its automatic counterpart, since the escapement would be in line with the balance wheel and without the rotor. 

 

We believe that a high quality, exclusive, well-designed watch should come in premium packaging. You will feel satisfied when you receive your order. 

 

Horween Leather Zulu strap (USD 45)  

Horween Leather Company is one of the worlds recognized high quality leather factory in USA, Chicago since 1905. Each of the strap will include a Horween official hot stamping logo to guarantee it is original and authentic.

Each set will free for one set of strap changing tools.

 

Our partnered manufacturer follows strict procedures to ensure the quality of the watches they produce. Generally, those procedures can be divided into three parts: Technical Control Check, Quality Assurance Check and Final Quality Check. 

During the Technical Control Check, a watch engineer will ensure the watches are in the safety structure from the technical drawing to predict and avoid the potential risks.   

For the Quality Assurance Check, the QA engineer will ensure that the dimensions of each individual component are 100% identical to the technical drawings and that all components pass the QA test, e.g. drop test and movement test.

 

For the Final Quality Check, the final QC engineer will rigorously test all watches, e.g. through water resistance and plating tests. In order to ensure the watches well functioned, all should pass the 240 hours burn-in test before dispatching the products to customers. 

 

1. Decide the “perk” you want to go for. Click the pink button that says, "GET THIS PERK."

2. Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment.

3. You will receive a survey email to select the versions of your watch within 3 days

3. Deliveries should start from February 2019 and can last, according to total quantities backed on Indiegogo.

We will ship the watches worldwide. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable in your region. 

 

We expect to ship the orders from Feb 2019. While we will make every effort to ship your orders on time, we ask for your understanding that slight delays in production may be possible. We will keep you informed of any changes as they arise. 

 

All of our watches will come with a 1 year international warranty. The warranty will cover all parts against manufacturer defects, for which the watch will be repaired or exchanged free of charge. 

 

 1. Keep your watch wound. Winding keeps the watch working, spreads the lubricants and the accuracy should be best with a fully wound watch.   

2. Please avoid any Bumps and Shocks of the watches. Shocks can damage any watch mechanism, scratches to the case or break the minor. Remember your watch is a mechanical watch consisted of more than hundreds of tiny parts.

 3. Cleaning.  If your watch has become dirty, the best way to clean it is with a soft damp cloth.  

4. 3ATM Water resistance. Diving, showering, bathing, taking a jacuzzi or sauna, or any submersion in water whilst wearing your watch should be avoided.  

The more details of the watches care and maintenance will mark in the instruction manual and come with your selected watches.

 

Please feel free to contact us at (info@lenvinowatch.com). We will always be here to answer any questions you may have. 

 

Risks and challenges

Although we are new on Indiegogo and Kickstarter, we have over 28 years of solid experience in the watchmaking industry. We are aware that our project is complex and that there are always unforeseen issues. However, we are confident that our professional manufacturing partners can help us minimize the potential risks by deploying strict quality controls during the manufacturing process.

Our manufacturers stand ready to begin production. Including the time needed to acquire the necessary parts, assemble the watches and perform all necessary checks, we anticipate that the first batch of orders will be delivered to you in about 2 months’ time from start of production. We will, of course, keep you updated on our progress throughout.

Thank you to everyone who has supported the project from the start and to all our backers.
story_txt:
IT WAS SUCH A GREAT SUCCESS AND SURPRISE NEWS FOR US. THANKS EVERYONE!!          Please also stay tuned to our page for our upcoming new project As we have received many comments and feedbacks from Kickstarter that most of the backers are interested to the minutes track markings design instead of hours design. During the Indiegogo in-demand programme, all design will be upgraded to our backers' suggestion. We’re using the best materials and components to build an excessively quality and modern minimal design watches.  Links: Watchuseek, Watchinsider, Fratellowatches, WatchTime  We are offering directly via Indiegogo and Kickstarter, we are able to cut out the retail channel, middlemen markups, brand exclusivity/scarcity, and offer a US 499 real flying tourbillon watch with the most premium materials and modern minimal design watch. Seriously, try to find a better watch for a better price, and we’ll match it. 


Open Heart / Open Balance  
1. Only Display balance wheel spinning back and forth.  
2. The balance wheel, the lever and the escape wheel are all at fixed locations on the movement's base plate no counteract the effects of gravity  
3. Low complication and value 


Real Flying Tourbillon:  
1. Tourbillon is a device which spiral, pallet fork and the escapement were worked on the same axis, and rotating 360 degrees,  
2. Reduce the time difference error caused by gravity  
3. A high complication with hundreds of years traditional watch craftsmanship.
 

LENVINO Watch Co. was started in 2017 Jan, a group of watch-addicts with the passion and constancy of the traditional watch craftsmanship. We believe that the most timeless and desirable timepiece must be the traditional one. We would like to awaken people’s mind about the core function of a watch, thus create our brands. 

In 2017 Dec LENVINO Watch Co. launched its first Kickstarter campaign to fund the World’s First Minimalist Design Rectangular Tourbillon Watch. After 40 days on Kickstarter, it raised a total of HK$ 427,860. The result is the most backed tourbillon project on Kickstarter history. In 2018 April, we returns to Kickstarter to launch our second project “US$149 Japan Automatic Vintage Racing Watch”. After 30 days on Kickstarter, it raised a total of HKD 1,344,752. It was such a great success and surprise result for us.   

Links: World’s First Minimalist Design Rectangular Tourbillon Watch 
Links: US$149 Japan Automatic Vintage Racing Design Watches

With the success of the first two projects, we returns to Indiegogo and Kickstarter to launch our Third collection to you. 

“LENVINO” is inspired by Legend, Tradition and Innovation. We strive to create legendary timepieces by combining traditional craftsmanship and innovative design 
We are a group of watch-addicts who have already worked in the Hong Kong watch industry for over 28 years. We specialized in the design and manufacturing of high-quality quartz and automatic watches. We have established good relationships with the world’s leading watch manufacturers specializing in luxury watches for high-end brands that retail for over US$1,000, as well as renowned watch companies in the retail market with over 400 chain stores worldwide.

 

Our ambition is to create our very own brand, which we can share with watch enthusiasts around the globe. Through “LENVINO”, we are offering high-quality products with unique and exclusive designs comparable to watches at department stores and luxury brands, but at only a fraction of their retail price. 

 

We want to share our love for watches with you. But in order to do that, we need more than just having innovative and tradition designs, quality support from a world leading manufacturing partner, and 28 years of industry experience. Your support will be instrumental in helping us achieve our dream, and we are confident you will be impressed with the design, workmanship and value that our watches offer. 
 


A tourbillon is a historic complication originally designed to improve the accuracy of pocket watches which was invented by the famous watchmaker Abraham-Louis Breguet in 1795. It is the term of a complex feature of traditional watch craftsmanship and present in a classic design of the high-end timepieces. For the purpose to let most of the watch-addicts can appreciate and enjoy for the tourbillon remarkable watch craftsmanship and complication, we used the most premium materials, reliable movement and unique design to create this authentic timepiece and also in a fraction of price to the Swiss mentors.   

Since we have a huge passion for designing unique and exclusive watches, we curated the “Tour Collection 02”. The time-tested hand-winding Tourbillon movement at its core, coupled with modern mininal designs with well-proportioned cases and sapphire crystal mirror. We also offer interchangeable genuine calf leather strap with square Croco pattern for you to choose.
 

Initially, LENVINO “Tour Collection  02” will offer you 5 color combinations and 1 new version to choose from. All watches are equipped with a hand-winding Tourbillon movement and sapphire crystal. 
You will be able to choose the design versions by the survey email within 3 working days
 


All Black- Black sandblasted dial with applied black circular brushed hour mark printed sub dial and silver-tone hands, and "Tourbillon" printed below of the brand metal plate. Circular case with rounded edges in brushed black tone. Black genuine leather strap with tone on tone stitching.
 

All Silver- Silver sandblasted dial with applied silver circular brushed hour mark printed sub dial and blue tone hands, and "Tourbillon" printed below of the brand metal plate. Circular case with rounded edges in polished silver tone. Navy blue genuine leather strap with large square Croco patter and tone on tone stitching. 
 

Black & Silver- Black sandblasted dial with applied silver circular brushed hour mark printed sub dial and hands, and "Tourbillon" printed below of the brand metal plate. Circular case with rounded edges in polished silver tone. Black genuine leather strap with large square Croco patter and tone on tone stitching.

Circular case with rounded edges in polished silver tone. Brown genuine leather strap with large square Croco patter and tone on tone stitching. 
 

Dark Brown & Rose Gold- Dark brown sandblasted dial with applied rose gold tone circular brushed hour mark printed sub dial and hands, and "Tourbillon" printed below of the brand metal plate. Circular case with rounded edges in polished rose gold tone. Dark brown genuine leather strap with large square croco patter and tone on tone stitching. 
 

Silver & Rose Gold- Silver sandblasted dial with applied rose gold tone circular brushed hour mark printed sub dial and hands, and "Tourbillon" printed below of the brand metal plate. Circular case with rounded edges in polished rose gold tone. Dark grey genuine leather strap with large square Croco patter and tone on tone stitching.

story:
As Seen In:

      

 

BIG THANK YOU TO ALL OUR CONTRIBUTORS!

We cannot describe how grateful we are for all the overwhelming support we have received!

We are now contacting all of our contributors for their sizing information. Please feel free to contact me at michelle@lightactivewear.com if you have any questions!

Did not have a chance to contribute in time, no worries! We are now taking pre-orders for all four "We Care" styles. Just e-mail me at michelle@lightactivewear.com and we'll make sure you'll be the first ones to wear these fantastic Eco-friendly pieces!

Announcing our first Stretch Goal: $12,500

We are super excited to announce our stretch goal to take Anima Riding Pants into the sampling and production process. This tapered pair of pants is perfect to wear with your favourite pair of boots. We are also going to contribute $500 to the Vancouver Rape Relief and Women’s Shelter upon successfully achieving our stretch goal. If there is any way for us to contribute more to the community, we want to do it!  

We are adding TWO new perks:

1. $25 – You will receive a 50% discount coupon code to our Light Activewear on-line store. Be the VERY FIRST to receive this special discount to our SUMMER BLOW OUT SALE EVENT. Also, receive a Micro-Fibre gym towel with laundry bag when you make your purchase on-line! $5 from this perk will also be donated to the Vancouver Rape Relief & Women's Shelter.

2. $75 – Be the VERY FIRST to receive the Anima Riding Pants! Using our unique fabric, this pant is slimming and very flattering to wear. Please don’t worry about choosing the size now. We will contact you after our campaign ends and find the perfect size for you.

 


Helping Vancouver Rape Relief & Women's Shelter

Currently 1 in 4 North American women will be sexually assaulted during their lifetime, however of every 100 incidents of sexual assault, only 6 are reported to the police.

Rape is a topic that isn't openly discussed enough, and we really want to support the victims by improving their lifestyle. Studies have show that women that are active:
* Develop a higher self esteem
* Has a lowered level of depression
* Decreases their chances of developing chronic diseases such as diabetes and heart conditions.

For the month of May, every piece sold from this campaign will be matched with the donation of one Light Activewear item to the Vancouver Rape Relief & Women's Shelter.

We strongly believe that a healthy mind and body increases your confidence and happiness.


The We Care Campaign

While fashion is our first love, we understand that clothing production takes a toll on the environment and we want to do our part. As a responsible business, we strive to bring more sustainable, earth-friendly clothing into our collection. All items from the We Care collection are made from 100% recycled polyester. By choosing to wear clothing that is environmentally conscious, not only will you look amazing but also feel great knowing you’re contributing to a greater good.

The exclusive We Care logo represents our commitment to the improvement of the environment and is incorporated into every piece of clothing in this collection made to contribute to this cause. 

 

What is Recycled Polyester?

Recycled polyester is a synthetic fibre based on post-consumer waste, such as plastic bottles and used garments. The raw material is reprocessed and spun into fibres. Using recycled polyester helps us reduce our dependency on petroleum; allowing us to discharge less waste and reduce toxic emissions from incinerators.

That’s not ALL! The signature fabric for our jacket and pants is made from a unique blend of “Dope Dyed Yarn”.

 

What is Dope Dye Yarn?

Dope Dyed Yarn is a synthetic yarn where the polymer, before the extrusion process, is mixed with dye and the extruded fibres are then coloured. What this means is that fabric made from Dope Dyed Yarn no longer needs to be dyed in large chemical filled lots. About 85% of water used in textile processing goes into dying fabrics. It takes about 20 gallons of water to produce one lot of fabric. So for every lot of fabric we make, we save 17 gallons of fresh water!

By using this material in our collection, we strive to keep plastic bottles out of landfills and conserve the use of fresh water.

 

Rewards

Be one of the first to own pieces of this beautiful and sustainable line! To thank you for your generous support, we have put together the below rewards.

1. The Anna tee - Great everyday piece you can use for layering. We made the hem line a little longer so you can move with ease!

2. The Pearl pant - The pants that goes with everything! We added magnetic buttons on the two back pockets so you can have your hands free.

3. The Darla jacket - Look elegant and sexy in this jacket whether you are heading to class or just walking around town.  This functional jacket provides light coverage with two side zipper pockets.

4. The complete outfit (size chart included below for reference)

Where Does the Money Go?

The cost of sustainable raw materials is much higher compared to non-sustainable materials due to the lack of demand from apparel companies. Therefore, fabric suppliers have little incentive to invest more of their resources into sustainable raw material product development. With your support, we can help challenge the status quo and increase the use of sustainable materials.

The money raised from the campaign will go towards meeting the very high minimums for taking these products into production. By increasing the volume of orders in the industry, we can contribute to the total demand for sustainable clothing which will lower the overall manufacturing cost (and therefore retail price). This will help make sustainable products more accessible to the mainstream market.

 

Who We Are

Light Activewear was started by two über-active sisters with a great love for fitness and fashion.

Currently, our team consists of the two of us and our two canine associates. From design, sampling, production to marketing and sales, we execute every aspect of our operation ourselves. 

Our clothing is currently being sold in fitness studios across Canada and the U.S., as well as in a number of countries overseas.

Photo by Judy Anna Madarasz (judymadarasz.com)

FAQ

How do I pick the size for my reward?

Not to worry! Here is how Indiegogo works: We receive your contact information when you contribute, and after the campaign, we'll reach out to have you confirm the size you'd like.    

What is the timeline for receiving my rewards?

Given that the recycled polyester yarn is very specialized, the production for the fabric is much longer. We estimated that we will ship the clothes your way in November 2013. Thank you for your support and patience during the process of building a more sustainable clothing company.

Light Activewear was started by two über-active sisters with a great love for fitness and fashion.
Currently, our team consists of the two of us and our two canine associates. From design, sampling, production to marketing and sales, we execute every aspect of our operation ourselves. 
Our clothing is currently being sold in fitness studios across Canada and the U.S., as well as in a number of countries overseas.

Photo by Judy Anna Madarasz (judymadarasz.com)
FAQ
How do I pick the size for my reward?
Not to worry! Here is how Indiegogo works: We receive your contact information when you contribute, and after the campaign, we'll reach out to have you confirm the size you'd like.    
What is the timeline for receiving my rewards?
Given that the recycled polyester yarn is very specialized, the production for the fabric is much longer. We estimated that we will ship the clothes your way in November 2013. Thank you for your support and patience during the process of building a more sustainable clothing company.

story:
All profits from this campaign will be distributed to many deserving organizations in the area of women's health via our Avon Breast Cancer walk team.  This is our creative way of fundraising- and you get a cool shirt out of it!  

Represent the strength of women everywhere and open the door to sharing your stories with the iconic pink ribbon gracefully over your shoulder

Be more inspiring than a pink shirt in a crowd 

Tangerine, White, Black, and Blue color options

Note: I'll send out a survey once the campaign concludes to collect color, style, and size info from you- you won't get asked upon choosing your perk. 

The breast cancer awareness ribbon is built right into the design of the shirt in a way that isn’t too over the top, but is still strong, feminine and flattering.  The diagonal stripe across the abdomen also gives you a nice hourglass look.  

I’m a long time performance-gear-obsessed kinda girl, so it had to meet my high standards for feeling and fitting well for high-output activities. I think you’re going to love wearing this shirt both inside and outside the gym, tennis court, or yoga studio.  And thanks to early feedback from dozens of women, we are also offering a long-sleeve option in addition to a tank top for extra cover-up, layering, and sun protection for backers at $50 or more. 

Long Sleeve
Long-sleeve fits like a yummy soft baselayer

Depending on your contribution level, you can choose between a tank top or a long sleeve shirt (or get both, of course!) in sizes ranging from S-XL and in your choice of color: white, black, light blue, and Tangerine (for special contributors at $100 and up). Sizes are meant to be fitted like baselayers but not compression-tight (the models in the pictures above are wearing a size medium).  Fabric is a performance 4-way-stretchy knit which wicks away moisture and moves with your body for an amazing and comfortable feel on your skin.

By working out for awareness, we give this cause a voice, and we demonstrate how strong we women are both as friends and survivors. I hope that the Rally shirt will help facilitate conversations and rally the people around you to help the hidden millions of cancer survivors share their stories while connecting to a purpose larger than themselves.

Note: In the video, Sheri is wearing an early prototype in a t-shirt style, but we've since decided to offer a tank top and a long-sleeved shirt based on early feedback (so just note that the short-sleeved option is not available).  The pictures here represent the final look well. 

The Rally story

Sheri killing it at her Crossfit workout, two weeks after her final treatment

As soon as I met Sheri I was a huge fan. Here was this kick ass woman- with no hair- laughing and talking about the last tough workout in her gym while having brunch at a friend’s house. After a friend asked about her hair situation, Sheri told us about her incredible journey of how she's worked through her breast cancer treatments one appointment and one workout at a time. It turns out that her bold and bald dome had invited many people to reach out with their own personal stories of cancer and treatment and solidarity.  This support- often from complete strangers in airports and grocery stores- turned out to be an essential part of Sheri’s healing process.

Our chance meeting lead into a treasured friendship and breast cancer walk team, and being the fashion design student I wanted our team to do better than the boring pink shirt that everyone else was wearing. We're athletes, not princesses, so it had to be fun, high-performance and sexy like us.  I got to work, and after weeks of iterations I created an original design that I hoped would represent the cause well and serve as a conversation starter to help people connect with others whose lives and loved ones have also been touched by cancer.  Since then I've heard dozens of meaningful stories- many from women I had just met- that have made me realize that cancer is all around us and needs a voice.  I hope you will help others share their own stories by boldly working out for a cause with us. 

My dining table workspace and trusty assistant Amos

Where your money goes

We’re raising money because it takes a certain minimum number of units to manufacture these professionally. $5000 covers the essential production, materials, and shipping costs for this minimum order size, produced locally in a garment factory in San Francisco. Any money we raise that doesn't go towards producing the shirt will be given Sheri's Avon Walk for Breast Cancer fundraising challenge to support cancer research and women's health.  

And if we find that people are into what this is all about, we hope to continue to sell Rally gear for future breast cancer events and even expand to other causes and styles (including some for men too). By backing this project, you will be helping this women-owned, mission-driven company get off the ground with our first product, and will be contributing real dollars towards women's health via the Avon walk campaign. Thank you for checking us out!

Look at those baby guns! Thank you for checking out the project -Beth

 

Risks and challenges

Athletics has long been a part of our lives but we are new to producing fashion en masse, so there may be unanticipated delays in the details of sourcing and production. We have already visited the production facility and have fabric choices lined up, which will help speed things along.

Also, colors may vary slightly from what you see here and are impossible to represent completely accurately with photos and different types of computer screens. Rest assured any fabric we use will be built for high-performance activity (ie no cotton) and we will do whatever we can to get as close to the colors shown as possible.

story:
Hello everybody!

We are Marianna, Marco and Chiara - two visual artists and a young fashion designer, the creative trio behind the label. We are Italian expats who have been living in Berlin for the last two years. In 2011, we decided to found and launch a new brand, that mixes art and fashion: MARC ANDERSEN.

MARC ANDERSEN is better than a simple brand. It is an alter ego. A mix between creativity and dreams, authenticity and style.The trends, colors and shapes of Berlin inspire the visionary approach of Marc Andersen’s design.The scarves collections are a visual representation of the urban chromatisms and contemporary geometries that embrace this city. From the Nu Disco Music to the young underground cultural scene and the 80’s revival.

The design is unisex. A must have for people looking for something unique, transforming basic outfits into something new and extraordinary with just a simple touch. This, mixed with the extra limited collection approach developed by MARC ANDERSEN, makes every scarf a beautiful and one-of-a-kind artwork piece. The main idea behind our Marc Andersen brand is to offer a kind of wearable, affordable contemporary art. A unique piece that is not hanging on the wall, but can interact with people and urban spaces.

That is why all of MARC ANDERSEN scarves are produced in exclusive limited editions. Our motto reflects the philosophy of the label: Wear your MARC ANDERSEN. And be unique.

Website: www.marcandersen.com

Facebook: www.facebook.com/marcandersenberlin

 

 

The making of MARC ANDERSEN

MARC ANDERSEN is not only unique. MARC ANDERSEN is also 100% Made in Europe . All the scarves are designed in Berlin, but made and printed in Como (Italy), a city famous for its high quality silk production. Berlin thus brings a funky design, but the manufacture and quality are totally Italian.

The scarves collections are unisex and available in an extra-large format of 120x120 cm in 100% silk or 100% modal.

What we have done until now.

Our first collection is already on the market, selling across Berlin, Europe and Canada! We designed the second one, that was presented with a runway show during the last Berlin Fashion Week 2012 but we have no money for the production. The creative process is over, the projects are ready, and our printing-house in Italy is waiting for the green light to make an order of fabrics and finally start the production. If you support us, our new scarves will finally come to life.

Your Support

Your support will fund the initial order of the new collection and the development of the MARC ANDERSEN brand. We were also invited to two upcoming fashion events in Paris and New York, that we cannot afford without your help.

Rewards

We’re offering MARC ANDERSEN scarves as a reward on Indiegogo. Shipping is included in Europe. If you live outside Europe, please add 5$ for shipping.

If your rewards includes multiple items, everything will be shipped to the same address. To thank you for your oh-so-precious support we have prepared a serie of lovely rewards. No matter how much you donate, you will get something but the three following rewards have been thought for those who will chose to donate more than 25$

The ORIGINAL LIMITED EDITION PRINT is hand printed by the MARC ANDERSEN team on high quality paper, and is inspired by graphics from the last collection is designed to embellish your home.

The LIMITED EDITION SHOPPER BAG sports a unique MARC ANDERSEN hand printed graphic and is a perfect reward for all fashion and details lovers.

The handmade SKETCH BOOK features graphics within the cover dedicated to all creative souls.

Don't worry, if you cant donate you can still help! 

You can follow us on Twitter, and you can like our Facebook page. Spread the buzz!

Thank you for your support and your love!

MARC ANDERSEN team

story:
invisaWear is attractive and smart jewelry which instantly sends your location to emergency dispatchers and loved ones during an emergency.
 

We designed invisaWear to be discreet and to easily fit into your everyday life. The charm containing the technology is small, stylish and can be used in a variety of ways including a necklace, bracelet, choker, keychain, simply clipped to your bag or purse on any major brand of jewelry.

 


We designed invisaWear to make pressing the device with one hand easy, but not so easy that you accidentally trigger an alert. We achieved this by precisely tuning the amount of pressure needed to activate invisaWear and using a two press system.
 


We also included a battery life designed to last one year, so you don’t have to worry about remembering to charge another device. And, the Bluetooth technology inside allows you to contact help even if your smartphone is up to 30 feet away.









invisaWear is perfect for anyone who wants to protect themselves or a loved one.

invisaWear products are perfect for:

 

invisaWear works with a companion app on your smartphone and it’s super easy to use.

 

If you ever can't speak during an emergency, simply double click your device to send a text with your location to loved ones. The optional Contact 9-1-1 feature (available only in the US) can connect your loved ones to 9-1-1 to speak on your behalf and share your location.

For more information, take a look at our CEO, Rajia, doing a demo of the invisaWear! 


This video below is an overview of how the app works and how to set it up! 
 

 

 

Major Update: invisaWear has now reached the manufacturing stage! We are well on our way to making the world a safer place. Check out the footage of invisaWear in production at this very moment!​

 
Rajia and Ray visiting our manufacturing partners
 

These lifesaving micro chips are ready to be placed in their 14K Gold plated outer shells.

 

The jewelry molds are already manufactured and ready for large volume production!

 



If you can speak during an emergency, we recommend using One Touch 9-1-1 in the app (rather than dialing 9-1-1 from your keypad) to call and send your precise location to 9-1-1 nearest to where you are. Using One Touch 9-1-1 has proven to show faster and more effective response times by 1 to 5 minutes.

The invisaWear founders testing with a local Public Safety Answering Point to see how the technology helps revolutionize the way 9-1-1 receives data.

 

Our proprietary patent-pending technology powered by RapidSOS can share your name and location with any 9-1-1 dispatch center in the United States, even if you don’t know where you are.

 


See how invisaWear compares to traditional personal security devices in the graphic below:

The invisaWear team all came together because they had each faced concerns regarding their personal safety or the safety of people they love and care about.

Our founder, Rajia, used to carry pepper spray while she was in college because she’d feel uncomfortable walking back to her car late at night. One day, a curious bystander picked up her pepper spray and attempted to press it. Worried that in an actual emergency the attacker would grab the pepper spray and try to use it against her, Rajia looked online to find a device that could allow her to quickly and discreetly alert her loved ones during an emergency. However, everything she found was big, bulky and unappealing to wear.

Frustrated by the unbelievable statistics (1 in 4 college women are sexually assaulted before graduating college), Rajia and co-founder Ray felt morally obligated to use their engineering skills to create life-saving technology and embed it within fashionable items that people already love to wear.

 

Frequently Asked Questions
 

Does the alert go directly to 911?
If you have the optional and free contact 9-1-1 feature enabled, when you double press your invisaWear, it will send an automated phone call to your emergency contacts prompting them to press 1 to connect via voice with 911 dispatchers near your location. The 911 dispatcher will be able to view your location on their screen.

Is there a version for Men? 
Yes, there is a silver keychain that works for both men and women. Please select silver keychain at checkout for the unisex option. 

How do my contacts get notified?
Your emergency contacts will receive a text message letting them know you initiated an emergency alert and will receive a link with your GPS location. If you have the free and optional contact 911 feature enabled, your emergency contacts will be connected via a phone call with the nearest 911 dispatcher closest to you at the time of the emergency.

Do I need to have my cell phone with me?
Yes. The invisaWear component uses a Bluetooth connection with a paired smartphone that can be up-to 30 feet away.

Do I need to charge the battery?
No! We did not want to burden you with yet another accessory you have to remember to charge. The invisaWear component has a 1 year lifetime. After 1 year, we’ll send you a notification on the companion app to purchase a replacement component at a discount!

What happens if I accidentally press the button?
For all you clumsies out there, no need to worry. invisaWear is designed just for you! A rapid double button press is required in order to initiate an alert. Additionally, the button actuation point is designed so that a substantial amount of pressure is required to press the button.

In the very rare case that you do accidentally activate an alert, that’s okay! Simply open your companion app within 30 seconds to notify your contacts & the police that you’ve canceled the alert. A 911 dispatcher may need your verbal confirmation that you don’t actually need help.

How do I select who gets notified in an emergency?
After purchasing an invisaWear, you simply install the free invisaWear Companion app onto your smartphone. The companion app allows you to select a group of up to 5 contacts who you would like to be notified during an emergency.

Can I change my contacts at anytime?
Yes of course! Anytime you’d like to switch your emergency contacts, simply open the companion app to update your list.

Are there any subscriptions or additional fees?
Nope. No monthly payments are necessary. We want to make sure you always can get help without breaking the bank. Please note that message and data rates may apply.

Please be aware that your invisaWear component has a battery designed to last one year and after the year is over, your invisaWear component will need to be replaced. Replacement components are offered at a discount!

Does my invisaWear track my location?
Yes, but only to ensure the fastest possible response time during an emergency.

Who is invisaWear for?

Can I test the emergency alert system?
Absolutely! We encourage users to test the system to make sure the setup was properly completed and that they know exactly what to expect during an emergency. Using the “Test Alert” feature in our companion app allows you and your emergency contacts to safely test the emergency notification system.

What smartphones are compatible with invisaWear?

  • Smartphones running Android™ version 6.0+
  • iPhone® models running iOS 9.0+
