story:
The Charlie Shirt

For teens with autism and sensory processing disorders to fit in and feel comfortable

Autism and Compression

1 in 68 children is diagnosed with autism spectrum disorder. A person with autism typically has sensory disorders meaning senses can be intensified or be diminished. People with a diminished sense of touch may exhibit arm flapping, excessive hugging or crawling under heavy objects such as mattresses or couch cushions in order to feel pressure.

Deep pressure therapy, such as hugging, squeezing, or swaddling, has been shown to be beneficial for people with sensory disorders, providing a sense of calm and relaxation. One way to provide deep pressure therapy is through compression clothing that provides a consistent firm sensory input.

While there are products on the market claiming to provide deep pressure therapy, many are expensive, lower quality, and not stylish. Teens with autism are already three times more likely to be bullied and the existing deep pressure therapy garments can lead teens with autism to stand out even more.

 

What's Unique?

Molly Fuller Design garments uses a power stretch compression material instead of weights or inflatables for deep pressure therapy. This eliminates the need to carry around (and potentially lose) extra items such as weights or a pump. Molly Fuller compression shirts can be worn all day long (compared to weighted vests) and are stylish and sleek enough to be worn on their own or under clothing.

 

 

Compression Shirt Comparison

Molly Fuller Design products are made to specifically address sensory needs by providing consistent and comforting deep pressure for the wearer. In comparison, Nike and Under Armour shirts are designed for athletes to promote blood flow and wicking away sweat.

Athletic compression shirts and other autism compression shirts apply less pressure because they use a lower percentage of spandex (5-8%), compared to Molly Fuller Design’s shirts, which are made up of 12% spandex.

Spio compression shirts are made for joint stability. They have zippers in the back, requiring assistance to put on, and apply more restriction than everyone with sensory disorders needs.

Molly Fuller Design is made in the USA and uses brushed spandex to provide firm pressure with the softest feel possible. The Charlie Shirt is unique with stylish details that provide tactile sensory input and act as a built in fidget. The Charlie Shirt eliminates irritation through three-needle cover stitching on the seams and a tag-less construction.
 

 

 

Why Back Molly Fuller Design

I’ve come as far as I can on my own, I’d love your support so I can continue to sustainably produce affordable and stylish garments that also improve peoples’ lives. The cost of finding new fabrics, developing and testing prototypes, and gathering feedback can easily be several thousand dollars, not including my time.

The $10K will allow me to:

  • Manufacture more long sleeve Charlie Shirts
  • Produce a short sleeve version of the Charlie Shirt
  • Add graphics and prints to the Charlie Shirt
  • Develop, test, and produce new products (such as blazers, sweatshirts, shorts, and pants)
     

By backing Molly Fuller Design, you are supporting our mission to help families and teens with autism. Even if you don’t personally have a connection to autism you can choose to donate a product to two great autism organizations, Fraser and the Autism Society of Minnesota.  A teen with autism is three times more likely to be bullied than their sibling, help me continue to create stylish, functional and affordable products that bring positive attention to a teen and help them feel comfortable and confident.  

 

About Molly Fuller

I've combined my background in fashion design with my experience in health care and human-centered design at the Mayo Clinic and UnitedHealth Care, to make stylish products that also address medical needs.

My first shirt, the Charlie Shirt, went through multiple iterations and testing with teens with autism across the States.

I plan to continue to work closely with people with autism and their families to design the next line of products by testing new concepts and gathering feedback.

 

What Do You Get?

 

I don't care about Perks. 

If you don’t want a Perk simply hit the “Back It” button at the top of this page to donate to your heart’s content. Any amount of support is truly appreciated.

 

I love Perks!

If you’d like to get a Perk for your donation simply click on the “Get This Perk” button for the perk you want! All shirts come with the option for you to either keep the shirt for yourself or donate it to one of the autism organizations I’ve collaborated with, Fraser or the Autism Society of Minnesota.

Shirts fit both boys and girls 

Back To Top

story:
Thank You!

We want to thank everybody, who helped us with a donation or by sharing the idea. The project will be continued. For further updates visit BlockPRISM.org.

BlockPRISM enables encryption in a simple way for everybody without tradeoffs.


Our goal is to offer encryption to everybody by creating simple-to-use tools that automate message encryption and integrate into your social networks seamlessly.

The NSA scandal showed that there is a need for secure communication. Although encryption technology has existed now for some time, it has not been widely adopted by the public, because it can be complicated. We want to solve this problem by implementing smart encryption tools that anyone can use easily.

BlockPRISM allows you to securely and seamlessly encrypt messages in your social networks and email without even having to think twice.

We have implemented a Chrome browser extension as a first prototype. The extension encrypts Facebook chats by default (see video). We are initiating this campaign to finish development and enable GMail encryption and mobile usage on iPhone and Android smartphones. Please help us spread the word and consider making a donation.

How it works

The Chrome browser extension enables encryption of Facebook messages and GMail emails with minimum interaction. Just install the extension and enter a passphrase, that’s all. The extension creates the necessary key pair in the background and shares the public key with your friends. Whenever you write a message, your friend’s public key is used to encrypt the message before it is sent. Received encrypted messages are decrypted with your private key in the background and shown. The extension will be ported to the Firefox and Opera browsers. Because most of the communication today is mobile, we want to create applications for your iPhone or Android too.

How can we ensure the encryption works?

We use strong public private key encryption that is widely used (PGP) and proven. All code will be released as open source. Every programmer can see how it works and validate that the encryption is safe. We promise that the access to the applications will always be free. For advanced questions about encryption, have a look at our FAQ.

Who we are

We are a group of three software engineering students from the Hasso Plattner Institute in Germany and a mechanical engineering student from Stanford University. Our background is in encryption, web- and mobile development. We have successfully developed websites and iOS applications (http://epic.hpi.uni-potsdam.de/Home/HanaOncolyzer).

Team:

Carolyn Estrada
Stefan George
Felix Leupold
Thomas Klingbeil

Why do we need money?

BlockPRISM is our side project on which we work after hours. We would like to focus on BlockPRISM and offer it for free. Without your donations, this won’t be possible. Every donation is a validation for the need for simple encryption and a sign that people want to decide for themselves who can access their information, instead of leaving this decision to big, anonymous companies.

Thank you for your support!

story:
our goals

our story

what we offer

useful instructions

οι στόχοι μας

η ιστορία μας

τι σας προσφέρουμε

χρήσιμες οδηγίες

New perk for the whole family!

Get ready for warm Christmas nights with matching slippers for all your family!

New perk!

You and Mini-You <3

Plektronio needs you to grow!

To do so, we need your contribution to make personalized knits for everybody. With each knit you are getting, you are helping us come closer to our goal.

Το plektronio σας χρειάζεται για να μεγαλώσει!

Για να το καταφέρουμε, χρειαζόμαστε τη συμβολή σας για να φτιάξουμε ξεχωριστά πλεκτά για όλους! Με κάθε πλεκτό που αποκτάτε, μας βοηθάτε να φτάσουμε πιο κοντά στο στόχο μας.

We need you to help us to…

Stash our high quality yarns

All our knits are made using pure merino, alpaca and 100% cotton yarns. We need to be able to order lots and lots of our selected high quality yarns and accessories in bulk so that we stock them in competitive prices.

Establish our production workflow and inventory platform

Our proposed business model that allows you to fully customize your garments (mass customization) requires a flexible yet clean-cut organized inventory platform and a production workflow that will allows us to knit-on-time℠ your unique garments without compromising the handmade quality of our products. For us it is really important to manage delivering your orders on time, so that you can wear and enjoy it for the whole season ahead!

Build a new online home for plektronio

We need to design and develop an online platform for plektronio that goes beyond a simple eshop. More than that, we want to design a platform that will enable you to fully customize your garments, taking part in the making process while we knit-for-you℠. This way, you can be creative by having full control over the final product by selecting its size, color combinations and matching accessories, while we do the knitting for you. In plektronio, we wish to make as unique garments as you are!

Fine-tune our business model

Making unique personalized items for everybody is not an easy task - this is why large companies avoid it. It is actually a business and logistic nightmare. We would like to change this by developing an innovative yet robust and scalable model that can be sustainable throughout the lifecycle of our products. Our goal is to establish and benchmark our new services knit-on-time℠ and knit-for-you℠ while this campaign runs. This way we can accurately monitor your needs and preferences while under-the-hood we perform all the adjustments to assure the sustainability of our business.

Enhance our collection with clothing and special garments

We are piling up new knitting and crochet patterns that are waiting to be transformed into precious handmade apparels. As making unique garments involves unique designs we would like to engage designers around the globe that will make exclusive patterns for plektronio. We are so much looking forward to show you our future collections of heirloom lacy cardigans or hip hooded sweaters, perky dresses and pants as well as gloves, mittens, arm- and legwarmers and many (really many!) more!

Plektronio's little tale

Contrary to the knitting tradition of many Greek families, I never sat next to my grandma to learn how to knit. But as I really love handmade garments, I started to experiment making my own. 

During that time, one of my best friends was expecting her baby girl, Elli, and I was her impatient promised-to-be godmother. Looking for a unique and warm present for her upcoming birth, I knitted her first pair of crispy white Mary Janes with cute little wooden buttons. I simply fell for the handcrafting experience!

It was amazing how it became viral. I couldn't believe how much joy a pair of knitted shoes could bring. Very soon I realized that I could do this for all of my friends trying different designs, colors and embellishments matching their babies' personality. 

And this is how my first collection of knitted baby shoes started.

I spent the next year designing carefully my knitting campaign, ordering tons of patterns, stashing colorful yarns and mastering my knitting and crochet techniques. I started making various combinations of colors, embellishments and accessories rendering one single pattern into multiple unique items. Transforming this home-based hobby to an actual small business, came as a natural next step. 

Now it is time to knit BIG!

Getting the encouragement and support from all our plektronio friends who have loved our baby hand-knitted shoes, we decided that time has come to grow and knit also for you, your kids and your grown-up beloved ones.

And there is much more than that: We want to use our handcrafting skills to make unique and custom knitwear for every member of your family and friends letting you choose the design, the colors, the combinations and the matching accessories of your taste.

There is so much more in a handmade knit than the way it looks: there is warmth, love, tenderness and also effort for the person who has made it or selected it as a special gift for a special someone. Although unapologetically simple, wooly garments are carrying a beautiful heritage - and this is what makes them indefinitely valuable!

And this is what we truly value! To knit handmade, unique and fully personalized garments which will match your taste and last for many unique plektronio outfits. 

You get to choose the design, the colors, the combinations and the matching accessories of your taste. What more can you get?

You get to choose in return any of our offered perks!

All our perks are offered in discount prices as long as our campaign last. Plus you get free shipping for all orders to Greece! Be sure to order on time to get all your Christmas & New Year's Eve presents from plektronio.

A pair of our newly introduced series of booties made exclusively with organic yarn

Our popular booties in toddlers and kids sizes!

Heads up! Our hats can be customized for boys or girls

A snuggly and versatile cowl for toddlers & kids

Yes, you and your older loved ones can have our knitted slippers too!

Handmade buttons or fluffy pom poms, you can embellish your hat any way you like!

Wrap yourself in our chic and warm cowls!

Steps for becoming a plektronio supporter:

  1. take a look at our designs. (for more, check our gallery)
  2. we would kindly ask you to add 5€ if ordering outside Greece
  3. would you like to order more of our knits? even better! just fill in the sum of your order (or repeat the process)
  4. all our knits are custom-knitted for you. this means that you will not see any special buttons for selecting your size or color
  5. as soon as we receive your contribution, we will contact you to send us the size and the color for your garment
  6. pay for your contribution via paypal or credit card
  7. wait for your package :)
  8. wear a plektronio & be unique!
  9. post a photo or a video wearing your new plektronio knit and share it on our facebook page!

Share our passion to knit

We would really appreciate any contribution you can make to push our ambitious project a little further. It will be as much as useful to us if you could spent a moment and spread the word about our effort. 

If you are a social butterfly, we do count on your impact to your network of friends. If not, just click on the easy-to-use Indiegogo share tools below to make other people aware of our campaign.

We love your feedback; so feel free to send us your comments or questions. You can also reach us on the social media (facebook, twitter, pinterest, youtube and vimeo channel).

Let’s knit together and share our passion to knit handcrafted designs that look and are handmade – not homemade!


Χρειαζόμαστε τη βοήθειά σας για να…

Προμηθευτούμε τις πρώτες ύλες για τα πλεκτά μας

Για τα πλεκτά μας χρησιμοποιούμε μόνο νήματα εξαιρετικής ποιότητας από μαλλί μερινό, αλπάκα και 100% βαμβάκι. Για να προμηθευτούμε τα υλικά αυτής της ποιότητας στην καλύτερη δυνατή τιμή, χρειάζεται να προχωρήσουμε σε παραγγελία χονδρικής και να εξασφαλίσουμε το συνδυασμό ποιότητας και κόστους.

Φτιάξουμε ένα καινούριο σπίτι για το plektronio

Φιλοδοξούμε να σχεδιάσουμε μια πρωτότυπη διαδικτυακή πλατφόρμα, ειδικά για το plektronio που δεν θα είναι απλά ένα ακόμα eshop. Στόχος μας είναι να αναπτύξουμε μια πλατφόρμα που θα σας επιτρέπει να σχεδιάσετε και να παραγγείλετε το πλεκτό σας ακριβώς όπως εσείς θέλετε, επιλέγοντας το μέγεθος, τους χρωματικούς συνδυασμούς και τα αξεσουάρ του. Με αυτόν τον τρόπο, θα δημιουργήσετε εσείς οι ίδιοι το δικό σας, μοναδικό πλεκτό, ενώ εμείς θα το ετοιμάζουμε για εσάς. Στο plektronio, θέλουμε να φτιάξουμε πλεκτά τόσο μοναδικά όσο εσείς!

Αναπτύξουμε το επιχειρηματικό μας μοντέλο

Η φιλοσοφία του επιχειρηματικού μας μοντέλου έχει στόχο να σας επιτρέπει να επιλέγετε εσείς οι ίδιοι όλες τις παραμέτρους που αφορούν τα πλεκτά σας. Για να μπορέσουμε να διαχειριστούμε τις παραγγελίες μας, συνδυάζοντας τη μοναδικότητα και ιδιαιτερότητα του χειροποίητου με την έγκαιρη παράδοση της παραγγελίας σας, χρειαζόμαστε το σχεδιασμό μιας εξειδικευμένης και ευέλικτης γραμμής παραγωγής. Είναι πολύ σημαντικό για εμάς να βελτιστοποιήσουμε την παραγγελία σας με τέτοιο τρόπο ώστε να είμαστε σε θέση να σας παραδώσουμε την παραγγελία σας εγκαίρως, ώστε να μπορείτε να φοράτε και να χαίρεστε τα πλεκτά σας για όλη τη σεζόν!

Εμπλουτίσουμε τη συλλογή μας με ρούχα και πλεκτά αντικείμενα

Στο εργαστήριό μας υπάρχουν δεκάδες καινούρια πατρόν που περιμένουν να μεταμορφωθούν σε υπέροχες πλεκτές δημιουργίες. Επειδή πιστεύουμε ότι τα ξεχωριστά πλεκτά ρούχα απαιτούν και ξεχωριστά σχέδια, θέλουμε να εμπλέξουμε σχεδιαστές από όλο τον κόσμο για να εμπνευστούν νέα σχέδια ειδικά για το plektronio. Ανυπομονούμε να σας δείξουμε τις επόμενες συλλογές μας με φορέματα, ζακέτες, γάντια, γκέτες και πολλά πολλά ακόμα!

Η μικρή ιστορία του plektronio

Παρόλα τα άπειρα πλεκτά της γιαγιάς μου που έχω φορέσει ως παιδί, ποτέ δεν κάθισα δίπλα της για να μάθω να πλέκω. Έχοντας, όμως, μια ιδιαίτερη αγάπη για τα χειροποίητα ρούχα, ξεκίνησα να πειραματίζομαι φτιάχνοντας τα δικά μου. 

Εκείνη την περίοδο, περίμενα να γεννηθεί η μικρή μου βαφτιστήρα, Έλλη, και σαν ανυπόμονη νονά, ήθελα να της ετοιμάσω ένα ξεχωριστό δώρο. Έτσι της έπλεξα τα πρώτα της λευκά πλεκτά παπουτσάκια διακοσμημένα με μικρά ξύλινα κουμπιά. Ήταν πραγματικά μια ξεχωριστή εμπειρία!

Και αυτή ήταν μόνο η αρχή! Δεν μπορούσα να πιστέψω πόσα χαμόγελα μπορούσε να φέρει ένα ζευγάρι από μικρά πλεκτά παπουτσάκια. Σύντομα συνειδητοποίησα ότι μπορούσα να πλέκω για τα παιδιά ολοένα και περισσότερων φίλων μου, δοκιμάζοντας διαφορετικά σχέδια, χρώματα, αξεσουάρ που ταίριαζαν στο γούστο και στην προσωπικότητά τους. 

Κάπως έτσι ξεκίνησε η πρώτη μου σειρά από πλεκτά βρεφικά παπουτσάκια.

Πέρασα τον επόμενο χρόνο σχεδιάζοντας με προσοχή την παρουσίαση των πλεκτών μου, παραγγέλλοντας άπειρα πατρόν και πολύχρωμα νήματα και τελειοποιώντας τις τεχνικές μου στο πλέξιμο. Μετά από λίγο καιρό, η έναρξη της μικρής μου επιχείρησης ήρθε σαν το επόμενο φυσικό βήμα. 

Τώρα ήρθε η ώρα για να μεγαλώσουμε!

Με την ενθάρρυνση και υποστήριξη από όλους τους φίλους του plektronio οι οποίοι αγάπησαν τα χειροποίητα πλεκτά παπουτσάκια της συλλογής μας, αποφασίσαμε ότι έφτασε η ώρα να μεγαλώσουμε την επιχείρησή μας και να πλέξουμε και για εσάς, τα παιδιά σας και τους μεγαλύτερους αγαπημένους σας!

Και δεν σταματάμε εδώ: Θέλουμε να χρησιμοποιήσουμε όλη μας την τέχνη στο πλέξιμο και να φτιάξουμε μοναδικά πλεκτά για εσάς, τα παιδιά και το σύντροφό σας, σχεδιασμένα και πλεγμένα όχι μόνο στα μέτρα σας αλλά και σύμφωνα με το σχέδιο, το χρώμα, τους συνδυασμούς και τα αξεσουάρ που εσείς θα διαλέξετε. 

Αυτό έχει αξία για εμάς! Να πλέξουμε ρούχα και αξεσουάρ που είναι χειροποίητα, μοναδικά και προσαρμοσμένα στο δικό σας γούστο για πολλές ξεχωριστές εμφανίσεις.

Μπορείτε να επιλέξετε ένα (ή και περισσότερα!) από τα πλεκτά μας!

Όλα τα πλεκτά προσφέρονται σε ειδικές τιμές για όλη τη διάρκεια της καμπάνιας μας. Ως ένα επιπλέον “ευχαριστώ”,αναλαμβάνουμε τα έξοδα αποστολής σας σε όλη την Ελλάδα! Συνεισφέρετε εγκαίρως για να παραλάβετε πριν από τις χριστουγεννιάτικες γιορτές όλα τα δώρα για τους αγαπημένους σας από το plektronio.

babies booties: πλεκτά παπουτσάκια για τα μπομπιράκια σας

kids booties: τα αγαπημένα παντοφλάκια μας σε μεγέθη και για τα μεγαλύτερα παιδιά σας!

babies & kids hats: τα πλεκτά μας σκουφιά & καπέλα μπορούν να προσαρμοστούν για κορίτσια και αγόρια αλλάζοντας τα χρώματα και τα αξεσουάρ!

babies & kids cowls: απαλά και ζεστά κασκόλ για μικρά χαριτωμένα plektronia!

Τι πρέπει να κάνετε για μας στηρίξετε:

Η διαδικασία είναι απλή!

Ακολουθήστε βήμα-βήμα τις αναλυτικές οδηγίες με εικόνες

Μοιραστείτε το πάθος μας για το πλέξιμο!

Υπολογίζουμε και εκτιμούμε κάθε ελάχιστη συνεισφορά που μπορείτε να κάνετε για να ενισχύσετε το φιλόδοξο σχέδιό μας. Είναι εξίσου σημαντικό για εμάς να αφιερώσετε λίγα λεπτά και να μοιραστείτε με τους φίλους σας στο facebook, στο twitter ή στο mail σας την ιδέα και το link της καμπάνιας μας. 

Περιμένουμε με χαρά τα μηνύματά σας! Στείλτε μας στο τα σχόλια ή τις ερωτήσεις σας. Μπορείτε επίσης να μας βρείτε και στο (facebook, twitter, pinterest, youtube & vimeo channel).

Ας πλέξουμε παρέα και ας μοιραστούμε το πάθος μας για μοναδικά ρούχα που είναι φτιαγμένα στο χέρι και όχι στο σπίτι!
story_txt:
our goals


our story


what we offer


useful instructions




οι στόχοι μας


η ιστορία μας


τι σας προσφέρουμε


χρήσιμες οδηγίες


New perk for the whole family!Get ready for warm Christmas nights with matching slippers for all your family!



New perk!You and Mini-You <3Plektronio needs you to grow!
To do so, we need your contribution to make personalized knits for everybody. With each knit you are getting, you are helping us come closer to our goal.
Το plektronio σας χρειάζεται για να μεγαλώσει!
Για να το καταφέρουμε, χρειαζόμαστε τη συμβολή σας για να φτιάξουμε ξεχωριστά πλεκτά για όλους! Με κάθε πλεκτό που αποκτάτε, μας βοηθάτε να φτάσουμε πιο κοντά στο στόχο μας.

We need you to help us to…
Stash our high quality yarns
All our knits are made using pure merino, alpaca and 100% cotton yarns. We need to be able to order lots and lots of our selected high quality yarns and accessories in bulk so that we stock them in competitive prices.
Establish our production workflow and inventory platform
Our proposed business model that allows you to fully customize your garments (mass customization) requires a flexible yet clean-cut organized inventory platform and a production workflow that will allows us to knit-on-time℠ your unique garments without compromising the handmade quality of our products. For us it is really important to manage delivering your orders on time, so that you can wear and enjoy it for the whole season ahead!
Build a new online home for plektronio

We need to design and develop an online platform for plektronio that goes beyond a simple eshop. More than that, we want to design a platform that will enable you to fully customize your garments, taking part in the making process while we knit-for-you℠. This way, you can be creative by having full control over the final product by selecting its size, color combinations and matching accessories, while we do the knitting for you. In plektronio, we wish to make as unique garments as you are!
Fine-tune our business model
Making unique personalized items for everybody is not an easy task - this is why large companies avoid it.  It is actually a business and logistic nightmare. We would like to change this by developing an innovative yet robust and scalable model that can be sustainable throughout the lifecycle of our products. Our goal is to establish and benchmark our new services knit-on-time℠ and knit-for-you℠ while this campaign runs. This way we can accurately monitor your needs and preferences while under-the-hood we perform all the adjustments to assure the sustainability of our business.
Enhance our collection with clothing and special garments
We are piling up new knitting and crochet patterns that are waiting to be transformed into precious handmade apparels. As making unique garments involves unique designs we would like to engage designers around the globe that will make exclusive patterns for plektronio. We are so much looking forward to show you our future collections of heirloom lacy cardigans or hip hooded sweaters, perky dresses and pants as well as gloves, mittens, arm- and legwarmers and many (really many!) more!

Plektronio's little tale
Contrary to the knitting tradition of many Greek families, I never sat next to my grandma to learn how to knit. But as I really love handmade garments, I started to experiment making my own. 
During that time, one of my best friends was expecting her baby girl, Elli, and I was her impatient promised-to-be godmother. Looking for a unique and warm present for her upcoming birth, I knitted her first pair of crispy white Mary Janes with cute little wooden buttons. I simply fell for the handcrafting experience!
It was amazing how it became viral. I couldn't believe how much joy a pair of knitted shoes could bring. Very soon I realized that I could do this for all of my friends trying different designs, colors and embellishments matching their babies' personality. 
And this is how my first collection of knitted baby shoes started.

I spent the next year designing carefully my knitting campaign, ordering tons of patterns, stashing colorful yarns and mastering my knitting and crochet techniques. I started making various combinations of colors, embellishments and accessories rendering one single pattern into multiple unique items. Transforming this home-based hobby to an actual small business, came as a natural next step. 
Now it is time to knit BIG!
Getting the encouragement and support from all our plektronio friends who have loved our baby hand-knitted shoes, we decided that time has come to grow and knit also for you, your kids and your grown-up beloved ones.
And there is much more than that: We want to use our handcrafting skills to make unique and custom knitwear for every member of your family and friends letting you choose the design, the colors, the combinations and the matching accessories of your taste. 
There is so much more in a handmade knit than the way it looks: there is warmth, love, tenderness and also effort for the person who has made it or selected it as a special gift for a special someone. Although unapologetically simple, wooly garments are carrying a beautiful heritage - and this is what makes them indefinitely valuable!
And this is what we truly value! To knit handmade, unique and fully personalized garments which will match your taste and last for many unique plektronio outfits. 
You get to choose the design, the colors, the combinations and the matching accessories of your taste. What more can you get?

You get to choose in return any of our offered perks!
All our perks are offered in discount prices as long as our campaign last. Plus you get free shipping for all orders to Greece! Be sure to order on time to get all your Christmas & New Year's Eve presents from plektronio.
A pair of our newly introduced series of booties made exclusively with organic yarn
Our popular booties in toddlers and kids sizes!
Heads up! Our hats can be customized for boys or girls
A snuggly and versatile cowl for toddlers & kids
Yes, you and your older loved ones can have our knitted slippers too!
Handmade buttons or fluffy pom poms, you can embellish your hat any way you like!
Wrap yourself in our chic and warm cowls!

Steps for becoming a plektronio supporter:


take a look at our designs. (for more, check our gallery)


we would kindly ask you to add 5€ if ordering outside Greece


would you like to order more of our knits? even better! just fill in the sum of your order (or repeat the process)

all our knits are custom-knitted for you. this means that you will not see any special buttons for selecting your size or color
as soon as we receive your contribution, we will contact you to send us the size and the color for your garment
pay for your contribution via paypal or credit card
wait for your package :)
wear a plektronio & be unique!
post a photo or a video wearing your new plektronio knit and share it on our facebook page!
Share our passion to knit
We would really appreciate any contribution you can make to push our ambitious project a little further. It will be as much as useful to us if you could spent a moment and spread the word about our effort. 
If you are a social butterfly, we do count on your impact to your network of friends. If not, just click on the easy-to-use Indiegogo share tools below to make other people aware of our campaign.
We love your feedback; so feel free to send us your comments or questions. 
You can also reach us on the social media (facebook, twitter,
pinterest, youtube and vimeo channel).
Let’s knit together and share our passion to knit handcrafted designs that look and are handmade – not homemade!

Χρειαζόμαστε τη βοήθειά σας για να…
Προμηθευτούμε τις πρώτες ύλες για τα πλεκτά μας
Για τα πλεκτά μας χρησιμοποιούμε μόνο νήματα εξαιρετικής ποιότητας από μαλλί μερινό, αλπάκα και 100% βαμβάκι. Για να προμηθευτούμε τα υλικά αυτής της ποιότητας στην καλύτερη δυνατή τιμή, χρειάζεται να προχωρήσουμε σε παραγγελία χονδρικής και να εξασφαλίσουμε το συνδυασμό ποιότητας και κόστους.
Φτιάξουμε ένα καινούριο σπίτι για το plektronio

Φιλοδοξούμε να σχεδιάσουμε μια πρωτότυπη διαδικτυακή πλατφόρμα, ειδικά για το plektronio που δεν θα είναι απλά ένα ακόμα eshop. Στόχος μας είναι να αναπτύξουμε μια πλατφόρμα που θα σας επιτρέπει να σχεδιάσετε και να παραγγείλετε το πλεκτό σας ακριβώς όπως εσείς θέλετε, επιλέγοντας το μέγεθος, τους χρωματικούς συνδυασμούς και τα αξεσουάρ του. Με αυτόν τον τρόπο, θα δημιουργήσετε εσείς οι ίδιοι το δικό σας, μοναδικό πλεκτό, ενώ εμείς θα το ετοιμάζουμε για εσάς. Στο plektronio, θέλουμε να φτιάξουμε πλεκτά τόσο μοναδικά όσο εσείς!
Αναπτύξουμε το επιχειρηματικό μας μοντέλο
Η φιλοσοφία του επιχειρηματικού μας μοντέλου έχει στόχο να σας επιτρέπει να επιλέγετε εσείς οι ίδιοι όλες τις παραμέτρους που αφορούν τα πλεκτά σας. Για να μπορέσουμε να διαχειριστούμε τις παραγγελίες μας, συνδυάζοντας τη μοναδικότητα και ιδιαιτερότητα του χειροποίητου με την έγκαιρη παράδοση της παραγγελίας σας, χρειαζόμαστε το σχεδιασμό μιας εξειδικευμένης και ευέλικτης γραμμής παραγωγής. Είναι πολύ σημαντικό για εμάς να βελτιστοποιήσουμε την παραγγελία σας με τέτοιο τρόπο ώστε να είμαστε σε θέση να σας παραδώσουμε την παραγγελία σας εγκαίρως, ώστε να μπορείτε να φοράτε και να χαίρεστε τα πλεκτά σας για όλη τη σεζόν!
Εμπλουτίσουμε τη συλλογή μας με ρούχα και πλεκτά αντικείμενα
Στο εργαστήριό μας υπάρχουν δεκάδες καινούρια πατρόν που περιμένουν να μεταμορφωθούν σε υπέροχες πλεκτές δημιουργίες. Επειδή πιστεύουμε ότι τα ξεχωριστά πλεκτά ρούχα απαιτούν και ξεχωριστά σχέδια, θέλουμε να εμπλέξουμε σχεδιαστές από όλο τον κόσμο για να εμπνευστούν νέα σχέδια ειδικά για το plektronio. Ανυπομονούμε να σας δείξουμε τις επόμενες συλλογές μας με φορέματα, ζακέτες, γάντια, γκέτες και πολλά πολλά ακόμα!

Η μικρή ιστορία του plektronio
Παρόλα τα άπειρα πλεκτά της γιαγιάς μου που έχω φορέσει ως παιδί, ποτέ δεν κάθισα δίπλα της για να μάθω να πλέκω. Έχοντας, όμως, μια ιδιαίτερη αγάπη για τα χειροποίητα ρούχα, ξεκίνησα να πειραματίζομαι φτιάχνοντας τα δικά μου. 
Εκείνη την περίοδο, περίμενα να γεννηθεί η μικρή μου βαφτιστήρα, Έλλη, και σαν ανυπόμονη νονά, ήθελα να της ετοιμάσω ένα ξεχωριστό δώρο. Έτσι της έπλεξα τα πρώτα της λευκά πλεκτά παπουτσάκια διακοσμημένα με μικρά ξύλινα κουμπιά. Ήταν πραγματικά μια ξεχωριστή εμπειρία!
Και αυτή ήταν μόνο η αρχή! Δεν μπορούσα να πιστέψω πόσα χαμόγελα μπορούσε να φέρει ένα ζευγάρι από μικρά πλεκτά παπουτσάκια. Σύντομα συνειδητοποίησα ότι μπορούσα να πλέκω για τα παιδιά ολοένα και περισσότερων φίλων μου, δοκιμάζοντας διαφορετικά σχέδια, χρώματα, αξεσουάρ που ταίριαζαν στο γούστο και στην προσωπικότητά τους. 
Κάπως έτσι ξεκίνησε η πρώτη μου σειρά από πλεκτά βρεφικά παπουτσάκια.

Πέρασα τον επόμενο χρόνο σχεδιάζοντας με προσοχή την παρουσίαση των πλεκτών μου, παραγγέλλοντας άπειρα πατρόν και πολύχρωμα νήματα και τελειοποιώντας τις τεχνικές μου στο πλέξιμο. Μετά  από λίγο καιρό, η έναρξη της μικρής μου επιχείρησης ήρθε σαν το επόμενο φυσικό βήμα. 
Τώρα ήρθε η ώρα για να μεγαλώσουμε!
Με την ενθάρρυνση και υποστήριξη από όλους τους φίλους του plektronio οι οποίοι αγάπησαν τα χειροποίητα πλεκτά παπουτσάκια της συλλογής μας, αποφασίσαμε ότι έφτασε η ώρα να μεγαλώσουμε την επιχείρησή μας και να πλέξουμε και για εσάς, τα παιδιά σας και τους μεγαλύτερους αγαπημένους σας!
Και δεν σταματάμε εδώ: Θέλουμε να χρησιμοποιήσουμε όλη μας την τέχνη στο πλέξιμο και να φτιάξουμε μοναδικά πλεκτά για εσάς, τα παιδιά και το σύντροφό σας, σχεδιασμένα και πλεγμένα όχι μόνο στα μέτρα σας αλλά και σύμφωνα με το σχέδιο, το χρώμα, τους συνδυασμούς και τα αξεσουάρ που εσείς θα διαλέξετε. 
Αυτό έχει αξία για εμάς! Να πλέξουμε ρούχα και αξεσουάρ που είναι χειροποίητα, μοναδικά και προσαρμοσμένα στο δικό σας γούστο για πολλές ξεχωριστές εμφανίσεις. 

Μπορείτε να επιλέξετε ένα (ή και περισσότερα!) από τα πλεκτά μας!
Όλα τα πλεκτά προσφέρονται σε ειδικές τιμές για όλη τη διάρκεια της καμπάνιας μας. Ως ένα επιπλέον “ευχαριστώ”,αναλαμβάνουμε τα έξοδα αποστολής σας σε όλη την Ελλάδα! Συνεισφέρετε εγκαίρως για να παραλάβετε πριν από τις χριστουγεννιάτικες γιορτές όλα τα δώρα για τους αγαπημένους σας από το plektronio.
babies booties: πλεκτά παπουτσάκια για τα μπομπιράκια σας
kids booties: τα αγαπημένα παντοφλάκια μας σε μεγέθη και για τα μεγαλύτερα παιδιά σας!
babies & kids hats: τα πλεκτά μας σκουφιά & καπέλα μπορούν να προσαρμοστούν για κορίτσια και αγόρια αλλάζοντας τα χρώματα και τα αξεσουάρ!
babies & kids cowls: απαλά και ζεστά κασκόλ για μικρά χαριτωμένα plektronia!

Υπολογίζουμε και εκτιμούμε κάθε ελάχιστη συνεισφορά που μπορείτε να κάνετε για να ενισχύσετε το φιλόδοξο σχέδιό μας. Είναι εξίσου σημαντικό για εμάς να αφιερώσετε λίγα λεπτά και να μοιραστείτε με τους φίλους σας στο facebook, στο twitter ή στο mail σας την ιδέα και το link της καμπάνιας μας. 

Περιμένουμε με χαρά τα μηνύματά σας! Στείλτε μας στο τα σχόλια ή τις ερωτήσεις σας. 
Μπορείτε επίσης να μας βρείτε και στο (facebook, twitter,
pinterest, youtube & vimeo channel).
Ας πλέξουμε παρέα και ας μοιραστούμε το πάθος μας για μοναδικά ρούχα που είναι φτιαγμένα στο χέρι και όχι στο σπίτι!

story:
Kurzbeschreibung

Wir möchten allen Tauchern und Interessierten die einzigartige Möglichkeit geben, ihrem (künftigen) Hobby nachzugehen. Das Ganze gepaart mit Spa, Wellness und einem Hotel im nautischen Stil.

Eine genauere Projektbeschreibung findet sich auf unserer Homepage www.tauchpark-nuernberg.de 

Im Zuge der Projektentwicklung sind wir so weit, dass die Gesamtfinanzierung nun kurz bevorsteht. Die Investorengruppe wird allerdings erst zusagen, wenn sichergestellt ist, dass das Gelände - aus geologischer Sicht - für den Bau einer solchen Anlage geeignet ist.

Was wir brauchen & Was man bekommt

Im Detail:

  • Wir benötigen ca. 30.000,00 € um die entsprechenden Prüfungen durchführen lassen zu können.
  • Als Perks bieten wir Gutscheine an, die nach Fertigstellung der Anlage im entsprechenden Gegenwert als Tauchkurs (oder Nutzung der Tauchanlage), als Wellness-Wochenende (oder einzelne Anwendungen) oder einfach als Gutschein für Hotelübernachtungen eingesetzt werden können.
  • Sollte das Funding-Ziel nicht erreicht werden, dann werden die Gelder verwendet um das Projekt dennoch weiterzutreiben.
Für den (unwahrscheinlichen) Fall, dass das Gutachten negativ ausfallen sollte gibt es noch andere Grundstücke die "passen" würden. Grundsätzlich war die Aussage von Sachverständigen, dass wohl auf Grund der vorhandenen Gesteinsschichten hier in Nürnberg kein Probleme zu erwarten seien, auch nicht, was z.B. das Grundwasser angeht. Dies würden ähnlich "tiefe" Bauprojekte hier in Nürnberg auch bestätigen. 

Die Auswirkung

Es ist wichtig, dass das Projekt voran kommt, weil:

  • etwa 100 neue Arbeitsplätze geschaffen werden, ein Teil davon zur Qualifizierung von Meschen in sozialen Schwierigkeiten, die anders kaum mehr eine Chance hätten am Arbeitsmarkt Fuß zu fassen.
  • die Kooperation mit Schulen angestrebt wird um Kinder für das Tauchen zu begeistern und so speziell "Problem-Kids" neues Selbstvertrauen zu geben und sie wieder auf geordnete Bahnen zu lenken.
  • wir schon so viel positives Feedback (z.B. bei Facebook) bekommen haben, dass es einfach nicht sein darf, dass ein solch einzigartige Sache an einer solchen "Kleinigkeit" scheitert!

Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann

Manche können einfach keinen Beitrag zahlen, das heißt aber nicht, dass sie nicht helfen können:

  • Sprecht über uns wo es nur geht und macht diese Kampagne bekanntt.
  • Nutzt dafür, das Tool von Indiegogo oder Facebook, Twitter, ...!

Dankeschön!

story:
Click. Vintage Television Remotes. 

My name is Patricia Harrison. My best friend in the world, Troy DeVolld, is a television producer for shows like Dancing With the Stars and dozens of others.  He loves making television and has spent many many years collecting vintage television remotes just because he appreciated them for their unusual beauty.

Eventually I decided that I wanted to take pictures of them ... for fun. I thought they were cool, too. 

People were immediately intrigued! Many said, "I grew up with one of these remotes in my house!" You may have, too.   

Troy and I are really excited to publish and sell these books! We've also been asked to do calendars, greeting cards, and art prints. 

We found the expense of printing pretty surprising. It's not overwhelming. We truly believe that "you can not get what you don't ask for."  We need help.  

The money will be going to printing costs, wholesale packaging, marketing, and shipping costs.  When we have enough product, we plan to do art fairs and will be selling on line. We have already started our inquiry letters to retailers large and small.

It's been our dream for many years to publish a coffee table book, but we never found a subject that we dug equally. These are way cool, really beautiful and -- sometimes -- just weird. 

We're seeking.. 

It's very simple. We need a minimum of $15,000 to build inventory. 

We need to hire finishing professionals to make sure that the products are done correctly. From graphics to printing.  We are positive we will reach and exceed our goal. However, If we do not reach our goal, the funds will be used to print as many books as we can. We will wait to print calendars.

What YOU get! 

Your contribution will be greatly appreciated!! BUT! since its better to give than receive ... We want to give you gifts for helping out! These gifts will range from a set of greeting cards to a 2015 calendar -- and for lots of lucky people, they will get the finished coffee table book in a large size! 

Challenges.. yeah ok.. 

We know that digital media is taking over. We understand that  maybe this isn't a product that fills a techie's heart, but for those of you, like us, who still love a book store, who still love to give a card, it's us that this project is for.  

Other Ways You Can Help!!

This may seem like a lot of pictures of TV remotes, but it’s more. It's a flashback. It's a connection to the person in the house that "controlled" the television remote. It's also a love of the industry of television, which is why the collection started in the first place. Troy just LOVES TV. He LOVES the business. He LOVES collecting things! We have also started collecting Vintage Radios, and other old items that are beautiful. So once the business is established, we will be able to branch off to different cool subjects. 

Maybe you just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help! 

Please share this campaign! 

You never know who will connect, or have a great memory regarding one of these remotes. So maybe you would make someones day.. anything you do, including reading this far, can only help. 

Thank you so much for reading this -- and we also thank Indiegogo for creating a space to ask for the help we need. 

Patricia Harrison and Troy DeVolld
story_txt:
Click. Vintage Television Remotes. 
My
name is Patricia Harrison. My best friend in the world, Troy DeVolld, is a television producer for shows like Dancing With the Stars and dozens of others.  He loves making television and has spent
many many years collecting vintage television remotes just because he appreciated them for their unusual beauty.

Eventually
I decided that I wanted to take pictures of them ... for fun. I thought they
were cool, too. 
People were immediately intrigued! Many said, "I grew up with
one of these remotes in my house!" You may have, too.   
Troy
and I are really excited to publish and sell these books! We've also been asked
to do calendars, greeting cards, and art prints. 
We
found the expense of printing pretty surprising. It's not overwhelming. We
truly believe that "you can not get what you don't ask for."  We
need help.  
The
money will be going to printing costs, wholesale packaging, marketing, and
shipping costs.  When we have enough product, we plan to do art fairs
and will be selling on line. We have already started our inquiry letters
to retailers large and small.
It's
been our dream for many years to publish a coffee table book, but we never
found a subject that we dug equally. These are way cool, really beautiful and
-- sometimes -- just weird. 
We're seeking.. 
It's
very simple. We need a minimum of $15,000 to build inventory. 
We
need to hire finishing professionals to make sure that the products are done
correctly. From graphics to printing.  We are positive we will reach and
exceed our goal. However, If we do not reach our goal, the funds will be used
to print as many books as we can. We will wait to print calendars.
What YOU get! 
Your contribution
will be greatly appreciated!! BUT! since its better to give than receive ... We
want to give you gifts for helping out! These gifts will range from a set of
greeting cards to a 2015 calendar -- and for lots of lucky people, they will
get the finished coffee table book in a large size! 
Challenges.. yeah ok.. 
We
know that digital media is taking over. We understand that  maybe this
isn't a product that fills a techie's heart, but for those of you, like us, who
still love a book store, who still love to give a card, it's us that this
project is for.  
Other
Ways You Can Help!!
This
may seem like a lot of pictures of TV remotes, but it’s more. It's a flashback.
It's a connection to the person in the house that "controlled" the
television remote. It's also a love of the industry of television, which is why
the collection started in the first place. Troy just LOVES TV. He LOVES the
business. He LOVES collecting things! We have also started collecting Vintage
Radios, and other old items that are beautiful. So once the business is
established, we will be able to branch off to different cool subjects. 
Maybe
you just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help! 
Please share this campaign! 
You
never know who will connect, or have a great memory regarding one of these
remotes. So maybe you would make someones day.. anything you do, including
reading this far, can only help. 
Thank
you so much for reading this -- and we also thank Indiegogo for creating a space to ask for
the help we need. 
Patricia
Harrison and Troy DeVolld

story:
Hi! I am Cecil Norwood, jewelry artist extraordinaire and Firefly series fan. (Other fans might recognize the lingo in this campaign) I moved to Nashville to start my life over several years ago and have slowly rebuilt my shop.

  Norwood's of Nashville has just moved from a home based business into a new shop and retail location. The bad news: I have to finish renovating the building and need to make new pretties before I can open my doors to the public. For this reason I am offering my Firefly Collection of glow rings on Indiegogo to raise the needed funds.

  Each and every dollar counts towards my goal. Any amount over goes towards better tools and the prettification (I need to trademark that) of my store.

The Firefly ring series is a collection of 5 ring types. Each can come in any of the 4 colors seen in the seashell photo near the bottom.



The Collection:

"Serenity"



"Orbital"

"5 Star"


"Eclipse"

"Supernova"



What's one to do if you feel like havin' an extra on hand? Get multiples!


What colors are we here offering? I'm mighty pleased that you asked!

The color options:
"Miranda GREEN": The brightest and the longest lasting is the green. It's so bright after a full charge that you can read by it! Check out the photo below on a quarter in pitch blackness!

"Hands of BLUE": Blue is the second longest lasting and very bright.

"Persephone TEAL": A right pleasant and sophisticated color you have here. Teal is not as bright as the green or blue but gives a soft glow for a good time. It's guaranteed to not damage your calm.

"REAVER RED": The red colors strength isn't in it's longevity but in it's extreme brilliance immediately after exposure to light. No need to be goin' and explainin'  the name here.There are civilized folk abouts.


Risks and challenges

With over 20 years experience, I am confident in my abilities as a jewelry artist. All of the rewards listed have previously and recently been made by me with older, basic jewelry equipment. A successful Indiegogo will provide me with better tools that will not only speed up the manufacturing process but will allow me to create my pretties in even greater detail. In the event that my campaign is successful beyond my wildest dreams, I have jeweler friends who are willing to assist me to make the rewards and get them out on time. I expect that the pretties will likely be sent out earlier than the listed shipping dates.

We got us a mighty fine crew and we aim to please.


For larger sizes or custom requests feel free to message me and I'll see if I can accommodate you.

Keep Flying!

For more photos and to see out our other pretties: Click Here To Check Us Out On Facebook!

story:
Our Story

Lola&Clarke, LLC is the embodiment of two sides of one dynamic woman. Lola personifies the sexier and more feminine side. Clarke personifies the tougher and more androgynous side. We believe that every woman is a little of both, some equally, and others concentrated more to one side or the other.

The Time Is Now!

It is time for our voices to be heard, and our vision conveyed! We are developing a women’s, ready-to-wear collection, which will be debuted March 2014. It will exemplify the range of the Lola&Clarke woman’s wardrobe, from the workplace to cocktail hour, and everywhere in between.

We Need Your Help!

Our goal is to raise $3,500. These funds will help with purchasing fabric and accessories, as well as developing press kits and our website. All backers will receive an awesome “perk” as a token of our appreciation. We have 30 days to meet this goal, and we need your help!

Jacket and Shorts by Lola&Clarke

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign any and everywhere you can! Sharing this campaign via Indiegogo share tools, social media, blogs, forums, emails, and word of mouth with those who may be interested would mean so much to us! Every dollar counts and every kind word is much appreciated! 

If you would like to make donations directly, please email us at lolaandclarke@gmail.com

Follow our journey on Twitter @Lola_at_heart and @Clarke_IAm

story:
4.7.14

We Hit Our Funding Goal!

Please visit the following link to pre-order TODAY!

http://www.rockethub.com/projects/42111-scoopette-the-ultimate-dog-walker-s-utility-tool


THE SCOOPETTES

The Scoopette's will come in Black, Dark Green, Dark Orange and Light Gray. 


The Bags

The Bags will come 30 pieces per roll (120 count per box), biodegradable, elongated at 12”L x 10”W  (conventional are 12"L x 9"W) and pine scented! They are double the quantity and 1/2 the price of what's out there to comparable dimensions!


The Leashes

The accommodating 2 ply leash to which the Scoopette device can fasten onto will come in these colors or the colors of the Scoopette's (above)! Incorporated may also be the Scoopette Logo, and possibly a new Ruff Pawz, LLC one (company name). 


Wholesale Inquiries

Please contact me directly at info@scoopette.com

------------------------------------------------------------

In the Media

Pet Age Magazine - Digital Edition

Daily Dog Blog

Animal Wellness Magazine - Blog

Animal Wellness Magazine - Facebook Contest

Life With Dogs - Blog


Overview / Journey 

A practical dog walker’s scooper at last!

We all love our dogs, but let’s face it; we all dread the pickup process during walks. Your dog conducts his/her business, people are watching, judging, making sure you’re a responsible dog owner. You've had horrible instances, experienced utter embarrassment and want to walk away whistling, but know deep down inside you must be brave, put that hand in that little bag, and go in for the scoop … Gross! Let the dry heaving begin. The frustrations kick in and the sanitary questions begin to churn. Good news … I’ve invented a solution!!

But before continuing, please allow me the opportunity to ask a few questions to see if the Scoopette is for you, or someone you know, who’s used the “hand in the bag technique”:

Have you experienced a “horror story” or worried about bacterial intrusion (holes in the bag)?

Is your hand too small for a one scoop and you find yourself “double dipping?” 

Do you refuse to walk your dog with a back yard pooper scooper? 

Have you had issues with tall grass or concrete?

Do you forget bags frequently?

Are you an expert in the "swinging bag technique” walking to the trash?

Are you frustrated when you see other’s ignoring the pickup process all together?

If you've answered “YES” to one or more of these questions, then the Scoopette is for you! The Patent Pending Scoopette is designed specifically for the squeamish, the frustrated and the already responsible! 

The Scoopette facilitates the “hand in the bag technique” by:

Eliminating the overall sensation as well as bacterial intrusion – Fantastic!

Potentially increasing the length, width and depth of the human hand - No more "double dipping!"

Instills confidence in you– No more dry heaving or embarrassment!

Leash fastening capabilities - Not “another thing” you're carrying!

Blade gaps when squeezed for grass pull through – Ingenious!

Flush blade closure to assist with messy concrete pick up – Finally!

An expandable dispenser (pouch) for rolls so you’re not forgetting bags – How convenient!

A molded clip mechanism for your unsanitary bag – No more “twirling” to the trash!

Share it  with your friends or strangers who ignore the pick up – No more excuses people!

Use it to pick up a dead bird or mouse! – Multi-Functional!

The Scoopette is the ultimate dog walker’s clean up tool that incorporates a minimalist design using magnets, friction blocks, hinges, attachment bands, springs, rods and collapsible blades! The product delivers satisfaction, cleanliness, ease and the feeling of responsibility everytime!

When collapsed and in the "Transport" Position, the Scoopette shrinks into the size of a cell phone! When in the “Ready” Position, it can double the size of the human hand!


How does it work?

Device Transport 

The Scoopette is the only scooping device to fasten around a 2 ply leash. It is super light and is not inconvenient in any way. Securement is conducted through magnets and rubber friction blocks working together. Simply align the leash atop the inside walls and close the device around it! The Scoopette should remain sanitary and can be transported in a variety of ways in addition to the leash fastening capability, below are a few examples.

Leash Transport

IN or ON Pocket (or Purse)

Opening the Device

One Handed Technique:

Place your thumb and fingers opposite and under each side’s attachment bands, and open strongly separating your thumb from your opposing finger's.There are a couple pounds of magnetic intensity holding the base of the blades together, so a couple lbs of reversal is necessary to open the device. Opening the device allows the blades to follow downwards and the hinges will interlock. This was essential in making sure the Scoopette was a one-step opening process!

Two Handed Technique:

Position the opposing hand’s index finger between the attachment bands and push inward as your other hand opens! Or, just simply pull the walls apart using two hands ...

Using the Device

In the “Open / Ready” Position, gently squeeze the device and place it in a bag, tuck the bag into the palm center area and throughout the blade gaps (as you normally do with your hand and fingers) and go in for the scoop! It’s that easy! In fact, it is likely the Scoopette will increase the length, width and depth of your hand! 

The common poop bags on the market are 12” L x 9” W, but if you want to go wider for those large & smelly "loads", we've customized bags that are 10” wide and pine scented for your convenience! Again, the Scoopette should work with any common waste bag on the market, it just work’s best with ours. 

The Bag Reversal

Now that you have the goods in your grip, use your other hand to take the bag from your elbow (entry side) and pull downwards and inside-out towards your hand / device (this is the same process you're doing now). Open up the device to allow the unsanitary bag removal and hold it in the opposite hand for just one second. 

Closing / Folding the Blades

The blades are locked in the "Open / Ready" Positions by conjoining hinges, so to unlock them, simply slide the blades towards the springs (that pushed them there in the first place) and close the blades flush against the inside walls. That's it! The blades and the device are now in the “Standing / Transport” Positions but ONLY close the device completely here if you’re sliding into your pocket (or purse).

Fasten, Clip and Go!

If you’re not transporting the Scoopette in your pocket or purse, conveniently fasten it around a 2 ply leash or onto your pocket or purse! 

Now you still have that gross bag, what to do? Simply tie, hang, or wedge it under the molded clip mechanism and go on your way hands free of the creative twirling habits you involuntarily developed over the years! Old habits die hard! 

Attaching the Dispenser

We all have some sort of dispenser that holds a roll of 30 bags, but what about the Scoopette? No problem, I've created our own! Simply position the dispenser with elastics upside down and wide at the tips of your fingers, now slide them over the open blades and center the dispenser. Position the top elastic in the provided grooves and under the attachment band and the bottom elastic around the middle portion of the inside wall. This could be done with or without the bags in the dispenser.  Unlike other dispenser's on the market, our's acts like a “pouch,” is collapsible and expandable to fit an array of roll sizes! Remember, our bags are pine scented and elongated at the base (10” W) and will work with the majority of rolls out there, but best with ours!

Here is a quick tutorial video:

http://vimeo.com/85365725 


Additional Features / Comments:

I plan to add a couple more features to the Scoopette. One addition is to include QR code's on the Attachment Bands that will link to a “How to Use” tutorial video and my website. I also plan to add an additional feature on the inside wall to accommodate the bottom elastic band of the dispenser. I will also fix the logo a to be "stand alone " as well as raise and silk screen printed, because I feel a colorful and well etched logo is important.


How’d you get the product this far?

Trial and error is always a blessing in disguise. After building the first prototype's, looking it over with fellow dog walkers and receiving end user feedback, I saw there was more to the big picture then originally imagined. I began to see the "frustrations" with the process as a whole. These of course included the sensation and bacterial intrusion elimination, but to my surprise tall grass, concrete, loose stool, tiny hands, forgetting bags, convenient devise as well as roll and unsanitary bag transport were at the top of the list. Until now, there have been no products to alleviate these pain points and that is why it's been great developing a device incorporating "frustration" eliminating features without overbearing additional steps.

I took the final prototypes to local dog parks, a couple consumer trade shows and to Mom & Pop shops to get their opinions and to generate interest. I was overwhelmed with the amount of dog owners who loved it and encouraged me to continue with the efforts to bring it to market! Only then, did I know it was a real winner!


Early Concept's

Our earliest of designs and prototypes left much room for improvement. Once I understood the focus should be on eliminating the frustrations rather than the sensation, magic began to happen!


The Scoopette's Final Design

I will be using 4 color schemes demonstrated on top of page.


Stretch Goal


Reward Tier Grid


Packaging Thoughts

Here are sketches of what I’m thinking. Please keep in mind the Grass represents the backdrop or background effect, so try to imagine that behind the product and accessories.

Estimates:

-Version A – 8”L x 4”W x 1.6”H

-Version B – 6” L x 6”W x 1.6”H

The options are to package the accessories below or to the side of the device. The background behind logo on top is TBD, but I’d like to stick with the idea “From the City to the Prairie.” Perhaps I’ll make it a solid color. Recommendations can be sent to info@scoopette.com. For the packaging, we’re including the device, 1 roll of 30 bags (10"W), a dispenser "pouch" and a carabier with elastic for you to enjoy!

A)

B)


Timeline


Reward Artwork - "Show Dogs"

In addition to the Scoopette's and Accessories, one of the higher end rewards is a beautiful 8 x 10 acrylic painting of up to 1 dog on wrapped canvas! Work directly with the artist to choose your own background! Shipping Included!


Reward Artwork - "Best in Show"

In addition to the Scoopette's and Accessories, the highest end reward is an amazing20x24 "Realistic" / "Impressionistic" portrait of up to 2 dogs (Size Incl. Frame)!! Work directly with the artist who will allow you to use your imagination on choosing a background! Shipping Included!


Risks and challenges

My biggest worry is finding support for the project. Many people (or teams) worry about how to make a product, fulfill it, or design it, and in this case, I have figured out all of those logistics prior to launching.

I am working with a terrific factory to generate the best possible Scoopette and accessorize the product to maximize its functionality. I've designed and obsessed over every nuance of the device. We're trying to build something that currently doesn't exist and we're excited, however, we realize that we might run into obstacles along the way. Overall, the Scoopette is a relatively simple product and project to manufacture and we anticipate hurdling obstacles and not project crushing road blocks.

Luckily for me (and you) this isn't the factory's first rodeo in Pet Industry Product Production. These people do this sort of thing for a living and were highly recommended to see the Scoopette through fruition. I am confident we will be able to deliver on our promise. I also promise to be fully transparent and provide our supporters with regular updates as I move from concept to production to fulfillment.

Mobilizing great fans, is probably my biggest issue and I’m looking for your help. Any great supporting tweets, videos, Facebook posts, they’re all a massive help. I plan on rewarding the biggest Scoopette supporters with significant recognition rewards, so please; your support will not go unnoticed!


Thank You

The time, energy and effort building the Scoopette prototypes has been fun! Between the shows and shops, I've met a lot of creative and interesting people along the way, all of whom truly love their dogs! I wish to thank the supporters at Pooch A Palooza, Pet Rock Fest, Attleboro Animal Shelter, NE Pet Expo and the Portsmouth NH Expo, the supporters at Stoddard’s Neck Park, the many shops who are willing to take on the Scoopette, Rustic Hound www.rustichound.com, David Kaye www.kaye-nine.com, PetAge Magazine, Animal Wellness Magazine, Dollar Shave Club, my friends who listen and provide direct and strategic advice ("The Meindel's"), and my loving family who continue to support and make sacrifices so I can chase a dream. This product and project wouldn't have continued without you and for that, I’m truly thankful. 

However, now is the moment of truth.

I hope I served you well my friends so … 

Be Good to Your Pet and Buy the Scoopette!


Follow the Scoopette

www.scoopette.com

www.facebook.com/scoopette

https://twitter.com/realscoopette


Credits

Prototype: Walsh Engineering - http://www.walsheng.com/

Website: Reel Big Media- http://reelbigmedia.com/

Video: Shane Uriot - https://twitter.com/moviemakershane , http://vimeo.com/shaneuriot

Production: Green Tree Co., Ltd.

In the “Open / Ready” Position, gently squeeze the device and
place it in a bag, tuck the bag into the palm center area and throughout the
blade gaps (as you normally do with your hand and fingers) and go in for the
scoop! It’s that easy! In fact, it is likely the Scoopette will increase the
length, width and depth of your hand! 
The common poop bags on the market are 12” L x 9” W, but if you
want to go wider for those large & smelly "loads", we've
customized bags that are 10” wide and pine scented for your convenience! Again,
the Scoopette should work with any common waste bag on the market, it just
work’s best with ours. The Bag Reversal
Now that you have the goods in your grip, use your other hand to
take the bag from your elbow (entry side) and pull downwards and inside-out
towards your hand / device (this is the same process you're doing now). Open up
the device to allow the unsanitary bag removal and hold it in the opposite hand
for just one second. Closing / Folding the Blades
The blades are locked in the "Open / Ready" Positions
by conjoining hinges, so to unlock them, simply slide the blades towards the
springs (that pushed them there in the first place) and close the blades flush
against the inside walls. That's it! The blades and the device are now in the
“Standing / Transport” Positions but ONLY close the device completely here if
you’re sliding into your pocket (or purse).Fasten, Clip and Go!
If you’re not
transporting the Scoopette in your pocket or purse, conveniently fasten it
around a 2 ply leash or onto your
pocket or purse! 
Now you still have that gross bag, what to do? Simply tie, hang,
or wedge it under the molded clip mechanism and go on your way hands free of
the creative twirling habits you involuntarily developed over the years! Old
habits die hard! Attaching the Dispenser
We all have some sort of dispenser that holds a roll of 30 bags,
but what about the Scoopette? No problem, I've created our own! Simply position
the dispenser with elastics upside down and wide at the tips of your fingers,
now slide them over the open blades and center the dispenser. Position the top
elastic in the provided grooves and under the attachment band and the bottom
elastic around the middle portion of the inside wall. This could be done with
or without the bags in the dispenser.  Unlike other dispenser's on the
market, our's acts like a “pouch,” is collapsible and expandable to fit an
array of roll sizes! Remember, our bags are pine scented and elongated at the
base (10” W) and will work with the majority of rolls out there, but best with
ours!Here is a quick tutorial
video:http://vimeo.com/85365725 Additional Features / Comments:
I plan to add a couple more features to the Scoopette. One
addition is to include QR code's on the Attachment Bands that will link to a
“How to Use” tutorial video and my website. I also plan to add an additional
feature on the inside wall to accommodate the bottom elastic band of the
dispenser. I will also fix the logo a to be "stand alone " as well as
raise and silk screen printed, because I feel a colorful and well etched logo
is important.
How’d you get the product this far?
Trial and error is always a blessing in disguise. After building
the first prototype's, looking it over with fellow dog walkers and receiving
end user feedback, I saw there was more to the big picture then originally imagined. I began to see the "frustrations" with the process as a whole. These of course included
the sensation and bacterial intrusion elimination, but to my surprise tall
grass, concrete, loose stool, tiny hands, forgetting bags, convenient devise as
well as roll and unsanitary bag transport were at the top of the list. Until now,
there have been no products to alleviate these pain points and that is why it's
been great developing a device incorporating "frustration"
eliminating features without overbearing additional steps.
I took the final prototypes to local dog parks, a couple
consumer trade shows and to Mom & Pop shops to get their opinions and to
generate interest. I was overwhelmed with the amount of dog owners who loved it and encouraged me to continue with the efforts to bring it to market! Only then, did I know it
was a real winner!Early Concept's
Our earliest of designs and prototypes left much room for
improvement. Once I understood the focus should be on eliminating the
frustrations rather than the sensation, magic began to happen!The Scoopette's Final DesignI will be using 4 color schemes demonstrated on top of page.Stretch GoalReward Tier Grid
Packaging Thoughts

Here are sketches of what I’m thinking. Please keep in mind the
Grass represents the backdrop or background effect, so try to imagine that
behind the product and accessories.
Estimates:
-Version A – 8”L x 4”W x 1.6”H
-Version B – 6” L x 6”W x 1.6”H
The options are to
package the accessories below or to the side of the device. The background
behind logo on top is TBD, but I’d like to stick with the idea “From the City
to the Prairie.” Perhaps I’ll make it a solid color. Recommendations can be
sent to info@scoopette.com. For the packaging, we’re including
the device, 1 roll of 30 bags (10"W), a dispenser "pouch" and a
carabier with elastic for you to enjoy!A)B)TimelineReward Artwork - "Show Dogs"
In addition to the Scoopette's and Accessories, one of the
higher end rewards is a beautiful 8 x 10 acrylic painting of up to 1 dog on
wrapped canvas! Work directly with the artist to choose your own background!
Shipping Included!Reward Artwork - "Best in Show"
In addition to the
Scoopette's and Accessories, the highest end
reward is an amazing20x24 "Realistic"
/ "Impressionistic" portrait of up to 2 dogs (Size Incl. Frame)!!
Work directly with the artist who will allow you to use your imagination on
choosing a background! Shipping Included!Risks and challengesMy biggest worry is finding support for the project. Many people (or teams) worry about how to make a product, fulfill it, or design it, and in this case, I have figured out all of those logistics prior to launching.I am working with a terrific factory to generate the best possible Scoopette and accessorize the product to maximize its functionality. I've designed and obsessed over every nuance of the device. We're trying to build something that currently doesn't exist and we're excited, however, we realize that we might run into obstacles along the way. Overall, the Scoopette is a relatively simple product and project to manufacture and we anticipate hurdling obstacles and not project crushing road blocks.Luckily for me (and you) this isn't the factory's first rodeo in Pet Industry Product Production. These people do this sort of thing for a living and were highly recommended to see the Scoopette through fruition. I am confident we will be able to deliver on our promise. I also promise to be fully transparent and provide our supporters with regular updates as I move from concept to production to fulfillment.Mobilizing great fans, is probably my biggest issue and I’m looking for your help. Any great supporting tweets, videos, Facebook posts, they’re all a massive help. I plan on rewarding the biggest Scoopette supporters with significant recognition rewards, so please; your support will not go unnoticed!Thank You
The time, energy and effort building the Scoopette prototypes
has been fun! Between the shows and shops, I've met a lot of creative
and interesting people along the way, all of whom truly love their dogs! I
wish to thank the supporters at Pooch A Palooza, Pet Rock Fest, Attleboro
Animal Shelter, NE Pet Expo and the Portsmouth NH Expo, the supporters at
Stoddard’s Neck Park, the many shops who are willing to take on the
Scoopette, Rustic Hound www.rustichound.com, David Kaye www.kaye-nine.com, PetAge Magazine, Animal Wellness Magazine, Dollar Shave Club,
my friends who listen and provide direct and strategic advice ("The
Meindel's"), and my loving family who continue to support and make
sacrifices so I can chase a dream. This product and
project wouldn't have continued without you and for that, I’m
truly thankful. 
However, now is the moment of truth.
I hope I served you well my friends so … 
Be Good to Your Pet and Buy the Scoopette!
Follow the Scoopette
www.scoopette.com
www.facebook.com/scoopette
https://twitter.com/realscoopette
Credits
Prototype: Walsh Engineering - http://www.walsheng.com/
Website: Reel Big Media- http://reelbigmedia.com/
Video: Shane Uriot - https://twitter.com/moviemakershane , http://vimeo.com/shaneuriot
Production: Green Tree Co., Ltd.

story:
Hello, there! Contrast Magazine is an anticipated magazine that strives to give exposure and create a buzz for highly-favored, upcoming clothing lines and musicians. Contributing to this publication will allow us to create, distribute and promote the content within each issue.


What We Need & What You Get!

Here's the deal...

  • We need at least $5,000 to hire editors, photographer, distribute each issue and promote the content.
  • You'll benefit from each contribution because we offer 'perks' for each level of donations.
  • If we exceed our goal, we'll donate the excess amounts to the Carol Maraj Foundation, founded by Nicki Minaj's mother, in New York, NY. As an advocate for families and homes free of domestic violence, the Carol Maraj Foundation's mission is to "empower survivors of this tragedy to once again see their human value through programs designed to nurture their self-esteem, build their inner strength and give them hope of better today and a brighter future." Watch this video of Carol Maraj's interview with MTV News! 


The Impact

Thousands of fashion designers and musicians are continuously launching their own brand/clothing lines and only so many make a success out of it. The fashion and music industries are constantly evolving, which makes it hard for hopefuls to make their mark. Contrast Magazine's mission is to provide articles in the fashion & music industries while helping upcoming designers and musicians develop their image and enhance their audience and fan base.

  • The Editor-in-Chief of Contrast Magazine's last publication, Maraj Magazine, reached 15,000,000 hits on their website and 3,000,000 NEW hits came in after their site closed down once they announced they were ending the magazine. They recently brought back their site.
  • Contrast Magazine has already landed interviews with
    3OH!3, Mona Scott-Young and Carol Maraj (Nicki Minaj's mother).

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, and we understand that fully! That doesn't mean you can't help. Here are some ways to get involved.

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. "Word-of-mouth" is a great marketing tool. Tell your friends and family about us.
  • If you're on Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr, etc., you can share our campaign on your profile for your friends and followers to see. If you share it on Twitter, be sure to tag us, so we can see you get involved! Our Twitter handle is @ContrastMag_ and you can find us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/contrastmagazine.

Questions & Answers

Q: What kind content will Contrast Magazine have?
A: Each issue will be a compilation of articles and features about hip hop artists, singers, TV stars, clothing lines, TV shows and various topics throughout popular culture.

Q: How often will each issue be?
A: Each issue will be released once every 6 months.

Q: Can I find Contrast in magazine stands?
A: As of right now, Contrast Magazine is still an online magazine. The funds from this campaign will go toward the printing of physical copies.

Q: Do you guys offer internships?
A: Of course! We encourage learning and support education, so we're always welcoming interns to join our team and in return we offer them college credits.

And that's all there is to it. Contrast Magazine... Be Strikingly Different.

story:
SUNGLASSES FOR EVERY DAY

  • Make Mavericks your own - Whether you're in the city or by the beach, design a pair that lets you express who you are. Create the sunglasses you've always wanted.
  • Wear them all day - Designed to offer outstanding performance and comfort all day long, Mavericks can be worn whatever the conditions and wherever you are.
  • High protection lenses - Made from impact resistant polycarbonate, our lenses filter 100% of UVA and UVB rays and are polarised to reduce glare and enhance optical clarity.




DESIGN YOUR OWN MAVERICKS

  • Completely customisable - SunGod is about giving you the ability to customise your own product, and Mavericks are no different. Don't be restricted by limited frame and lens options.
  • Just Add Colour - Select from 3 different frame finishes, then choose from 6 polarised and mirrored lens options and 6 different tip colours. Design the pair of sunglasses you've always wanted.
  • Design your Mavericks here - Create and visualise your Mavericks before you pledge.


OUR LENSES

  • 100% UVA and UVB protection - Lenses that will protect your eyes from all harmful UV light. All our lenses exceed EN 1836 (CE) and ANSI Z80.3 (FDA) standards.
  • Polarised precision - Our polarised polycarbonate core reduces glare from horizontal surfaces like snow, water and the road, increasing depth perception and providing enhanced optical clarity.
  • Scratch and impact resistant - Used for aircraft windscreens and bulletproof glass, polycarbonate is known for it’s shatter-resistant properties and superior optical precision. We’ve also added a scratch-resistant film to keep your lenses protected and looking good.


OUR FRAMES

  • Durable but lightweight - Made from a composite steel and alloy frame, Mavericks fit securely on all face shapes and have been built to withstand the abuse of daily wear and tear. 
  • Rim-lock lens technology - Steel screws lock lenses in place securely and provide additional reinforcement to the frame.
  • Bright and functional tips - Made with comfort in mind, our tips are designed to hold your Mavericks in place all day. Pick colours to complement or contrast your lens and frame choices.




WHY WE NEED YOU

We've spent the last 6 months developing a high-performing frame, carefully selecting colour options, and constructing a system that will allow us to assemble each custom pair ourselves in the UK.

We now need your help to make SunGod Mavericks a reality!


OUR PERKS

As a reward for your pledge, we are going to send you the first production run of SunGod Mavericks.

All pairs are customisable and come with a case and microfibre cleaning cloth. Shipping is included to all UK and US addresses, for rest of world please add £5.

Our estimated delivery date is early-mid July. There is float in our programme and we'll be working hard to meet and beat this delivery date.

Unanswered question? Please send us an email and we'll get straight back to you: hello@sungod.co.

Thanks for your support and for checking out SunGod Mavericks!


FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

When do I design my SunGods? We'll send you a link at the end of the campaign when you can submit your design to us from our sunglasses designer. While you wait, you can work on your design here.

I forgot to add international shipping, what do I do? Don't worry, we'll be in touch at the end of the campaign to sort it out.

What size are SunGods? Our sunglasses are one size fits all and comparable size to other similar styled sunglasses available. We've used a malleable frame material that can be adjusted to fit well on both large and small heads!
