story:
Check out our latest Lookbook with the AEON Sunnies!
http://issuu.com/aeonattire/docs/sunnies-updated_small

Featured on:

Support Sunnies in under 10 seconds!
 http://bit.ly/AAshare

Visit the team at www.AEONAttire.com and connect on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram with one simple click. 

WHY SHOULD YOU SUPPORT?

• Save over 60% for a limited time! Every pair only $29.99 for first 75 supporters.

• The sunglass industry is a monopoly. We're giving you the option to avoid brand-inflated mark-ups. 

• Premium, unisex sunglasses with unprecedented price. An affordable investment piece. 

• Complete package. Every pair comes with a hard-shell  leather case, lens cloth, and microfiber pouch.

• UVA, UVB and UV400 protection for your beautiful, one-and-only pair of eyes.

• You should never have to squint in the sun. 

•  Incredibly Light weight; reduces pressure and those pesky red marks on the nose.

• They come completely packaged. Instant present for any occasion.

• Versatile range of designs. 

• Easy mailing, easy gifting--everytime.

Curious about the sunglass industry monopoly? Wall Street Journal...
http://online.wsj.com/article/SB10001424052748704518904575365362932852610.html

 @AEONAttire!

1. A Super Premium, Unisex sunglass made with materials that can brave the slips, falls, and accidents of everyday life. Made with a durable and flexible plastic frame, and polycarbonate scratch resistant lenses. It's lightweight, and can be carried anywhere. It'll become what your favourite sunglasses should be — long lasting and something that grows with you.   

2. Designed creatively with inspirations from childhood with a modern sensibility. Each pair of AEON Attire Sunnies represents a link between two different worlds. The Sunnies connect structure with beauty. Sharp lines and contours. Science and art. Old and young. What is and what is yet to be.

 3. A comfortable fit for the structure of the face and the sensitive nature of the skin. Our hypoallergenic frames are made from non toxic materials. They're nickel free, rust proof, and won't corrode/crack from sweat.

4. Respect for the windows to the soul. Formidable UVA & UVB, and UV 400 protection for the eyes.

5. Sold Direct and Crowdfunded. An answer to cheap knockoff frames and over priced brand inflated designer frames. Cheap quality frames aren't even worth spending money on. Premium glasses can cost $200+ in department stores. And that's without the gurantee, the leather case, and the microfiber pouch. We're scrapping the middle men and the ridiculous markups to keep the price low. After the campaign, this whole set will be retailing for $99 so you'll be saving over 60% when you support this project. 

 *Conceived for the free thinker, the writer, the artist, the designer, the entrepreneur, the traveler, the student & the teacher, the old and the young. The passionate and the creative.

 

Go ahead, bend them. Modelled after the resilient and flexible nature of our youthful essence. Take life in stride.

The AEON Sunnies are inspired by the meeting of two worlds-- structure with beauty. Sharp lines and contours. Science and art. Old and young. What is and what is yet to be.

 You'll look amazing and feel safe. Crafted with UVA, UVB and UV400 protection. 

Sharp lines meet sweeping contours on the frame of the "Neko" style. 

Custom AEON Attire insignia can be found on every pair. Timeless and subtle. 

 With 12 styles to choose from, there is something for everyone. 

Support us in under 10 seconds!
 http://bit.ly/AAshare

Visit the team at www.AEONAttire.com and connect on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram with one simple click 

 @AEONAttire!

Comes in it's very own house. Your choice of a smooth white leather (black or brown) case and an on-the-go microfibre pouch with a lens cloth. For the explorer and the collector.
 

 

This is where you come in!

We need your help to go from working prototypes to full-scale production. We have been working with a leading manufacturer in frames and lenses that are hand assembled, polished, and packaged to our exact needs.

The funds raised from this project will be used to produce the AEON Sunnies Eyewear line, which includes 12 different eyewear styles, which utilizes metal for 6 of the designs. It will also help pay for the costs associated with a large scale production run, including the tooling, necessary molds, samples, and the creation of the cases and microfibre pouches. After the campaign is funded, we will quickly proceed to the creation of the Sunnies, quality control, and then mailing out your orders as soon as possible. 

By helping us make the AEON Sunnies, you'll get some Sunnies in return and be the first to wear them! Sunnies, shoutouts, meet and greets, customized dance sequences, hats, accessories... find it all below! 

All reward levels over $30 include a limited edition Indiegogo microfiber pouch and hard-shell leather case for each pair of Sunnies + free shipping within Canada. If you are an international friend, please add $7 for shipping. At the end of the campaign, you will receive a survey where you specify the style of glasses you would like.  

As a major thanks to everyone, all pledges above $35 gets you a complimentary thank you, a PERSONAL shout out to you, AND 3 customized dances by all members to a song of your CHOICE (YES ANY SONG). This will be posted on all our social media for your support as well as our campaign. Feel free to share our dedicated dance with all your friends, you're famous! 

(Luckily no singing)

  • $5: Shout Outs! A huge thank you, a follow on facebook, and an honorable mention. Every dollar makes a difference!
  • $20: Dance for your love! A fun way to support. You pick 3 songs and we dance to them. No questions asked. We'll be giving you a personal credit, thank you, and an honorable mention, and then the video will be uploaded onto our campaign & all our social media! Where you will become famous. 
  • $30: As thanks to our first 75 supporters, we take $5 off the price. One pair of any AEON Sunnies of your choice + (brown/black) leather case + microfiber pouch. 

 

  • $35+: One pair of AEON Sunnies of your choice + (brown/black) leather case + microfiber pouch. A customized dance.

  • $50+: One pair of AEON Sunnies of your choice  + (brown/black) leather case + microfiber pouch. plus a limited edition AEON cap to commemorate the Indiegogo launch. A customized dance.
  • $70+: Two pairs of AEON Sunnies of your choice + (brown/black) leather case + microfiber pouch. A customized dance.

  • $140+: Four pairs of AEON Sunnies of your choice + (brown/black) leather case + microfiber pouch. A customized dance.
  • $275+:  Eight pairs of AEON Sunnies of your choice + (brown/black) leather case + microfiber pouch. A customized dance.
  • $420: Twelve pairs of timeless AEON Sunnies of your choice + (brown/black) leather case + microfiber pouch. A customized dance.
  • $850: Twenty five pairs of any timeless AEON Sunnies of your choice + (brown/black) case + microfiber pouch plus five limited edition AEON caps to commemorate the Indiegogo launch.  A customized dance.
  • $1480: Forty pairs of any timeless AEON Sunnies of your choice + (brown/black) case + microfiber pouch plus ten limited edition AEON caps to commemorate the Indiegogo launch. A customized dance. 

Together, let's create the sunglasses of our dreams. Lenses that are living representations of the best this world has to offer. Make your pledge, receive fun and valuable rewards, share the story, and experience top-notch design and superior value. If we meet our goal, the collection comes to life!

-Wei, Wei & Patrick (AEON Attire)

 

The main challenge is awareness. We need to get the word out and build a buzz. We have asked friends, family, and bloggers worldwide to help us spread the word! If the campaign goes through, it's a huge step in helping break the sunglass market monopoly. 

Once the funding is in place, our next challenge will be to produce a large quantity of sunglasses at the quality and standard that we are looking for. We have a manufacturer with 20 years of sunglass experience, and we'll be working with them to produce the eyewear and get it into your hands. 

Help share the campign and get a free pair of sunnies! 
CONTEST DETAILS


(for blogs and publications just enter this into your site):

Enter here to win your very own limited edition Sunnies from our Indiegogo campaign! 7 lucky winners will be contacted when the Indiegogo campaign has successfully finished. Also the person who shares it the most every week(until the completion of our campaign) will also win a free pair of AEON Sunnies.

In order to win, you will need to:

1. Enter our quick contest for a chance to win your favorite pair of AEON Sunnies(Over 100+ USD value): HERE
2. Follow us on Twitter @AEONAttire
3. Share about the giveaway by tweeting this:

Example: “Just joined @AEONAttire giveaway to win their sweet Sunnies! Support their great Indiegogo campaign here: http://bit.ly/IgAEON Enter @ bit.ly/AAsunnies”

-Wei, Wei & Patrick (AEON Attire)

Thank you so much for checking out our Indiegogo page. Please continue following your dreams and stop at nothing to make the world a better, more inspired place.


Also, a huge thank you to Waylon Thorton for the use of his song "Favorite Secrets"! You can find his great music here: http://theheavyhands.bandcamp.com/

Wei, Wei & Patrick

AEON Attire // www.AEONAttire.com // Toronto, Canada

 

FAQ

Q: How and when do I choose which styles I want?
A: All Indiegogo campaign reward choices are made once a project's campaign is completed. Indiegogo offers a survey that will gather all the order information.

Q: What do I get when I order a pair of AEON Sunnies? 
A: With every pair of AEON Sunnies comes a lens cloth, microfiber pouch, a hard-shell protective case, and lots of love from the team here at AEON Attire!

Q: Why do you offer dancing as a reward? 
A: The founders of AEON Attire actually raised the seed money for the business through doing street performances! So we thought personalized dancing would be a fun way to thank you for being part of the movement.

Q: Can I choose any pair I want for the rewards ($30+)? 
A: Yes! Choose from any of the 12 styles. You can also choose the interior colour of your hard-shell protective case: brown or black.
story_txt:
Check out our latest Lookbook with the AEON Sunnies!http://issuu.com/aeonattire/docs/sunnies-updated_smallFeatured on:


Support Sunnies in under 10 seconds! http://bit.ly/AAshare
Visit the team at www.AEONAttire.com and connect on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram with one simple click. 
WHY SHOULD YOU SUPPORT?

• Save over 60% for a limited time! Every pair only $29.99 for first 75 supporters.
• The sunglass industry is a monopoly. We're giving you the option to avoid brand-inflated mark-ups. • Premium, unisex sunglasses with unprecedented price. An affordable investment piece. 
• Complete package. Every pair comes with a hard-shell  leather case, lens cloth, and microfiber pouch.
• UVA, UVB and UV400 protection for your beautiful, one-and-only pair of eyes.
• You should never have to squint in the sun. 
•  Incredibly Light weight; reduces pressure and those pesky red marks on the nose.
• They come completely packaged. Instant present for any occasion.
• Versatile range of designs. 
• Easy mailing, easy gifting--everytime.
Curious about the sunglass industry monopoly? Wall Street Journal...http://online.wsj.com/article/SB10001424052748704518904575365362932852610.html
 @AEONAttire!


1. A Super Premium, Unisex sunglass made with materials that can brave the slips, falls, and accidents of everyday life. Made with a durable and flexible plastic frame, and polycarbonate scratch resistant lenses. It's lightweight, and can be carried anywhere. It'll become what your favourite sunglasses should be — long lasting and something that grows with you.   
2. Designed creatively with inspirations from childhood with a modern sensibility. Each pair of AEON Attire Sunnies represents a link between two different worlds. The Sunnies connect structure with beauty. Sharp lines and contours. Science and art. Old and young. What is and what is yet to be.
 3. A comfortable fit for the structure of the face and the sensitive nature of the skin. Our hypoallergenic frames are made from non toxic materials. They're nickel free, rust proof, and won't corrode/crack from sweat.
4. Respect for the windows to the soul. Formidable UVA & UVB, and UV 400 protection for the eyes.
5. Sold Direct and Crowdfunded. An answer to cheap knockoff frames and over priced brand inflated designer frames. Cheap quality frames aren't even worth spending money on. Premium glasses can cost $200+ in department stores. And that's without the gurantee, the leather case, and the microfiber pouch. We're scrapping the middle men and the ridiculous markups to keep the price low. After the campaign, this whole set will be retailing for $99 so you'll be saving over 60% when you support this project. 
 *Conceived for the free thinker, the writer, the artist, the designer, the entrepreneur, the traveler, the student & the teacher, the old and the young. The passionate and the creative.






 

Go ahead, bend them. Modelled after the resilient and flexible nature of our youthful essence. Take life in stride.

The AEON Sunnies are inspired by the meeting of two worlds-- structure with beauty. Sharp lines and contours. Science and art. Old and young. What is and what is yet to be.

 You'll look amazing and feel safe. Crafted with UVA, UVB and UV400 protection. 

Sharp lines meet sweeping contours on the frame of the "Neko" style. 

Custom AEON Attire insignia can be found on every pair. Timeless and subtle. 

 With 12 styles to choose from, there is something for everyone. 
Support us in under 10 seconds! http://bit.ly/AAshare

Visit the team at www.AEONAttire.com and connect on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram with one simple click 
 @AEONAttire!

Comes in it's very own house. Your choice of a smooth white leather (black or brown) case and an on-the-go microfibre pouch with a lens cloth. For the explorer and the collector. 
 

This is where you come in!
We need your help to go from working prototypes to full-scale production. We have been working with a leading manufacturer in frames and lenses that are hand assembled, polished, and packaged to our exact needs.
The funds raised from this project will be used to produce the AEON Sunnies Eyewear line, which includes 12 different eyewear styles, which utilizes metal for 6 of the designs. It will also help pay for the costs associated with a large scale production run, including the tooling, necessary molds, samples, and the creation of the cases and microfibre pouches. After the campaign is funded, we will quickly proceed to the creation of the Sunnies, quality control, and then mailing out your orders as soon as possible. 

By helping us make the AEON Sunnies, you'll get some Sunnies in return and be the first to wear them! Sunnies, shoutouts, meet and greets, customized dance sequences, hats, accessories... find it all below! 
All reward levels over $30 include a limited edition Indiegogo microfiber pouch and hard-shell leather case for each pair of Sunnies + free shipping within Canada. If you are an international friend, please add $7 for shipping. At the end of the campaign, you will receive a survey where you specify the style of glasses you would like.  
As a major thanks to everyone, all pledges above $35 gets you a complimentary thank you, a PERSONAL shout out to you, AND 3 customized dances by all members to a song of your CHOICE (YES ANY SONG). This will be posted on all our social media for your support as well as our campaign. Feel free to share our dedicated dance with all your friends, you're famous! 

(Luckily no singing)


$5: Shout Outs! A huge thank you, a follow on facebook, and an honorable mention. Every dollar makes a difference!


$20: Dance for your love! A fun way to support. You pick 3 songs and we dance to them. No questions asked. We'll be giving you a personal credit, thank you, and an honorable mention, and then the video will be uploaded onto our campaign & all our social media! Where you will become famous. 



$30: As thanks to our first 75 supporters, we take $5 off the price. One pair of any AEON Sunnies of your choice + (brown/black) leather case + microfiber pouch. 

 

$35+: One pair of AEON Sunnies of your choice  + (brown/black) leather case + microfiber pouch. A customized dance.

$50+: One pair of AEON Sunnies of your choice  + (brown/black) leather case + microfiber pouch. plus a limited edition AEON cap to commemorate the Indiegogo launch. A customized dance.

$70+: Two pairs of AEON Sunnies of your choice  + (brown/black) leather case + microfiber pouch. A customized dance.

$140+: Four pairs of AEON Sunnies of your choice  + (brown/black) leather case + microfiber pouch. A customized dance.

$275+:  Eight pairs of AEON Sunnies of your choice  + (brown/black) leather case + microfiber pouch. A customized dance.



$420: Twelve pairs of timeless AEON Sunnies of your choice  + (brown/black) leather case + microfiber pouch. A customized dance.


$850: Twenty five pairs of any timeless AEON Sunnies of your choice + (brown/black) case + microfiber pouch plus five limited edition AEON caps to commemorate the Indiegogo launch.  A customized dance.

$1480: Forty pairs of any timeless AEON Sunnies of your choice + (brown/black) case + microfiber pouch plus ten limited edition AEON caps to commemorate the Indiegogo launch. A customized dance. 


Together, let's create the sunglasses of our dreams. Lenses that are living representations of the best this world has to offer. Make your pledge, receive fun and valuable rewards, share the story, and experience top-notch design and superior value. If we meet our goal, the collection comes to life!
-Wei, Wei & Patrick (AEON Attire)
 

The main challenge is awareness. We need to get the word out and build a buzz. We have asked friends, family, and bloggers worldwide to help us spread the word! If the campaign goes through, it's a huge step in helping break the sunglass market monopoly. 
Once the funding is in place, our next challenge will be to produce a large quantity of sunglasses at the quality and standard that we are looking for. We have a manufacturer with 20 years of sunglass experience, and we'll be working with them to produce the eyewear and get it into your hands. 

Help share the campign and get a free pair of sunnies! CONTEST DETAILS
(for blogs and publications just enter this into your site):Enter here to win your very own limited edition Sunnies from our Indiegogo campaign! 7 lucky winners will be contacted when the Indiegogo campaign has successfully finished. Also the person who shares it the most every week(until the completion of our campaign) will also win a free pair of AEON Sunnies.In order to win, you will need to:1. Enter our quick contest for a chance to win your favorite pair of AEON Sunnies(Over 100+ USD value): HERE2. Follow us on Twitter @AEONAttire3. Share about the giveaway by tweeting this:Example: “Just joined @AEONAttire giveaway to win their sweet Sunnies! Support their great Indiegogo campaign here: http://bit.ly/IgAEON Enter @ bit.ly/AAsunnies”-Wei, Wei & Patrick (AEON Attire)


Thank you so much for checking out our Indiegogo page. Please continue following your dreams and stop at nothing to make the world a better, more inspired place.Also, a huge thank you to Waylon Thorton for the use of his song "Favorite Secrets"! You can find his great music here: http://theheavyhands.bandcamp.com/
Wei, Wei & Patrick
AEON Attire // www.AEONAttire.com // Toronto, Canada
 
FAQ
Q: How and when do I choose which styles I want?A: All Indiegogo campaign reward choices are made once a project's campaign is completed. Indiegogo offers a survey that will gather all the order information.
Q: What do I get when I order a pair of AEON Sunnies? A: With every pair of AEON Sunnies comes a lens cloth, microfiber pouch, a hard-shell protective case, and lots of love from the team here at AEON Attire!Q: Why do you offer dancing as a reward? A: The founders of AEON Attire actually raised the seed money for the business through doing street performances! So we thought personalized dancing would be a fun way to thank you for being part of the movement.Q: Can I choose any pair I want for the rewards ($30+)? A: Yes! Choose from any of the 12 styles. You can also choose the interior colour of your hard-shell protective case: brown or black.

story:
Greetings!  Please help us get our Earth-friendly hemp company off the ground!                 

hempsac Eco-Minded Productions is a startup hemp-based company, for the People!  Hemp has been a prevalent resource since the days of antiquity, and our company strives to continue in the ancient and modern traditions of the Cannabis plant.           

Check out our innovative line of Eco-Friendly clothes and accessories! The double-layered Jacket/Hoodie weighs over 2lbs!

****** ALL OF OUR PRODUCTS COME IN ELEVEN COLORS!

                                


         

                         



Get your CUSTOM DESIGN or COMPANY printed onto HEMP SHIRTS AND HOODIES!!  Or choose from one of our designs (these are for the People).  The designs will be EMBROIDERED and will be included in the price!!!  

NOTE: THESE SHIRTS ARE NOT ACTUALLY EMBROIDERED; THEY ARE SAMPLES DONE DIGITALLY; our goal is to eventually have all of our shirts available in print as well as embroidery.    

Since us global advocates are still pushing for the full-on legalization of the Cannabis plant, without any dishonest influences or regulations, the global hemp supply is limited.  The American people are especially limited, since America is one of the few well-developed nations that prohibits the cultivation of industrial Cannabis (.01% THC = NONE).                                     

                                                But Why Hemp?

Was the first printed edition Bible of the 15th century printed on hemp paper?  How about the Declaration of Independence?  Did Henry ford really build a hemp-fueled automible in 1941 with a celluose hemp-fiber body? Was an infant's inoperable brain tumor cured with a 3.8% CBD cannabinoid tincture applied to a pacifier?  Yes, yes, yes, and yes!                    

We have a very strong friendship with our Hemp cultivator/ manufacturer! We've secured a trustworthy partnership, and we're ready for up to 30,000 pieces per month; AND YES, WE'RE OPEN FOR WHOLESALE!!!

Please message us with ANY questions!   

__________________________________________________________________________________

story:
Our fashion netbags

well known in  Europe , are made in a Sheltered workshop in Czech Republic - by disabled people. Every net bag which you buy, can improve their lives
and provide funds to live their lives better.
We make it from recyclated PET bottles, or other plastic waste .
The net bag is very solid , it can carry 35 kg/77 lbs/ or maximum volume 40L /10 gallons/ and the weight is only 30g. /1 ounce/.
You can hide it in your hand , pocket of your jacket, anywhere it takes a minimum space.Just try to compare this power with plastic or paper bags and think -  that bags are washable and long life - they can protect our rivers and oceans from plastic contamination.
It is easy to choose right......
Thanks.


What You Get

Strong washable bag - when you go shopping , you will value it.
When you go to the gym , you will good looking....
When you need something storage in pantry - it help you.
For students - books, supplies , drinks , gym clothes.
For Retail stores-Grocery .
Hang on the shoulder and go.....





The Impact

The U.S.  consumed over 6 billion  plastic bags every year .
Whole world consumed over 45 billion plastic bags/year.
Come on to start to protect our rivers and oceans
from plastics  , by purchasing netbags.


Challenges


You can choose from 3 option

BASIC pack - 2 pcs of bags for 16 USD. include worldwide delivery

FAMILY pack - 4 pcs of bags for 28 USD. include worldwide delivery

BUSINESS pack - 40 pcs for 236 USD . For grocery , retail stores / 1 pcs for 5.9 USD/ all include worldwide delivery.

For more than 40 pcs , visit us on  www.netbagshop.com

Worldwide delivery is next working day.

story:
Hello! We are two women who love fashion, technology, and fitness, and we understand the power of looking great and feeling great. We love our Fitbit trackers that help keep us active, but the rubber bracelet...?  Well, not so much.

Our solution is a line of chic bracelets and necklaces that house the Fitbit Flex tracker, so you can make every step count in style. Now your Fitbit can look as good as the rest of you! We are producing an assortment in a range of styles, from classic chic to downtown edgy. We've also created earrings to pull your entire look together.


Fashion Press Is Buzzing...


Now the fun part  -- let's go shopping! 

New Style! ID Bracelet in Gold or Silver, $88

Includes free US shipping.  After Indiegogo price of $98. 

We made it to our $20,000 goal and are thrilled to put another style into production: our ID bracelet for the Fitbit Flex.  With the studs on top and your Fitbit tracker inside, this isn't your typical ID bracelet.  It comes in two finishes: brass with 18K gold plating or imitation rhodium for the silver finish. The chunky chain will feature multiple jump rings and allow you to adjust the sizing from 7.4" to 7.8".  It's comfortable and lightweight at 1.6 ounces.  This style is made in the USA.


Stud Double Wrap Bracelet, $78

Includes free US shipping. 


The stud double wrap bracelet is an eye-catcher. We think you'll love how this bracelet, with its 12K gold studs, black leather band, and your Fitbit inside, will make every step just a bit bolder!  The leather band wraps twice around your wrist and has a double snap closure to make it extra comfortable.  The interior circumference is 13.5" long with 2 snaps closed or 14.25" long with 1 snap closed.  It's lightweight at 1.4 ounces.


Basketweave Single Wrap Bracelet, $78  

Includes free US shipping.

We love the combination of the classic basketweave next to the modern black leather band and 12K gold plating, making this style feel fresh and polished. The leather band wraps around once for those who like a slim profile, and it's comfortable to wear with its double snap closure. (Please note that some photos show a double wrap leather bracelet, but the final product will be a single wrap leather bracelet.)  The interior circumference is 7.4" long with 2 snaps closed or 7.8" long with 1 snap closed. It's lightweight at 1.2 ounces.


Stud Pendant Necklace in Gold or Silver, $88

Includes free US shipping.

Free your wrist! This pendant is lightweight and designed to lay flat when worn around your neck. We love how the 18K plating and stud accents brighten up your face for an instant glow. And when you hit your goal and the lights flash, it won't be your imagination that you're emitting a glow from within! The necklace is 20 inches long (shown on-figure in the photo above) and comes with a 4 inch extender for those who want a longer option. Note that the correct chain is the thinner style that is shown on the silver pendant. It's super light and comfortable at 0.9 ounces. This style is made in the USA.


New Style! Single stud earring, $25

Includes free US shipping.

Pull your entire look together with a single pyramid earring.  This goes perfectly with all our pieces and is a wonderful update to the basic stud earring.  It's made of brass and plated in 12K gold.


Triple Stud Earring, $25

Includes free US shipping.

This piece goes with all our jewelry and will pull your look together. We love this earring because it's basic enough for everyday, but the studs add just the right amount of edge. The earrings are imported and plated in 12K gold.


Other newly added perks:

1) Can't decide between two styles or want to give Bezels & Bytes for Valentine's Day or Mother's Day?  Save $10 by purchasing the specific "Add On" perk after your first bracelet or necklace purchase. 

2) Add any of our earrings for $10 (regularly $25).  Purchase the "Add On: Earring" perk. We will confirm your Single or Triple Stud choice at the end of the campaign.


As Seen In the Media

Refinery 29: "Wearable Tech Just Got Way More Stylish"

Well + Good: "Fitness Tracker Fashion: A New Era of Stylish Wearables"


What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking $20,000 to fund tooling and rounds of samples for our Fitbit Flex accessories assortment. We've placed an initial order for many of these styles, so our first customers will receive their product in April!  Almost all our styles feature windows that align with your tracker, so you can see the progress lights when you tap on the piece. Fun, right?! We've also designed these pieces so that your Fitbit Flex tracker will sit securely within the jewelry but be easy to insert and remove. And don't worry, you will feel and hear the rewarding buzz through our jewelry when you've hit your daily step goal! Please note that the Fitbit Flex is NOT included in any of the styles. You can purchase the Flex separately.


Risks & Challenges

We have been very pleased with the quality of our samples but need to ensure quality is maintained for a larger production run. In particular, we want to ensure doors for the tracker open easily and that the tracker stays inside when we produce on a larger scale.

The other risk is how our jewelry wears over time. We have worked with the factory on a plating thickness that will hold up to our active customer's lifestyle, but we will continue to monitor as time goes on. We have been wearing our samples non-stop for the past month, and they are looking great so far!

We recommend that you wear Bezels & Bytes styles for fashion and not intense physical activity (though we have tested them under such conditions and they hold up great!).

Don't forget! Our jewelry does NOT include the Fitbit Flex tracker. You can purchase the Flex separately here. 


Our brand: Bezels & Bytes

By funding this campaign (thank you!), you will not only launch our assortment for the Fitbit Flex, but also launch the Bezels & Bytes brand. As women on the go, we need technology at our fingertips to get things checked off our lists and to multi-task. Our vision is to create tech-friendly fashion and accessories, so you can stay connected while looking polished and put together.


Melissa was a marketer at Gap, and Sarah was a buyer at Bloomingdale's. We live and breathe retail and fashion. We left big companies with dreams to build a fashion brand and realized we need to update the way we dress to accommodate our modern, tech-enhanced lives. We would love to have you join us on this journey!

FAQ

What is your return policy?

We want you to be absolutely delighted with the product you receive and be rewarded for taking a chance on our new company. If you are not satisfied within 10 days of receiving the product, simply email us and we will find a solution.

Where is your jewelry manufactured?

We are testing factories and currently working with two in the USA and one in Asia.

Will my tracker be accurate in the jewelry?

We have worn trackers in our jewelry alongside trackers in the rubber bracelet, and the results are almost identical. Just like when wearing the Fitbit tracker, steps vary person to person and with various activities. Note that for the necklace, we designed it to lay flat when walking; If you are active to the point your necklace is jumping up and down, accuracy will likely be compromised.

Other Ways You Can Help

Thank you for helping us to hit our goal and get our company off the ground. Here are additional ways to connect with us and share the news: 

Bezels & Bytes: Learn more and get in touch! bezelsandbytes.com

Facebook: Let's be friends! facebook.com/bezelsandbytes

Pinterest: Show you're pinterested! pinterest.com/bezelsandbytes

Instagram: Check out some pics! @bezelsandbytes 

Use the hashtag #bezelsandbytes to show us your favorite way to style your tech.

Thank you very much for your support!

Fashionably yours,

Melissa & Sarah XOXO

sarah@bezelsandbytes.com

As Seen In the Media
Refinery 29: "Wearable Tech Just Got Way More Stylish"
Well + Good: "Fitness Tracker Fashion: A New Era of Stylish Wearables"


What We Need & What You Get
We are seeking $20,000 to fund tooling and rounds of samples for our Fitbit Flex accessories assortment. We've placed an initial order for many of these styles, so our first customers will receive their product in April! 
Almost all our styles feature windows that align with your tracker, so you can see the progress lights when you tap on the piece. Fun, right?! We've also designed these pieces so that your Fitbit Flex tracker will sit securely within the jewelry but be easy to insert and remove. And don't worry, you will feel and hear the rewarding buzz through our jewelry when you've hit your daily step goal!
Please note that the Fitbit Flex is NOT included in any of the styles. You can purchase the Flex separately.

Risks & Challenges

We have been very pleased with the quality of our samples but need to ensure quality is maintained for a larger production run. In particular, we want to ensure doors for the tracker open easily and that the tracker stays inside when we produce on a larger scale.
The other risk is how our jewelry wears over time. We have worked with the factory on a plating thickness that will hold up to our active customer's lifestyle, but we will continue to monitor as time goes on. We have been wearing our samples non-stop for the past month, and they are looking great so far!

We recommend that you wear Bezels & Bytes styles for fashion and not intense physical activity (though we have tested them under such conditions and they hold up great!).
Don't forget! Our jewelry does NOT include the Fitbit Flex tracker. You can purchase the Flex separately here. 

Our brand: Bezels & Bytes






By funding this campaign (thank you!), you will not only launch our assortment for the Fitbit Flex, but also launch the Bezels & Bytes brand. As women on the go, we need technology at our fingertips to get things checked off our lists and to multi-task. Our vision is to create tech-friendly fashion and accessories, so you can stay connected while looking polished and put together.


Melissa was a marketer at Gap, and Sarah was a buyer at Bloomingdale's. We live and breathe retail and fashion. We left big companies with dreams to build a fashion brand and realized we need to update the way we dress to accommodate our modern, tech-enhanced lives. We would love to have you join us on this journey!
FAQ
What is your return policy?
We want you to be absolutely delighted with the product you receive and be rewarded for taking a chance on our new company. If you are not satisfied within 10 days of receiving the product, simply email us and we will find a solution.
Where is your jewelry manufactured?
We are testing factories and currently working with two in the USA and one in Asia.
Will my tracker be accurate in the jewelry?
We have worn trackers in our jewelry alongside trackers in the rubber bracelet, and the results are almost identical. Just like when wearing the Fitbit tracker, steps vary person to person and with various activities. Note that for the necklace, we designed it to lay flat when walking; If you are active to the point your necklace is jumping up and down, accuracy will likely be compromised.

Other Ways You Can Help

Thank you for helping us to hit our goal and get our company off the ground. Here are additional ways to connect with us and share the news: 
Bezels & Bytes: Learn more and get in touch! bezelsandbytes.com
Facebook: Let's be friends! facebook.com/bezelsandbytes
Pinterest: Show you're pinterested! pinterest.com/bezelsandbytes
Instagram: Check out some pics! @bezelsandbytes 
Use the hashtag #bezelsandbytes to show us your favorite way to style your tech.
Thank you very much for your support!
Fashionably yours,
Melissa & Sarah XOXOsarah@bezelsandbytes.com

story:
What is DormMate?

DormMate is an inventive bag unlike any other on the shelves these days. It is a roll-up toiletry bag that holds everything from your toothbrush to your shaving gel. Simply put, it is your personal countertop.

DormMate is designed to protect germ-fearing students from the millions of bacteria on a dorm bathroom countertop. When rolled out DormMate fits perfectly between sinks (we tested it on the smallest of spaces). Once rolled up, DormMate has space efficiency written all over it. The handle fits on any doorknob, while it is small enough to be stored on a shelf or under a bed.

We are past the prototyping phase and are into production but here is where we need you.

So here's the plan.

With the money raised on indiegogo, we will do three things.

  • Place an order for 1,000 DormMates
  • Market DormMate at college campuses. 
  • Plant some trees!

After proving sales in big college markets this fall, DormMate will be ready to go to distributors like Bed Bath and Beyond and Target who are the biggest players in a college market estimated to be worth 4 billion dollars. 

We will run T.V informercials by next summer and target other markets that we missed in the 2012 school year. 

Is DormMate just for students?

No way! It is the perfect bag for travelers, painters, bikers, outdoor enthusiasts  and just about everyone else. We originally designed DormMate for students but found that the majority of people wanted to use it for more than just their dorm. 

The future of DormMate.

Once we establish the DormMate name on campuses around the United States, we plan to do three things. 

-Tap into the growing international college market.

-Set up an online store, to optimize the traffic that our website         (http://www.dormmate.co) would otherwise waste selling one dorm accessory. 

-Invent more dorm products

These actions will boost our sales into the millions and further establish DormMate as a household name, or should we say dormhold name.

Can I buy a DormMate right now?

Yes. We placed a small order of 100 that will be shipping in early August. If your school starts earlier than most, or you just can't wait to get your hands on a DormMate shoot us an email at dormmate@gmail.com

Who are we? 

In short: We are a couple of college students starting a company with good morale values that hopes to give back to the earth. 

In detail:  We are the inventors of DormMate. If you've ever been in a college dorm bathroom, you know why we invented this product. DormMate is a roll-up toiletry bag that becomes a pallet for your toothbrush, razor, hairbrush etc. that we invented for ourselves.

Connor Clarry and I (Michael Thomas) will be attending Cal Poly and The University of British Columbia respectively in the fall. We realized that there are a whole lot of "hoodies" running the world these days. What I mean by this is that you no longer have to be 50 years old and balding to start the next greatest company. 

By contributing to DormMate, you are not only helping us. You are helping the world. We don't mean the occasional student you may save from bacteria. DormMate is a company that hopes to give more than we take from the beautiful Earth we live on. 

We'll admit, we've hugged a tree or two in our lives. It's hard not to look at the world we live in and feel a complex emotion of love and hate. Love, for the beautiful products we use everyday. But hate, for the destruction these products cause. 

This is our mission to be one of the world's businesses of tomorrow. We hope to lead by example and show our generation just how easy it is to give a little back to Mother Nature. Please join us and help us set a precedent of good things to come in a generation that is suppose to "change the world."

story:
Short Summary

My dream!

Hi my name is Luke Valvona and my company is Cedar Views ltd after installing both domestic and commercial fencing and gates for the last ten years i had a dream of modernising fencing, gates and garden products to compliment modern construction styles and garden designs.

I have so far bought most of the tools and machines that i need and have a website that is nearly complete, unfortunatly i have also reached the end of my funds. I am currently working full time to pay for the growth of my company. With your help i can focus 100% of my time on that growth and bring some quality products to market.

 

What We Need & What You Get

As i have reached my budget growth is slow and to really put my company where it needs to be i have to achieve the following:

  • Finish website for online ordering 
  • Buy materials 
  • Advertising
  • Premises

To achieve this I need a further £8500.

The bulk of the funding will go on renting and running a workshop - £6000. £2000 will be spent on Materials and the final £500 will be on advertising and finishing the website.

Any help received would be greatly appreciated and will not go unrewarded! Any donation will see you become a patron of the company, receiving a personal hand wrtten thank you from me and discounts for life on any products from my website, In the current climate any donations are welcomed  but if you can make a big difference then the reward must match, please check out the perks on offer.

Whats next?????

If i can not raise the funds i need then the money raised will be used the same, working within smaller budgets. I am committed to making a change within this industry so no matter what happens i will continue to push Cedar Views in the direction of success.

Thank you for taking the time to look at my campaign and please help, we know times are hard so if you cannot donate then please help by spreading the word about my campaign, like us on facebook

story:
So, What is BAZZUL Studios? 

BAZZUL Studios is a proudly Canadian clothing brand, rooted in North American fashion tradition with a truly global reach. Head office is in Toronto, where we are infusing the rich landscape of denim culture with the BAZZUL philosophy on classic, timeless ready-to-wear. Our pieces are fashion forward, while adhering to their original functions, time-honored lines, cuts and quality fabric.

We are working together to make the best product possible, delivering enduring style and quality to the diverse and discerning BAZZUL customer. 

And the brains behind this?

Creative Director, Felicia Burke, and her team of dedicated denimheads. They are flung far and wide, and they are very good at what they do. 

How far we talkin’?

Toronto, New York, London, & L.A. 

Wowie! Why all those places?

BAZZUL is all about the best of the best – which in the apparel world means Denim made in Los Angeles, Sportswear made in Canada and Ready-to-Wear made in the UK. Our team members in all those places are making BAZZUL products happen in real time, and bringing their local flavour to the brand. 

I’m interested…Tell me more, what exactly are you making? 

We are going to throw out all that traditional fashion secrecy and show you exactly what we are up to:

6 Styles of Jeans with some otherworldly finishes

4 Styles of classic shirting, with super-fine digital BAZZUL prints

2 Premium Sweatshirts

CHECK OUT MORE IMAGES IN THE GALLERY  










Sounds like you’ve got it together, why do you need Indiegogo?

Pulling together all the elements for a first season launch costs a lot of money and takes a lot of time from talented people. This especially applies to denim, which is highly specialized and needs the loving care of long established factories and wash-houses (for that owned-it-a-million-years look), which are available to us in LA. All of the R+D is done in the Toronto studio, we’re damn good, but there is only so far we can take our home-grown samples without this serious and essential machinery.

We need that final set of top-notch samples for when we start the process of getting shop orders and building a stockist list. That means taking the product on the road in January to Capsule Trade Show in NYC, where we can meet and show the product to store buyers. When we do this we need to have great looking promotional materials, a ballin’ website and a whole ‘lotta logistics sorted out! 

In a nutshell, your Indiegogo donation will go towards: 

  • Developing and making the “Golden Seal” samples of each style in our Denim line-up, one for sales and one for press. (Golden Seal is industry terminology for the final, perfect sample that we will present to buyers, and on which production is based). For each style our developer in Los Angeles has to go through 3 edits, with changes on the fabric composition, the cut and the wash. This is by far the biggest cost, but once we nail down the fits on our 6 styles, we can use those fits as a base season after season. It is a key investment to the longevity of the brand. Cost: $14, 506
  • Developing and making the golden seal samples for our printed shirting range. This includes the weighty cost of digitally printing short yardages of fabric (later when we print for production the cost goes down dramatically), excellent patternmaking, and craftsmanship in the home of tailoring – the United Kingdom. Cost: $4076
  • Developing and making the golden seal samples for our premium sweatshirts. Everything to do with the sweatshirts happens at home in Toronto, where local talent make the final pieces. Cost: $2313
  • Registering for trade shows, and then getting the product there. This includes the show fee, flights, shipping, the cheapest food and accommodation we can find, and the really exciting stuff like order forms and sales books (harhar). There are great shows in Europe and all over the world, but for this first season we are aiming a little closer to home, Capsule Trade Show in NYC, January 2013. Cost: $4550
  • Studio Rent. Cost: $3000

 

This is a relatively condensed explanation of our budget. If you are interested in investing and are curious about a more detailed breakdown, we’d love to hear from you, and can send you some further information. 

Right, I get it, pretty cool! So if I donate I get prizes right?

Do you ever! The seductive prize breakdown looks can be seen to the side, and we will be updating with pics so you can see exactly what you are getting! 

I’m pretty convinced and threw down $300. When do I actually get my jeans?

We are aiming for June delivery. If we can get the product out to you earlier we certainly will! That’s fashion though folks, she takes bloody ages. 

Last thing: I looked into wash houses and they can be pretty notorious for polluting/water use, what’s the deal?

We looked into that too, and as a result we are using reduced water consumption methods, and more modern, less damaging techniques. BAZZUL might not be branded as ‘green’ but sustainability is at our bottom line, and all the processes we use are always the most eco-responsible option. For example, we are eliminating unnecessary packaging material, tags and cards, opting to print any vital information directly to the garment.

MEET THE ZZ TEAM

story:
Hi Indiegogo funders, I am Jase King and I've been photographing the world and its diverse cultures and peculiarities across over 79 countries and almost 200 cities. Over a period of 10 years, I have captured over 250,000 images of the world we all call home. I carefully select and manipulate the photographed image, to create one of a kind prints and fabrics used for the production of clothes, accessories and home wares.The unique statement pieces form this Visionary Clothing and lifestyle brand named, VIAGGI BY JASE KING.
"Viaggi" is Italian for "Travels". The beautiful sound of this language is translated into the phonetics of the word, evoking elegance and sophistication. It is by no coincidence that the images are imagined while galavanting the globe. A unique collaboration between wanderlust and fashion. 
Inspired and created on a voyage of exploration. Viaggi by Jase King's expert craftsmanship bridges the gap between sharp tailoring, fashion innovation and the love of the world. 
Selection Of Premium Fabrics...
Wear us on a flight or pack us into your suitcase. Each piece is well thought out from conception to the tailoring of the final garments. We first begin by selecting tested fabrics that are travel ready ( we even took the samples on a spin ourselves wearing our jackets and pants while flying). They are items you can wear, pack and remove out of your luggage with minimum fuss without the worry of an ironing board at the hotel. We believe in luxurious fabrics and attention to detail. There is absolutely no reason why dressing fashion forward can't be comfortable. 

Immortalizing That Moment Into Wearable Art...
Here is an image I photographed while traveling across the wilderness of Tibet from Kathmandu to Lhasa.  Altitude sickness of the brain hit me shortly after this was captured. I won't get your pledges for that, but I hope you believe in my vision. There is a story behind every image. An emotion that ignites from within. The magical spark of that instant, that could be lost with a blink of an eye. This brand is the translation of that precise moment into wearable garments. All the photographs are captured by me, therefore when you wear one of the signature pieces, you know you are wearing something that can't be bought just anywhere. It's unique. It's an experience. It's art. It's an emotion. A slice of originality. Visionary clothing. 

The Design And Making Of...

After we marry the chosen imagery and material choice, we begin the printing process where our designs are constructed from. One of our statement pieces, The Tibetan Flag Jacket is the unlikely pairing of the tuxedo jacket, known for its strict dress code with the merging of the vivacious print of the Tibetan flags. You will make a lasting impression no matter the occasion. 

We understand the importance of fit and tailoring as every individual is unique. We customize the jackets, shirts and pants to your measurements. Let's celebrate all body types!

Each of our garments are designed to be "WOW" pieces. That is our signature. No one else in the market is creating garments this way and we plan to be the first with your help and pledges. 

WHAT IS THIS CAMPAIGN AND WHY IT'S IMPORTANT TO ME. WHY DONT YOU PUBLISH A COFFEE TABLE BOOK AND CALL IT A DAY?

I don't wish the finality of my work to be just a book of photographs of the world. That has already been done. Should I do it in the future, it has to portray how I have used my photography to create and innovate. It must give back to the world, which has inspired me to the core of my being. While photographing these images, I've encountered the less fortunate. As I take a portrait of them, I ask them about their lives and I always wonder, what I can do to help? How can I help them through what I love to do? Then it came to me through an old man, with an answer that I've heard so many times before but only became clear to me right there. He said " You can help me by buying my bracelets. I support my family through what I make and sell". So it's important to me Viaggi takes flight. We can support their livelihood by buying what they make, through a dedicated category on Viaggi's online retail website where more people can purchase them. 
VIAGGIBYJASEKING is the continuation of creation and exploration, combining Photography and Fashion in a fresh and unexpected way while giving back to the source of the Inspiration. 
The final product of each piece comes from an immeasurable amount of time and money capturing the photos around world. My images are fashioned into the birthing of the fabric prints and the garment are then thoughtfully designed into wearable art, statement pieces. It's a long process that encompasses the final product that you will wear. This campaign has been created to raise funds so I can start producing these clothes and home wares to be sold online at www.viaggibyjaseking.com. I aspire to get the accessories and home wares into shops everywhere and to open its own signature boutique with like minded investors. Every dollar you pledge matters! 
Here are other wearable art pieces.  

Made from 100% linen in matching jacket and shorts. It's comfortable and chic. Can you tell where this is? 

Custom made featuring The Howl Series. Velvet Jacket, Waistcoat and Untied bow tie. 

ARE THESE ORIGINAL IMAGES THAT YOU ARE USING? 

Yes of course. My work has been exhibited, featured in 2 page spreads in magazines and newspapers around the world. Some of my repertoire of images can be found at
www.JaseKing.com 

Before ViaggiByJaseKing was founded, I've blogged several years as a photographer and contains a significant amount of photos. 
www.jasesdiary.com 

You can also Yahoo Jase King in images.

I LOVE IT! CAN GIRLS WEAR IT?!

A most affirmative astounding YES! We are excited to strive in creating a brand that appeals and caters to both men and women alike. Fashion shouldn't be exclusive or specific to gender types. Everyone should have the freedom to wear whatever they choose. We don't discriminate! You can wear any of these items and pair it up with heels and rock it! In fact through our focus groups conducted, ALL the girls said they would want to own them. The cut of clothes and shoulder pads of the jackets makes them feel empowered. In time we will also design and create edgy prints for dresses. 
Posted on Instagram, look what the fashion editor of Shanghai's prominent fashion and lifestyle magazine "That's It", is wearing!

                                                

DO YOU ONLY MAKE PRINTED GARMENTS AND HOME WARES?

We produce other garments that can be worn with the signature pieces. While they look immaculate accompanying the prints, each of them are fashionable in their own right. There always has to be something special about each piece. Some of the pieces are featured at the perks section. 

We believe in bringing people together, in line with our vision at Viaggi By Jase King. Our online store, that ships worldwide, we will have a page titled BAZAAR, where we support local artisans from the world and their livelihood by giving them a platform to sell their wares. This will be an on going commitment where you will be able to buy unique pieces from around the globe on our site. One of the items that is available as a perk, is the Anchor Rope Bracelet, handmade by a grandfather and his grandson in the fishing town of Alacati on the coast of Turkey. 

 We need to reach our minimum target of $30,000 in order to produce all our clothes and merchandize on Viaggi By Jase King website. We want to start sending you all the perks along with the launch of the website. Your pledges will go to all aspects of this brand. The chart demonstrates where the funds will be spread out across all the different components. The more funds we have, the more items we can roll out. Almost 2/3 of the costs go into the selection of premium fabrics, printing and tailoring.

Regardless of the risks & challenges that we may face, we are committed to those who support our vision and make our brand a reality. Therefore, we vow a reciprocal pledge of complete transparency and communication with our backers. If we don't reach our entire goal, we will go launch it on a smaller scale with less products and include more items over time. 

As we have many items to produce, every pledge gets us collectively closer to revolutionizing the fashion industry. No donation is too small! We want to thank you sincerely from the bottom of our hearts, so we are releasing some of items as perks for you to own, before it's officially released! 

*Pledge $USD 49  The HANDMADE ANCHOR ROPE BRACELET in Orange, Red or Blue. Accessorize in this timeless piece that never goes out of fashion and help support local artisans!



* Pledge $149 for some Tongue and Cheek. The pair of satin cushion covers brings smile and laughter to any space. 

 

*Pledge $USD 69 THE HOWL- Untied Bow Tie. Let loose, flip it under your collar to spruce up any white shirt! 


 

*Pledge $69USD The Quiet Yak Pocket Square. You'll be the star wherever you go, once this conversation piece sits in your pocket!


  

*Pledge $99USD LIMITED EDITION Yakking Away Pocket Square. The smaller print version of Yakking Away but it's in no way less fabulous. Take a look, it's as versatile as its big brother! 


*Pledge USD $69 Tokyo Lights Button Bow tie. Just button onto on your favorite shirt or polo. You're all about the little details and so are we! 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*Pledge$245 The Tokyo Lights Jacket. From our Signature Collection. This versatile print that goes with absolutely everything!! This stunner will make every head turn! All you need to do is put it on and show up!  


*Pledge$245 The Tibetan Flag Tuxedo Jacket. From our Signature Collection. Life is too short to just fit in. Stand out from the crowd and raise the fashion stakes, No matter how you style this, you will irrevocably be the star of the party! 


*Pledge 119 The Little White Shirt. Every girl has the LBD and every respectable man has TLWS. A must have in every man's collection, timeless and sophisticated, perfect for every occasion!


*Pledge $119 Go Thee To A Nunnery SHIRT. Inspired by the nun's habit, injected with a sense of humor. This is a shirt Shakespeare would approve! Dress it up or pair it down. 

*Pledge $119 The Chastity Shirt. Designed for the people who can't control the urge....and have a sense of style! This dramatic shirt is elegant yet stylish. Now who wouldn't want a bit of both?

*Pledge $129 The High Waist Ambition Pants. Pants always miss out on all the fun. Not this pair! Stay fresh with a combination of vintage and a splash of new, all the while staying comfortable and snug!


*Pledge $129 The Cloud Pants. Baggy at the hips and tapered at the knee, fashioned after East Germany military pants. It's just the flair you need to look effortless chic!  



Please help by making some noise and spreading the word about this campaign by sharing it on your social media sites as well as on your own blog. 
Like us on our Facebook page at ViaggiByJaseking. < Click on the link 


Please add us on Instagram. Copy and post for the world to see! 


Email us your suggestions and tell us what you like! Reach us at viaggibyjaseking@gmail.com.
Thank you for taking the time to have a look at our campaign. We are very excited about our company's vision and look forward to crafting your fantastically fitting clothes and furnishing your home with quirky statement pieces!
story_txt:
Hi Indiegogo funders, I am Jase King and I've been photographing the world and its diverse cultures and peculiarities across over 79 countries and almost 200 cities. Over a period of 10 years, I have captured over 250,000 images of the world we all call home. I carefully select and manipulate the photographed image, to create one of a kind prints and fabrics used for the production of clothes, accessories and home wares.The unique statement pieces form this Visionary Clothing and lifestyle brand named, VIAGGI BY JASE KING.
"Viaggi" is Italian for "Travels". The beautiful sound of this language is translated into the phonetics of the word, evoking elegance and sophistication. It is by no coincidence that the images are imagined while galavanting the globe. A unique collaboration between wanderlust and fashion. 

Inspired and created on a voyage of exploration. Viaggi by Jase King's expert craftsmanship bridges the gap between sharp tailoring, fashion innovation and the love of the world. 

Selection Of Premium Fabrics...
Wear us on a flight or pack us into your suitcase. Each piece is well thought out from conception to the tailoring of the final garments. We first begin by selecting tested fabrics that are travel ready ( we even took the samples on a spin ourselves wearing our jackets and pants while flying). They are items you can wear, pack and remove out of your luggage with minimum fuss without the worry of an ironing board at the hotel. We believe in luxurious fabrics and attention to detail. There is absolutely no reason why dressing fashion forward can't be comfortable. 


Immortalizing That Moment Into Wearable Art...

Here is an image I photographed while traveling across the wilderness of Tibet from Kathmandu to Lhasa.  Altitude sickness of the brain hit me shortly after this was captured. I won't get your pledges for that, but I hope you believe in my vision. There is a story behind every image. An emotion that ignites from within. The magical spark of that instant, that could be lost with a blink of an eye. This brand is the translation of that precise moment into wearable garments. All the photographs are captured by me, therefore when you wear one of the signature pieces, you know you are wearing something that can't be bought just anywhere. It's unique. It's an experience. It's art. It's an emotion. A slice of originality. Visionary clothing. 



The Design And Making Of...
After we marry the chosen imagery and material choice, we begin the printing process where our designs are constructed from. One of our statement pieces, The Tibetan Flag Jacket is the unlikely pairing of the tuxedo jacket, known for its strict dress code with the merging of the vivacious print of the Tibetan flags. You will make a lasting impression no matter the occasion. 
We understand the importance of fit and tailoring as every individual is unique. We customize the jackets, shirts and pants to your measurements. Let's celebrate all body types!
Each of our garments are designed to be "WOW" pieces. That is our signature. No one else in the market is creating garments this way and we plan to be the first with your help and pledges. 


WHAT IS THIS CAMPAIGN AND WHY IT'S IMPORTANT TO ME. WHY DONT YOU PUBLISH A COFFEE TABLE BOOK AND CALL IT A DAY?

I don't wish the finality of my work to be just a book of photographs of the world. That has already been done. Should I do it in the future, it has to portray how I have used my photography to create and innovate. It must give back to the world, which has inspired me to the core of my being. While photographing these images, I've encountered the less fortunate. As I take a portrait of them, I ask them about their lives and I always wonder, what I can do to help? How can I help them through what I love to do? Then it came to me through an old man, with an answer that I've heard so many times before but only became clear to me right there. He said " You can help me by buying my bracelets. I support my family through what I make and sell". So it's important to me Viaggi takes flight. We can support their livelihood by buying what they make, through a dedicated category on Viaggi's online retail website where more people can purchase them. 

VIAGGIBYJASEKING is the continuation of creation and exploration, combining Photography and Fashion in a fresh and unexpected way while giving back to the source of the Inspiration. 

The final product of each piece comes from an immeasurable amount of time and money capturing the photos around world. My images are fashioned into the birthing of the fabric prints and the garment are then thoughtfully designed into wearable art, statement pieces. It's a long process that encompasses the final product that you will wear. This campaign has been created to raise funds so I can start producing these clothes and home wares to be sold online at www.viaggibyjaseking.com. I aspire to get the accessories and home wares into shops everywhere and to open its own signature boutique with like minded investors. Every dollar you pledge matters! 
Here are other wearable art pieces.  


Made from 100% linen in matching jacket and shorts. It's comfortable and chic. Can you tell where this is? 


Custom made featuring The Howl Series. Velvet Jacket, Waistcoat and Untied bow tie. 


ARE THESE ORIGINAL IMAGES THAT YOU ARE USING? 
Yes of course. My work has been exhibited, featured in 2 page spreads in magazines and newspapers around the world. Some of my repertoire of images can be found at

www.JaseKing.com 



Before ViaggiByJaseKing was founded, I've blogged several years as a photographer and contains a significant amount of photos. 

www.jasesdiary.com 


You can also Yahoo Jase King in images.



I LOVE IT! CAN GIRLS WEAR IT?!

A most affirmative astounding YES! We are excited to strive in creating a brand that appeals and caters to both men and women alike. Fashion shouldn't be exclusive or specific to gender types. Everyone should have the freedom to wear whatever they choose. We don't discriminate! You can wear any of these items and pair it up with heels and rock it! In fact through our focus groups conducted, ALL the girls said they would want to own them. The cut of clothes and shoulder pads of the jackets makes them feel empowered. In time we will also design and create edgy prints for dresses. 
Posted on Instagram, look what the fashion editor of Shanghai's prominent fashion and lifestyle magazine "That's It", is wearing!                                                

DO YOU ONLY MAKE PRINTED GARMENTS AND HOME WARES?

We produce other garments that can be worn with the signature pieces. While they look immaculate accompanying the prints, each of them are fashionable in their own right. There always has to be something special about each piece. Some of the pieces are featured at the perks section. 





We believe in bringing people together, in line with our vision at Viaggi By Jase King. Our online store, that ships worldwide, we will have a page titled BAZAAR, where we support local artisans from the world and their livelihood by giving them a platform to sell their wares. This will be an on going commitment where you will be able to buy unique pieces from around the globe on our site. One of the items that is available as a perk, is the Anchor Rope Bracelet, handmade by a grandfather and his grandson in the fishing town of Alacati on the coast of Turkey. 








 We need to reach our minimum target of $30,000 in order to produce all our clothes and merchandize on Viaggi By Jase King website. We want to start sending you all the perks along with the launch of the website. Your pledges will go to all aspects of this brand. Almost 2/3 of the costs go into the selection of premium fabrics, printing and tailoring.

Regardless of the risks & challenges that we may face, we are committed to those who support our vision and make our brand a reality. Therefore, we vow a reciprocal pledge of complete transparency and communication with our backers. As we have many items to produce, every pledge gets us collectively closer to revolutionizing the fashion industry. No donation is too small! story:
PN! Launch
STAND UP  STAND OUT

London’s newest streetwear brand PN! is set to launch with a capsule collection that taps into the trend for minimal, conceptual streetwear with an underground vibe.

The mostly monochrome range includes T-shirts, hoodies, sweaters and snapbacks in black with grey and white graphic detailing. PN! uses premium quality British made garments and manufactures in the UK.

Hits of colour are rare but powerful and feature the brand’s unique innovative, raw hand drawn graphic personality, which is crafted to help individuals of any background to STAND UP and STAND OUT.

With a countercultural spirit influencing the range, PN!  takes its name from a vaguely defined set of rebellious infringements. Many are the sorts of things that youths get up to because they feel sidelined.

PN! Founder David P, one of the original Skateboarders of Southbank, London 1977, and who previously worked in the music industry as a front man for a rock band. He says: “We started PN! in order to represent something that was missing. There was nothing Streetwear wise for individuals to latch on to that would help them to STAND UP for they believe in and STAND OUT in what they are wearing. So I got to work with my Creative Director putting together a collection that was all about individual style. In addition I wanted the Apparel to be of a high quality and British made giving our customers maximum value for money.”

The collection is available from www.pnstreetwear.com ;
Prices start at £25 T shirts; £55 Sweatshirts; £65 Hoodies; £25 Snapbacks; 

COMMUNITY:  The idea behind PN! is to create a 'movement/community' of Brand Ambassadors/Fans/Consumers/etc who are STANDING UP for they believe and want to STAND OUT in what they wear. 

SALES & MARKETING:   Direct Sales via  a flagship store supported by our website is our ideal model.  On the wholesale channel we plan to sell exclusively to one or two selected chain retailers  in the UK and US. We have identified and approach 6 other chain stores that operate in the UK/Europe and one other in the US. 

The money needed is to pay for the Guerilla Marketing/social media marketing costs,  editorial and blog content, working capital to support orders and the design costs for our next collection of designs (SS 2016).  

Our Marketing Campaign is around Free Editorial in fashion magazines, mens magazines, Streetwear/Skateboard/BMX magazines, DJ magazines, Blogs and forums. This takes in offline and online publications. We also have brand ambassadors, celebs in the 'Online World' e.g. Skateboarders, BMX Riders, Urban Sports Persons, Vloggers, Entertainers, Musicians, DJs, Street Artists, Graffiti Artists etc.  who are sharing our content via their social media platforms and websites.

story:
RighteousWretch Apparel began with an idea to make one shirt with Charles Spurgeon carrying a Ghetto Blaster on his shoulder. We dubbed it, "The Spurge" and in only 2 months time, that shirt has been sold to over 100 people all over North America.

Not only was it an awesome design, but we here at RighteousWretch we believe in producing shirts that are of the highest quality. So our designs are printed on a tri-blend tee.

We have not only received compliments on the superior quality of our work from our customers, but Hip Hop artists Flame and Ambassador have given our first design their approval.

Not only do we strive to produce quality products, but our clientele have given us some great feedback:

Brad in Chicago was able to use the shirt as a segue into a gospel conversation. 

Joy in Atlanta wears her Spurgeon tee when she teaches her Hip Hop dance class and has been able to educate her students on the life of Spurgeon, creating great opportunies for gospel talk.

Since this was intended to be a one-off design, we never planned on producing more products. But then, we started linking up with amazing artists through Facebook and Instagram who wanted to be a part of what we are doing. We partnered with Atlanta-based illustrator Wes Montgomery to design our John Owen: Be Killing Sin shirt (not yet released) and Jason Bradshaw of West Palm Beach to produce our It is Well design (for which we are currently taking preorders).

So, where do you come in?

Since there has been an overwhelming response to our first two products, we need some capital to make this venture run as smoothly and to reach as many people as possible. We need to pay our artists, build up an inventory, and put ourselves into a position where we are not soley relying on "preorders" to make this happen.

So we are asking those who support us to help us in some way. This relationship will be mutually beneficial as we are offering some great incentives for your support.

Finally, when you consider supporting us, remember that you are investing in and promoting quality art. We are not making cheesy Christian parody shirts. We believe that we can better serve this culture by producing great apparel that points people to the Redeemer. Thanks for your support! Soli Deo Gloria!
