story:
NOW AVAILABLE FROM WWW.BLUECRANE.YOUNEEK.CO.ZA

*Please ignore the gender options upon checkout. Our sizes are unisex. We will e-mail all backers to reconfirm sizes.

Leave Nothing Behind.

Life in the modern era can sometimes move at a blistering pace. We don't always know what to take with us and what to leave behind, but what if you never had to leave anything behind?

Not just a bag. Not just a hoodie. It's both!

Whatever the journey, our hoodie is guaranteed to keep you up to the task. We've made it our goal to create an all-in-one hoodie-and-bag that is packed with creativity and innovation, but that is above all an everyday hoodie that you'll want to wear day in and day out.

From bag-to-hoodie or hoodie-to-bag in seconds!

The BC hoodie transforms from bag-to-hoodie or from hoodie-to-bag seamlessly in just a matter of seconds. You no longer have to carry around a bag and jacket separately. You no longer have to try and squish everything into your travel-sized bag. You no longer have to worry about being unprepared for a sudden change of weather. You no longer have to worry. Your day becomes just that little bit easier and less frustrating with the magic provided by the Blue Crane Hoodie.

 

The Hoodie

As a hoodie, the Blue Crane hoodie is, in its most natural form, a stylish and modern everyday hoodie that has been crafted with intense care and an extreme attention to detail. We've focused on creating a hoodie that is luxurious in its feel and trendy in its look that is perfect for any occasion. Only after focusing on an alluring appearance does the focus shift to the features of the hoodie. And boy are the features a sight to behold as well. The BC hoodie is integrated with over 20 remarkable features that will make sure you're ready for whatever the journey of life will throw at you. It's currently available in black and grey, but if our campaign surpasses our expectations you can expect to see a few more colors announced.

The hoodie is made from 230gram soft, premium quality fleece fabric. The inside lining on the body is lined with 180gram cotton lycra, giving it an instant quality feel and look. The inside of the hood is lined with Mongolian fleece, one of the softest and most luxurious pieces of fabric available.

The Bag

As a bag the BC hoodie is perfectly compact in size even though there's a barely noticeable full size hoodie zipped up and hiding on the inside. In bag form there's a middle slot that can be clipped open or closed with more than enough space to hold even more of your essentials. There's also a side zipper pocket in which you can keep items you'd like to have zipped up. The great thing is that once you've folded your hoodie up and transformed it into a bag, everything you've stored inside the hoodie's pockets will all still be on the inside of the bag, safely and securely.

The bag is made from 110gram high quality and lightweight cotton poplin fabric so that it doesn't weigh things down.

The Features

Hoodie

Converted To Travel Bag

That's actually a pretty darn good looking hoodie!?

We've made it our priority to first make a strikingly good looking and comfortable hoodie, we only then shifted concentration to all of its amazing features. We want you to never want to be without it, and for that it has to have the looks.

The look of the hoodie is inspired and stylized after the Blue Crane bird, symbolizing its travel and adventurous features. The peak of the hood and flaps on the front and back are all stylized after the beak of a bird. The BC hoodie logo is mutely added on the left chest, with a soft textured velvet finish.

The Blue Crane is South Africa's national bird, which will always serve as a subtle reminder of where your new favorite hoodie came from.

The Manufacturing (NB!)

If our project gets funded successfully, we will be handling the manufacturing ourselves, right here in our own small, self established factory in South Africa. We are indeed proudly South African. This project will not be outsourced to be manufactured by a third party with which we cannot communicate and work with every step of the way. We have heard some torrid stories of projects being made from third party manufacturers outside of their own country, where the garments came back lacking quality and simply fell apart after just a few days. That won't happen here. We are looking to make a hoodie that you can have a very long and noteworthy relationship with. We have sourced for premium resources for our project and we will have our hands in the production process every step of the way. This will allow us to make sure every garment gets the exact special attention it needs and deserves.

Our goal is to make an amazing product that we can be proud to send to you and that you can be proud of wearing, day in and day out for many, many years.

Why do we need the funding?

In a day and age where every entrepreneurial field is flooded with a competitive aura, opportunities to stand out above the crowd are getting harder than ever before. We are therefore immensely grateful for platforms like Indiegogo that give us the opportunity to showcase our creativity and provide us with a real fighting chance to get our first project out there into the world. Despite many setbacks, we have put our hearts and souls into making the Blue Crane Journey hoodie come to life. We now need the funding to give our project a footprint to make its mark in the world. Running a successful campaign will also allow us to create jobs in a country where it is desperately needed.

All in all, it's very simple. We need the funding to start manufacturing each and every one of these hoodies to our backers and send them out to you safely and securely. If the campaign exceeds expectations, we will invest in adding a wider range of colors to choose from, as well as invest in future versions of the Blue Crane Hoodie and/or other similar projects.

Delivery and returns

We ship worldwide! But since our manufacturing will be happening in South Africa, South Africans who back our project can expect to get their hoodies a lot sooner than the rest of the world! Delivery for South African backers can happen as soon as June 2017. The rest of the world can expect delivery between July and September 2017.

We would be more than happy to do exchanges and returns, but since we are just a startup, two-way shipping will unfortunately have to be on you. With that said, if you follow our size chart closely everything should be hunky dory with your hoodie.

Size Chart

The Blue Crane Journey Hoodie is available for men and women of all shapes and sizes, ranging from XXS to XXXL. If you're not sure which size to go for, check out our handy measurements below. It's always best to pull out a hoodie of your own and compare its measurements to our own. Our sizes are UNISEX. Please ignore the gender selection upon checkout, it does not influence the sizing or fit of your hoodie in any way.

Indiegogo only allows 5 size attributes to be added, hence the sizes upon checkout only ranging from Small to XX-Large. We will be e-mailing all backers to reconfirm sizing :)

Who are we?

We are a son and mother team looking to defy all the odds by making our first campaign a successful one. Jaen (25) is an out-and-out entrepreneurial enthusiast with a terrible sleep pattern thanks to the constant need to conjure up the latest piece of innovation. Elizabeth (55) is a passionate mom who can make those ideas come to life. Having more than 20 years experience in the clothing industry makes her a significant part of the life that has been breathed into this project.

We are a smaller team than many, but our dreams are bigger than most.

Possible Customs Charges For Backers Outside South Africa

Depending on where you are from, your country could add customs charges to release your package upon delivery. It is an unpredictable Since we are merely a startup, we unfortunately can't. If you wish to learn about the duties and taxes applicable to your shipment, you may want to check with the customs and border protection authorities of your country.
story_txt:
NOW AVAILABLE FROM WWW.BLUECRANE.YOUNEEK.CO.ZA
*Please ignore the gender options upon checkout. Our sizes are unisex. We will e-mail all backers to reconfirm sizes.Leave Nothing Behind.Life in the modern era can sometimes move at a blistering pace. We don't always know what to take with us and what to leave behind, but what if you never had to leave anything behind?Not just a bag. Not just a hoodie. It's both!Whatever the journey, our hoodie is guaranteed to keep you up to the task. We've made it our goal to create an all-in-one hoodie-and-bag that is packed with creativity and innovation, but that is above all an everyday hoodie that you'll want to wear day in and day out.From bag-to-hoodie or hoodie-to-bag in seconds!The BC hoodie transforms from bag-to-hoodie or from hoodie-to-bag seamlessly in just a matter of seconds. You no longer have to carry around a bag and jacket separately. You no longer have to try and squish everything into your travel-sized bag. You no longer have to worry about being unprepared for a sudden change of weather. You no longer have to worry. Your day becomes just that little bit easier and less frustrating with the magic provided by the Blue Crane Hoodie. The HoodieAs a hoodie, the Blue Crane hoodie is, in its most natural form, a stylish and modern everyday hoodie that has been crafted with intense care and an extreme attention to detail. We've focused on creating a hoodie that is luxurious in its feel and trendy in its look that is perfect for any occasion. Only after focusing on an alluring appearance does the focus shift to the features of the hoodie. And boy are the features a sight to behold as well. The BC hoodie is integrated with over 20 remarkable features that will make sure you're ready for whatever the journey of life will throw at you. It's currently available in black and grey, but if our campaign surpasses our expectations you can expect to see a few more colors announced.The hoodie is made from 230gram soft, premium quality fleece fabric. The inside lining on the body is lined with 180gram cotton lycra, giving it an instant quality feel and look. The inside of the hood is lined with Mongolian fleece, one of the softest and most luxurious pieces of fabric available.The BagAs a bag the BC hoodie is perfectly compact in size even though there's a barely noticeable full size hoodie zipped up and hiding on the inside. In bag form there's a middle slot that can be clipped open or closed with more than enough space to hold even more of your essentials. There's also a side zipper pocket in which you can keep items you'd like to have zipped up. The great thing is that once you've folded your hoodie up and transformed it into a bag, everything you've stored inside the hoodie's pockets will all still be on the inside of the bag, safely and securely.The bag is made from 110gram high quality and lightweight cotton poplin fabric so that it doesn't weigh things down.The FeaturesHoodieConverted To Travel BagThat's actually a pretty darn good looking hoodie!?We've made it our priority to first make a strikingly good looking and comfortable hoodie, we only then shifted concentration to all of its amazing features. We want you to never want to be without it, and for that it has to have the looks.The look of the hoodie is inspired and stylized after the Blue Crane bird, symbolizing its travel and adventurous features. The peak of the hood and flaps on the front and back are all stylized after the beak of a bird. The BC hoodie logo is mutely added on the left chest, with a soft textured velvet finish.The Blue Crane is South Africa's national bird, which will always serve as a subtle reminder of where your new favorite hoodie came from.The Manufacturing (NB!)If our project gets funded successfully, we will be handling the manufacturing ourselves, right here in our own small, self established factory in South Africa. We are indeed proudly South African. This project will not be outsourced to be manufactured by a third party with which we cannot communicate and work with every step of the way. We have heard some torrid stories of projects being made from third party manufacturers outside of their own country, where the garments came back lacking quality and simply fell apart after just a few days. That won't happen here. We are looking to make a hoodie that you can have a very long and noteworthy relationship with. We have sourced for premium resources for our project and we will have our hands in the production process every step of the way. This will allow us to make sure every garment gets the exact special attention it needs and deserves.Our goal is to make an amazing product that we can be proud to send to you and that you can be proud of wearing, day in and day out for many, many years.Why do we need the funding?In a day and age where every entrepreneurial field is flooded with a competitive aura, opportunities to stand out above the crowd are getting harder than ever before. We are therefore immensely grateful for platforms like Indiegogo that give us the opportunity to showcase our creativity and provide us with a real fighting chance to get our first project out there into the world. Despite many setbacks, we have put our hearts and souls into making the Blue Crane Journey hoodie come to life. We now need the funding to give our project a footprint to make its mark in the world. Running a successful campaign will also allow us to create jobs in a country where it is desperately needed.All in all, it's very simple. We need the funding to start manufacturing each and every one of these hoodies to our backers and send them out to you safely and securely. If the campaign exceeds expectations, we will invest in adding a wider range of colors to choose from, as well as invest in future versions of the Blue Crane Hoodie and/or other similar projects.Delivery and returnsWe ship worldwide! But since our manufacturing will be happening in South Africa, South Africans who back our project can expect to get their hoodies a lot sooner than the rest of the world! Delivery for South African backers can happen as soon as June 2017. The rest of the world can expect delivery between July and September 2017.We would be more than happy to do exchanges and returns, but since we are just a startup, two-way shipping will unfortunately have to be on you. With that said, if you follow our size chart closely everything should be hunky dory with your hoodie.Size ChartThe Blue Crane Journey Hoodie is available for men and women of all shapes and sizes, ranging from XXS to XXXL. If you're not sure which size to go for, check out our handy measurements below. It's always best to pull out a hoodie of your own and compare its measurements to our own. Our sizes are UNISEX. Please ignore the gender selection upon checkout, it does not influence the sizing or fit of your hoodie in any way.Indiegogo only allows 5 size attributes to be added, hence the sizes upon checkout only ranging from Small to XX-Large. We will be e-mailing all backers to reconfirm sizing :)Who are we?We are a son and mother team looking to defy all the odds by making our first campaign a successful one. Jaen (25) is an out-and-out entrepreneurial enthusiast with a terrible sleep pattern thanks to the constant need to conjure up the latest piece of innovation. Elizabeth (55) is a passionate mom who can make those ideas come to life. Having more than 20 years experience in the clothing industry makes her a significant part of the life that has been breathed into this project.We are a smaller team than many, but our dreams are bigger than most.Possible Customs Charges For Backers Outside South AfricaDepending on where you are from, your country could add customs charges to release your package upon delivery. It is an unpredictable Since we are merely a startup, we unfortunately can't. If you wish to learn about the duties and taxes applicable to your shipment, you may want to check with the customs and border protection authorities of your country.

story:
Rough day at work.

Scramble for a looming deadline. Presentation to a surly manager. Gunfire from villainous henchmen. One of those days.

Your body sweats to keep you cool in tense situations. In fact, your feet have one of the highest concentrations of sweat glands on your body, and are confined in stifling boxes called shoes most of the day. This is not a recipe for feeling (or smelling) like success.
 

Inspired by the archetypal super-spy, we’ve created the perfect sock to keep you looking and feeling effortlessly cool, whether stress means spreadsheets or shootouts. Through the design process, we’ve tested every product on the market and made dozens of prototypes to reach the perfect blend of features and capabilities. Like an ejection-seat-equipped sports car, the Stealth Sock’s stylishly unassuming exterior conceals the incredible technology and features that make it so awesome.
 

The secret weapon behind the Stealth Sock is its unique one-two punch of fabric technologies. The first of its kind, bacteriostatic silver and activated carbon infused fibers work synergistically to keep you cool and odorless. Paired with its advanced construction methods and features, there’s no better sock on the market.

Like the agents it's designed for, the Stealth Sock can go anywhere and do anything. Sleek and svelte, it's thin enough to fit perfectly under a handcrafted leather dress shoe, yet its ample cushioning and performance features make it equally at home under boots on the trail or sneakers and jeans off-duty.

New to the Stealth Sock family are the Recon & Zero. These sock types provide the technological punch of the Stealth Sock in more casual or beach-appropriate cuts.

 

 

True to its name, the Stealth Sock features an unmatched ability to remain undetectably fresh, even after multiple wears and heavy use. How is that possible? Well:


Stealth Sock silver fabric works by keeping bacteria, the real odor culprits, in check at healthy skin levels; without it, they grow uncontrollably leading to that locker-room smell.
 

So go ahead, wear 'em again if the situation calls for it. Pack a little lighter for that trip. We won't tell - and nobody else can.
 

Like your favorite gym gear, Stealth Socks fight rising temps by transporting moisture away from your skin while improving air circulation and breathability.
 

To prove the Stealth Sock’s performance, we had samples tested at a 3rd party laboratory certified by the American Association of Textile Chemists and Colorists.
 

In addition to keeping feet dry and breathable, the Stealth Sock features strategically placed cushioning and a seamless toe for maximum comfort and wearability.
 


Stylish clothes are worthless without proper fit, and state-of-the-art socks are useless if you spend half your time pulling at and adjusting them. By pairing our unique fiber blend with top of the line fit features, you can be confident that your Stealth Socks will always stay in place and never let you down.
 

Self-adjusting cuff conforms to your calf

 

The Stealth Sock's unique fiber blend give it a higher degree of stretch and adaptability than most other products. As a result, it fits comfortably on feet from US Men’s 5/Women’s 6 to Men’s 14/Women’s 15.
 

Lengthwise stretch


Some brands have caught criticism for allowing silver to leach out of their clothes and onto their wearers. Unlike cheaper, coated threads, the Stealth Sock utilizes a polymeric matrix design to encapsulate the silver in its fibers. This means the odor-fighting ability is proven to stay in the sock and off your skin, all while ensuring antimicrobial effectiveness even after 100+ washes.
 

 

When we were testing other socks on the market, nothing irritated us more than spending $30 on a pair with some cool technology, only for it to pill to shreds and disintegrate after only a few wears. We vowed never to make that mistake. Besides using a naturally more wear-resistant fabric, we added:

RECON

Available in six colorways:

 

ZERO

Available in three colorways:

 

 

THE COVERT TRAVEL KIT

Designed with versatility in mind, the Covert Travel Kit’s zippered pockets and elastic straps make it the perfect case for carrying and organizing your gear in any situation. Built out of heavy-duty nylon, toss it into your suitcase for your next trip or use the integrated webbing system to strap it into a bag or pack.

 Load outs might include:

  • Toiletries, shaving gear, and documents for travel
  • First aid items, tools, and a flashlight to keep in the car
  • Hard drive, cables, and a mouse for work on the go
  • Pocketknife, chargers, and pens for EDC
  • Survival tools and emergency supplies for camping

THE DEODORIZER

 

Built with the same charcoal carbon technology, the Deodorizer is a natural companion to our Stealth Socks. Coming in a two pack, the Deodorizer captures odor with a slim and convenient form factor, perfect for slipping into shoes, gym bags, suitcases, or anywhere else odors or humidity aren't welcome.

 

CUSTOMIZE YOUR LOADOUT

Additional deodorizers, travel kits, and Stealth Socks available as add-ons via backer survey at the end of the campaign.


Maison Impeccable was founded in 2015 by a few high school friends from Michigan reuniting from coast to coast through a shared passion for style and a love of action flicks. Our team spans a diverse range of industries and experiences: business, medicine, retail, tech, and even finance - all of which help to give us unique insights and perspectives into the clothes we wear and how we can improve them.

Despite differing backgrounds, we all independently ended up at the same conclusion: today’s clothes simply aren’t as good as they should be, always forcing us to sacrifice on one aspect or another. We’re not the first to come up with this idea either - a handful of other brands are paving the way and doing great work. That said, when we tried what was on the market, something always wasn’t quite right. Sure, A was great, but B was all wrong. Why didn’t they do C and had they even considered D? Rather than wait for companies to magically figure out and produce what we wanted, we decided strike out on our own. We were already reading and learning about this stuff obsessively in our free time, why not make something of it?

The Support Team

As much work as we've put in over the past year and change, we wouldn't be where we are today without all the people who've helped us along the way. Among others, we'd like to thank:


Maison Impeccable is a startup dedicated to evolving garments and how we interact with them. By analyzing clothing equally through the lenses of utility and aesthetics, we seek to engineer pieces that offer uncompromising performance across all use cases. Building upon the belief that each individual is the hero of their own life, our goal is to keep wearers outfitted for the day’s missions, wherever they may lead.
 
As the common crowdfunding story goes, the traditional model of buy-first-sell-later manufacturing is too expensive for new brands just getting started.

To make Stealth Socks, we need to make a minimum order from our factory of several thousand pairs - after all, it doesn’t make sense for them to set up and retool machines to make a few dozen socks. Crowdfunding on Indiegogo lets us secure enough initial orders to make a large production run so we can bring costs and prices down to reasonable levels. Without you, we’d have to either make a small order at a crazy-high cost, or keep thousands of pairs sitting around in a warehouse ($$$) as we find buyers one-by-one.

Funding raised through the campaign will go towards production, manufacturing, and shipping the Stealth Sock as well as fuel the development of awesome new product lines in the future!


All orders will be shipped from our fulfillment warehouse in Georgia. We evaluated dozens of companies for reputation, reliability, and experience before choosing this critical partner. We're proud to offer free shipping within the United States for all Indiegogo backers.
 

For operatives outside of the US, shipping will add a small fee to cover added costs. Taxes, VAT and/or duties aren’t included in the prices and may be added in accordance with your local regulations.

Because policies around customs and duties can vary by country, please check yours in advance to avoid any complications down the line!

 
 

 

For any press enquiries, please contact press@impeccable.maison

story:
A backpack made from cork?

Yep. 

The key difference between Jajamän backpacks and your current backpack is that Jajamän is made from cork. Cork is a sustainable, durable, natural material that grows on trees. It’s cruelty-free, unlike leather, and totally natural and biodegradable, unlike the fabric and other materials most other backpacks are made of. 

A backpack's just a backpack, right?

Not exactly.

We make our backpacks to be objects of connection. The cork material connects you to nature, and its durability means you use it for many years as a beloved item.

Jajamän backpacks are designed to be durable and practical so they can hack life being a backpack. They are the result of a long and careful design process that’s seen different variations and materials put to the test to see which ones proved best suited to the job. 

What's so great about cork? 

Cork oak trees actually benefit from having their bark stripped as the process allows the tree to thrive for hundreds of years. Now that’s a win-win right there. It means that for those of you who may have issues with buying and using leather, cork is a fantastic alternative.

The key material in Jajamän backpacks is cork, something you might only have ever encountered when opening a bottle of wine or champagne. But cork has so much more going for it than pops, bubbles, and cheers, so much so that we’ve made a handy list of some of its benefits: 

  •  Natural & Sustainable. Cork comes from harvested tree bark in a process that rejuvenates the cork trees. It has to go through lamination to become strong and water-repellent, but this has a much lower environmental impact than the alternatives, animal leather, and plastic-based faux leather. 
  •  Water & Stain Repellent. Cork is pretty much everything-resistant. Water. Fire. Dirt. Stains. Cork can resist it all. It’s also anti-fungal and hypoallergenic, so it’s suitable for people with asthma and other allergies. And it’s easy to clean which is handy since you’ll probably take it on a fair few adventures.
  •  Unique pattern. Each piece of cork is unique. No two pieces of cork look the same, so your bag will be unique. 
  •  Light-weight and strong. Cork is lightweight and strong. Ideal for making a bag out of, we would say. The whole backpack weighs less than 3 bananas. It’s a very versatile and durable material that can handle the heavy loads you’re likely to want to carry around with you.

Mindfully Designed 

We're going back to a more sustainable way of consuming and producing. Sustainability is our business, and thanks to your pledges, we will be able to begin producing our planet-friendly cork backpacks. We’ll be able to fund our team to continue to challenge the status quo of fast fashion, by creating truly sustainable alternatives. 

You want a backpack that’s going to be with you for the long run (or walk). Because who wants to be throwing away a backpack after a year or so because it couldn’t hack the rigors of daily life in the city or the countryside or even a summer of full-on festivals?

There’s something about cork’s natural look that makes it perfectly striking in the urban jungle. That’s why we designed a bag that is sleek-looking and practical for taking to work.

Our cork backpacks come in three colors:

All backpacks are lightweight, water repellent with an expandable compartment and adjustable straps.

Jajamän can really hack being a backpack. We’ve tested it in various settings so that it's going to be with you for the long run (or walk).

JAJAMÄN ETHICS: HANDS-FREE AND GUILT-FREE

We’ve made sure that it’s not just the people who wear our backpacks who benefit, but also everyone and everything affected along the way - the oak trees that are harvested for cork, all the people who help make the bags, and the environment at large. 

Finding the most planet-friendly option for each detail of our backpack without compromising function was also a long and careful process. Here’s what won through (drumroll please):

 PRIMARY MATERIAL: Cork. Our beloved cork from Portugal. So strong, so smooth, so durable. We love it and hope you will too. 

 CLOSING MECHANISM: 100% YKK zips made from post-consumer plastic. So reliable and recycled.

 INSIDE LINING: Italian quality felt made from recycled polyester. Smooth and strong.

 PUSH BUTTONS: 70% recycled brass. They’re solid and really look the part.

 TAGS AND TRIMS: Recycled paper for easy labeling and stylish finishing.

Fast fashion has created a culture of short-term consumerism with a take, make, and discard relationship to products. Jajamän is here to change that culture by designing with a holistic view of materials and the lifecycle of products.

Designed in Sweden. Made in Portugal. 

All Jajamän bags are carefully made in a small factory in the north of Portugal. We’ve chosen to produce in Portugal not just to be close to the source of the cork, but also for collaboration and quality purposes, and to support the manufacturers that operate in secure and safe environments. 

Fair wages and good working conditions are standard practices not just at our factory, but throughout Portugal. We like that, and on our many visits to the factory, we’ve worked on the styling of the bags, ensuring our Nordic vision of function combines with Portuguese artisanal production methods to create a unique backpack that meets the highest quality standards. 

Our Mission

The Jajamän team aspires to create fashionable, functional products that have a positive impact on people and the planet. We believe sustainability issues don’t have to be serious, they can be fun as well. And that backpacks can do more for the world than just carry stuff around for us so we can be hands-free. They can lead the way in the quest for environmentally friendly bags, and get people doing more fun things.

If we could sum up Jajamän in a couple of lines it would go something like this:

DO GOOD. CARRY WITH STYLE. 

Actually, it would go exactly like that!

Jajamän cork backpacks are stylish and timeless. A Nordic design made in Portugal for the quiet revolutionaries who want to change things and go about their daily lives with style and ethics. 

Perks: How to Back The Backpack 

Here are the benefits of making a pledge to support us now! 

Get this perk = pre-order a backpack for 90€ LESS compared to what the backpack will cost after the crowdfunding campaign (retail price)

Thanks to these pre-orders we will be able to go into production and you’ll get your backpack in July. 

Meet The Team

The Jajamän team is a multinational team based in Malmo, Sweden. We all share the same passion for sustainable living and ethical production.

With a background in Sociology and Fashion Design, founder Netta aspires to create fashionable, functional products while bringing a positive impact to the people and planet.  

During the past decades, Netta has seen the textile industry from many perspectives. She spent two years working for a sustainable textile company in Pakistan and saw firsthand the damaging effects of fast fashion: quality being sacrificed for quantity, fabric waste piling up, and the connection between creator and consumer breaking down.

Our studio images are taken by photographer Johanna, who is consistent about her Nordic aesthetics. Peter knows about quality and production. He has spent the past 20 years or so traveling around the world keeping track of timelines in order to make production and processes run smoothly. AD Angela loves making sense of the world through her lens, and there is some “Angela magic” to her images. Leonor’s passion is combining analysis with intuition, and she has a double degree in psychology and economics. Viviana is Jajamän personified, and you can see her in many of our images. Apart from modeling and being our ambassador, she also takes care of our social media and PR.

The cork backpack represents Jajamän’s first step in their search for sustainable materials. It’s a big part of their mission to encourage everyone to be more conscious of their consumption and more determined to make meaningful connections, be they with nature, beloved items or people around them.

Q&As

Here are some quick answers to a few questions you might have.

Q: Is cork leather really vegan?

A: Jajamän! 

Q: Will the material really last without cracking?

A: Jajamän! 

Q: Will you be able to ship the bags to anywhere in the world?

A: Jajamän! 

Q: What’s Swedish for “hell yes, without a doubt?”

A: Jajamän! 

Q: Is that the end of the Q&A?

A: Jajamän! 

Risks and challenges

We acknowledge the risk of unexpected delays or complications, but we are committed to getting the best products to our backers on time, and we are confident that we will be able to do that. Between Jajamän’s founder and quality manager, the team has a long collective history in manufacturing, sourcing, purchasing, design, and product development. Our quality manager has two decades of experience in a senior position securing quality production in a major company. This means we know how to handle quality and make sure a timeline is kept to. We have also done our share of prototyping for the past 2 years and now have a nearly final version ready to produce. Before going into production, we plan to make some minor adjustments and make one last prototype to ensure that all details are in place. We are confident that we can manufacture our backpacks from cork and distribute them all over the world (their lightweight nature really helps keep shipping costs down). We just need people to believe in the importance of using backpacks that are as environmentally friendly as a bag can be.

Can't Contribute Right Now? No problem. You can still help... 

We understand that supporting us financially might not be possible right now. But you can still do your bit to spread the word about Jajamän across social media or at your next dinner party.

That’s it from us, except to say: if you’re asking yourself can I really help launch a more sustainable backpack that could do its little bit to make the world a better place, there’s only one answer we’d like to give you and it’s: 

Jajamän!
story_txt:
A backpack made from cork?Yep. The key difference between Jajamän backpacks and your current backpack is that Jajamän is made from cork. Cork is a sustainable, durable, natural material that grows on trees. It’s cruelty-free, unlike leather, and totally natural and biodegradable, unlike the fabric and other materials most other backpacks are made of. A backpack's just a backpack, right?Not exactly.We make our backpacks to be objects of connection. The cork material connects you to nature, and its durability means you use it for many years as a beloved item.Jajamän backpacks are designed to be durable and practical so they can hack life being a backpack. They are the result of a long and careful design process that’s seen different variations and materials put to the test to see which ones proved best suited to the job. What's so great about cork? Cork oak trees actually benefit from having their bark stripped as the process allows the tree to thrive for hundreds of years. Now that’s a win-win right there. It means that for those of you who may have issues with buying and using leather, cork is a fantastic alternative.The key material in Jajamän backpacks is cork, something you might only have ever encountered when opening a bottle of wine or champagne. But cork has so much more going for it than pops, bubbles, and cheers, so much so that we’ve made a handy list of some of its benefits: 
 Natural & Sustainable. Cork comes from harvested tree bark in a process that rejuvenates the cork trees. It has to go through lamination to become strong and water-repellent, but this has a much lower environmental impact than the alternatives, animal leather, and plastic-based faux leather. 

 Water & Stain Repellent. Cork is pretty much everything-resistant. Water. Fire. Dirt. Stains. Cork can resist it all. It’s also anti-fungal and hypoallergenic, so it’s suitable for people with asthma and other allergies. And it’s easy to clean which is handy since you’ll probably take it on a fair few adventures.

 Unique pattern. Each piece of cork is unique. No two pieces of cork look the same, so your bag will be unique. 

 Light-weight and strong. Cork is lightweight and strong. Ideal for making a bag out of, we would say. The whole backpack weighs less than 3 bananas. It’s a very versatile and durable material that can handle the heavy loads you’re likely to want to carry around with you.
Mindfully Designed We're going back to a more sustainable way of consuming and producing. Sustainability is our business, and thanks to your pledges, we will be able to begin producing our planet-friendly cork backpacks. We’ll be able to fund our team to continue to challenge the status quo of fast fashion, by creating truly sustainable alternatives. You want a backpack that’s going to be with you for the long run (or walk). Because who wants to be throwing away a backpack after a year or so because it couldn’t hack the rigors of daily life in the city or the countryside or even a summer of full-on festivals?There’s something about cork’s natural look that makes it perfectly striking in the urban jungle. That’s why we designed a bag that is sleek-looking and practical for taking to work.Our cork backpacks come in three colors:All backpacks are lightweight, water repellent with an expandable compartment and adjustable straps. Jajamän can really hack being a backpack. We’ve tested it in various settings so that it's going to be with you for the long run (or walk).JAJAMÄN ETHICS: HANDS-FREE AND GUILT-FREEWe’ve made sure that it’s not just the people who wear our backpacks who benefit, but also everyone and everything affected along the way - the oak trees that are harvested for cork, all the people who help make the bags, and the environment at large. Finding the most planet-friendly option for each detail of our backpack without compromising function was also a long and careful process. Here’s what won through (drumroll please): PRIMARY MATERIAL: Cork. Our beloved cork from Portugal. So strong, so smooth, so durable. We love it and hope you will too.  CLOSING MECHANISM: 100% YKK zips made from post-consumer plastic. So reliable and recycled. INSIDE LINING: Italian quality felt made from recycled polyester. Smooth and strong. PUSH BUTTONS: 70% recycled brass. They’re solid and really look the part. TAGS AND TRIMS: Recycled paper for easy labeling and stylish finishing.Fast fashion has created a culture of short-term consumerism with a take, make, and discard relationship to products. Jajamän is here to change that culture by designing with a holistic view of materials and the lifecycle of products.Designed in Sweden. Made in Portugal. All Jajamän bags are carefully made in a small factory in the north of Portugal. We’ve chosen to produce in Portugal not just to be close to the source of the cork, but also for collaboration and quality purposes, and to support the manufacturers that operate in secure and safe environments. Fair wages and good working conditions are standard practices not just at our factory, but throughout Portugal. We like that, and on our many visits to the factory, we’ve worked on the styling of the bags, ensuring our Nordic vision of function combines with Portuguese artisanal production methods to create a unique backpack that meets the highest quality standards. Our MissionThe Jajamän team aspires to create fashionable, functional products that have a positive impact on people and the planet. We believe sustainability issues don’t have to be serious, they can be fun as well. And that backpacks can do more for the world than just carry stuff around for us so we can be hands-free. They can lead the way in the quest for environmentally friendly bags, and get people doing more fun things.If we could sum up Jajamän in a couple of lines it would go something like this:DO GOOD. CARRY WITH STYLE. Actually, it would go exactly like that!Jajamän cork backpacks are stylish and timeless. A Nordic design made in Portugal for the quiet revolutionaries who want to change things and go about their daily lives with style and ethics. Perks: How to Back The Backpack Here are the benefits of making a pledge to support us now! Get this perk = pre-order a backpack for 90€ LESS compared to what the backpack will cost after the crowdfunding campaign (retail price)Thanks to these pre-orders we will be able to go into production and you’ll get your backpack in July. Meet The TeamThe Jajamän team is a multinational team based in Malmo, Sweden. We all share the same passion for sustainable living and ethical production.With a background in Sociology and Fashion Design, founder Netta aspires to create fashionable, functional products while bringing a positive impact to the people and planet.  During the past decades, Netta has seen the textile industry from many perspectives. She spent two years working for a sustainable textile company in Pakistan and saw firsthand the damaging effects of fast fashion: quality being sacrificed for quantity, fabric waste piling up, and the connection between creator and consumer breaking down.Our studio images are taken by photographer Johanna, who is consistent about her Nordic aesthetics. Peter knows about quality and production. He has spent the past 20 years or so traveling around the world keeping track of timelines in order to make production and processes run smoothly. AD Angela loves making sense of the world through her lens, and there is some “Angela magic” to her images. Leonor’s passion is combining analysis with intuition, and she has a double degree in psychology and economics. Viviana is Jajamän personified, and you can see her in many of our images. Apart from modeling and being our ambassador, she also takes care of our social media and PR.The cork backpack represents Jajamän’s first step in their search for sustainable materials. It’s a big part of their mission to encourage everyone to be more conscious of their consumption and more determined to make meaningful connections, be they with nature, beloved items or people around them.Q&AsHere are some quick answers to a few questions you might have.Q: Is cork leather really vegan?A: Jajamän! Q: Will the material really last without cracking?A: Jajamän! Q: Will you be able to ship the bags to anywhere in the world?A: Jajamän! Q: What’s Swedish for “hell yes, without a doubt?”A: Jajamän! Q: Is that the end of the Q&A?A: Jajamän! Risks and challengesWe acknowledge the risk of unexpected delays or complications, but we are committed to getting the best products to our backers on time, and we are confident that we will be able to do that. Between Jajamän’s founder and quality manager, the team has a long collective history in manufacturing, sourcing, purchasing, design, and product development. Our quality manager has two decades of experience in a senior position securing quality production in a major company. This means we know how to handle quality and make sure a timeline is kept to. We have also done our share of prototyping for the past 2 years and now have a nearly final version ready to produce. Before going into production, we plan to make some minor adjustments and make one last prototype to ensure that all details are in place. We are confident that we can manufacture our backpacks from cork and distribute them all over the world (their lightweight nature really helps keep shipping costs down). We just need people to believe in the importance of using backpacks that are as environmentally friendly as a bag can be.Can't Contribute Right Now? No problem. You can still help... We understand that supporting us financially might not be possible right now. But you can still do your bit to spread the word about Jajamän across social media or at your next dinner party.That’s it from us, except to say: if you’re asking yourself can I really help launch a more sustainable backpack that could do its little bit to make the world a better place, there’s only one answer we’d like to give you and it’s: Jajamän!

story:
Gold for the Queen

All figure skating fans, let's thank Queen Yuna for her beautiful performances throughout her career. Let's build an extra special gold medal as a retirement gift for the queen. Please help us raise enough money to build this medal.

김연아선수를위해, 금매달을 만들어 은퇴선물로 드리고 싶습니다.


What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Sochi Olympic's gold medal is made out of 525g of Silver and 6g of Gold.
  • It will cost about $1,000 to build a similar medal
  • $30,000 is needed to build a pure gold medal, 531g of gold.
  • Any left overs will be donated with Queen Yuna's name

The Impact

  • Thank Queen Yuna for bringing up the standard of figure skating.
  • Show power of fan, who really care about the athlete.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share this page or goldforqueen.com

story:
Your iconic automobile: few things define an individual better than the car they drive.  Many car owners can tell you a story about the first car they owned.  Feel free to comment and let us know the make and model of your first automobile. 

my first car

I don’t know about you, but as a kid I was obsessed with the ‘80’s television show, “Knight Rider.”  The Blackhawk Smartwatch Remote Engine Starter (RES) is an attempt to make Knight Rider a reality for the everyday driver. 

All-in-all, the patented Blackhawk RES is an outward expression of auto enthusiasts' passion for their vehicles.

Many have tried, but the market is still yearning for an incredibly practical, yet user friendly application for the smartwatch.  The Blackhawk Smartwatch RES is such a system.  The smartwatch is fashion forward and turbocharged with technology, poised to introduce the system to the masses.  Welcome to the preeminent connected car experience. 

“I have spent 15 years of my life selling mobile electronics so I am very experienced with Remote Starts. Your technology is awesome!” - Michael B. -- The Man Cave Colorado

“Props to you and your team for making such a fascinating product!” - Nick Y. -- ICON Automotive Customs, LLC

“I dig your product and look forward to working with you guys in future.” – Michael B. -- Elevation Auto Spa

The Specialty Equipment Marketing Association (SEMA) designated the Blackhawk Smartwatch RES as one of the Top Ten most innovative products of 2014!  This smartwatch has Caller ID, Anti-Cell phone loss alarm, and can Un/Lock your car doors, Pop your trunk or Start your vehicle from anywhere – Unlimited range.

**FREE Installations for Colorado Residents at select donation tiers provided by ICON Automotive **

2014 SEMA Show attendees are invited to watch the Blackhawk RES presentation about this breakthrough technology on Wednesday, November 5, from 11:00 a.m.–12:30 p.m., in the Las Vegas Convention Center, room N258.


Black BHK 530 & Stainless Steel BHK 810


Connected Cars & Vehicle-to-Vehicle Technology

The connected car is vital in road communication. Consider the ability of cars closest to a blocked tunnel entrance, to relay the information back to those cars that have time to make alternate driving routes. It also could amplify the quality of information needed by EMS responders in regards to the severity and specifics of accidents.

Visual Representation of V2V Communication - Source: NHTSA

"Safety is our top priority, and V2V technology represents the next great advance in saving lives" - U.S. Transportation Secretary Anthony Foxx

According to the National Highway Transportation Safety Administration (NHTSA), preliminary estimates of vehicle-to-vehicle (V2V) communication safety benefits state that just with two of the multiple safety applications up to 592,000 crashes would be prevented and save 1,083 lives per year. Put another way, V2V technology could help drivers avoid more than half of these types of crashes that would otherwise occur by providing advance warning.

V2V technology has the potential to be fused with the Blackhawk RES to further improve the effectiveness of many crash avoidance safety systems currently being developed and serve as a building block for a driverless vehicle. Vehicles equipped with V2V technology could also enable the development of a wide range of mobility and environmental benefits based on vehicle-to-infrastructure applications and other V2V applications that can enhance traffic flow in many ways.

White BHK 530 & Stainless Steel BHK 818

In addition to convenience features, the Blackhawk RES platform will be a means where drivers can conveniently upgrade their vehicles in order to come into compliance with upcoming regulatory measures to bring forward a vehicle-to-vehicle and vehicle-to-infrastructure communication environment.

"By warning drivers of imminent danger, V2V technology has the potential to dramatically improve highway safety," - NHTSA Deputy Administrator David Friedman.

Blackhawk RES

The Blackhawk RES represents the marriage of form and function.  Convenience without compromise.  Cool core features and high quality components.

The Blackhawk RES bridges design, form factor and convenience features that consumers demand while providing a gateway  governments and municipalities need for fulfilling safer and more environmentally friendly driving experiences.

Stainless Steel BHK 818 & Blue BHK 530 


SMARTWATCH FEATURES

The Blackhawk Smartwatch RES comes equipped with Call Features (Private call, Speakerphone, Contact download and Caller ID), Messaging Features (SMS & MMS, Text Reply [android only]), Smart Phone Apps (Key fob functions, Cell phone loss-prevention), Watch Apps (Calculator, Calendar, Task, Alarm, Stopwatch, World clock, File manager), and Multimedia Features (MP3/MP4 player, One-click hidden camera function, Customizable wallpaper & screensaver Organizer, Voice recording & Video recording).

The Blackhawk Smartwatch is platform agnostic, meaning we support call features and limited messaging features with Bluetooth enabled phones.

Whether the average car owner or enthusiast, all these features come attractively packaged in a sleek design with a striking luminous display and a timeless look for any occasion.

12 VOLT SYSTEM FEATURES

The patented Blackhawk RES enables a "Cloud-Connected Car" like never before, providing an entirely new level of 2-way interaction with your vehicle. The Blackhawk RES system lets you use a smartwatch to control the functions of your vehicle from a remote location.

Telematics

Drivers have a wide range of security features that keep them connected and safe in the event of an emergency, including emergency SOS notification, and stolen vehicle tracking.

Remote Services

Operating over the GSM network, you can communicate with your car and control many of its functions remotely, even if you're hundreds of miles away!  Features include:

  • GPS Tracking
  • Lock / Arm
  • Unlock / Disarm
  • Push Button Starter
  • Remote Engine Starter
  • Window Control 
  • Trunk Release
  • Panic

Universal 4 band GSM module

We use an industry standard 4 band GSM module; it can be used anywhere in the world that has GSM network and it covers all bands of the GSM network.  For example, if one band signal is insufficient, it will change to another band.  With a total of 4 bands, ostensibly superior to singular band or dual band GSM modules, that can be searched and activated, the Blackhawk RES system is robust enough for consistent signal reception.

Wiring diagram

The Blackhawk RES system is a complex car alarm / remote start / GSM alarm / GPS tracking integrated 12 volt system, we strongly recommend installation by professionals.

**FREE Installations for Colorado Residents at select donation tiers provided by ICON Automotive **

STRETCH GOALS

Funding Goal $100,000 – Onboard Diagnostic Device

Advanced Diagnostics

Your vehicle generates thousands of data points per second, potentially providing you the information you need to predict potential vehicle issues before they happen.

Road Trip Infotainment

4G LTE speeds available via built-in mobile hotspot enables services such as Internet radio, video streaming, web browsing and more.

Family Tracker

Receive notifications and track a young driver when they have traveled beyond predetermined boundaries or crossed a preset speed limit.

Connected Media

Passengers can purchase and download songs, audiobooks and maps, and stream music on the go.

Funding Goal $250,000 – Voice Recognition (the K.I.T.T. car experience)

With the advent of the Android Wear and Apple Watch platforms, we’d begin to develop solutions for these users and create a novel voice activated connected car experience.  Speak into your Blackhawk RES powered Android Wear device or Apple Watch and witness your car obey your commands.  Knight Rider is here. Knight Rider is now.

Funding Goal $500,000 – Indiegogo Donor Invite

We are pleased to announce that if this crowdfunding campaign is successful reaching this funding goal level, unless government regulations prohibit, and if we decided to formulate a company in order to issue equity, we will notify ALL Indiegogo donors in ADVANCE!!

Funding Goal $1,000,000 – Vehicle-to-vehicle communication

We intend to collaborate with NHTSA partners for the development of aftermarket OBD-II and 12 volt solutions representing the highest level of compliance with the pending NHTSA rules and regulations for vehicle-to-vehicle and vehicle-to-infrastructure communication.

WARRANTY

Every Blackhawk RES system will come with a limited 1-year warranty.  This will cover the replaceable battery under normal usage circumstances.

DIMENSIONS

BHK 818


BHK 810


BHK 530


Tech Specifications

PROJECT STATUS & MILESTONES

As you can see we’ve built working prototypes and first generation pre-production models, and are now making the final adjustments for production. Furthermore, we have selected established, reliable manufacturing partners.  In addition, we are now testing the pre-production models and will continue to file for additional patent protection.

Your pledge will help us fund:

  • Foster a dynamic developer community
  • Large volume component orders
  • Development on Android and/or Apple Watch platforms

Our remaining key milestones are:

Month 1: Finish final design details and package design

Month 2: Pilot production

Month 3: Finish certifications, volume production

Month 4: Start shipping

THE TEAM

Samuel K. Giles is a registered United States patent agent and received his technical training in physics at the University of Colorado at Boulder. In addition, Samuel received his Bachelor’s in information systems and M.B.A. from the University of Toledo. 

Drawing on his experience of university technology transfer and business development, he develops strategic patent portfolios that position the Blackhawk RES to remain a force in the automotive aftermarket industry for years to come.

Mr. Giles has teamed up with great contributors around the world, specifically, partner with designers from Hong Kong Top Watch.  The collaborative efforts blended optimum intellectual property position, cutting-edge technology, world-class horological engineering with leading high throughput manufacturing capability.

The team has a passion for innovation, solving real-world problems with technology, attention to detail, and clean execution.

The Blackhawk RES exemplifies our commitment to high-quality and exceptional design.

RISKS & CHALLENGES

Every technology project has risks and challenges and the Blackhawk Smartwatch RES system is no different. Our system is a novel combination of hardware, wireless technologies, software, electronics, and wristwatch hardware. We are confident in our design. To deliver a premium product, it is sometimes necessary to spend extra time tuning designs, refining software, or adjusting mechanical tolerances.

Furthermore, after years of research and development, we now have fully functional prototypes in-hand. This is the result of meticulous care in design, research, and development while selecting the highest caliber components and manufacturing partners.

As we move towards production, our main challenges are in final integration, wireless certifications, and parts deliveries. Moreover, as with any product, supply chain logistics can potentially impact parts delivery. Additionally, delays may result from final detailing, testing procedures, and certification processes.

Finally, we have integrated cutting-edge components into the Blackhawk Smartwatch RES. Brand-new components sometimes incur longer lead times. We have excellent relationships with these component suppliers and are coordinating closely with them to ensure that parts arrive on time.

We are driven to get your Blackhawk RES system off the assembly line and onto your wrist and vehicle ; we will let you know if we run into unexpected delays.

Trademarks

The logos of Lexus® Chevrolet® Jeep® and all other trademarked brand names / models are used for descriptive purposes only and remain the sole property of their respective trademark holders. The Blackahawk RES has no connection in any way with any vehicle manufactures listed on this website.


Other Ways You Can Help

Times are tough.  We understand.  If you're not in a position to contribute at this time, please help us get the word out and make some noise about the campaign!  You'll find tools on this page to help share this campaign with your colleagues, friends, and family. 

FAQ

Can the Blackhawk RES be installed on a manual transmission vehicle?

Yes.  The Blackhawk RES can be installed on a manual or automatic transmission.  The default state is automatic; however, by sending the following code to the system from the smartwatch – MTGEAR*123456.  This will configure the system for manual transmissions. 

Is the Blackhawk Smartwatch water resistant?

No. Although hermetically sealed, the Blackhawk Smartwatch charges via a mini-USB, so we advise caution if the Blackhawk Smartwatch is exposed to high levels of moisture.

What do you mean when you say unlimited range?

As long as the Blackhawk RES has adequate GSM network coverage, the system will perform as designed.

What is the average battery life?

4-5 days

Which smartphones are compatible?

Any Bluetooth enabled phone. However text notifications are only available on Android devices.

Can the Blackhawk Smartwatch RES accept phone calls?

Yes. Blackhawk RES supports both speaker phone calls and private calls.

Does the Blackhawk RES have a warranty?

Yes. Blackhawk RES comes with a one (1) year limited warranty covering manufacturing faults.

How does the Blackhawk Smartwatch recharge?

Charging uses a standard mini USB cable for fast charging.

What language(s) is the Blackhawk RES available?

The Blackhawk RES has been developed in the following 11 languages:  English, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, German, Czech, Dutch, Russian, Greek, Arabic.

The watch hardware is frozen in order to meet our delivery goal.

We’d love to add “x cool piece of hardware” to our watch, but any modifications will require time that we don’t have. Our hardware choices are therefore frozen. You can still submit ideas to info@blackhawkres.com. Maybe we’ll make version 2.0!

Will I need to pay customs on my order?

You will need to follow your local laws regarding customs. We will mark the package as a gift for supporting our project. We will also correctly declare the value of the watch when shipping. Customs charges may incur depending on your locale. The Blackhawk RES team or any of its affiliates will not refund those costs. We are working to be CE certified for shipping time.

What about model, colors, and shipping information? 

Your model choice, color choices, and shipping information will be collected in a survey when the funding period is over.

Additional questions can be submitted by email or the comments page.

We care a lot about what you think. We’re constantly providing answers to all sorts of questions. Give us a shout on the comments page or email us at info@blackhawkres.com

vehicle from a remote location.

Telematics
Drivers have a wide
range of security features that keep them connected and safe in the event of an
emergency, including emergency SOS notification, and stolen vehicle tracking.
Remote Services
Operating over the
GSM network, you can communicate with your car and control many of its
functions remotely, even if you're hundreds of miles away!  Features
include:

GPS Tracking
Lock / Arm
Unlock / Disarm
Push Button Starter
Remote Engine Starter
Window Control 
Trunk Release
Panic


Universal 4 band
GSM module
We use an industry
standard 4 band GSM module; it can be used anywhere in the world that has GSM
network and it covers all bands of the GSM network.  For example, if one
band signal is insufficient, it will change to another band.  With a total
of 4 bands, ostensibly superior to singular band or dual band GSM modules, that
can be searched and activated, the Blackhawk RES system is robust enough for
consistent signal reception.

Wiring diagram
The Blackhawk RES
system is a complex car alarm / remote start / GSM alarm / GPS tracking
integrated 12 volt system, we strongly recommend installation by professionals.
**FREE
Installations for Colorado Residents at select donation tiers provided by ICON
Automotive **

STRETCH GOALS
Funding
Goal $100,000 – Onboard Diagnostic Device
Advanced
Diagnostics
Your
vehicle generates thousands of data points per second, potentially providing
you the information you need to predict potential vehicle issues before they
happen.
Road
Trip Infotainment
4G
LTE speeds available via built-in mobile hotspot enables services such as
Internet radio, video streaming, web browsing and more.

Family Tracker
Receive
notifications and track a young driver when they have traveled beyond
predetermined boundaries or crossed a preset speed limit.
Connected Media
Passengers can
purchase and download songs, audiobooks and maps, and stream music on the go.
Funding Goal
$250,000 – Voice Recognition (the K.I.T.T. car experience)
With the advent of
the Android Wear and Apple Watch platforms, we’d begin to develop solutions for
these users and create a novel voice activated connected car experience. 
Speak into your Blackhawk RES powered Android Wear device or Apple Watch and
witness your car obey your commands.  Knight Rider is here. Knight Rider
is now.
Funding Goal
$500,000 – Indiegogo Donor Invite
We are pleased to
announce that if this crowdfunding campaign is successful reaching this funding
goal level, unless government regulations prohibit, and if we decided to
formulate a company in order to issue equity, we will notify ALL Indiegogo donors in ADVANCE!!
Funding Goal
$1,000,000 – Vehicle-to-vehicle communication
We intend to
collaborate with NHTSA partners for the development of aftermarket OBD-II and
12 volt solutions representing the highest level of compliance with the pending
NHTSA rules and regulations for vehicle-to-vehicle and
vehicle-to-infrastructure communication.
WARRANTY
Every Blackhawk RES
system will come with a limited 1-year warranty.  This will cover the replaceable battery under
normal usage circumstances.
DIMENSIONS
BHK 818



BHK 810




BHK 530 



Tech Specifications

PROJECT STATUS
& MILESTONES
As you can see
we’ve built working prototypes and first generation pre-production models, and
are now making the final adjustments for production. Furthermore, we have
selected established, reliable manufacturing partners.  In addition, we
are now testing the pre-production models and will continue to file for
additional patent protection.
Your pledge will
help us fund:

Foster a dynamic developer community
Large volume component orders
Development on Android and/or Apple
     Watch platforms

Our remaining key
milestones are:
Month 1: Finish
final design details and package design
Month 2: Pilot
production
Month 3: Finish
certifications, volume production
Month 4: Start
shipping
THE TEAM
Samuel K. Giles is a registered United States patent agent and received his technical training in physics at the University of Colorado at Boulder. In addition, Samuel received his Bachelor’s in information systems and M.B.A. from the University of Toledo.  
Drawing on his experience of university technology transfer and business development, he develops strategic patent portfolios that position the Blackhawk RES to remain a force in the automotive aftermarket industry for years to come.
Mr. Giles has teamed up with
great contributors around the world, specifically, partner with designers from
Hong Kong Top Watch.  The collaborative efforts blended optimum
intellectual property position, cutting-edge technology, world-class
horological engineering with leading high throughput manufacturing capability.
The team has a passion
for innovation, solving real-world problems with technology, attention to
detail, and clean execution. 
The Blackhawk RES
exemplifies our commitment to high-quality and exceptional design.
RISKS & CHALLENGES
Every technology
project has risks and challenges and the Blackhawk Smartwatch RES system is no
different. Our system is a novel combination of hardware, wireless technologies,
software, electronics, and wristwatch hardware. We are confident in our design.
To deliver a premium product, it is sometimes necessary to spend extra time
tuning designs, refining software, or adjusting mechanical tolerances.
Furthermore, after
years of research and development, we now have fully functional prototypes
in-hand. This is the result of meticulous care in design, research, and
development while selecting the highest caliber components and manufacturing
partners. 
As we move towards
production, our main challenges are in final integration, wireless
certifications, and parts deliveries. Moreover, as with any product, supply
chain logistics can potentially impact parts delivery. Additionally, delays may
result from final detailing, testing procedures, and certification processes.
Finally, we have
integrated cutting-edge components into the Blackhawk Smartwatch RES. Brand-new
components sometimes incur longer lead times. We have excellent relationships
with these component suppliers and are coordinating closely with them to ensure
that parts arrive on time.
We are driven to
get your Blackhawk RES system off the assembly line and onto your wrist and
vehicle ; we will let you know if we run into unexpected delays.


Trademarks
The logos of Lexus® Chevrolet® Jeep® and all other
trademarked brand names / models are used for descriptive purposes only and
remain the sole property of their respective trademark holders. The Blackahawk
RES has no connection in any way with any vehicle manufactures listed on this
website. 
Other Ways You Can Help
Times are tough.  We understand.  If you're not in a position to contribute at this time, please help us get the word out and make some noise about the campaign!  You'll find tools on this page to help share this campaign with your colleagues, friends, and family.  


FAQ


Can the Blackhawk RES
be installed on a manual transmission vehicle?
Yes.  The Blackhawk RES can be installed on a
manual or automatic transmission.  The
default state is automatic; however, by sending the following code to the
system from the smartwatch – MTGEAR*123456. 
This will configure the system for manual transmissions.  
Is the Blackhawk
Smartwatch water resistant?
No. Although hermetically sealed,
the Blackhawk Smartwatch charges via a mini-USB, so we advise caution if the
Blackhawk Smartwatch is exposed to high levels of moisture.
What do you mean when
you say unlimited range?
As long as the Blackhawk RES has
adequate GSM network coverage, the system will perform as designed.
What is the average
battery life?
4-5 days
Which smartphones are
compatible?
Any Bluetooth enabled phone.
However text notifications are only available on Android devices.
Can the Blackhawk
Smartwatch RES accept phone calls?
Yes. Blackhawk RES supports both
speaker phone calls and private calls.
Does the Blackhawk RES
have a warranty? 
Yes. Blackhawk RES comes with a one
(1) year limited warranty covering manufacturing faults.
How does the Blackhawk
Smartwatch recharge?
Charging uses a standard mini USB
cable for fast charging.
What language(s) is
the Blackhawk RES available?
The Blackhawk RES has been
developed in the following 11 languages: 
English, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, German, Czech,
Dutch, Russian, Greek, Arabic.
The watch hardware is
frozen in order to meet our delivery goal.
We’d love to add “x cool piece of
hardware” to our watch, but any modifications will require time that we don’t
have. Our hardware choices are therefore frozen. You can still submit ideas to info@blackhawkres.com. Maybe we’ll make
version 2.0!
Will I need to pay
customs on my order?
You will need to follow your local
laws regarding customs. We will mark the package as a gift for supporting our
project. We will also correctly declare the value of the watch when shipping.
Customs charges may incur depending on your locale. The Blackhawk RES team or
any of its affiliates will not refund those costs. We are working to be CE
certified for shipping time.
What about model, colors,
and shipping information?  
Your model choice, color choices,
and shipping information will be collected in a survey when the funding period
is over.
Additional questions
can be submitted by email or the comments page.
We care a lot about what you think.
We’re constantly providing answers to all sorts of questions. Give us a shout
on the comments page or email us at info@blackhawkres.com

story:
Why we are doing this?

Understanding the needs around us can be so difficult with the idea that we live our lives for ourselves at the forefront. What if we started living our lives for others? Haven't you wanted to see change in the world one small step at a time? You can be apart of the community that is setting out to change one life at a time. 

What We Need?

We need:

  • Website built (to keep it running we need funds)
  • Clothing printed 
  • Misc accessories for printing
  • 501c3 License

The Impact

         1. Globally, the average cost of a slave is $90.

  • 2. Trafficking primarily involves exploitation which comes in many forms, including: forcing victims into prostitution, subjecting victims to slavery or involuntary servitude and compelling victims to commit sex acts for the purpose of creating pornography.

    3. According to some estimates, approximately 80% of trafficking involves sexual exploitation, and 19% involves labor exploitation.

    4. There are approximately 20 to 30 million slaves in the world today.

    5. According to the U.S. State Department, 600,000 to 800,000 people are trafficked across international borders every year. More than 70% are female and half are children.

    6. The average age a teen enters the sex trade in the U.S. is 12 to 14-year-old. Many victims are runaway girls who were sexually abused as children.

    7. California harbors 3 of the FBI’s 13 highest child sex trafficking areas on the nation: Los Angeles, San Francisco and San Diego.

    8. The National Human Trafficking Hotline receives more calls from Texas than any other state in the US. 15% of those calls are from the Dallas-Fort Worth area.

    9. Between 14,500 and 17,500 people are trafficked into the U.S. each year.

    10. Human trafficking is the third largest international crime industry (behind illegal drugs and arms trafficking). It reportedly generates a profit of $32 billion every year. Of that number, $15.5 billion is made in industrialized countries.

    11. The International Labour Organization estimates that women and girls represent the largest share of forced labor victims with 11.4 million trafficked victims (55%) compared to 9.5 million (45%) men.


The small impact we can make will not only change the lives of those directly receiving the hope but you as well. It will give you the sense of love that you may not have experienced before. You can say that you had a hand in rescuing lives, saving children and sharing hope.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't financially give, I ask you to simply SHARE and Raise Awareness: 

Thank you,

Marc Phun and Ryann Kunst
Founders of Simple Life

story:
We've been making unique hand pressed lingerie since 2009. All of our designs are done in-house, inspired from our lives and things we love. 

We've had success with the line and can be found in retailers like; Free People, Planet Blue, American Rag and Dollskill.com

Our customers tell us they'd like to show off their Private Arts more, sending us many requests for a swim or lounge line. 

We decided to do both...

Our new line Cabana is a swim/intimates hybrid and loungewear line. Our goal with Cabana is to keep the same fun playful feel of our lingerie with the wearability for the beach and the comfort of lounge.


First off, the funds will be set aside to take care of our wonderful backers. The rest of what's raised will mostly go to pre-production of Cabana. Some money will be set aside for advertising once the line is ready for launch. 

If we don't make our goal we will do the best with what we've got. This will mean producing less inventory or cutting styles, but this is our passion and since the beginning we've always done whatever we had to to make it a success. 


Buy the song here

story:
But now there is, 'one shoe for all' and built to last. Introducing T-redZ...


T-RedZ: Our Product. Our Vision.

T-redZ is a product birthed from the frustration my husband and I had from the sheer volume of school shoes our children go through each term. It's simple!!! Shoes are not made the way they used to be made and unfortunately the shoes out there typically suffer from at least one of the following problems...

1)    OVERLY CHEAP, meaning you'll have to spend a fortune on repeated purchases multiple times within a term as they get worn-out. Most shoes today compromise on comfort, build-quality and durability in order to fit within a supermarket 'bargain bin', not to mention the compromise on ethical manufacturing standards.

2)    OVERPRICED . Times are tough and the demands of children and family life don't get any easier. Not every parent is in a position to pay Saville Row prices for a decent quality pair of shoes.

3)    INAPPROPRIATE. Many shoes for children are 'all about the bling' and flashy in design. While they may capture the attention of the child, they are considered unsuitable for the majority of school uniform policies. Yet those that are deemed acceptable are normally the polar-opposite; boring, bland and old-fashioned. There's no winning! (parents of teenagers will know what i'm talking about!).

 Sharing the same frustration as you...we decided to make a "shoe for all"... Something trendy enough for the kids,still acceptable for schools (from whom we have received feedback from our pre prototype survey) but most importantly robust and BUILT TO LAST!!

 


What makes T-RedZ special?

T-redZ (pronounced 'treads') will be made available in two distinct styles, One for boys, and one for girls. As this is initially a product for school children it will be available in sizes covering pre-school to high-school and will retail at a RRP of £49.

T-RedZ will be constructed from a strong ETHICALLY-sourced leather. We are so confident of the durability of these shoes that we assure that under normal usage (and yes kids being kids at playtime---is normal!)the only time you will probably be replacing these shoes is when your child outgrows them. We believe that the quality of a shoe should extend beyond the upper, and we have a number of unique features/design innovations and health benefits that we are unable to disclose at this stage due to protection of intellectual property.

There is nothing else like this shoe on the market, this CAN be the next big thing and we aim to have a BRAND to stay. It is thereby essential that we get this right first time and this is where you come in!...

 


How you can help T-RedZ?

We have done all we can financially (every last scrape) to start up the company, website, and design of our prototype. However for our company to be able to deliver this shoe to our consumers all the way from our friends in China we need to physically build the prototype based on our designs and produce the first wave of orders in four styles (boys and girls / junior boys and girls) and in BULK to make it cost effective for all parties concerned, and position ourselves to be able to sell this product both online and through leading UK retailers. If we fail to reach our target, we will allocate all funds raised towards our online sales strategy. We have measured demand through nationwide market research receiving an overwhelming 98% confirming that there IS a demand for the shoe we are working to produce.


We are proud to be an ethical company. All of our materials will be ethically sourced, as will be our manufacturing processes. To help the environment, we aim to have a programme for the recyclable components of the goods we produce and will additionally work with various charities to refurbish suitable used shoes to help deprived children in developing countries around the world at no cost to those who donate or benefit.


 

Things have been progressing positively thus far, and we are well on our way  but need that final push from you guys... We hope you'll support our vision and assist in achieving our goals. This product has every chance of being the next big thing.. and you could be part of it!

We thank your for taking the time to read this.

 

 

The Team @ T-redZ Ware Ltd.

 

 

How can you follow us?

Even if you are not in a position to pledge, we'd still welcome some shameless promotion!

Please find us on Facebook.com/tredzware

Be sure to click on 'like' so that you can keep up to date with what is happening.

You can also follow us on Twitter @tredzware.

Keep an eye on www.t-redz.com our official website launching soon!
