Keep an eye on www.t-redz.com our official website launching soon!

story:
Hi, thank you for taking the time to visit our campaign.

We live in the north east of Italy, closed to Venice. Our son Nicholas is only 7 years old but he has always been in love with motorsport and especially in kart races. He always repeat he want become a Formula 1 pilot!
After years of insistence, last spring I decided to bring him to drive (you can see a picture here below of his first driving time with a rented kart), and in the wonder of all, he has proven to be much much better than his peers.

He has won almost all the unofficial races he has joined - and he only used rented karts.
Next fall he will be allowed to join his first kart championship and -frankly speaking- I do not dare to destroy his deepest dream.
I have invested all the money I could to buy him a good kart (the one in the first picture) and a small white van to bring him at the circuits but the money needed to participate in the championship are much more than I could afford.

Now he is having a lot of practice as he wants to be perfectly prepared for next year season....




Please, help me to make his dream come true.


What We Need & What You Get

  • A championship season is very expensive : you need to pay each time you want to take part on a race or make practice, you need to buy tyres, spare parts, mechanical assistance on circuit.... More than this you have to afford to travel expenses.....
  • I am offering really good perks! You will always be part of its career, if you own a company you will have the possibility to advertise it on its Kart and also on our truck.Please check it out!
  • If i will not reach the goal i will use the found to let him participate to some karting courses to let him improve its ability and not let him stop dreaming.


I think that child's dreams should be supported. It is not common to have a so big and ambitious one! 


Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please help to get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • Also if you can't help us with founding, please use the Indiegogo share tools to let people know about Nicholas dream!

Feel free to contact me for any question you may have, i will be very happy to give you all necessary explanation.

story:
Hello! My name is Leira. I'm (almost) 35, awesome and I have, in the past, had the most terrible luck with men. I had the terrible habit of choosing fellas who were utterly incompitable. As you can imagine, this led to many years of heartache and unhappiness. Three years ago, I had sworn off of dating FOREVER. That's when the perfect man (for me) found me. He has made me happier than I have ever been in my life and now, he's decided to keep me...so we're getting married. I have found the gown I want to wear while I pledge my life to him. The one that made me cry happy tears when I saw myself in it...but it's a little pricey. Please help me be the happiest bride that ever existed. Think of it as one massive group birthday gift and a good deed.

We've worked out some lovely pieces of art and whatnots as a thank you for any donations we recieve. If you can't help financially, help me by sharing my cause.

 

*All artwork is done either digitally or with pencil AND ink.

story:
Short Summary

Hey there my Name Is Ryan Taft and I’m an illustrator and designer, but my friends call me an "Artist". (yaaaaaaay :) ) So let me tell you a little bit about my inspiration, I have been a part of graffiti, skatboarding and the underground music scene since I was about 13 years old. The combinations of those things have shape and inspire much of my work. I am currently working 2 parttime jobs and I also am a fulltime student. I am very dedicated to making this Brand happen and have been funding it by myself 100%. But it has become to much to handle by myself I have over 30 designs ready for print I Just need a little more money to get the first line printed.

I am making a brand Called Daily Supply Co. the idea behind the brand is to support creative people, people who strive Daily to become a better artist, writer, musicians and more. We are not another street wear brand following trends. You will never see us in big chain stores. We are not another brand pretending to be a part of subculture. Everyone at daily is subculture we are the people who breathe life into the things other brands pretend and claim to be. We do what we love Daily and we are not stopping.

This project has been self funded by myself. I cannot make this happen alone, I have high hopes for Daily Supply Co. to grow and become a strong and independent brand, I want to make everything in America, I want to help donate to foundation and causes that affect people’s lives every day. I want a brand that is for real people not pretenders.

(The Shirts Above are samples of some ideas for shirts only a few will be printed to see more designs go to are facebookpage)

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise as much money as possible for the first run, the American printer has given us a minimum of 50 shirts for the first design. I am funding every penny I can into this. With $500 dollars we can print the first shirts with $800 or more we can print multiple shirts and build a website 

We care about are supporters and we want to offer exclusive shirts for this fundraising campaign 

If we do not reach are goal we will use whatever funds were raised and push forward with the brand and I will continue to fund it as much as I can myself until it is successful.

Contributing to Daily Supply Co., we will offer special perks  the cost range from$5-$500

The Impact

We will be one of the only real street wear brands left, that is run by people associated in graffiti, street art, skateboarding and other parts of subculture.  

We appreciate you taking the time to read this. Keep doing what you love Daily.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can not think you can contribute, yes you can ! If you like and would love to support Daily Supply Co. share this with your friends and Family. With facebook, twitter and tumblr

DONT FORGET TO USE THE Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you every one and welcome to the Daily Supply Co.
story_txt:
Short Summary
Hey there my Name Is Ryan Taft and I’m an illustrator and designer, but my friends call me an "Artist". (yaaaaaaay :) ) So let me tell you a little bit about my inspiration, I have been a part of graffiti, skatboarding and the underground music scene since I was about 13 years old. The combinations of those things have shape and inspire much of my work. I am currently working 2 parttime jobs and I also am a fulltime student. I am very dedicated to making this Brand happen and have been funding it by myself 100%. story:
Hot or cold, you remain at ease at all times!

With the help of thermal conduction technology, Wendu became a reality. With a working range of 20 degrees Celsius/ 36 Farenheit, Wendu can switch temperatures from 20 (68ºF) to 40 (104ºF) degrees Celsius in just a couple of minutes – that means you can be completely comfortable in just a few minutes! You may not be able to control the weather around you but with Wendu, you can maintain optimal temperature at your comfort and ease.

 

 

Test Internal Focus

Test of the garment

 
Wendu is a uniquely innovative piece of apparel making a revolutionary break into the world of wearable technology. At its core, it is a shirt that can be temperature regulated with your phone, tablet, or smartwatch so anytime you feel hot, you can opt for it to cool and anytime it’s too cold, you can make it warm!
 
 
 

​
 

 

 

Move your finger to regulate your Wendu.

Picture taken in degrees fahrenheit, also available in degrees celsius*

 

 

 

SIZES

 

 Washing instructions

story:
Short Summary

  • My name is Dr. Sol Regwan and I'm a practicing Eye Doctor for the past 13 years.  I have worked extremely hard to build my practice and consider myself to be the people's doctor. 

  •  By carefully listening to my patients and gaining feedback about what is important to them when it comes to their eyewear, I knew Rejwan Eyewear had to be born. 

                             

  • Rejwan Eyewear is not just a campaign to raise funds for Sunglasses, it goes way beyond that.  Rejwan was born to revolutionize the way the eyewear industry has been operating over the last few decades.

     I believe that the eyewear industry is being monopolized by a single entity dictating over 70% of our market with overly priced eyewear.  

       

  • Rejwan also has a special place in its heart to support and help "Prevent Research for Blindness." That's why we decided that we are giving a portion of our proceeds to help support this great cause.
                        
  • This campaign is so important to us because we want to come up with the best quality polarized sunglasses that are fun to wear, comfortable and also quite affordable. In addition to making an amazing product together, we are also helping Research to Prevent Blindness by donating a portion of every sunglass we create in hopes of helping the cause create better technology to combat blindness. Being in the eyewear field for over 13 years, we know exactly what works and what doesn't. By bringing these new prototypes to life, we can create what other sunglass lines lack. Simply, we are creating the best polarized protection with the most comfortable technologically designed frames!!
  • With your help we can make a significant change in the marketplace, by creating high quality frames and lenses for a cost that's affordable to us all.             
  •  Your support in any way shape or form will go a long way to make these prototypes come to life.  

What We Need & What You Get

By developing our own manufacturing technologies such as mold production for the frames and creating an amazing polarization process, we need your support to launch this campaign. Our goal is $9,000 and your backing will help bring these prototypes to life and get them out to the public. By producing these amazing quality sunglasses independently, we can cut the middle man and markups that makes most of the designer sunglasses out there extremely overpriced. We can save everyone a lot of money while providing a beautiful styled eyewear piece and make it the most comfortable sunglasses out there! Additional funds raised in addition to our goal will go to developing more frames styles for you to choose from. The more we raise, the larger the contribution we will provide to Research to Prevent Blindness!!

By supporting and backing us, we are offering lots of perks, especially the ReJwan sunglass line!! We are also offering many more perks. Please see the right side bar for  details!!


        

                            

                                 

    

   

          

                           

    

    



The Impact

This particular project is valuable to the contributors and to the world because after seeing the end of the eyewear business, we are lacking high quality frames that are carefully designed and inspected at low cost retail frames. I have seen the tremendous markups with "designer" sunglasses and regular spectacle frames and it is completely absurd. There is no reason why we should be monopolized by a company that charges ridiculous retail prices when as a private independent company, we can produce the highest quality frame and polarized lens for a third of the retail price. We want everyone to be able to afford good quality eye protection and stylish frames and create competition so that we have more choices. 

Over the past year, our Eyeglass line has been flying off the shelves and people have responded positively to them. Because of their unique construction quality that they are made in, we have not had one return or defect since. We found that formula where we can mold the perfect frame, use the top quality parts and bring the cost down substantiably. Now we want to do the same thing with our new sunglasses. We went that extra mile and created prototypes that were even better when it came to quality and comfort. We went ahead and created a more echo friendly frame that is biodegradable, lighter, and has that special ingredient that no other sunglass out there has. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone can contribute and we would appreciate it if we could ask everyone to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign. ReJwan Eyewear can be found on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram. If you believe in us, please spread the word and we will be eternally GRATEFUL!! We would entertain any questions you might have about anything to do with our products and would go to the ends of this earth to accommodate you. We could definitely use some help sharing this amazing project with everyone! By sharing our campaign link with your social networks would be a true help to us! You can use the sharing buttons under our video towards the top of this page!  We believe that it is not just about the products but about creating wonderful relationships with our customers just like we do with our daily patients.

We feel that Indiegogo is the perfect place to introduce our new ReJwans and thank you for spending some time to learn about our brand. Thank you all in advance and THANK YOU INDIEGOGO!!!!

Also Find this Campaign On: facebook.com/rejwaneyewear

story:
TRADITIONAL WATCH. MODERN SMARTS.

 

The Simble is a paradigm shift to the Smartwatch world. As a perfect hybrid of elegance in design and smart technology, it is here to offer you a better quality of life. You’ll enjoy the little details like it’s expertly hidden cutting-edge technology built under the minimalist design. Or the fact that it helps you get the most out of the little amount of time in your day while also being able to complete any outfit with finesse. The classic watch-face means there are no bright or oversized LED screens, loud notifications or need to charge it before going out. You no longer have to give up luxury for the smart functions you want.

 

THE WORLD'S LONGEST BATTERY LIFE

The Simble uses a high-powered CR2032 button battery, meaning you’ll never have to charge it! Its average lifetime is 250 days, the longest out of any smartwatch currently on the market. It does everything a smartwatch does with the power of a traditional watch battery.

 

A TIME-HONORED LOOK FOR A MODERN TIME

The Simble is designed to look, be, and act elegant. It is a natural extension of your style, class, and character. The stainless steel body & traditional watch face show a different you to the world, while the tech inside shows you everything else.

 The Simble’s design hides a number of smartwatch features inside the tasteful body of a classic watch, and tells you everything you’d want to know without informing everyone around you. With a simple, elegant face, it’s beautiful to look at as it draws upon the honored tradition of its ancestors; the uncountable, timeless wristwatches of ages past.

 

MADE WITH SAPPHIRE GLASS

The Simble watch face is covered and protected by a sapphire glass cover, which is highly resistant to scratches and abrasion. It’s so strong that it is 15 times stronger than regular glass. We modeled our protection after Swiss watch brands, such as Rolex, Tissot, and Jean Perret who all use the same Sapphire glass coating to protect their watch faces.

 

QUALITY BANDS FOR A QUALITY WATCH

Express yourself with your Simble. Whether you prefer a classic leather, rugged NATO or the fashionable Milanese band, don’t miss out on the opportunity to demonstrate your style and class. There are 3 different bands, with the three different Milanese Mesh bands, so you can choose the one says “you”.

 

STANDS THE TEST OF TIME

Carrying the build of traditional watchmaking, the Simble is a mechanical watch made to last a lifetime. The tiny intricate gears, springs, and sprockets are protected by a stainless steel body which is guaranteed to put up with the same daily stress you do.

 

WATERPROOF - UP TO 50 METERS

The Simble smartwatch can stand up to the pressure. Like the pressure 50 meters of water has.  

 

THE RIGHT TIME ALL THE TIME

No matter where in the world you go the Simble keeps up with you. It automatically adjusts to your time zone, so you’ll never be late for a flight or miss a siesta ever again!

 

FITNESS, SLEEP, AND HEART TRACKING

Get moving with Simble’s fully loaded activity tracker. Keeping an eye on everything from step-counting, distance, to monitoring your heart-rate. It even works when you don't. The advanced sleep monitor tracks your sleep pattern, learns when you sleep and when you wake up and works to give you a more restful night.

 

CUTTING-EDGE BLUETOOTH TECH

The Simble smartwatch is powered by the newest Bluetooth 5.0 technology. Giving you double the speed, quadrupled range, and eight times the connectionless data broadcasts.

 

PHONE NOTIFICATIONS

The Simple watch lets you choose who or what is allowed to interrupt you. Allow the right people to reach you with a gentle vibration. The vibration and the indicator of the watch hands tell you what kind of notification you are receiving. No need to keep an eye on your phone. Distractions are costly, so be picky.

 

KEEP UP-TO-DATE WITHOUT EVEN TRYING

 

The D-MAP app seamlessly connects your Simble to your phone, allowing you to see the data in collects in real time, take photos using your Simble, and access and customize all of the functions available. The app also comes with over-the-air updates to give you the latest functions and to keep the Simble running smoothly. Just tap to accept the download and it will begin.

 

CAMERA CONTROLS

The built-in camera control lets you switch places, from always being the person behind the camera to sharing the moment in front of it. Take a picture from your phone by just shaking your Simble back and forth.

 

PERKS

 

HOW SIMBLE COMPARES

 

HOW FAR WE'VE COME

 

 

OUR SIMBLE ROOTS

Simble is all about creating a smartwatch with modern functionality under a traditional watch design. Thought of and built by Haslip. We formed in January of 2016, originally specializing in healthcare and big data, but our aim was to provide the best services based on personal data. With this in mind we’ve now expanded into integrating personal motion and physical data (PMPD) into an intelligent terminal, creating the Simble smartwatch and the D-MAP mobile app. Our early prototypes were met with healthy excitement and success and we managed to find our initial funding from Chinese backers to create our first prototypes and iron out the design flaws. Now, with an perfected Simble smartwatch, we are hoping to start shipping globally and provide a smartwatch which perfectly blends high functionality into a timeless look.

 

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

 

What is the battery lifetime and model?

The battery lasts up to 250 days and it is a CR2032 button battery.

 

Is it waterproof?

Yes it is waterproof up to 50 m.

 

How does it connect to my phone?

It connects through Bluetooth 5 and through the D-Map app.

 

What app does the Simble connect to?

The D-Map app. It is available for Android and iOS.

 

Do you ship worldwide?

Yes! We are offering FREE shipping worldwide.

 

How long is the watch strap?

The watch straps width is 20mm and the length is versatile. We can change it to fit whatever size you need.

 

What is the diameter of the watch face?

The diameter of the watch face is 40 mm.

 

Can I change the strap?

Yes you can.

 

Is it necessary for the Simble to be connected to my phone all the time?
No. The Simble can store up to 30 days of data onto its internal memory. However being disconnected from bluetooth will affect some functions.

 

Does the watch have memory to collect activity and sleep data when it is not paired with the app?

Yes, the Simble has an internal memory and can store up to 30 days of tracking info on it without connecting/syncing and transferring this data to your phone.

story:
For a Limited Time Only is an experimental fashion event that explores the novelty of impermanence. It aims to subvert the commercial aspect of the phrase and focus on the ephemeral nature of performative art. With 15 individual collections showcased through fashion, dance, puppetry and performance, it’s a night you don’t want to miss!


This event is the annual creation of the MICA Fiber Department’s year-long course, Multimedia Event. All aspects of the show are designed, directed, and produced by members of the class.

 

We would like to raise at least $4,000 for our event. The majority of this money will go towards paying for our location, the Baltimore War Memorial in downtown Baltimore. This location will cost us approximately $2,000 to rent for the time we need. The other funds will be used to rent lighting & sound equipment (≈ $700), risers (≈ 1,300), and merchandising. We have created some great perks for you! These include tote bags and t-shirts, photographic prints of our work, and even a VIP experience at the show!

Any contribution is greatly appreciated!

Keep checking back on this page for more information about different designers, their work, and where to buy tickets for the show.

 

For a Limited Time Only: An Experimental Fashion Event

April 22, 2017

5pm & 8:30pm 

Baltimore War Memorial

101 N Gay St #D, Baltimore, MD 21202

 

Featuring the work of:

Alessandra Vasi

Alie Medina-Fetterman

Alisa Glenn

Alison Baskerville

Amanda Elie

Arooj Qamar

Ashley Lian

Babs Weiss

Brit Kolich

Carol Chu

Caroline Smouse 

Cindy Perdomo

Demetra Maheras

Erica Oh

Suwan Kim
story_txt: For a Limited Time Only is an experimental fashion event that explores the novelty of impermanence. It aims to subvert the commercial aspect of the phrase and focus on the ephemeral nature of performative art. With 15 individual collections showcased through fashion, dance, puppetry and performance, it’s a night you don’t want to miss!This event is the annual creation of the MICA Fiber Department’s year-long course, Multimedia Event. All aspects of the show are designed, directed, and produced by members of the class. We would like to raise at least $4,000 for our event. The majority of this money will go towards paying for our location, the Baltimore War Memorial in downtown Baltimore. This location will cost us approximately $2,000 to rent for the time we need. The other funds will be used to rent lighting & sound equipment (≈ $700), risers (≈ 1,300), and merchandising. We have created some great perks for you! These include tote bags and t-shirts, photographic prints of our work, and even a VIP experience at the show!Any contribution is greatly appreciated!Keep checking back on this page for more information about different designers, their work, and where to buy tickets for the show. For a Limited Time Only: An Experimental Fashion EventApril 22, 20175pm & 8:30pm Baltimore War Memorial101 N Gay St #D, Baltimore, MD 21202 Featuring the work of:Alessandra VasiAlie Medina-FettermanAlisa GlennAlison BaskervilleAmanda ElieArooj QamarAshley LianBabs WeissBrit KolichCarol ChuCaroline Smouse Cindy PerdomoDemetra MaherasErica OhSuwan Kim

story:
Website         Instagram           Twitter         Facebook


Risks & Challenges

At 3RD & HUDSON, we believe in complete transparency.  Our goal is to deliver high quality products that will keep our customers happy.  

We have been working with our factory for about 3 years & have established a trusted working relationship with them.  We will be using their sister factory overseas for our bulk production whom they have built a long term working relationship with over the past few decades.  This is our first bulk production run & we know there can be unexpected delays in the process.  If at any moment we hit a snag that will delay production, we will immediately notify our customers & keep you updated.  We will work day & night to make sure we resolve whatever issues arise in order to get you the best quality product in the most time efficient way.


Special Thanks

We wanted to give special thanks to all of the people that helped make Indiegogo happen for us. Our amazingly talented Videographers/Photographers, Marcelo Pancote & Daniela Bacchim (produtoraframe.com). This brazilian duo worked magic & provided us with great work & were such a pleasure to work with. We would also like to thank the models who participated in the video: Jenni Lubo, Amber Bates, Hadiatou Bah, sweet baby Piper & her parents for allowing us to film in their lovely home. You guys are awesome!

story:
Nova uses a thin, stretchable & flexible, silicon-based material to guide light from one end to another. 



 



The silicon guides redistribute light from two LEDs, spreading the light across a much larger area, making you much more visible. 






 


 

Or get one of these: 

Nova Buddy - Early Bird

Nova 5 pack - Early Bird

 

By ordering now, you’re avoiding the middleman.



 


Sizes & color options will be selected via checkout at perk selection.


 



Nova is brought to you by the same company manufacturing your favorite sportswear brands
 


 

 


 


 

ABOUT           

Why should we use Nova?

Nova is a game-changing jacket for runners, cyclists and other outdoor enthusiasts. It’s a pain to carry a flashlight or to attach the appropriate reflective gear when heading for a night run. Nova allows people to run freely in any weather condition – which means no excuses. Not only does Nova have excellent safety features, it’s comfortable and stylish.

Who created it?

Having closely worked with community of runners and athletes for over 2 years, NOVA was developed by Twinery, the innovation arm of MAS Holdings, one of the largest sports apparel manufacturers globally

Why are you crowdfunding?

We want to take this product to the next level by bringing it to early adopters who would like to experience the product first hand and co-create with us further. And of course, crowdfunding will help us validate and fund our production.

PRODUCT FEATURES

What features are available?

The jacket is seamlessly integrated with four Lightguides, thumbholes, a hideaway hoodie, and a weatherproof phone pocket. 

What colors do you offer?

 The jacket is available in 3 colour options - Black, Grey and Navy Blue

 Is it comfortable / attractive / discreet?

The jacket is lightweight with an airy construction that makes it all weather breathable. The form fit design offers extra comfort and movement with a sleek look. The jacket is styled to be versatile for day as well as night wear. 

 TECH SPECS

What makes Nova unique?

This is the first time ever that LEDs have been seamlessly integrated into your jacket to make them washable and wearable. Powered by a tiny half ounce battery, the LED LightGuide strips illuminate on demand with a click of a button.  

What is the battery life? How easy is it to charge?

The Battery Module will last between 2 and 8 hours on a full charge. The Nova jacket comes with a USB cable that can be used to charge the Battery Module. It takes between 30 and 60 mins to reach full charge.

Is it waterproof?

The Jacket is water-resistant thanks to a DWR finish. The DWR finish prevents rain from saturating the jacket's exterior.

Where is it manufactured?

Nova has partnered with MAS Holdings and Flex. MAS Holdings, is a premier apparel manufacturing company with over 30 years’ experience in designing and developing active-wear solutions. We trust our partners at MAS, to manufacture your Nova jacket, to the highest ethical and quality standards. Flex, a leading electronics manufacturer in US, will produce the certified Battery Module.

SETUP & MAINTENANCE

How do I turn it on and off?

Simply slip the Battery Module into the magnetic Landing Pad. Press the button on the Battery Module to turn the lights on

How do I take care of it?

The NOVA Jacket should be cold washed (86degree F) and hang/line dried. The battery module must be removed from the jacket before it is washed. To clean the Battery Module, use a soft damp cloth or tissue. 

Is it machine washable?

Absolutely! The Nova jacket is machine washable. Simply remove the Battery Module once you are done with your run and it’s safe to machine wash. 

SAFETY AND REGULATION

Is it safe? What certifications do you have?

The Nova jacket is safe and machine washable. Just like any other electronic device you would carry in your pocket, the Nova Battery Module, complies with the following industry safety standards:

  • FCC
  • CE
  • UL 1642
  • UN38.3 + 967
  • IEC 62133
  • REACH report
  • WEEE
  • California Prop 65
  • California CEC

SHIPPING

When does shipping begin?

The first batch of orders will be shipped out as early as March 2018. Orders will be fulfilled in roughly the sequence that they were purchased on Indiegogo.

When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps?

The orders will be delivered by March and latest by May 2018.

Where does it ship?

We will ship only to the US, Canada, UK, Europe and Australia for this Indiegogo campaign. In the future, we hope to make Nova available worldwide.

How much is shipping?

We offer free shipping within the United States.

What are the risks & challenges of getting the device today?

Our team is comprised of seasoned entrepreneurs, tech innovators, supply chain experts & fashion designers with nearly 30+ years of combined experience, so rest assured the jackets will exceed your expectations.

We have done our homework, so the risks are minimal. We have also partnered with the best apparel and technology manufacturers in the industry. Our production lines are scheduled, and we will be able to ship out within 90 days of successful project funding.

What you are seeing in our videos and pictures are working prototypes, so expect the final product to be more polished and of supreme quality. 

 

CUSTOMER SERVICE        

What is your refund policy?

While the Indiegogo campaign is live, all refunds can be rewarded directly Indiegogo. Once the campaign has concluded, refunds will be processed on a case-by-case basis; and we will need to lock refunds to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped. 

What is your return / exchange policy?

If you received your product and you experience any type of defect with either the Jacket or the Battery Module, you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days, less shipping & handling fees.

Why do I have to wait longer than usual?

This is not just pre-orders: You're helping to build the device, and we need to know how many to make before we can start production. This is the first of its kind, and you'll be glad you waited. We will send you updates while we work to produce the first batch.

If I have other questions, who should I contact?

Press: Lauren Cozza <LCozza@uproarpr.com>
Support: Siddharth Amalean hello@wearnova.co

 

-------

What you are seeing are prototypes, so expect the final product to be more polished and of superior quality.

story:
I am a Mechanical Engineer and I recently got a 3D Printer.  I thought that was the end All Be All for being an Engineer with an active Hobby life.  Strangely enough it was not.  My Printer uses an Acrylic building plate. Not that uncommon among the lower priced 3D Printers.  My builds would get stuck to the build plate or not stick at all and get released before the build was complete.

Additionally, I would have to use hard tools to remove the projects from my build plate.  As a result, my build plate very often would get damaged.  I would also lose the part I was creating as well. Giving me some serious buyer’s remorse - and a full project Trash Bin.

To make matters worse, I got little to no help from the manufacturer and I then learned that this is not a unique problem to my 3D Printer... but a wide variety of 3D Printers with hard build plates had the same problems.

Taking that as a challenge, I resolved to find a solution.  I call it 3D EeZ. For the Ease at which ones build can be removed afterwards.  It is very easy to use and is reusable.  Watch the video where we remove a build I had never before been able to build successfully before I came up with 3D EeZ.http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zg1w6dXKHGU  Then ask yourself, "Why didn’t the company I bought my Printer from, not come up with something like this?"

Here is a Video of me applying the 3D EeZ http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=flBy8lY0U24

story:
Our Story

The Nakate Project was launched at the end of 2010. Nakate is an initiative working on the ground in a rural area of Uganda called the Nakasangola district. Nakasangola is known for its poverty, itâ€™s problem with AIDS, malaria and TB, witchcraft, drinking problems, polygamy, prostitution, and for its abuse of women and children.

Because of itâ€™s rural placement, there is a lack of aid in the district, and thus a lack of tourists. So, the women in our district are less developed skill-wise than women in more populated areas of the country because they havenâ€™t had a market to sell to. At the same time, they also have less opportunity business wise, and have been more marginalized than women in more developed areas of the Uganda.

We launched Nakate in Nakasangola on purpose, because we felt that these women, in particular, needed to be noticed and empowered. So, for a year now, weâ€™ve been working to help them grow in their newly acquired skill as jewelry makers. Along the way, weâ€™ve been focusing on helping them to re-construct how they view themselves as women. Instead of poor, diseased, left behind, we want them to see themselves as artisans, designers, business women, and as women that have the power to make choices â€“ choices about where they live, about whether they send their children to school, about where they want to open a bank account, and what theyâ€™d like to do with their money.

The Impact

In February, we will be spending two months on the ground working with the women in our project to expand our reach beyond jewelry to shoes and bags. We'll be helping them to understand quality control as they work to fulfill wholesale orders, and helping train them in time and money management. We will also be implementing the work of several local Rwandan immigrants, as we have them teach our artisans to make tightly woven bags, as well as leather sandals and cow horn jewelry.

What We Need & What You Get

Because we are a company that's still at the grassroots level, we're at the point where we're turning women that would like to work for us away because we just don't have the financial means to take them on as artisans yet. We're growing slowly yet surely, but our lack of funding keeps us from buying a huge amount of items on the ground. We've become the most reliable source of income in Kakooge, and there are women waiting to become part of our program. Our goal on the ground in February is to be able to buy more items and expand our reach. Your funding will help us do that as we work to buy bags, shoes and cow horn items from the women we work with. The money you donate will be used for these purposes exclusively, and will not be put towards travel expenses or other overhead costs.

Other Ways You Can Help

Blog about our campaign

Buy Nakate jewelry: http://nakateproject.com.

Hold a Nakate Party: http://www.nakateproject.com/take-us-with-you/

story:
After the campaign visit us at www.ZipBelt.com

ALL BACKERS WILL RECEIVE THEIR ZIPBELT REGARDLESS IF WE MEET OUR GOAL OR NOT - THE FLEXIBLE FUNDING PLAN.

1) A ratchet style belt that adjusts every ¼ inch with 32 different sizing options. This means no holes and a perfect fit every single time. Adjust the belt throughout the day or week as your weight fluctuates.

2) Built to last a decade. The belt is made from 100% Italian Genuine Leather and the buckle is constructed from Zinc Alloy. The durability and quality far surpasses other adjustable belts. See the side by side comparison below for details

3) More affordable than other adjustable belts. A perfect fitting belt shouldn't cost twice as much as a regular holes belt. Our prices are guaranteed to be at least $20 cheaper than other adjustable belts.

4) Customization and personalization. A belt may be a wardrobe accessory but it still should reflect your personality and interests. Add your favorite college/sports logo, artwork, flag, or anything else to personalize the buckle and belt.

5) Interchangeable buckles. All ZipBelt buckles use the same ratchet system. Easily swap out a buckle for another while keeping the same colored leather belt. ZipBelt is taking accessorizing to a new level.

Like us on Facebook. Follow us on Twitter and YouTube.

ZIPBELT IN THE PRESS AND BLOGS

ZIPBELT WILL BE SOLD IN THE MISSIONARY MALL STORES!

The ZipBelt buckle locks firmly into place on each of the 1/4 inch grooves on the inside of the belt for a perfect fit when feeding the belt through. It works just like a zip tie, hence the name ZipBelt, except it can be loosened when pressing on the lever to release the lock and pulling the belt away from you to your right. See the ZipBelt in action in the photos below or the video above.


The ZipBelt is now available with 3 different belt buckles and 3 different colored leather belt straps depicted in the images below. More buckle styles and belt colors will be added when we meet our IndieGoGo goal and expand the ZipBelt product line.

Traditional belts never have enough size options with only 5 holes or 5 sizes. The ZipBelt adjusts every ¼ inch with 32 different sizing options. In actual waist sizes we can currently offer US Men's sizes 28 - 55 inches.  When we showed the ZipBelt to several of our friends, we had the same resounding reaction about sizes - "It's exactly what I needed - a belt that fluctuates as my weight fluctuates for a perfect fit every time."

In the near future, we will have smaller and larger sizes as we continually expand the ZipBelt product line.

The ZipBelt allows customers to customize belt buckles and leather belts through personalized images, logos, and text. We currently are the ONLY adjustable belt company that offers customization. We've already secured a partnership and agreement with the NCAA, NFL, MLB, NBA, NHL, MLS, and more to add your favorite sports team logos on the ZipBelt buckles.

Also we're partnering with Universities across the USA to allow mascots to be placed on the face of the buckle. Create any high resolution artwork, send us a vector file of the artwork, and we'll engrave it on the buckle or leather belt strap. It's that simple and it's what sets us apart from the competition! *(See Disclaimer at the bottom of this page)

If you order a customized ZipBelt, we will send you a survey at the end of the Indiegogo to get your info and image and get your customization started.

Sun Choi - As my parents are entrepreneurs, I too started as an entrepreneur at the age of 14 detailing cars in my neighborhood. From there, I started several different businesses on the side during my free time while still learning from the successes and failures of my parents' businesses. I recently sold my web design company (one of the largest in the State of Utah for small to medium sized businesses) to focus on ZipBelt and in 2011 sold a Men's Wedding Bands e-commerce company.

Casey Choi - My Father is my partner for the ZipBelt and helps me with the day to day operations along with negotiations for securing vendors for the ZipBelt. He is a successful entrepreneur and currently owns a multi-million dollar company in the restaurant and food services industry.

Matt Schramer - Video Director, Graphic Designer, Marketing Manager, and owner of Schramer Films, a video production company that specializes in capturing the making of a product and promoting a product through video. He produced the Indiegogo video, designed the Indiegogo page, and took all product photos. Also Matt manages all marketing efforts for ZipBelt, including the Indiegogo, PR, blog articles, and Social Media.

Nixon Pierre - Owner of BeautahfulCreations.com and partner for expanding the product line for ZipBelt in NCAA, NFL, MLB, NBA, NHL, MLS, and more! Nixon is a successful entrepreneur and owner of multiple companies.

Josh Nelson- Josh has worked in business development and as an entrepreneur for multiple corporations. Josh manages all leads with online retailers and local shops, plus manages posts to community forums and discussion groups. He also wants to note that he looks devilishly handsome in his ZipBelt :). 

Jordan Liau - Jordan is supervising all social media efforts for ZipBelt across Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, and Instagram. He works with Matt to improve visibility of the ZipBelt and larger viral appeal.

We've already had a couple test runs of the ZipBelt manufactured and shipped to us and have had an overwhelming response from the community to produce more. Your support will help us to secure the minimum order quantity set by the factory as well as to have the items shipped to us within 1 week of manufacturing completion. We want to make sure that these belts are in all of our Indiegogo supporters' hands before Christmas (in the USA only). As already noted, the product has been designed, developed, manufactured, and fully tested. Packaging has also been completed as well and shipping has been secured through FedEx. Customs has also been ironed out as we've received a couple shipments of the ZipBelt.

Our factory can produce up to 10,000 belts per month, so we believe that we will be more than ready to fulfill all orders on IndieGoGo . The factory will manufacture all of the belts, package them, and label them according to size. They will then ship it to us by FedEx express shipping to Los Angeles, which will then clear customs and be shipped to our headquarters in Utah. As all ZipBelts will be packaged in an individual gift box and labeled by size and color, we will then ship it directly to YOU, our loyal Indiegogo backer. 

  • The belts and buckles are designed. Prototypes were made and tested. Now the belts are ready for the first production run.
  • A partnership with a reliable manufacturer has been formed. Shipping times and costs have been tested.
  • The "engraving" customization has been tested and perfected.
  • The ZipBelt website has been setup to take additional direct orders once the Indiegogo is complete.
  • Negotiations with local and online distributors have begun and will hopefully be solidified during the Indiegogo.

This is where you come in and how you can help. Your pledges will directly go toward expanding the available ZipBelt buckle designs and belt colors, help design and manufacture a ZipBelt for women, and pay for the the machine that will print customized designs on the face of the buckle and on the leather belt.

After the Indiegogo campaign, the various styles of ZipBelt will likely retail for $15-25 more than the Indiegogo price. We believe in rewarding loyal supporters by giving them a superior product and saving them money.

Thank You SO much for the support! We're positive you will love your ZipBelt more than any other belt. If you can't support ZipBelt by purchasing a belt, you can still help us out! Please share the ZipBelt Indiegogo http://igg.me/at/zipbelt/x/5155526 on Facebook and Twitter.

If you have any additional questions about the ZipBelt, please contact us through either the Indiegogo messaging system or our contact form on the website - http://www.zipbelt.com/contact/

*The BYU Sailor Cougar Logo is a registered trademark with Brigham Young University and their respective partners. Logo is used for illustration purposes only to show the detail of the customization feature. Negotiations are in place for licensing of college mascots and eventually pro sports teams across.
story_txt:
After the campaign visit us at www.ZipBelt.comALL BACKERS WILL RECEIVE THEIR ZIPBELT REGARDLESS IF WE MEET OUR GOAL OR NOT - THE FLEXIBLE FUNDING PLAN.
1) A ratchet style belt that adjusts every ¼ inch with 
32 different sizing options. This means no holes and a perfect fit every
 single time. Adjust the belt throughout the day or week as your weight 
fluctuates.2) Built to last a decade. The belt is made 
from 100% Italian Genuine Leather and the buckle is constructed from 
Zinc Alloy. The durability and quality far surpasses other adjustable 
belts. See the side by side comparison below for details
3) More affordable than other adjustable belts. A
 perfect fitting belt shouldn't cost twice as much as a regular holes 
belt. Our prices are guaranteed to be at least $20 cheaper than other 
adjustable belts.
4) Customization and personalization. A 
belt may be a wardrobe accessory but it still should reflect your 
personality and interests. Add your favorite college/sports logo, 
artwork, flag, or anything else to personalize the buckle and belt.
5) Interchangeable buckles. All
 ZipBelt buckles use the same ratchet system. Easily swap out a buckle 
for another while keeping the same colored leather belt. ZipBelt is 
taking accessorizing to a new level.
Like us on Facebook. Follow us on Twitter and YouTube.
ZIPBELT IN THE PRESS AND BLOGS


ZIPBELT WILL BE SOLD IN THE MISSIONARY MALL STORES!





The ZipBelt buckle locks firmly into place on each of the 1/4 inch 
grooves on the inside of  the belt for a perfect fit when feeding the 
belt through. It works just like a zip tie, hence the name ZipBelt, 
except it can be loosened when pressing on the lever to release the lock
 and pulling the belt away from you to your right. See the ZipBelt in 
action in the photos below or the video above.




The ZipBelt is now available with 3 different belt buckles and 3 
different colored leather belt straps depicted in the images below. More
 buckle styles and belt colors will be added when we meet our IndieGoGo goal and expand the ZipBelt product line.


Traditional belts never have enough size options with only 5 holes or
 5 sizes. The ZipBelt adjusts every ¼ inch with 32 different sizing 
options. In actual waist sizes we can currently offer US Men's sizes 28 - 55 inches. 
 When we showed the ZipBelt to several of our friends, we had the same 
resounding reaction about sizes - "It's exactly what I needed - a belt 
that fluctuates as my weight fluctuates for a perfect fit every time."
In the near future, we will have smaller and larger sizes as we continually expand the ZipBelt product line.



The ZipBelt allows customers to customize belt buckles and leather 
belts through personalized images, logos, and text. We currently are the
 ONLY adjustable belt company that offers customization. We've already 
secured a partnership and agreement with the NCAA, NFL, MLB, NBA, NHL, MLS, and more to add your favorite sports team logos on the ZipBelt buckles. 
Also
 we're partnering with Universities across the USA to allow mascots to 
be placed on the face of the buckle. Create any high resolution artwork,
 send us a vector file of the artwork, and we'll engrave it on the 
buckle or leather belt strap. It's that simple and it's what sets us 
apart from the competition! *(See Disclaimer at the bottom of this page)
If you order a customized ZipBelt, we will send you a survey at the end of the Indiegogo to get your info and image and get your customization started.





Sun Choi - As my parents are entrepreneurs, I too started as 
an entrepreneur at the age of 14 detailing cars in my neighborhood. From
 there, I started several different businesses on the side during my 
free time while still learning from the successes and failures of my 
parents' businesses. I recently sold my web design company (one of the 
largest in the State of Utah for small to medium sized businesses) to 
focus on ZipBelt and in 2011 sold a Men's Wedding Bands e-commerce 
company. 
Casey Choi - My Father is my partner for the 
ZipBelt and helps me with the day to day operations along with 
negotiations for securing vendors for the ZipBelt. He is a successful 
entrepreneur and currently owns a multi-million dollar company in the 
restaurant and food services industry.
Matt Schramer - 
Video Director, Graphic Designer, Marketing Manager, and owner of 
Schramer Films, a video production company that specializes in capturing
 the making of a product and promoting a product through video. He 
produced the Indiegogo video, designed the Indiegogo page, and took 
all product photos. Also Matt manages all marketing efforts for ZipBelt,
 including the Indiegogo, PR, blog articles, and Social Media. 
Nixon Pierre - Owner of BeautahfulCreations.com
 and partner for expanding the product line for ZipBelt in NCAA, NFL, 
MLB, NBA, NHL, MLS, and more! Nixon is a successful entrepreneur and 
owner of multiple companies. 
Josh Nelson- Josh has worked in business development and as an entrepreneur for multiple corporations. Josh manages all leads with online retailers and local shops, plus manages posts to community forums and discussion groups. He also wants to note that he looks devilishly handsome in his ZipBelt :). 
Jordan Liau - Jordan is supervising all social media efforts for ZipBelt across Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, and Instagram. He works with Matt to improve visibility of the ZipBelt and larger viral appeal.












We've already had a couple test runs of the ZipBelt manufactured
 and shipped to us and have had an overwhelming response from the 
community to produce more. Your support will help us to secure the 
minimum order quantity set by the factory as well as to have the items 
shipped to us within 1 week of manufacturing completion. We want to make
 sure that these belts are in all of our Indiegogo supporters' hands before 
Christmas (in the USA only). As already noted, the product has been 
designed, developed, manufactured, and fully tested. Packaging has also 
been completed as well and shipping has been secured through FedEx. 
Customs has also been ironed out as we've received a couple shipments of
 the ZipBelt. 
Our factory can produce up to 10,000 belts per month, so 
we believe that we will be more than ready to fulfill all orders on IndieGoGo . The factory will manufacture all of the belts, package 
them, and label them according to size. They will then ship it to us by 
FedEx express shipping to Los Angeles, which will then clear customs and
 be shipped to our headquarters in Utah. As all ZipBelts will be 
packaged in an individual gift box and labeled by size and color, we 
will then ship it directly to YOU, our loyal Indiegogo backer. 



The belts and buckles are designed. Prototypes were made and tested. Now the belts are ready for the first production run.
A partnership with a reliable manufacturer has been formed. Shipping times and costs have been tested.
The "engraving" customization has been tested and perfected.
The ZipBelt website has been setup to take additional direct orders once the Indiegogo is complete. 
Negotiations with local and online distributors have begun and will hopefully be solidified during the Indiegogo.

This is where you come in and how you can help. Your pledges 
will directly go toward expanding the available ZipBelt buckle designs 
and belt colors, help design and manufacture a ZipBelt for women, and 
pay for the the machine that will print customized designs on the face 
of the buckle and on the leather belt. 
After the Indiegogo 
campaign, the various styles of ZipBelt will likely retail for $15-25 more 
than the Indiegogo price. We believe in rewarding loyal supporters by 
giving them a superior product and saving them money.


Thank You SO much for the support! We're positive you will love your 
ZipBelt more than any other belt. If you can't support ZipBelt by purchasing a belt, you can still help us out! Please share the ZipBelt Indiegogo http://igg.me/at/zipbelt/x/5155526 on Facebook and Twitter.
If you have any additional questions 
about the ZipBelt, please contact us through either the Indiegogo 
messaging system or our contact form on the website - http://www.zipbelt.com/contact/*The
 BYU Sailor Cougar Logo is a registered trademark with Brigham Young 
University and their respective partners. Logo is used for illustration 
purposes only to show the detail of the customization feature. 
Negotiations are in place for licensing of college mascots and 
eventually pro sports teams across.

story:
Comrades,

Let's take the fight to Cancer!

I'm competing in the Virgin Active London Triathlon on the 27th of July - http://www.thelondontriathlon.co.uk/

I've decided to dedicate my efforts to Cancer Research UK as this is a cause which has always been close to my heart. There have been significant breakthroughs in this field of late and I believe us to be in the brink of a new era in the fight against this insatiable disease which has come knocking with at too many of our doors.

If ever you've witnessed the brunt of cancer's afflictions and the  devastation caused by it's subsequent fallout you are well aware of how worthy a cause this is. As I've already said, cancer is on the backfoot, and I ask you to please lend your strength in helping to push cancer out of all our lives forever. Your contribution, no matter how small, could be the tipping point in this battle.

I have spent months preparing for this event and am determined to push myself to my absolute limits on Saturday the 27th.

Thank you all so much for taking the time to read this! 

We're coming for you Cancer!

David McGuinness

story:
THE COLLECTION → all pictures at the bottom of this page

It simply does not exist yet, real fashion with the European flag. The only EU clothing we saw was uninspired and awful; poorly made advertising t-shirts. During the past year we have worked hard to make a change. We designed a prototype collection for every age, taste and occasion. Sometimes a bold statement, sometimes more subtle. 

We intend to make the collection even more varied over the coming months. It all depends on the amount of funding we can raise. 

BUY A VOUCHER

Buy a voucher now. We are not yet sure if the collection will be available to the general public after the crowdfunding campaign ends. It all depends on the amount of funding we can raise. 

The voucher you buy will be valid on the whole collection, available through a web-shop. You choose whatever you like. After a purchase, any remainder of the vouchers value will be usable in a next purchase.

To thank you for your early support we like to give you a discount. Check out the different perks to see how much you can save. 

WHAT WILL THE CLOTHING COST?

We will not only make quality and sustainable clothing, we aim to make it affordable as well. That's why we are trying to raise as much crowdfunding as possible. It is logical, if we can produce in large numbers, the costs will go down and we can lower the prices. Join the mission and help us advertise :)

Above every picture you will find a realistic target price (all pictures at the bottom of this page). 

WHEN WILL THE COLLECTION BE AVAILABLE?

The designs are ready, we only have to make a deal with the manufacturer based on the success of this campaign and the related amount of clothing we want to have produced. We estimate the clothing will be ready early spring 2018.

WHY FASHION WITH THE EU FLAG?

We want to reclaim our name. Being European does not mean you are a bureaucrat in Brussels. It is not a political position. It's a sense of togetherness, not based on origin, nationality nor opinion. It's you and it's me. It's a response to the recent hate. Ignore cynicism, we feel European and we are proud of it! 

WHAT'S THE UNTIMATE GOAL?

First let us tell you what is not aiming for. We don't intend to make any money on this project. We just want to bring fashion with the European flag to life. If this crowdfunding campaign proves a success, we might even be able to convince big clothing stores to join us and include the 'EU flag clothing' in their collection. Imagine, fashion with the European flag in stores all over the continent or the globe. Accessible to all. It's our ultimate goal and we are willing to invest all the collected funding to achieve it.

HELP US PROMOTE! #euflagfashion

We can't do it without you. Join the mission! Share, tweet, like and talk. On the top of this page you will find the various 'social media buttons'. It's important to not only share the link, but to also write something about it. Apparently not many people click on a link that is not introduced. :)

Facebook - Twitter - Instagram 

Thank you! Let's awaken our European stars...

ABOUT THE MAKERS

Senne Dehandschutter, a film director from Belgium, is the founder of this project. He feels passionate about Europe's future and wants to wear some stylish clothing with the European flag. After searching the internet and scouring shops he had to admit defeat. The only EU clothing he found was uninspired and awful. He gathered some friends and together they are trying to make a change. Would you like to join?

CONTACT

Contact us with any questions: crowdfunding@euflagfashion.com

 

THE COLLECTION

(see chapter 'WHAT WILL THE CLOTHING COST?')

scarf | unisex | € 30to40

dungarees | € 60to70

hoodie | unisex | € 50to60

jumper | € 50to60

t-shirts | unisex | € 20to30

polo | € 40to50

coat | € 110to120

shirts | € 50to60

long shirt | € 50to60

blouse | € 40to50

shirt child | € 40to50

jeans | unisex | € 70to80

short | € 50to60

bomber | unisex | € 60to70 

jeans jacket | unisex | € 70to80 

dress | € 70to80 

belt | € 60to70 

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Will the collection be produced sustainably?

What we sincerely intend to do: make it in Europe.

What we guarantee: it will not be produced by exploiting people in sweatshops (or any way) and it will be produced in a sustainable way.

Will the collection be available worldwide?

We will ship to most countries. If you live in a remote area, send us an email to double-check. If you have bought a voucher and we can't deliver, you will get a refund. Note that the shipping costs could be higher to countries outside of Europe.

Email: crowdfunding@euflagfashion.com

Can I contact 'EU Flag Fashion' with B2B questions and proposals?

Yes, we're happy to have a conversation with you!

Email: crowdfunding@euflagfashion.com

What if we don't get the minimum amount of funding needed to make the collection?

We need a minimum of 10.000 euro. If we don't achieve this goal by the end of the crowdfunding campaign, everybody will be paid back instantaneously and automatically by Indiegogo.

Is this project linked to a political party?

No. This project is not politically inspired, we have no political connections and we have no political (or any) funding. We are just some wackadoodles with a passion for Europe and a crazy plan.

Note that the shipping costs could be higher to countries outside of Europe.Email: crowdfunding@euflagfashion.comCan I contact 'EU Flag Fashion' with B2B questions and proposals?Yes, we're happy to have a conversation with you!Email: crowdfunding@euflagfashion.comWhat if we don't get the minimum amount of funding needed to make the collection?We need a minimum of 10.000 euro. story:
Hello Everyone,


I have two campaigns going on! One is for me to attend September 2012 Brooklyn Fashion Weekend which my deadline to register as a Headline Designer ends in August 31, 2012 as their are only 4 openings left my time is running short. The registration fee is keeping me from achieving this dream which if not registered with 50% deposit I cannot participate.

My second campaign is for D'NALEL DESIGNS Storefront Design Boutique on Wheels which ends in December 2012! Please check out both campaigns as both are two dreams that with your help I can make come true! Thanks for your support & patronage! Below is little bio about me details about fund usage!

 

Inspired by my love for Interior Design, Fabrics, Home Décor,  and all things Victorian, I breathed life into D’nalel Designs. D'nalel Designs is a small independent company founded in 2008 before the birth of my son Leland.  The name D'nalel is Leland spelled backwards. (PRONUNCIATION: D-NA-LEL).

I'm known for my “Retro” style, which includes the 80's, Shabby Chic, Victorian, and Vintage clothing. I integrate a broad style mix of vintage elements with modern and practical recycling, which makes them unique, custom handcrafted home décor elements. My eye for design emerged when I was little, watching my mother often rearrange furniture and re-decorate our home.  While attending Suffolk University New England School of Art & Design I was chosen to design a bedroom on an episode of HGTV Designer Finals. After attending school, I worked in the Interior Design Field, with retail chains like Ethan Allen.

  My love for fabrics led me to create my own pocketbook line named "Victorian Vintage" & Cultural Fusions" which are elegant clutches adorned with home decor fringe trim. "Victorian Vintage" has been seen in the hands of a few celebrities, graced fashion blogs and fashion magazines. This campaign is important to me because it will allow me to make two dreams into reality. The funds raised will allow me to be a Headline Designer for Brooklyn Fashion Weekend September 2012, which is an awesome opportunity because my handbag designs will walk the runway and could give me a chance to feature my designs NYC Mercedes-Benz Fashion Week 2013. The registration fee is keeping me from achieving this dream which if not registered by August 30, I cannot participate.  Please keep reading on to see breakdown of funds needed and detailed description of Brooklyn Fashion Weekend. Thanks for your time and patronage! If you cannot patronize, please spread the word of my campaign and use the IndieGoGo share links.

 

Registration Fees Breakdown
 
 *Headline Designers (Opening designer for each evening)
$2000 Registration Fee - **only (4) openings available**
15-22 Looks per designer
Designer name/bio and picture will be included in the event program and on our website (with a link to the designer’s website) which will be seen by the press/media, buyers, fashion bloggers, stylists and fashionistas.
Our fashion team (Fashion Director, Hair and make-up, Backstage Director and dressers) will work and coordinate with you to ensure a cohesive show.
All of our casted and agencies models will be assigned to walk in your show. (Although you can select your own models, our Creative Director must approve each model).
Your design/company info will be included on the front seats and in our gift bags (an option to include your look book is also available).
8 VIP Guest tickets (including all after-parties)
One edited video of your runway show (photographs is not included)
We will provide a dedicated staff to ensure the event will be an exclusive networking opportunity (with invited buyers and press at the event).
All Show Packages Includes:
The BK STYLE Foundation will provide the venue and a full production crew, sound, staging, lighting, marketing materials including an event program, DJ and security. RUNWAY PICTURES AND VIDEO COST IS NOT INCLUDED
 
 
*Premiere Designers- $1200 Registration Fee
10-15 looks per designer
Designer name/bio and picture will be included in the event program and on our website (with a link to the designer’s website) which will be seen by the press/media, buyers, fashion bloggers, stylists and fashionistas.
Our fashion team (Fashion Director, Hair and make-up, Backstage Director and dressers) will work and coordinate with you to ensure a cohesive show.
All of our casted and agencies models will be assigned to walk in your show. (Although you can select your own models, our Creative Director must approve each model).
Your design/company info will be included on the front seats and in our gift bags.
4 VIP Guest tickets (including all after-parties)
All Show Packages Includes:
The BK STYLE Foundation will provide the venue and a full production crew, sound, staging, lighting, marketing materials including an event program, DJ and security. RUNWAY PICTURES AND VIDEO COST IS NOT INCLUDED

story:
New Perk - Spiro Bikewear Top

After listening to comments I've introduced this performance cycling top. Featuring COOL-DRY moisture wicking fabric to keep skin cool and comfortable. One design only in Aqua/Black with the 'HGV' logo. Men's and women's sizes available.  

                  

   See article                                              See article


Cyclists who ride in congested cities are naturally concerned about safety. On most occasions we stay ‘curb side’ to avoid the potential of a head on collision. Gladly, in London TfL have supported this by establishing green or blue cycle lanes.

Unfortunately casualties are still too high with many cyclists deaths caused by lorries turning left. These collisions are not deliberate and many haulage owners try to help by plastering yellow signs on their lorries to warn cyclists against filtering on the inside even though the highway code allows it.

To raise awareness of this issue I’ve decided to create some signage of my own and have designed 3 cool tee shirts.

                The HGV                                 The Lorry                                The Bus 

The Shirts

I’ve sourced 100 percent cotton tee shirts and produced these three designs. They look great on or off the  bike. I’ve got sizing covered and can offer small to double XL. If I reach my target I will write to every contributor giving more detail about sizing and ask for your choice.

Superior quality, 100% Belcoro yarn cotton for a softer feel and durability.

The Charity

I’ve joined up with a great charity called Roadpeace who support families of road crash victims as well as campaign for safer roads. 

The Sad Facts - UK

source ; RoSPA

Who am I?

Hi I'm Joseph. I am an 18 year old student, passionate about bringing cycling casualties to the forefront of people's attention and promoting a mutually safer road environment for users. I am both a cyclist and a driver and understand there are issues on both sides that can contribute towards collisions. However the issue I have is that the government and haulage businesses in particular believe they can solve these issues with very aggressive anti-cyclist signs. These usually sound like: "CYCLISTS stay back" or similar. This inspired me to create the Redacted T-Shirt campaign, kicking back at these ridiculous vehicle signs.
   

What We Need & What You Get

The more pledges I can get, the more money goes to charity. Its that simple. I've included an early bird perk for the first 30 shirts in each design which is nearly a 20% discount. There's also a perk for people who wish to support me.

The Impact

Our named charity beneficiary is RoadPeace. You can learn more about their charity on their website at http://www.roadpeace.org/ and see the impact that your pledges will have.

Other Ways You Can Help 

If you cannot make a pledge, the best way to help me and the success of this campaign is to share it and get it out there for people to see. Thank you and enjoy redacted clothing.

story:
About us, and the hat

Elijah Newman is a senior at Puget Sound Community School, and for his senior project, he's linked with Joshua Darlington to create a limited run minimalist baseball cap. Manufactured by Ebbets Field Flannels, the cap has a high focus on quality, and a clean, versatile design. 

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise at least $700, which will make a minimum run of 24 hats. Anything raised above that will simply go towards making a larger number! We're excited that our minimum for project success is this achievable, and can't wait to share that excitement with you. You can see our offered perks on this page, where you can pre-order the project. The wool, hardware, and leather used by Ebbets are all of the highest quality, and made in the USA. All of your money will be used to make as many hats as possible, and we will sell any surplus product on a web store (coming soon!)  after fulfilling all Indiegogo support.

Why would you help US?

By supporting our campaign, you're helping two young entrepreneurs complete an exciting project, and further our exploration into the world of fashion, design, and marketing.

What could go wrong?

Our most obvious challenge is our age. We're 16 and 17, and our lack of experience is the largest obstacle is our way. To combat this, we've roped in several experienced adult advisors with experience in design, marketing, and entrepreneurship. We feel that most of our challenges have been minimized, aside from this being a relatively risk free campaign.

So you're broke?

If you can't help us monetarily, share our project with anyone you think might appreciate it! Any way to spread the word is fantastic, and helps us gain more exposure.

We sincerely appreciate anything that you can do, from the smallest share to the biggest donation. 

Hope to see you soon!

-Elijah and Joshua

story:
Check the weather, browse local restaurants, make phone calls, reply to messages, or call an Uber. Just say, “Ok, Tico.”

 

 

Access all the things you need with just a swipe on Ticwatch 2’s cubic user interface.

 

Signature patented side touch strip. Scroll, select, and zoom without ever covering your screen.

 

Innovative gesture control. Flip your wrist to make a quick phone call or activate voice interaction. Knock the watch twice to shuffle songs.

 

Dim the watch to stealth mode with just a press of the palm.

 

 

Health & Fitness

Ticwatch 2’s powerful sensors precisely track real-time heart rate data, speed, distance, and GPS location. No need to bring your phone when going out for a run; Ticwatch 2 will save and share your activity with your phone and Google Fit! Sync with Bluetooth headphones to listen to music on the go.

 

Business & Notifications

With voice interaction, you can now set notifications, reminders, and calendar appointments within seconds. The days of manual entries are behind us.

 

Hands Free Assistance

Never put your safety in jeopardy. While driving, simply flip your wrist to answer or hang up a phone call. Play phone calls out loud with Ticwatch 2’s built-in speaker. Use flip gesture to activate voice interaction and search for information on the go.

 

TIC - Time in Control. Our in-house developed Ticwear OS allows easy navigation through information and built-in apps, and offers connectivity with your iPhone or Android device, and features its own app store with frequent OTA updates and a growing developer community!

Inspired by architectural philosophy, Cubic UI is a 4-way in-depth user interface that enables easy navigation among countless information: notification, quick cards, the app list, music control, voice search and more.

Apps and Features

Ticwatch 2 pre-loads a series of useful apps, including “Dialer,” “Calendar,” “Health,” “Fitness,” and many more. These apps were designed specifically for optimal smartwatch functionality. You can even use “Find my phone” to locate your phone from your watch!

Compatible with iPhone and Android

We have heard your prayers for an alternative to the apple watch. So we worked hard to bring you the Ticwatch 2, compatible with both iPhone and Android! 

*System requirement: iOS 8.0 and Android 4.3+

Currently Supported Apps (work in progress)

Pre-installed apps (for both Android and iOS): Dialer, Calendar, Health (including heart rate, steps etc), Fitness, Weather, Calculator, Stopwatch, Timer, Recorder, Alarm, Music control, Find My Phone. 

Voice Search (both Android and iOS): Uber, Yelp, POI, Joke, Weather, etc.

Android: Notification of SMS, Facebook Messenger, Whatsapp, Gmail, etc. [Full Notification Display and Voice Reply]

iOS: Notifications of SMS, Facebook Messenger, Whatsapp, Gmail, etc. [Full Display]

Ticwear App Store

You can also download more Ticwear apps through the Ticwear App Store on your Android device. iOS users will gain access to more built-in apps and features through frequent OTA updates.

Write Apps for Ticwear

You can also write your own apps for Ticwear! Ticwear provides open API (mostly compatible with Android Wear API) as well as more Ticwear-specific ones, including “Tickle API,” “Gesture API,” “Voice API,” and more. Please visit our developer website for more information.

Frequent OTA Updates

The Ticwear OS Global Edition has been refined over 5 versions since May 2016, with the continued devotion of our tester community. We are committed to listening to you, our community, and look forward to improving the OS even more with your help.

A watch should look like a watch. We forged Ticwatch 2 in collaboration with world class designers, including award-winning Scandinavian designer, Mika Nenonen. Our relentless dedication toward the perfection of every detail has allowed us to successfully combine both functionality and fashion. Our design reflects the principles that we persist: simplicity, quality, and craftsmanship.

Invisible Tickle

Tickle, inherited from Ticwatch first generation's signature design, co-designed with frog , is the side touch strip that allows users to control screens, slide app menus, zoom in and out, and control volume.

The Ticwatch 2 built on this foundation to further improve material and sensor integration. We are proud to announce the Ticwatch 2 Tickle, invisible, with a smoother touch experience.

Watch Faces For Every Occasion

Download countless more from the Ticwear App Store and even design your own.

Personalize Your Bands

No tools required, just use your fingers.

 

 

Our Team

Our team, small but full-stack, comprises of AI researchers, software developers, hardware engineers, and product to market practitioners. We’ve innovated in companies like Google, Microsoft, Nokia, and hail from prestigious universities around the globe (Harvard, Stanford, Oxford, Cambridge, MIT, Tsinghua, and more).

Though diverse in background, our team is unified in our vision: to bring the delight in “AI inside” to users around the world!

Building in-house, AI empowered, software and hardware is not easy, especially in such a category as new as wearables, but we know this is the only way we'll be able to deliver true innovations powered by AI technologies.

Join Ticwatch Global Community

We care about user experience and the best way to create a user friendly product is to closely work with our users. Join our Facebook group and tell us how you like it and how we can make Ticwatch 2 better!

Ways to contact us

1.  Submit your questions and inquiries using FAQ page 
2. Join our Ticwatch 2 Facebook Group.
 

Press Kit

If you are a member of the press and need more resources, please download our press kit or reach us at pr@mobvoi.com

Disclaimers

Notifications and phone calls: Ticwatch 2 can only receive notifications and make phone calls when connected via Bluetooth to a smartphone (please refer to FAQ “Does Ticwatch 2 work with both iOS and Android?” for supported device) with valid call and internet plan.

Heart rate monitor: Ticwatch 2 is not designed as medical device and you should not rely on the accuracy of heart rate data for any purpose, especially for medical or health purposes. 

Battery life: Your actual battery life will vary according to your personal settings, your rate and duration of use. 

Uber: You must have your Uber account linked to Ticwear companion app to be able to use it with your Ticwatch 2. Use of third party services is subject to the service’s own terms and conditions. 

Volcanic charger stand: Every Ticwatch 2 package will have a standard magnetic wireless charging dock inside. However, volcanic charger stand is only provided in Ticwatch 2 Onyx. 

Strap: The Strap of Ticwatch 2 is made from liquid silicon rubber for Charcoal and Snow, genuine leather for Oak and steel for Onyx. We can not guarantee that our watch strap will not cause any skin allergy. It is recommended that you consult with your doctors if you are skin-sensitive. 

Flip & Knock: You need to enable gestures in Ticwatch 2 settings (settings->gestures ) to use Flip & Knock

Risks and challenges

We are currently working hard at our software iterations with our seed users, consolidating production plan and coordination 3rd party vendors, e.g. international logistics. However, we still would like to inform you certain risks and challenges. 

International Logistics Risk 
Our watches include lithium batteries, which make them more difficult to ship. The speed and price of the shipping may vary with the number of units we deliver to each country.

Supply Chain Risk 
We’ve spent the past two years building a very capable supply chain team. However, component delays and unexpected shortages can occur. If this happens, we’ll be sure to keep you informed and try our best to quickly solve the problem.

FAQ

Please visit our FAQ page

Warranty

Please visit our Limited Warranty Policy
