story:
Give Your Dog a ‘Voice’ with Petpuls

Petpuls is an AI-powered dog collar that gives your dog a ‘voice’. The Petpuls system utilizes a smart collar and an accompanying iOS or Android app to analyze your dog’s emotional state as well as its physical well-being — allowing you to better understand and manage your dog’s entire lifespan. 

Petpuls utilizes voice recognition technology to analyze your dog’s emotional well-being, and also functions as an activity tracker with a built-in accelerometer sensor that calculates the number of calories burned from exercise. 

Our patent-pending, AI-enabled voice recognition technology uses a proprietary algorithm in combination with a database of more than 10K bark samples from 50 breeds of dogs in four different sizes to detect and determine the five different emotional states of your dog — happy, relaxed, anxious, angry or sad.

As the dog’s ‘voice’ data is accumulated, Petpuls’ AI-driven database grows even more accurate, helping you to better understand your dog’s emotions, what triggers them and manage its 10-15+ year lifespan. 

The AI-powered Dog Collar

The eco-friendly, silicone Petpuls dog collar strap comes in safety orange by default. It pairs with the Petpuls smartphone app, iOS or Android. 

Big or small, we’ve got you covered. The Petpuls collar comes with an adjustable strap available in two sizes (15. 75”/40 cm and 31.5”/80 cm).

 

Always fashionable. Additional straps are available in five colors: orange, turquoise, blue, hot pink and green. Detachable and interchangeable, your best friend will always fit the mood with unique color combinations.  

The Petpuls Smartphone App

The Petpuls collar pairs via Wi-Fi with our iOS or Android smartphone app, which displays and tracks your dog’s emotional state and physical activity. 

Tell us how you really feel. The Petpuls app gives pet parents insight into their dog’s emotional well-being. Using AI-powered ‘voice’ recognition, Petpuls identifies five different emotional statuses of your dog, including: happy, anxious, angry, sad or relaxed. Emotional data can be viewed by day, week and month. Petpuls has an Emotional Recognition Accuracy Rate of more than 80%*. 

*Backed by research and testing conducted by Seoul National University, the most prestigious university in South Korea

The activity tracker is embedded within the collar. It utilizes a proprietary algorithm in combination with an accelerometer sensor to determine net calories burned.  The Petpuls app allows you to track your dog’s activity by hour, day, week or month. 

 

How We Started

Petpuls is the life’s mission of founder and CEO, Vincent Kim, who became a dog lover at an early age. His first dog, Sunni, was a mixed breed that loved him fiercely and followed him everywhere. 

Early in his career and while completing his doctoral program at Korean National Maritime and Ocean University, Kim created an online pet care/sitter service that became an instant hit among pet lovers and travelers alike. This success combined with Kim’s love of dogs and technology led him to believe he could create an IoT device with AI-driven data to help dog owners better understand their canine companions through a unique voice recognition system. 

Supported by an R&D team at Seoul National University, Kim developed Petpuls to unite all dog lovers and their families and create a safe, fun and playful community. He is currently a dog parent to Dori, a Korean Jindo he’s gotten to know even better through a little miracle device called Petpuls.

 

Help Us Give All Dogs a Voice

Originally launched in South Korea, Petpuls was successfully crowdfunded through Wadiz (270% over the goal). Hundreds of users backed Petpuls, showing their passion for understanding their dog. Now we are bringing Petpuls to the world, uniting dog lovers and building a community for all dog parents. 

If you believe that all dogs deserve to have their voice heard, then back this project! 

Meet the Petpuls Team

Petpuls is a small company where every team member is deeply involved with the product. We believe Petpuls can improve human-pet interaction like never before.  

 

Our mascots, Honey and Godot lead the way lifting company morale! 

 

Risks and Challenges 

Production tooling has been completed and the system is performing well during field-testing. New challenges may arise as we move into mass production. These could include a need to improve system parts or resolve issues related to fulfillment, such as transportation, international customs, etc. Based on the current pace, we expect to begin shipping Petpuls in late August 2020. We are confident in the proposed timeline given our team's experience already fulfilling the Petpuls product in South Korea. We pledge to prioritize all crowdfunding pre-orders and to clearly and promptly communicate any issues that may arise.

Originally launched in South Korea, Petpuls was successfully crowdfunded through Wadiz (270% over the goal). Hundreds of users backed Petpuls, showing their passion for understanding their dog. Now we are bringing Petpuls to the world, uniting dog lovers and building a community for all dog parents. 

If you believe that all dogs deserve to have their voice heard, then back this project! 
Meet the Petpuls Team
Petpuls is a small company where every team member is deeply involved with the product. We believe Petpuls can improve human-pet interaction like never before.  

 
Our mascots, Honey and Godot lead the way lifting company morale! 
 
Risks and Challenges 
Production tooling has been completed and the system is performing well during field-testing. New challenges may arise as we move into mass production. These could include a need to improve system parts or resolve issues related to fulfillment, such as transportation, international customs, etc. Based on the current pace, we expect to begin shipping Petpuls in late August 2020. We are confident in the proposed timeline given our team's experience already fulfilling the Petpuls product in South Korea. We pledge to prioritize all crowdfunding pre-orders and to clearly and promptly communicate any issues that may arise.

story:
Claire Desjardins is an abstract painter whose work travels around the globe, spreading colorful joy and happiness. The My Vanity print is an example of the creativity and passion that Claire dedicates her life to. The eclectic artwork inspires, liberates and incites feelings of freedom and equality.

 

 

 

A fun mix of zebra-like lines and retro dancing results in this colorful pattern. Wear it proudly, share your positive energy with the world: create joy! Turn heads and change the world in stride.

 

 

A balance of color and geometric shapes to keep your cool: the sky blue tone inspires summer skies all year long. Bring order and lightness to these challenging times.

 

 

Whoever said that Italian marble must be stone cold? This clean design, inspired by Mother Nature, warms the heart. Feel her strength. The noble Marquina marbles are the solid ground upon which community is built and grows. Be the strongest version of you!

​

 

Warranty

The YUL warranty policy includes free exchanges and returns for all unused or only tried indoors products. Apparel must have the original tags. The exchange/return window is 60 days from the date of receipt.

Exchange / returns

The YUL team is committed to making exchanges/returns easy. We are very flexible on our return policies, as long as it makes sense. We want you to find the right product you need! All returns are free in a few simple steps:

  1. Reach out to info@yul-run.com and receive a request confirmation from our customer service team.
  2. Print your return label and apply it to the original box or a similar size one.
  3. Drop it off to your local USPS or Canada Post office.
  4. Upon receipt of your item(s), we will process quickly with the exchange or refund.

story:
TYVEK® Footwear by LOVE@First Step, Inc.

LOVE @ First Step, Inc. or L@FS™ is a Delaware company established in 2013. L@FS™ specializes in casual and hip footwear using TYVEK® material making our products comfortable to wear, lightweight, water resistant and eco-friendly. 

Hip and Casual

We want to provide consumers a selection of comfortable, functional, and high quality footwear with hip designs. Comfortable, because it is made with eco-friendly materials, making it light for feet always on the go. It is also made with TYVEK® material making it durable and water resistant hence, functional. 

Who said comfortable and functional had to be boring? 

L@FS™ footwear come in cute and hip designs suited to your personality! 

The Idea

L@FS™ is the brainchild of finance and accounting professional, Jocelyn Pontecore. Nowadays, products sold in the United States use materials made from other countries. Jocelyn initially started with the idea of making a product made from materials manufactured in the USA to support the local economy in her own way. She saw how TYVEK® was being widely used in building houses, packaging materials, etc. because of its durability. Why not use the same material on something we use everyday?

MEN'S STYLE SIZE: 9, 10, 11, 12

WOMEN'S STYLE SIZE, 6, 7, 8, 9


WOMEN'S STYLE SIZE, 6, 7, 8, 9

MEN'S STYLE SIZE: 9, 10, 11, 12

How You Can Help

We swear by not only producing unique and hip footwear but also providing products with good quality. We aim to raise $39,000 for production, new line of designs, operating expenses for marketing and branding as well as research on using other US made materials. 

Your involvement will help L@FS™ achieve its goal of providing fun, hip and functional casual shoes for your everyday needs. The possibilities are endless!

You can contribute any amount you want, every dollar counts! Of course we won't let you leave empty handed! Here's what you'll get if you decide to avail one of our perks: 

*EXCLUSIVE OF SHIPPING RATES FOR SHOES

L@FS™ footwear are created with the adventurous spirit in mind with its unique and fun designs.

The perfect pair for feet that are always on the go!

Visit our site: http://www.loveatfirststep.com

story:
Carla Debbie Alleyne's Story 

I came up with the idea for Arm Candy Culture when I worked as a Bronx Middle School teacher. One morning on my way to work, I threw on a t-shirt and jeans and ran out the door.  Outside on the streets of New York, feeling a brisk wind in the autumn air, I decided to run back in to get a jacket.  As I sifted through my closet, I felt that it wasn’t quite cold enough for a jacket.  So then I  ran to my room for a sweater.  Looking through my drawers for the “just right sweater,” my hand fell upon a multi-colored jumbo sock.   “Wow, this would make great sleeves,” I thought aloud, and I grabbed a pair of scissors and chopped the toes off.  I placed the elongated socks on my arms, pulling them all the way up to my shoulders… To my surprise, all the way to school on the subway, and as I taught class, students continually complimented me on the self-created arm socks. Where did you get that,” they would ask,  or “how much did that cost,” a few chimed in.  I started thinking... designs started downloading. Hence, the birth of Arm Candy Culture.

I have a heart to teach and raise up inner-city youth as "young urban entrepreneurs" as this company grows.

What We Need & What You Get

I need about $10000 to create the  Arm Candy Culture 2011 Collection, trunk show, and fashion show.  I am currently producing these hot and creative designs out of a showroom in the fashion district in NYC. My hope is also to produce a 2011 fashion show, during fashion week, outfitting an entire football team, cheerleaders, and student in Arm Candy Culture and utilizing them as runway models for the Arm Candy Culture fashion show.  I hope to also use high-fashion models for the couture line.  

The Impact

Arm Candy Culture arm warmers can be the next HOT TREND, and a staple in everyone's wardrobe, very much like a hat or scarf.  I have created many designs of arm warmers that can appeal to men, women, and children.  We have already had interest from the sports arena like the NFL and the NBA.  Arm Candy Culture arm warmers appeals to many markets: from the eclectic fashionistas. to movie stars and recording artists, but it also crosses over to the sports realm, and appeals to fab and funky kiddos.  Kids just love Arm Candy Culture.  My biggest wish would be to get Willow Smith  to promote Arm Candy Culture in ads.  She is sooo Arm Candy Culture :). It is totally fun fashion!  A well-produced celeb endorsement can take this unique fashion design through the roof.  Thank you all for your time and support of this vision, it is very much appreciated.

Other Ways You Can Help

Tell your friends and colleagues, link this site to your Facebook and Twitter pages, and stay tuned for fundraising events as we move toward our goal.

If you know of any person that would want to invest in Arm Candy Culture as a shareholder, please send an email to info@armcandyculture.com

Photo Credit: Keith Major

story:
Hello!

 

My name is Michelle and I have graduated from the art institute of Seattle in 2011 with a associates in fashion design. After graduation I was hired by a Japanese media company as part of the international team in charge of the fashion department. During my employment, I traveled to New York, London, Paris and Milan to cover the fashion weeks. At the fashion weeks I was able to go backstage and conduct interviews with the fashion designers. Through this experience I have decided to reach for that goal of showing starting my collection and one day have my own fashion show in NYC.

This campaign is important to me because it will fund a fashion collection that is trying to spread the word of a beautiful culture.

With your donation, I will be able to create a line of dresses that will be shown in various fashion shows in Seattle by the end of the year. I have already talked to various fashion show organizers, and have received a lot of interest in the collection.

What I Really Need & What You Will Receive in Return

This contribution will go towards the hand dyed bingata fabric. It will take around three months from the time I order it to when it will get here. I have already talked to the people in Okinawa, and they are ready to take my order.  I already have the dresses drafted, and will make the patterns. )I am ordering the rest of the fabric for the dresses after I have placed the order for Okinawa.) Once I have the fabric from Okinawa, I will sew each dress. Right now I have 8 evening gowns planned.

If I do not reach my goal, I will still see how much fabric I can order. I will make dresses just not as many as I had planned :)

The Impact

I was born and raised on the Island of Okinawa. When I was growing up I was surrounded by the unique culture. I would go to watch the traditional dances where the ladies would wear kimonos made with bingata dyed on silk. I always asked myself “what would it look like if I made a bingata dress? Would people even know that the dress had bingata incorporated in it?” When I left the island I decided to go down a path that would make that thought a reality. I attended the art institute of Seattle part time as I worked full time. It was a lot of hard work but I never gave up. Today I work part time as a barista as I chase my dream of creating a fashion line that has hand dyed bingata incorporated in it. I have the drive, and your contribution will make a difference. Thank you!!!

Thank you again for your time and consideration!!

 

Michelle Gingras

story:
Help Us Launch our Custom Clothing Shop in Chicago!

Hi! We're Cindy and Julia - the Crafty Broads. After making our wedding dresses and planning the big event, we realized we'd be great at helping other people do the same, and we launched Crafty Broads. We now specialize in custom garments, alterations, and wedding planning. 

We think the fashion industry is using unbelievably misguided notions (and measurements!) when creating the clothing we wear every day, and we are trying to change that, one garment at a time. We want to make clothes that fit and flatter YOUR figure, no matter what size or shape that may be.

When it comes to weddings, we think the only critical parts are picking the right person and following the rules of whatever government and/or religion you want your marriage recognized by. Everything else is up to you, and we will gladly help you make it happen.

Why are we asking for your money and what will we do with it?

Over the past two years, we've grown explosively and we saved up just enough money to move the shop out of our guest room and into a storefront. Trouble is, that storefront is empty.

 

Your contribution today will help fund our capital expenses so that we can keep our shop open for the long haul.

We have some basics already, but here's what we'll be spending these funds on:

  • Work tables for our sewing machines
  • Cutting table
  • Storage Cabinets for our fabrics and notions
  • Full-length mirrors for our fitting room
  • Closet system to hang garments in progress and alterations
  • Boring office stuff, like a computer, printer, filing cabinet, and phone
  • Seating for our clients and ourselves
  • Lighting and new paint for the walls
  • Website redesign if we exceed our goal!

If we don't meet our goal, we will prioritize this list and use the money we do raise towards the most crucial items. Having a well-equipped shop will help us to get many more clients into perfectly-fitted clothes! It will also allow us to begin developing a line of custom-fit jeans, the number one trouble garment if anecdotal evidence is accurate. If we exceed our goal, we'd like to work on the number two problem - bras!

PERKS!

We have what we think are some great perks for you when you give $25 or more:

Contribute $25 or more and we'll write a blog post about your biggest clothing pet peeve.

We want to know - what is the most annoying thing about buying mass-produced clothing? Tell us what drives YOU crazy! We will write it up on our blog, dissect the problem to figure out why it is the way it is, give you some strategies for combatting it when you're shopping, and (of course!) explain how creating a custom garment can eliminate the issue entirely!

Contribute $50 or more and you'll get 2 hours of event planning consultation to use any way you like.

You can use this for getting a handle on your wedding ideas and plans, having us research vendors or venues for you, a wedding budget strategy session, or just ask us anything else you want for two whole hours. We can meet in person in Chicago, or through the magical powers of the internet anywhere else, so this perk is available to EVERYONE.

Contribute $75 or more and we'll handmake you a Crafty Broads tote bag AND we'll invite you to our Launch Party in Chicago this August.

Your tote bag will be made of durable fabric in our signature colors, teal and brown, with our logo. It's the perfect size for schlepping home a farmers' market haul, carrying all your beach gear, or carrying home a custom garment from us. Shipping is included within the continental United States only; we can ship anywhere else at an additional fee.

The first 25 people to contribute at this level will receive an invitation to the Launch Party for our shop in August. The drinks are on us while you tour the shop and ask us anything.

Contribute $150 or more and we will make you a custom silk tie, in any color you like; OR you we will make alterations to a garment of your choice.

A silk tie is a beautiful thing - so lovely that every time we make one, we try to think of occasions on which we might wear one ourselves. You choose the color from a plethora of options. 100% silk dupioni; shipping anywhere included. 

OR

Bring us a garment that needs some alterations, and we will make it fit like a glove! You must redeem this perk in person at our new Chicago shop. Appointments are required.

Contribute $500 or more and custom jeans are headed your way.

We are beginning research and development on a line of custom-fit jeans. This is one of the biggest clothing hassles we hear about from women, and we want to do something about it. We'll measure you, create a pattern, do a trial fitting (or two, or three...) until we get it right, and then stitch up a pair of jeans that fit you just how you like them. You must redeem this perk in person at our new Chicago shop. Appointments are required.

Contribute $1000 or more and we'll make a custom corset for you OR we'll coordinate your wedding day.

Wearing a custom corset is like getting a nice hug all day long; everything is supported; you are comfortable; and all the right curves are highlighted. We'll start by talking about what you want, come up with a design you love, complete a trial version to test the fit and style, and finally handmake your corset right in our new shop. If you aren't in Chicago, that's ok - you'll just need a crafty friend to take accurate measurements and help with fittings. This perk includes shipping within the continental United States; shipping to other locations is at your expense.

OR

We'll coordinate your wedding day! Our day-of-coordination service includes two planning meetings, a visit to your venue(s) prior to the wedding, review of all vendor contracts and confirmation of vendor services in the weeks ahead of the big day. We will manage your rehearsal and be available for the entire day of your wedding to coordinate every last detail so you can enjoy it stress-free. Subject to availability; travel fees apply to weddings outside the Chicago metro area.

Contribute $3,000 or more and we will create a custom wedding gown or any other garment for you.

We'll start by talking about what you want, come up with a design you love, complete a trial version to test the fit and style, choose fabrics together, and finally handmake your garment right in our new shop. You must redeem this perk in person at our new Chicago shop. Appointments are required.

Want to help us even more? Spread the word about our campaign! THANKS!

story:
Our Background and Inspiration

That’s basically the origin of slow.  There was a deep realization within each of us that it was time to recapture the mindset of slow… since this moment, we have tried to focus on what’s really important in life and enjoy everything we do. It’s fair to say that we developed slow for ourselves, but we soon realized that many had the same feelings. The overwhelming support for this concept strengthened our conviction that creating a brand which reflects these values is exactly the right thing at the right time.

The slow watch is a subtle reminder that time is the most precious thing we have so we should enjoy everything we do and stop chasing every minute.   In order to be a true symbol of this idea, the slow watch has only one hand that rotates once every 24 hours. It actually moves at half the speed of a normal watch, but allows you to see the progress of your entire day at a glance. 


                                                 The 24 Hour One Hand Concept

                     

                                           

This slow way of showing the time is made possible by using a Swiss precision GMT movement that actually has 4 hands and a date (the Ronda 505.24 Swiss Made), but to keep you focused we simply left out the other 3 hands.

                                                   

We wanted to make a product of highest quality that is still affordable. That's why we strongly shortened the distribution chain and are focusing on online and direct-to-comsumer sales. Cutting out all the middle men allows us to offer slow watches at an unseen price-value-ratio.

What We Need & What You Get

We started the brand last year with our first model. It was a huge success so far and a truly inspiring experience to see how many people connected to slow mind-set. We received a lot of feedback from people who loved the concept but would wish for a smaller version. That's why we want to take the next step and add a smaller version to our offering - perfectly fitted for girls and guys with smaller wrists.


                          FIRST MODEL                                          NEW SMALLER MODELL

So far we developed the prototype of this smaller model (we named it slow Mo) and are ready to kick-off the production and bring it to market within the next months.

We believe that, in order to continue to inspire people to be slow, we need to keep the brand very real and focussed. Therefore it's vital for us to remain independent and stay fully in charge of the brand. Usually such an expansion would require to take investors on board, but it’s our dream to do this with your support instead and deliver the undiluted slow story for all time. 

So we are asking for your contribution to finance the first production lot. 

For your help you will be the first to get your hands on slow Mo - the new smaller model!


The Product in Detail

The small case series comes in 10 color and band options (5 with metal bands and 5 with soft Italian calf leather straps).

The case is made of 316L stainless steel and 100 metres water resistant. 

It's 34mm wide, 38.5mm long and 8mm thin. The raised K1 mineral glass with anti-reflective coating creates a great vintage look. 

The entire construction was developed with one aim: Making the case as symmetric and sleek as possible. Just have a look at the case back and how it's seamlessly integrated into the case. 

                                


The Collection

                                      

                                           LIMITED EARLY BIRD INDIEGOGO EDITION                                               

                                                        


                                                                       SLOW T-SHIRT

                                                


The founding team

In this project we combined the strength and expertise of each founder to build a highly professional set up.

Gabriele Guidi is the founder and manager director of one of the leading watch design agencies in Switzerland.

May Margot build this company with him and was involved in the creative and strategic development of many successful watch brands.

     

Corvin Lask, has worked for many years in online marketing and sales. During this time he work with and for many of the leading players, such as AOL, OTTO, Amazon, and eBay.

Chris Noerskau adds the strategy, brand and product part to the puzzle. He worked for Boston Consulting Group, PUMA as well as MYWA (watch specialist focussing on license business).


    Risks & Challenges

    We are fully privately funded and have no investors. So far that worked out well and makes us independent and efficient. Also we can keep the brand 100% clean and consistent. But of course our resources are limited. That's why we rely on your support in financing new projects like this one. 

    Also we are focusing on selling online and direct to the consumer. That comes with a lot of advantages such as an amazing price value ratio and direct interaction with the customers. But of course it also comes at a risk to carry it all on our shoulders. In comparison to the traditional business model where a lot of the work is done by distributors and retailers, we need to do the entire marketing and build our own traffic stream. So far all is great, but if the marketing efficiency worsens the buffer is much less, than those of traditional business models.

    The founder team has many years of relevant experience to overcome these challenges. The 4 founders combine high level expertise in design, brand and product development, online marketing and sales as well as general management. We have proven over the last 1.5 years that we are able to generate business at a sustainable level.

story:
P.M.F.B the new definition of best friend! 

Hi, we are a group of vissionary common young people with great ideas. While we were hanging out at school we were talking about the big step we're about to make (entering college) and how important it was for people to be enterprising and not just to think about cool things and projects, but to make them happen. 

Why bracelets?

Most of all the girls and boys our age wear bracelets all the time, but not always have a bottle opener or a key holder, this is why we want to design custom fashion bracelets with more functions than decorative use only.

We want to create a line of fashion plastic and rubber bracelets with original functions and designs.

Picture it!

If you help us fund this idea, we will create the first line of multifuctional bracelets.

 There are times when you keep your earphones in your pocket and later when you take them out, they are all entangled , now imagine that you have an earphone saver in your left arm. You take out your amazing bracelet and you transform it in a usefull earphone saver.

We already have some ideas for the different uses we can give to the bracelets.

1) bottle opener bracelet


2) earphones saver bracelet

3) cell usb bracelet

4) dock cellphone holder bracelet (for the office netflix time)

5) key holder bracelet 


6) mini post it bracelet (to not forget important ideas)

7) ipod nano bracelet 


8) car cellphone holder bracelet

9) hot or cold bottle holder bracelet

10) aux cable bracelet 


So basically

We want to create a line of fashion plastic and rubber bracelets with original functions and designs.

------------------------------------------------------------

The #PMFB Team!!

Carla E. Gaitan

FB: https://www.facebook.com/carla.e.gaitan?fref=ts


Alexis Orfaly

FB: https://www.facebook.com/alexis.orfaly

Regina Jiménez

Mariana Carrillo

What are we doing with your cooperation?

To perform this project we need the nesesary materials and the tools to create by ourself the prototype versions of the bracelets.

We need to acquire a computer to design the 3D models of the bracelets and also need a 3D printer to fabricate part by part the bracelets. 

Why 3D printed?

If we use 3D CAD's or STL's we can customise the bracelets for the owner ,  like put personalized inscriptions for example names or aniversary dates.

We also need materials to print and fabricate the bracelets like pvc plastic ,3d printing filament and rubber.

The numbers on the table:

We're asking for 5000 dollars :

design computer: 800-100

3D printer 2000-3000 dlls

Material (plastic, rubber, filament) 1000dlls

If you want to help us :D

Share this project on FACEBOOK, TWITTER, MYSPACE, TUMBLR and please tell your friends your family and also your neighbors about this proyect. 

the shipping cost depends on the country (20 -39 dollars)

global shipping support!

THANKS FOR READING

story:
Short Summary

Hi guys! My name is Cynthia Magallanes. I am a full time mommy, wife and Founder of Free Ever After; a ministry of Sold No More, a 501(c)3 nonprofit organization that combats sex trafficking and empowers young women. In August we began a campaign to receive donated wedding gowns and formal dresses to fight sex trafficking and pornography. We resell them and the proceeds (yes! 100% of them) go to help victims get the services they need such as housing, medical care, counseling, and life skills training. We also partner with prevention programs and will have scholarship opportunities for the young women we help through our partnered organizations. 

We partnered with our local organization Sold No More that helps victims of DMST (Domestic Minor Sex Trafficking). Together we are passionate to see their lives transformed, restored and fulfilling their God given destiny and purpose. 

Free Ever After was born out of an urgency to do something against this evil. I could not bear to imagine if my daughter was in such a place. Just because my daughter is free, doesn't mean I shouldn't fight for all the other daughters out there.

In 5 months we have built enough inventory to open a retail location. Because all the proceeds go for victim and prevention services, we need financial support to secure our lease and furnish our boutique. 

Why used wedding dresses? Just because a dress was used, doesn't make it less beautiful or valuable. All it needs is a new bride to redeem it and give it a chance to shine again. So many girls feel used, unwanted and unworthy but they're NOT! They are beautiful, valuable and redeemable!

If you support us, you will enable us to fund organizations continually. The more dresses we sell, the more lives we are able to reach. Your contribution to us will multiply with each dress we sell and will also send a message to all who are enslaved that you care for their freedom.    

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are asking for 12,000. This amount will pay for our lease and utilities for our first 6 months and pay for remodeling the store and purchase the needed fixtures and furniture. 
  • Your contribution is TAX DEDUCTIBLE!!
  • We have great perks for you! 
  • $10 you will receive a bumper sticker that says "I'm changing the world, one dress at a time!"
  • $25 you will receive a sticker and a handmade bracelet with our sparrow charm and the word "Freedom".
  • $50 you will receive a sticker, bracelet and a Sold No More tumbler cup.
  • $150 you will receive a sticker, bracelet, tumbler cup, and a "born to be Free Ever After" t-shirt.
  • $500 you will receive all of the above plus 2 tickets to our Boutique Launch Party (You will be responsible for travel and hotel expenses)
  • $1000 You will receive all of the above. In addition, your name will be on our "Partners for Life"  a framed keepsake with the names engraved of key contributors of our organization. This is a once in a lifetime opportunity to have your name recorded. Because it is our first store (Of many around the world. [We're dreaming big!]) Only the contributors that help build our first store will get this privilege. We will have the keepsake replicated and displayed in every future store.  
  • If we do not reach our entire goal, whatever finances we reach will be used for the remodeling and purchase of fixtures for the boutique.

The Impact

  • Sex trafficking is a commercial sex act induced by force, fraud or coercion, or in which the person induced to perform such an act is not yet 18 years old.
  • 100,000 of US children are being trafficked annually.
  • An estimated 27 million are slaves around the world which 80% are sex slaves.
  • 12-13 years old is the average age of entry into sex slavery.
  • Pornography is the demand that fuels the sex trafficking industry.

Your contribution will help change these numbers and create a culture change to stand up against injustice. No human being should be treated as an object. No child should go through such abuse.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Prayer!
  • Sign up for our monthly newsletter.
  • Share our campaign with your friends.
  • Like us on Facebook, Instagram, and Google+

story:
What is VGG Belts?

Founded in 2012 ,we have partnered with key manufacturers to get our prototype(VGG BELT) to be produced and to hit the market. The VGG Belt is a wearable, fashionable multi-functional information device belt buckle for the modern consumer which includes women, children and men.

What makes VGG Belts better than other products on the market?

The key differentiators offered by VGG Belts include:

-Stylish, cool, fun, fashionable and comes in different colors.

-Designed for children, men and women's belt wear products.

-First of its kind. Its a belt buckle device that comes with the belt for the waist.

-Panic Button, GPS, Audio, recording, video and high decibel alarm sound features, all on a belt device.


How does the VGG Belt work?

The VGG Belt consist of features such as a power button, one panic button,  alarm with high decibel audible alarm sound, GPS, audio and video.  Once the Panic button is pressed it will start dialing the consumers choice of 3 programmed numbers and the first person that answers that call, is able to listen and hear what's going on in the background and at the same time everything is being recorded to internal memory for re-play. The video, audio as well as the GPS is also activated at the same time when the Panic button is pressed.


How do I charge the VGG Belt?

Charging the VGG Belt is simple. You just need to connect the device to the charger adapter which will be included in the package.

How lond does the battery last for the VGG Belt?

The VGG Belts are designed to last up to 72 hours depending on usage.

Does the VGG Belt have a battery indicator?

Yes, the VGG Belt does have a battery indicator level on it.

Does the VGG Belt work in my country?

Yes, it will be engineered to work in 120 countries.  We provide prices in one USD currently for consistency.

Do I have to use the VGG Belt device buckle only for a belt? Can it be held or put in my hand bag?

Absolutely Yes. You don't have to wear as a belt buckle.

How do I order the VGG Belt?

Currently the VGG Belt is available exclusively for pre-order on our campaign site.

What colors does the VGG Belts come in?

We currently offer  VGG Belts in Red, Blue, White, Pink, Black, Grey, Green, Yellow,Purple.  When you pre-order we will contact you for your preference.

Our campaign :

To raise $20,000 in funds to produce and manufactor our first working VGG Belt Buckle prototype. The funds will specifically be used for manufacturing our first prototype and for further production of device belts. We have already chosen a manufacturing company for our first working prototype and for production. 


From your support in helping us raise the funds, we will achieve our goal of providing a quality, fashionable, multi-functional belt device of its first kind on the planet and you will be the first ones to share in assisting with delivering the first device belt of its kind to the market.


We are very passionate about our product as it will be the first of its kind and importantly, will benefit children especially with its multi-functional features of Panic, GPS, video and audio recording as well auto-dialing features.

In the event we don't reach our goal of $20,000 in funding, we will continue to be creative in raising the funds for this AMAZING product. Please spread the word and utilize the indiegogo share tools to help us. Thank You So Much!

story:
Passionate about design

We are Stephan, Matyas and Alina and are passionate about design! That is why a short while ago we have opened B1, an international centre for contemporary design in Prague, Czech Republic.

We have lots of ambitions, ranging from international exhibitions to supporting young designers. And the last one is what we actually like best.

We meet many young designers with great potential suffering from lack of attention and support. And we believe that it is a real pity that their individual collections are not being seen by the wider public. There are many reasons for that. Designers, however great, should design. But to create their own brand needs more, a lot more. So we are working out a program to ensure that these collections get seen and bought.

We give them free space for exhibitions, we assist in completing the process: from prototype to production to marketing & sales. We want to be the platform that makes their dreams comes true.  

 

Tokio - the knitted carpet

TOKIO is a knitted structured carpet freshly born in Pauline Gorelov's textile research lab. Very light and quickly produced, the carpet is still as dense as the best hand tufted classic rugs. A wise combination of natural wools and technical fibers makes the carpet very soft and resistant at the same time. The delicate color range and the 2/1 traditional tatami proportions pay homage once again to the inspiring craft and design from Japan.

Revolutionary technique - Planet friendly design

As Pauline describes it:

“ Machine knitting is not being used for carpet production while it has various advantages: it’s much faster than the traditional tufting and weaving techniques and the starting costs are insignificant, which allows the production of small and custom series as well as bigger ones. The specific patterns I created for it give to the structure its thickness with a very small amount of material because it stores a lot of air.”

Tokio’s knitted structure ensures that the carpet is significantly lighter than any other rug without loosing it’s density!

Its weight of approximately 1,25 kg per sq.mtr. means that it needs significantly less material in comparison to other carpets. Another side effect of the low weight is lower carbon emissions for transportation. And for you, it makes it easier to move it around your office or home.

It is also a relative fast production process. A carpet of 100 x 200 cm only takes an hour to be knitted. We believe that is a very energy efficient method and we plan to find this out in more detail.

Sizes, colors, yarns

Tokio is available in various standard sizes to unlimited length – at this point in time the maximum width is limited to 100 cm.

Together with Pauline we have prepared various standard sizes:

The pixel (40x40cm), pigmy (40x55cm) and kawai (40x70cm) will make your cat or dog very happy. It is also great to put it under your desk or in front of your favorite chair where it will keep you feet stylishly warm.

The small runner (55x105cm) and big runner (70x150cm) great for bed side and in corridors.

The tatami (100x200cm) is the size with which it all started. A perfect size for most living rooms, proving a special touch to your interior.

You want your Tokio carpet even longer?
We have made it easy for you to find out your custom size price (longer than 200 cm) – standard width 100 cm:
(Width) 1,0 mtr. x Length in mtrs x €250 + transport (EU €40, rest of world €70) = funded price

We use high quality yarns with a mix of 25% wool & angora and 75% acrylic. This combination provides an excellent resistance for rugs while still being soft, thick and airy.

NOTES:

Regarding the colors: we try to accurately represent the colors available. But the color of products in person may differ slightly from how they appear here.

Tokio is an manufactured product, but it's finished by hand so the mentioned sizes can differ slightly with the final size we will deliver. 

Pauline Gorelov & 

Our first campaign is about Pauline, a young surface designer, art director and trend watcher from Brussels - Belgium. She has a special talent and passion for repeated patterns and mathematical structures. She designs stylish prints for textiles, wallpapers and tiles and rugs.

After graduating in La Cambre Visual Arts School in Brussels in 2007, Pauline was selected amongst the 5 best Brussels designers by “101% Designed in Brussels” organisation to exhibit her work around the world.

She has been exhibiting during various international design fairs, including Milan, London, Cologne and New York. Her works were also featured in various design magazines and blogs, receiving positive critics.

We, the B1-team, help her to make her portfolio more visible. Together we want to produce many more of her designs, like the wallpapers below, and make those available to you! 

How we use the funds?

Are you a reseller? Or are you working on a larger interior project?

We like to hear from you! Sent an email to tokio(at)b1.centre.eu and we get personally in touch with you.

Other Ways You Can Help

To help the campaign in other ways, spread the word! Write comments. Let your friends know about our campaign via your social media networks and like us in various ways, for example via our facebook page: www.facebook.com/B1.Praha

If Indiegogo gets enough feedback, they publicize the site, giving it greater access to the public and therefore a better chance of being funded.

Thanks a lot, we are incredibly happy with all your support.

F A Q  - ORDERS & DELIVERY

When can I expect my delivery?                     

On Indiegogo you’ll find our expected delivery month. In the meantime we will keep you posted about our production process. That way you’ll know when to expect your choice of Tokio carpet(s). 

How can I make clear what colors I order?

After you ordered your Tokio carpet through Indiegogo we will send you an email. In this email you have the options to select the desired color and you can change delivery addresses. When you buy a Tokio carpet as a gift, it is also possible to leave a personal note to the lucky receiver of this unique gift.

How can I order additional Tokio carpets or other sizes and colors than offered?

During the Indiegogo campaign just add more – we are always pleased to receive your orders.

In case you like to order different colors, please let us know which color you are looking for. We do not yet have a wide choice available, but that is going to change. And we are always happy to see what we can do for you, sent you a color samples and make you an offer.

We can produce many more different sizes on request. The only limitation we still have is the maximum width of 100 cm.

Just drop us a line and we will be in touch: tokio(at)b1.centre.eu

B1 - Many reasons to get in touch with us

  • Designers: show us the result of your visions.

 

  • Visitors: be inspired.

 

  • Companies: get new, innovative solutions and support young designers.

story:
Following the Blues can be a rollercoaster and this season we want you to join us for every minute of the ride on 1Sport.

Bleeding Blue - an interactive Chelsea commentary

How many times have you sat in front of TV watching Chelsea play and wished you were at the stadium, at the pub, with your friends and other fans? With the Bleeding Blue raves, we bring you that exact experience right on your iPhone, iPad or iTouch.

You can listen to the whole Chelsea FanCast gang live: Chidge, Ross, Pablo, Lauren and Dazza. To top it all off, you could talk back to them - as the Blues blaze the field. Add Kris from FamousCFC to the mix and you've got the most Bleeding Blue crew to watch the match with.

1Sport App

1Sport is an iPhone app that lets fans listen to live audio commentary from football experts and also talk with the commentators and other fans. With 1Sport, you always have your mates with you while watching matches on TV or at the pub.

Cheering, shouting and sledging the opposition are actively encouraged. It's like being in a giant virtual stadium with other fans from around the world.

We call these interactive commentary sessions "raves" - like a large wild party, except it is exclusively for Chelsea fans. 

Why IndieGoGo

We would like to start our Bleeding Blue raves with every Chelsea fan on board. You can help make this real by joining this IndieGoGo campaign.

The 1Sport app will be upgraded in August offering paid subscriptions to watch Chelsea matches. By participating in this IndieGoGo campaign, you can get discounts and other perks on top of the regular subscriptions that will be available during the season.

So why wait? Sign up today to be part of something special. 

The Details

Season Ticket

Purchase a Season ticket on IndieGoGo to receive a discount code that can be used in the AppStore. The discount code will give you AppStore credits for joining all the Bleeding Blue Chelsea raves in the 1Sport app during the upcoming season. Be one of the first 100 to claim a Season Ticket and you will get a 30% discount off the regular Season Ticket price.

Premium Perks

Support us in making the Bleeding Blue raves happen, by getting the premium £20 and £50 tickets. You will not only be able to join in the raves as with the Season Ticket, but also be featured in the raves and our blog & podcast. 

The Bleeding Blue Perk

Become a true blue supporter with the £100 ticket - you will get prime spots in the raves and our blog/podcast and in addition you will also receive a T-Shirt to show off your true blue colors.

All Season Tickets & T-Shirts will be sent out prior to season start. 

Come watch Chelsea with us this August!

Join now to be part of something special. Get your discount & perks. 

About Chelsea Fancast

The Chelsea Football FanCast has been broadcasting since April 2008 and is a 2 hour weekly podcast with more than 30,000 listeners every week from literally every corner of the globe, reflecting the global support for Chelsea FC. Its aim has always been to bring the supporters post-match pub chat to the airwaves, and is authentic, forthright, independent, funny and anarchic in tone. In 2011,

The Chelsea FanCast gained a seat at the Chelsea FC Supporters’ Consultative Forum (The Fans’ Forum). In 2012, the show was awarded the ‘Best Football Podcast’ by the Football Blogging Awards, and has consistently been nominated over the last three years for the EPLTalk Soccer Awards coming 3rd in the Best Podcast category and 2nd in the Best Podcast Presenter category in 2013. 

About FamousCFC

FamousCFC is totally biased and not afraid to give frank views on the issues affecting the club and its fans. Established in 2010, FamousCFC is the rants and ramblings of Kristian Downer and whoever he can convince and cajole into sharing their thoughts on the Blues. Kristian travels over land and Sea (AND LEICESTER!) to watch the Blues including our recent glories in Munich and Amsterdam.

story:
Comfort Meets Style



Dress them up, or dress them down


Lighter colors to take you through the end of Summer and into early Fall.


Darker colors for a more formal scene.


Our flexible outsole allows your foot to rotate through its full range of motion in every stride.  The movement helps your foot gain and maintain strength.

Bird's Eye View of the Penny Loafer, Tassel Loafer, Ornament Loafer, and Boat Shoe displayed below in all available colorways.

Step in TUNE Campaign T


TUNEfootwear

My name is Mike Norris and I'm the guy you see in the video.  My story is simple.  I started TUNEfootwear in 2011 because I really believe in order to maintain a healthy body, you need to have healthy feet.  I also believe that minimalist footwear is synonymous with healthy footwear.  I first ran in minimalist footwear in 2009, and I've never looked back.  Once I made the transition to minimalist running shoes, I couldn't help but realize that, on a daily basis, my dress loafers caused more pain, discomfort, and harm to my feet than any other shoes I owned.  They were too narrow and stiff, with too much heel, and not enough feel!  

At the time I worked for a company with a strict business dress code.  Everyday at work I felt like I was banging my head against the wall because I was wearing these shoes that were killing my feet!  With no minimalist dress shoes available at the time, I decided it was time to take action and TUNEfootwear was started!

As a small company our biggest problem is getting our product in front of our target audience.  We had to think outside the box to come up with an affordable and effective way to reach our customers.....so what did we come up with??? 

Dudes in Suits Campaign

Late last summer I had to wear test our final prototypes for fit, comfort, and structural integrity before giving the green light to start our production run. I thought the best way to conduct a wear test would be to run in the loafers. At first, I thought there's no way I could run in a pair of loafers. Despite my doubts, I set out on a short run.  After about one mile, I not only realized it was possible to run in the loafers, I realized it was comfortable, too! That's because our loafers possess all the characteristics of a minimalist shoe, and they allow your feet to do the work. My mind started racing with ideas, and one of the first things I thought of was racing in TUNE loafers while decked out in a full suit and tie...and so the Dudes in Suits Campaign was born.  

I got to do what I love most, run, while promoting our new brand, TUNEfootwear, at a very low cost.  We participated in 10 races across the nation.  I was able to reach thousands of potential customers because you get a lot of attention racing in a suit and loafers.

Minimalist Footwear

The underlying idea behind minimalist footwear is that your feet can cope without the support and cushioning of a traditional shoe.  A minimalist shoe won't impede your stride or posture, which helps promote natural movement and stronger feet.    

Step in TUNE!

Step in TUNE is our new campaign to promote healthy feet by getting people in healthy footwear!  This is the same campaign we'll be promoting next year at the trade shows if our Indiegogo project is a success. Healthy footwear allows your feet to FUNCTION naturally.  Here are the underlying principals, and the characteristics that set TUNEfootwear apart from your traditional loafers. 

FEEL - Our outsole/insole design puts less than 15mm between you and the ground. This allows your foot to feel the ground and will naturally encourage you to pick up your feet instead of exerting extra force in every stride.  It's this extra force that can lead to painful injuries and degenerative arthritis later in life.  Feeling the ground reminds you to LIFT your feet.

FLEXIBILITY - Your feet are extremely dynamic and are supposed to rotate through a full range of motion in every stride you take.  Tying a shoe with a stiff outsole to your foot is like putting a splint on your foot. It will prohibit the full range of motion and cause muscles to atrophy.  TUNEfootwear's flexible outsole allows your foot to rotate through its full range of natural motion in every step you take. 

FLAT - Our flat, or neutral, outsole design has no heel and has a minimal affect on your natural stride and posture.

FIT - Our wide fit allows your foot to spread out, as it should, every time it hits the ground.  This wide design can help prevent several major crippling foot disorders.  

We Need Your Help!!

We've been selling shoes for almost 9 months now, and have big plans for our upcoming year.  Our next goal as a company is to attend industry trade shows in 2014. We want to attend at least two of the following: The Footwear Event in Chicago, The FFANY in NYC or The Atlanta Shoe Market in Atlanta.  Each show will cost upwards of $10,000.  If we don't reach our goal of $20,000, then any proceeds we do receive will go toward helping TUNEfootwear make it to at least one of the shows listed above. 

What You GET!

By donating to our new campaign you will receive up to 30% off the retail value Tunefootwear loafers.  What's even more exciting is that we've completed our production run and our inventory is at our distribution center just outside of Richmond, VA.  We can begin shipping out orders as soon as we reach our goal!!  We offer one free exchange to anyone who makes a donation!

What's the Doc have to Say??

Three doctors leading the way in promoting natural footwear and natural walking are Dr. Mark Cucuzzella, Dr. Ray McClanahan, Dr. Marty Hughes.  All three of these doctors endorse and recommend TUNEfootwear to their patients.  I could sit here all day and tell you why natural footwear is better for you, but wouldn't you rather hear it from a doctor??  Check out Dr. Marty's review down below.  Then, follow these links for more information from Dr. Ray about healthy fitting shoes and from Dr. Cucuzzella about the basic principles of natural running and walking.  Also, Check out Dr. Ray's recommended footwear list.  You know we're on that!!

Our Loafers

All of our loafers are built off the same last, so they have the same fit. We have three different style slip-ons, and one lace up dock shoe.  Our slip-ons come in black, chocolate, and tan.  Our dock shoe comes in Nubuck leather.  You can see some good top down views above, and some good profile views below.

TUNE Penny Loafer seen below in Black.  Also Available in Brown and Tan.

TUNE Tassel Loafer seen below in Tan.  Also Available in Brown and Black.


TUNE Ornament Loafer seen below in Brown.  Also Available in  Black and Tan.


TUNE Boat Shoe...Perfect for taking you through the end of Summer and into early Fall.


Sizing Chart and Available Sizes

Currently Sold Out of the Following (this list is updated anytime we sell out of a pair of shoes, please check to make sure your size is available before donating):
Black Penny Loafer Size 13
Black Penny Loafer Size 13.5
Black Ornament Loafer Size 13

We want to attend at least two of the following: The Footwear Event in Chicago, The FFANY in NYC or The Atlanta Shoe Market in Atlanta.  Each show will cost upwards of $10,000.  If we don't reach our goal of $20,000, then any proceeds we do receive will go toward helping TUNEfootwear make it to at least one of the shows listed above. 
What You GET!
By donating to our new campaign you will receive up to 30% off the retail value Tunefootwear loafers.  What's even more exciting is that we've completed our production run and our inventory is at our distribution center just outside of Richmond, VA.  We can begin shipping out orders as soon as we reach our goal!!  We offer one free exchange to anyone who makes a donation!

What's the Doc have to Say??
Three doctors leading the way in promoting natural footwear and natural walking are Dr. Mark Cucuzzella, Dr. Ray McClanahan, Dr. Marty Hughes.  All three of these doctors endorse and recommend TUNEfootwear to their patients.  I could sit here all day and tell you why natural footwear is better for you, but wouldn't you rather hear it from a doctor??  Check out Dr. Marty's review down below.  Then, follow these links for more information from Dr. Ray about healthy fitting shoes and from Dr. Cucuzzella about the basic principles of natural running and walking.  Also, Check out Dr. Ray's recommended footwear list.  You know we're on that!!



Our Loafers
All of our loafers are built off the same last, so they have the same fit. We have three different style slip-ons, and one lace up dock shoe.  Our slip-ons come in black, chocolate, and tan.  Our dock shoe comes in Nubuck leather.  You can see some good top down views above, and some good profile views below.

TUNE Penny Loafer seen below in Black.  Also Available in Brown and Tan.


TUNE Tassel Loafer seen below in Tan.  Also Available in Brown and Black.



TUNE Ornament Loafer seen below in Brown.  Also Available in  Black and Tan.

TUNE Boat Shoe...Perfect for taking you through the end of Summer and into early Fall.







Sizing Chart and Available Sizes

Currently Sold Out of the Following (this list is updated anytime we sell out of a pair of shoes, please check to make sure your size is available before donating):
Black Penny Loafer Size 13
Black Penny Loafer Size 13.5
Black Ornament Loafer Size 13

story:
Please scroll down for the english version. 

Dürfen wir vorstellen: Die Fanns - Kissen mit Charakter!

Molly, Buster, Lester, Fred und Carl sind eine neue Generation von Kissen für Kinder, Erwachsene und alle dazwischen!
 Kissen? Nur Kissen? Nein, auch Spielzeug! Und Gefährte! Und Freund! Die Fanns sind immer für Euch da.

Das ist Molly

Molly ist die Kuschelige. Sie gibt Dir Sicherheit, ist ganz beruhigend und kommt überall mit hin. Und sie hält die Fanns-Bande zusammen - denn eine muß es ja machen!

Molly ist ca. 27 cm groß und mit ausgestreckten Armen etwa 30 cm breit.

Das ist Carl

Carl ist der Leidenschaftliche, der Lieb-Haber. Du kannst toll mit ihm streiten oder Deinen Frust an ihm auslassen. Danach gehts Dir wieder besser, weil Carl kann ganz toll trösten.

Carl ist ca. 25 cm groß und mit ausgestreckten Armen etwa 32 cm breit.

Das ist Lester

Lester ist der weltbeste Umarmer, einer, der Dich nie im Stich läßt. Denn mit seinem langen und starken Arm hält er Dich immer fest.

Lester ist ca. 26 cm groß und mit ausgestreckten Armen etwa 28 cm breit.

Das ist Fred

Fred ist die treue Seele der Fanns! Fred erlebt gerne jedes Abenteuer mit Dir und denn er kommt überall mit hin. Bei Fred kannst Du Dich ganz toll ausruhen.

Fred ist ca. 26 cm groß und mit ausgestreckten Armen etwa 34 cm breit.

Das ist Buster

Buster ist der Beschützer der Fanns! Mit seiner breiten Persönlichkeiten kann er alles von Dir ab- und jede Deiner Stimmungen aushalten. Auf ihn kannst Du Dich verlassen.

Buster ist ca. 22 cm groß und mit ausgestreckten Armen etwa 49 cm breit.

Mehr Details zu den Fanns findet Ihr weiter unten.

So haben die Fanns angefangen

Eigentlich gibt es die Fanns schon seit drei Jahren. So alt ist Una, so alt ist Leon, die Tochter von Karsten und Tanja, der Sohn von Laura und Klaus. Beide kamen im Abstand von einer Woche auf die Welt und sind seitdem die besten Freunde. So haben sich auch Laura und Karsten kennengelernt. Und sehr schnell festgestellt, daß nicht nur ihre Kinder Gefährten brauchen, die ihnen das Leben etwas leichter machen. 

Karsten ist Designer, Laura ist Managerin, damit war klar: Das machen wir zusammen! 


So soll es weitergehen

Die erste Auflage der ersten Fanns-Kollektion haben wir bereits produziert. Das Feedback, das wir für die Fanns bekommen haben und vor allem die Reaktionen der Kinder sind phantastisch: "Endlich mal was anderes!" "Geben unsere Kinder gar nicht mehr her!" Aber auch die Erwachsenen wurden bereits mit Fanns gesichtet - im Flieger, im Anzug und mit Buster an der Schulter bei einer gemütlichen, kleinen Ausruh-Pause.

Wir möchten die Fann-Familie nun in die Welt entlassen und sie weiter ausbauen. Das soll uns u.a. mit Facebook gelingen - und Facebook kostet Geld.  

Aber: Facebook ist für den Aufbau einer Fann-Community das perfekte Medium! Wir wollen die Fann-Familie mit Euch und Eurer Hilfe so groß wie möglich machen und den Spaß mit den Fanns mit allen teilen (und damit auch den Austausch untereinander fördern!)

Über Facebook wollen wir Euch neue Fanns vorstellen, Euer Feedback zu den Fanns hören und vielleicht sogar mit Euch zusammen neue Fanns entwickeln und designen.

Eure Hilfe ist nicht umsonst

Das sind unsere tollen Perks für Eure tolle Unterstützung:

Dankedankedanke! Das ist großartig! Wir werden der Welt verkünden, daß Du ein offizieller Fann-Fan bist! Auf unserer Homepage werden wir einen eigenen Bereich für alle Fann-Fans einrichten - und damit bist Du dabei!

Die Fanns schreiben zurück! Du bist ein besonderer Fann-Fan - denn die Fanns schreiben Dir offiziell und handgeschrieben zurück! Eine individuell beschriebene Postkarte geht direkt an Dich in die Post!

Ein Fann aus der Fann-Familie. Damit bist Du ein offizielles Mitglied der Familie! Du bekommst einen der Fanns aus der Familie versandkostenfrei geschickt - zusammen mit einer individuell beschriebenen Danke-Postkarte! Vergiss nicht uns zu schreiben, welchen Fann Du Dir ausgesucht hast!
 

Sei der Erste - ein Early-Bird-Fann. Du gehörst zu den Ersten! Dieser Fann ist so noch nicht zu haben - wir heben ihn uns für später auf. Oder für Dich. Finley ist ein early bird - der erste Fann mit einer kleinen Tasche auf dem Rücken für Schlüssel, Nuckel, Labels oder andere Kleinigkeiten. 

Der exklusive Kampagnen-Fann. Das gibts nur einmal, das kommt nie wieder! Diesen Fann haben wir nur für Euch designt: Die dicke Lucy in lila gibt es nur für diese indiegogo-Kampagne! Und dann nie wieder. Lucy wird also eine echte Seltenheit, sozusagen eine Rarität sein. 

Die ganze Familie. Alle Achtung, gleich die ganze Bande! Aber Du hast ja recht, man sollte sie eigentlich nicht trennen! Die ganze Familie - Molly, Lester, Buster, Carl und Fred kommen versandkostenfrei als ein Paket zu Dir!

Die ganze Familie und Lucy. So sind sie fast alles versammelt: Die ganze Fann-Familie und Lucy, der Kampagnen-Fann - das wird es so nie wieder geben! Diese sechs Fanns werden sich bei Dir häuslich einrichten: Molly, Lester, Buster, Carl, Fred und Lucy! 

Ein individuell designter Fann als Sonderanfertigung. Das ist wahrhaftig ein Einzelstück! Wir designen Dir einen eigenen Fann, ein Unikat, das nur Du hast: Dein ganz eigener Fann!

Ein Fann wird heißen wie Du. Wir benennen einen Fann nach Dir - einen Fann, den wir in zweiter Generation bringen werden. Denn das hast Du Dir auch wahrlich verdient! Dazu erhälst Du, quasi als Einstimmung, natürlich auch die ganze Familie - denn schließlich gehörst Du nun ja dazu! 

Design your own Fann. Wir wissen - Du hast Geschmack und ein wahres Händchen für die Fanns! Du weißt, wie sie ticken und was sie brauchen. Damit kannst Du auch einen eigenen Fann gestalten, den wir dann in der zweiten Generation auflegen werden. Dazu erhältst Du natürlich auch die ganze Familie! 

Ganz wichtig!

Eure Hilfe wird hier bei indiegogo durch paypal abgewickelt. Wenn Ihr keinen eigenen paypal-Account habt - kein Problem! Ihr könnt bei Paypal auch so mit Eurer Kreditkarte bezahlen. Wenn Ihr das auch nicht wollt, könnt Ihr einfach auf unser Konto (Garden Street Management UG, Konto 455 87 104, BLZ 100 100 10 oder IBAN DE 7310 0100 1000 4558 7104, BIC PBNKDEFF (Postbank)) überweisen. Ihr müßt uns nur eine entsprechende Mail dazu schreiben (an karsten@fanns.de), wir lösen dann den von Euch gewählten Perk aus und ordnen alles entsprechend zu.

Bei Fragen oder Anregungen oder Kommentaren oderoderoder schreibt uns einfach an karsten@fanns.de! Wir werden uns dann so schnell wie möglich bei Euch melden!

Wir planen noch mehr

Natürlich planen wir noch weitere Kollektionen mit neuen Fanns! Der early-bird-Fann nur ist ein Beispiel davon - er hat eine kleine Tasche auf dem Rücken für die allerallerwichtigsten Dinge, die man nie verlieren darf. Zum Beispiel Schnuller, zum Beispiel Haustürschlüssel.

Aber wir wollen auch noch kleine und große Taschen, kleine Reißverschlußtaschen (für die Windel, die Feuchttücher und den Reserveschnuller für unterwegs zum Beispiel) oder Schultertaschen für den Ausflug entwickeln. Außerdem Lätzchen, Bodies und Wickelunterlagen  und, mit Eurer Hilfe und Euren Anregungen, auch noch viele andere Dinge, die zur Fann-Familie passen und das Leben einfacher und entspannter machen.

Wir freuen uns auf Eure Ideen!

Sie sind Einzelhändler/Kooperationspartner oder wollen einen eigenen Fann für Ihr Unternehmen?

Natürlich haben wir besondere Konditionen für Einzelhändler! Sprechen Sie uns einfach an!

Sie wollen einen Corporate-Fann für Ihr Unternehmen? Darüber würden wir uns natürlich sehr freuen! Schreiben Sie eine Mail an karsten@fanns.de, wir haben dazu sehr viele Ideen!

Noch ein Wort zu den Fanns

Wir haben die Fanns robust und trotzdem kuschelig designt, damit die Fanns auch tatsächlich allem standhalten und überall mit hin können. Wenn sie dreckig werden oder zu doll geliebt werden, könnt Ihr die Fanns natürlich auch waschen. Nur - bitte nicht chemisch reinigen lassen oder in den Trockner oder bügeln, das mögen sie nicht so gern.

Die Fanns sind aus 65% Baumwolle und 35% Leinen, einem Stoff, der nach dem Öko-Tex-Standard 100 produziert wurde. Das bedeutet, daß nichts im Stoff enthalten ist, was irgendwie schädlich sein könnte. Und das heißt - entspanntes Spielen, Kuscheln und Ausruhen nach Lust und Laune.

Da ist noch etwas:

Besucht uns auf http://www.facebook.com/diefanns ... schenkt uns ein Like, teilt unsere Seite, folgt uns ... wir freuen uns über jeden Besuch!

Molly, Carl, Fred, Buster, Lester und wir sagen Danke!

Wir freuen uns sehr über Eure Unterstützung und sind Euch sehr, sehr dankbar. Wir sind sehr gespannt und hoffen, daß Euch die Fanns genauso viel Spaß machen wie uns!


Introducing the Fanns - pillows with personality!

Molly, Buster, Lester, Fred and Carl are a new generation of pillows for kids, adults and everybody in between!

Pillows? Just pillows? Far from it, they’re also a toy! And a companion! And a friend! The Fanns are always there for you!

This is Molly

Molly is the cuddly one. She will make you feel safe, is very calming and will go wherever you go, too. She’s the one who keeps the Fann Family together - after all, one of them has to, right? 

Molly is 27 cm tall and with spread-eagled arms 30 cm wide.

This is Carl

Carl is the passionate one. He’s the one you can quarrel with or let off steam. You’ll feel a lot better afterwards because Carl is a brilliant comforter. 

Carl is 25 cm tall and with spread-eagled arms 32 cm wide.

This is Lester

Lester is the world’s best hugger who will never let you down, because his long and strong arms just won’t let go of you. 

Lester is 26 cm tall and with spread-eagled arms 28 cm wide.

This is Fred

Fred is the reliable and faithful soul among the Fanns! He will be by your side during any adventure and go anywhere with you. Need a rest? Then Fred is your Fann. 

Fred is 26 cm tall and with spread-eagled arms 34 cm wide.

This is Buster

Buster is the Fanns’ protector! With his robust personality, he can shield you against anything and put up with all of your moods. 

Buster is 22 cm tall and with spread-eagled arms 49 cm wide.

Scroll down for more information on the Fanns.

This is how the Fanns got started.

Truth to tell, the Fanns are already 3 years old. Just like Una, Karsten and Tanja’s daughter and just like Leon, Laura and Klaus’ son. They were born one week apart and have been best friends ever since. And that’s how Laura and Karsten met and discovered rather quickly that the world and their children need companions who make their lives a little bit easier. 

Karsten is a designer, Laura is a manager, so it was pretty much clear that we would do this together! 
 


What we are planning to go from here

We already produced the first edition of the first Fanns collection. The feedback we got and the kids’ responses are fantastic: “Something different, finally!" “Our kids won’t let them go anymore!" But even adults won’t part with their Fanns anymore: “He gives me the break I need when I’m on the road all the time!" 

Now, we want to raise the Fanns’ profile and build the Fann Family through facebook - and facebook is costs money.
However, facebook is also the perfect medium to build a community! With you and your help, we want to make the Fann Family as big as possible so we can share the Fanns with everybody.

Via facebook, we will present new members of the Fann Family, get your feedback on the Fanns and maybe even develop and design new Fanns together with you. 


Your help will not go unrewarded

These are the great perks we will be offering in return for your support: 

Thankyouthankyouthankyou! This is great! We will let the know that you are an official Fann-Fan. We´ll have a special section on our homepage - and you are on it!

The Fanns write back! You are truly are special Fann-Fan! Because the Fanns are writing back offically and handwritten! A handwritten postcard is in the mail for you.

A Fann from the Fann-Family. You are an official member of the family! You will get one of the Fanns - together with a handwritten thank you postcard. Please don´t forget to write which Fann you have decided for.

Be the first - a Early-Bird-Fann. You are one of the first! This Fann will come later - but not for you! Finley is a early bird - the first Fann with a little pocket on his back for keys, pacifiers or other little things.

The exclusive campaign-Fann. This Fann is designed only for you and only for this indiegogo-campaign: Big Lucy in purple will be a real rarity! 

The whole family. Ok, everybody. But you are right, they should not be separated. 

The whole family and Lucy - it will never be like this again: Molly, Lester, Buster, Carl, Fred und Lucy! 

A customized Fann as a special model. There can be only one! We design and produce your own Fann and for you only. And he will be the only one of its kind.

We will name a Fann after you. A Fann of the next generation will carry your name. And you deserve it! Of course you will also get the whole family. After all you are a part of us now!

Design your own Fann. We know - you love them. You know them. So you will  design the next Fann which will be part of the official second generation. And of course you will also get the whole family. 

Important!

You don’t have your own paypal account? Not a problem! You can pay with your credit card via paypal, too. If you don’t like that option, either, you can simply transfer the money into our account  (Garden Street Management UG, Konto 455 87 104, BLZ 100 100 10 oder IBAN DE 7310 0100 1000 4558 7104, BIC PBNKDEFF (Postbank)).

All you have to do is send us a corresponding email (to karsten@fanns.de), so we can match all the information and get your requested perk on its way to you.

For any questions, ideas or comments, just drop us a line at karsten@fanns.de and we’ll be in touch as soon as possible! 

We´ve got more in store

Of course we’re planning more collections with new Fanns, such as the Early Bird Fann, who comes with a little backpack for those essential things that you simply cannot afford to lose. Like your kid’s pacifier or your keys, for example.

Moreover, we are also planning to design and produce small and big bags, zipped pouches (for a nappy, wet wipes and the spare pacifier for when you’re out and about) or shoulder bags for that day out, bibs, onesies and nappy changing mats. And with your help, we are sure we’ll come up with even more additions to the Fann Family to make life easier and more relaxed. 

We are looking forward to your ideas!
 

Are you a retail/cooperation partner or would you like your own corporate Fann?

Of course we offer special rates for retailers, so simply contact us for a quote!

Would you like your company’s very own Fann? We would be delighted to show you our exciting ideas - just send us an email at karsten@fanns.de! 

Just another few words about the Fanns

We’ve designed the Fanns to be resilient yet cuddly so they can put up with a lot and go through thick and thin with you. Obviously, you can wash the Fanns when they get dirty or when they’ve been loved a little too much. Just don’t dry-clean, tumble-dry or iron them - they’re really not too keen on that.

The Fanns are made from 65% cotton and 35% linen, a fabric manufactured in compliance with the OEKO-TEX Standard 100. In other words, the fabric contains absolutely no harmful substances, so you can play, cuddle and relax with them in total peace of mind. 

One more thing:

Visit us on http://www.facebook.com/diefanns ... like us, share, follow us ... any help, any visit is appreciated!

Molly, Carl, Fred, Buster, Lester and all of us say Thank you!

We are very looking forward to your support and are immensely grateful to you. Let’s hope you will enjoy the Fanns just as much as we do!
