Sie wollen einen Corporate-Fann für Ihr Unternehmen? Darüber würden wir uns natürlich sehr freuen! Schreiben Sie eine Mail an karsten@fanns.de, wir haben dazu sehr viele Ideen!


Noch ein Wort zu den Fanns


Wir haben die Fanns robust und trotzdem kuschelig designt, damit die Fanns auch tatsächlich allem standhalten und überall mit hin können. Wenn sie dreckig werden oder zu doll geliebt werden, könnt Ihr die Fanns natürlich auch waschen. Nur - bitte nicht chemisch reinigen lassen oder in den Trockner oder bügeln, das mögen sie nicht so gern.







Die Fanns sind aus 65% Baumwolle und 35% Leinen, einem Stoff, der nach dem Öko-Tex-Standard 100 produziert wurde. Das bedeutet, daß nichts im Stoff enthalten ist, was irgendwie schädlich sein könnte. Und das heißt - entspanntes Spielen, Kuscheln und Ausruhen nach Lust und Laune.


Da ist noch etwas:
Besucht uns auf http://www.facebook.com/diefanns ... schenkt uns ein Like, teilt unsere Seite, folgt uns ... wir freuen uns über jeden Besuch!



Molly, Carl, Fred, Buster, Lester und wir sagen Danke!
Wir freuen uns sehr über Eure Unterstützung und sind Euch sehr, sehr dankbar. Wir sind sehr gespannt und hoffen, daß Euch die Fanns genauso viel Spaß machen wie uns!


Introducing the Fanns - pillows with personality!









Molly, Buster, Lester, Fred and Carl are a new generation of pillows for kids, adults
and everybody in between!






Pillows? Just pillows? Far from it, they’re also a toy! And a companion! And a friend!
The Fanns are always there for you!



This is Molly








Molly is the cuddly one. She will make you feel safe, is very calming and will go
wherever you go, too. She’s the one who keeps the Fann Family together - after all,
one of them has to, right? 




Molly is 27 cm tall and with spread-eagled arms 30 cm wide.
This is Carl






Carl is the passionate one. He’s the one you can quarrel with or let off steam. You’ll
feel a lot better afterwards because Carl is a brilliant comforter. 




Carl is 25 cm tall and with spread-eagled arms 32 cm wide.
This is Lester






Lester is the world’s best hugger who will never let you down, because his long and
strong arms just won’t let go of you. 




Lester is 26 cm tall and with spread-eagled arms 28 cm wide.
This is Fred






Fred is the reliable and faithful soul among the Fanns! He will be by your side
during any adventure and go anywhere with you. Need a rest? Then Fred is your
Fann. 




Fred is 26 cm tall and with spread-eagled arms 34 cm wide.
This is Buster






Buster is the Fanns’ protector! With his robust personality, he can shield you
against anything and put up with all of your moods. 




Buster is 22 cm tall and with spread-eagled arms 49 cm wide.







Scroll down for more information on the Fanns.













This is how the Fanns got started.











Truth to tell, the Fanns are already 3 years old. Just like Una, Karsten and Tanja’s
daughter and just like Leon, Laura and Klaus’ son. They were born one week apart and have been best friends ever since. And that’s how Laura and Karsten met and
discovered rather quickly that the world and their children need companions who
make their lives a little bit easier. 





Karsten is a designer, Laura is a manager, so it was pretty much clear that we would do this together! 


 

What we are planning to go from here







We already produced the first edition of the first Fanns collection. The feedback we
got and the kids’ responses are fantastic: “Something different, finally!" “Our kids
won’t let them go anymore!" But even adults won’t part with their Fanns anymore: “He gives me the break I need when I’m on the road all the time!" 










Now, we want to raise the Fanns’ profile and build the Fann Family through facebook - and facebook is costs money.
However, facebook is also the perfect medium to build a community! With you and
your help, we want to make the Fann Family as big as possible so we can share
the Fanns with everybody.






Via facebook, we will present new members of the Fann Family, get your feedback
on the Fanns and maybe even develop and design new Fanns together with you. 






Your help will not go unrewarded







These are the great perks we will be offering in return for your support: 






Thankyouthankyouthankyou! This is great! We will let the know that you are an official Fann-Fan. We´ll have a special section on our homepage - and you are on it!


The Fanns write back! You are truly are special Fann-Fan! Because the Fanns are writing back offically and handwritten! A handwritten postcard is in the mail for you.


A Fann from the Fann-Family. You are an official member of the family! You will get one of the Fanns - together with a handwritten thank you postcard. Please don´t forget to write which Fann you have decided for.

Be the first - a Early-Bird-Fann. You are one of the first! This Fann will come later - but not for you! Finley is a early bird - the first Fann with a little pocket on his back for keys, pacifiers or other little things.


The exclusive campaign-Fann. This Fann is designed only for you and only for this indiegogo-campaign: Big Lucy in purple will be a real rarity! 


The whole family. Ok, everybody. But you are right, they should not be separated. 
The whole family and Lucy - it will never be like this again: Molly, Lester, Buster, Carl, Fred und Lucy! 
A customized Fann as a special model. There can be only one! We design and produce your own Fann and for you only. And he will be the only one of its kind.
We will name a Fann after you. A Fann of the next generation will carry your name. And you deserve it! Of course you will also get the whole family. After all you are a part of us now!
Design your own Fann. We know - you love them. You know them. So you will  design the next Fann which will be part of the official second generation. And of course you will also get the whole family. 
Important!







You don’t have your own paypal account? Not a problem! You can pay with your
credit card via paypal, too. If you don’t like that option, either, you can simply
transfer the money into our account  (Garden Street Management UG, Konto 455 87 104, BLZ 100 100 10 oder IBAN DE 7310 0100 1000 4558 7104, BIC PBNKDEFF (Postbank)). 








All you have to do is send us a corresponding email (to karsten@fanns.de), so we can match all
the information and get your requested perk on its way to you.








For any questions, ideas or comments, just drop us a line at karsten@fanns.de and
we’ll be in touch as soon as possible! 





We´ve got more in store






Of course we’re planning more collections with new Fanns, such as the Early Bird
Fann, who comes with a little backpack for those essential things that you simply
cannot afford to lose. Like your kid’s pacifier or your keys, for example.

Moreover, we are also planning to design and produce small and big bags, zipped
pouches (for a nappy, wet wipes and the spare pacifier for when you’re out and
about) or shoulder bags for that day out, bibs, onesies and nappy changing mats.
And with your help, we are sure we’ll come up with even more additions to the Fann
Family to make life easier and more relaxed. 






We are looking forward to your ideas!
 
Are you a retail/cooperation partner or would you like your own corporate Fann?






Of course we offer special rates for retailers, so simply contact us for a
quote!

Would you like your company’s very own Fann? We would be delighted to show
you our exciting ideas - just send us an email at karsten@fanns.de! 





Just another few words about the Fanns







We’ve designed the Fanns to be resilient yet cuddly so they can put up with a lot
and go through thick and thin with you. Obviously, you can wash the Fanns when
they get dirty or when they’ve been loved a little too much. Just don’t dry-clean,
tumble-dry or iron them - they’re really not too keen on that.










The Fanns are made from 65% cotton and 35% linen, a fabric manufactured in
compliance with the OEKO-TEX Standard 100. In other words, the fabric contains
absolutely no harmful substances, so you can play, cuddle and relax with them in
total peace of mind. 




One more thing:
Visit us on http://www.facebook.com/diefanns ... like us, share, follow us ... any help, any visit is appreciated!
Molly, Carl, Fred, Buster, Lester and all of us say Thank you!







We are very looking forward to your support and are immensely grateful to you.
Let’s hope you will enjoy the Fanns just as much as we do!

story:
Jeanitarian [jeen- i-tair-ee-uh n] noun

1. One having concern for or helping to improve the welfare and happiness of denim;  Pertaining to the saving of denim pants and the alleviation of their suffering. 


The Problem:

Shopping for jeans is a necessary evil.  You try on dozens of pairs before you finally find the perfect fit - you know, the pair that hugs you in all the right places and feels like a second skin? You wear them all the time, they make your butt look amazing, you fall in love, it's like they know you.  Then one day, you put a foot through a distressed area, or blow a hole in the knee.  Devastated.  The only feeling that could describe your future without your favorite pair of jeans.  The only thing worse is imagining the hunt for a pair that might even come close to replacing them.  

I'm Jennifer Fagan, and I have been a life long lover and wearer of denim . If you are anything like me, you have a beloved graveyard of booty fabulous jeans and jean skirts that you just can't bear to get rid of. You dream of the day some fashionable solution will appear to restore them to their previous state of fabulosity (that won't make you look like a hobo).

One morning I was putting on my beloved $200 Hudson distressed jeans when I put my toe through one of the distressed holes and ripped them for the last time. After swearing up a storm, I thought, "This is ridiculous! There must be a way to repair this and make them look distressed." So, i went to work on solving that problem...and what journey it has been! Initially I had a manufacturer distress yards and yards of denim, until I realized that destroying something to make something else doesn't sit well with me. 

I began looking  into various ways to create the look of distressed threads, and even built myself a loom out of PVC pipes.  I was on a quest to find the best way to produce what has now become Tatter Patch - the first ever iron-on designer threaded inner-patch that you can use to repair, revive or restyle your favorite denim, giving them a vintage distressed look in under 5 minutes. 

The Solution:

Click Here to See the How-To Video

It's As Easy As 1-2-3:


The Goods:

The Machine - After designing, testing, and revising several prototypes, I have discovered the perfect combination of design, raw materials, and user-friendly application.  In order to produce the Tatter Patch without murdering an entire population of innocent denim garments, I will need to purchase a machine that can create the new garment without the violence. $3500

The Packaging - In our quest to keep production costs low, we will be purchasing our packaging materials in bulk.  We have already fallen in love with the design - which allows customers to see the actual thread patch through a denim-printed package, illustrating how the patch will actually look when applied when they use it to rescue their favorite pair of jeans. $500

The Raw Materials - We have been producing small runs of the Tatter Patch by hand for testing and review, which is not the most cost effective way to purchase and produce an item.  When we reach our campaign goal, we will use the funds to purchase raw materials in bulk for our first major production run. $800


The Impact:

Tatter Patch is a simple patch that reinforces the hole but maintains that tattered, distressed look we all love. 

Emotional Impact: It's no surprise that there are 22,500 search results for "My favorite jeans ripped".  Great jeans become an extension of ourselves.  Over time, they fade stretch, and distress in ways unique to our bodies and our lifestyles, reflecting who we are when we wear them. That kind of best friend isn't easy to find. With Tatter Patch, you don't have to toss your best friend aside because of a little extra wear and tear.  Now that's priceless!

Economical Impact: Let's face it, jeans are expensive! According to the New York Times, the average price for premium jeans is just under $200. Now multiply that by the pairs of jeans in your closet. Fortunately, now you can use Tatter Patch to rescue once abandoned jeans, breathing new life into your wardrobe.  It's like a shopping trip in your own closet - only you already know you love the look and fit! 

Ecological Impact: The EPA reported that landfills in the United States receive about 20 billion pounds of old clothing each year. That's an average of 68 lbs of clothing per person per year. Now, we're not suggesting you hold on to the ugly Christmas sweater from your Aunt, but we are suggesting that you help save the planet and your favorite jeans from certain death. 


The Difference You Can Make:

We appreciate all of your support.  If you're already a backer and you're looking for additional ways you can help Save the Jeans, we have put together a couple ways you can get involved.  

1. You can share this campaign with your friends on social media. #savethejeans

2. You can email this campaign to your friends and family.

3. You can call all of your friends and tell them how to save their own favorite jeans.

4. You can write a letter to your congressman, urging them to raise awareness and Save the Jeans. (Ok, I'm only half kidding about this one.)

story:
AS SEEN ON


 

About The Designer Backpack

The Designer Backpack is a creative lifestyle statement, it’s about eliminating unnecessary details and keeping it simple while amplifying quality, functionality and comfort.

Intentionally is quite the opposite of a high-tech fully featured all in one backpack. It’s made for those who are comfortable keeping things elegantly simple.

Perfect for carrying everyday essentials including your laptop, camera and other items without compromising style.

It features adjustable padded shoulder straps for extra comfort, dedicated zip compartment to hold a 15-inch laptop, two quick access zip pockets on both sides, an internal deep zip pocket that fits an iPad , top and side leather handles.

Not All Backpacks Are Created Equal!

Backpacks can be bulky, heavy, packed with unnecessary features or simply have no style or elegance.

A common misconception amongst backpack makers that adding more features is better! The truth is that with more features, quality and style is principally tolerated!

Surely we get excited about features but soon this excitement fades!
 

Trend Fades, Style is Forever!

Functionality is not about adding more features, it’s about removing unnecessary ones!

Simplicity is way of life for people who believe that less is more! The Designer Backpack is merely a reflection of that thought and lifestyle.

We focus on quality of materials, shape and style, functionality and handcraft excellence, and that we believe makes us different!
 

The Designer Backpack - Master Edition
 

* Free Delivery on all perks except of the Leather Laptop Sleeve.
* All our products include a 1-Year warranty.

Traditional Retail Markups

The price you pay in traditional retail stores is marked up several times!

How? Between the cost of production and what comes out of your pocket generally pays for the following:

Brand’s retail and distribution costs, excessive marketing expenses, licensing fees, reseller markups, margin and taxes and a little extra more for the brand name.

 

We save you 70%

We distribute our products directly to you from our partner manufacturer. We have no inflated marketing expenses, no middlemen, no retail costs and no markups.

Realizing The Dream!

Since my graduation back in 2001 as UIUX designer, i’ve always had this deep urge to create meaningful products that i can touch and feel with my own hands, but my professional life was always pulling me way from making this dream come true.

A couple of years back while being in Istanbul for a short term project, i decided to start my own brand, where i can create beautifully designed, useful and authentic products and so i started otenteko.

I set out to create a modern and comfortable leather backpack for everyday creative lifestyle, a backpack that looks great anytime, anywhere!

Finding great leather from a reliable source was a challenge, luckily i was in Turkey, well known for producing the world’s finest natural leather with a heritage of craftsmanship that goes back to the 12th century.

After months of research, i found a great leather producer and a bag manufacturer, the same manufacturer who makes leather goods for high-end brands. Our relationship has developed into friendship, they believed in our mission as much as we believed in their commitment to excellence from inception to delivery.

There was a significant meaningfulness and pleasure felt at each stage of the production process, starting from concept design to sourcing leather, materials and hardware up until the final stages of delivering the first prototypes.

Named to celebrate creativity and creatives around the world. "The Designer" Backpack was born.
 

APRIL - MAY / 2017 – Materials Requirements Planning

MAY / 2017 – Sourcing Leather and Materials

JUNE - JULY  / 2017 – Manufacturing

JULY / 2017 – Staging Delivery

AUGUST / 2017 – Shipping Starts

We produce and fulfill our products from Istanbul!

We ship our products Express Delivery with DHL.

Delivery typically take 4-10 business days.

_________

Join our Members Club!
Members will always get the best deals before anyone!
We promise we'll keep your email safe with us. 

 

 

Your support will help us meet minimum production requirements, buying materials, launch a brand that we are passionate about and ultimately allow us to produce our next great product.

Fulfillment

Manufacturing involves a number of risks that might extend order fulfillment time. For that reason we have set up an office at the heart of our manufacturer headquarters to ensure quality of production and manage orders fulfillment.

Our anticipated delivery dates are reasonable estimates. If all runs smoothly you might get your backpack earlier than anticipated!

Customs & Duties

Otenteko is not responsible for any customs, duties or import fees when receiving your backpack.

Founded by Anas Alshanti in 2016 with one goal in mind, to design and produce products that enhances the quality of daily lives. We believe that design is the art of simplifying complex problems and offering real measurable value.


SUBSCRIBE TO OUR NEWSLETTER
- Good things will happen to those who sign up with us -


If you have feedback or questions, email us at:
anas@otenteko.com

story:
Thanks SO MUCH for your interest in our Campaign!

We appreciate every level of support, whether you are pre-subscribing for the limited-edition print, or simply want to help us preserve and sustain our fine-press studio.

We're very pleased to present our first limited edition print of our Sustaining Campaign, a stunning calligraphic tour de force from Julian Waters. Julian is world-renowned for his work, both commercial lettering, type design, and calligraphic fine-art. He continues the lineage of late German master calligrapher and type designer, Hermann Zapf. See  Wikipedia and Julian's Biography at Adobe.

The final design is now shown here, with Julian's elegant uncial script in red as counterpoint to the powerful fraktur. The quote "Letters are Symbols which turn Matter into Spirit" is one which resonates powerfully with all letter people! Calligraphers, type designers, typographers, printers and beyond!
We need your support to publish this fine edition, and to keep Slow Print/Driftless Book Arts going! 

Julian has generously provided this work in support of Driftless Letterpress and Book Arts Coop, and the funds raised (after production expenses) from this and future projects will be used to sustain the studio, improve the facilities, and retire outstanding obligations. We are planning a continuing series of similar collaborations from other extraordinary artists and designers.

The edition is a gorgeous two-color design using Julian's personal "fraktur" script, which is rooted in his historical studies of the writing of the 16th century German writing master Johann Neudörffer. Limited to 150 total, of which 100 will be available to supporters, and the remainder will go to the artist and printer.  The Fraktur form is perhaps the epitome of the calligraphic form, with enormous vitality exhibiting the essential nature of the 'chisel-edge' pen written letter.

Driftless Letterpress and Book Arts Coop is a letterpress studio in Dubuque Iowa. Founded by Peter Fraterdeus in 2007 as SlowPrint.com, we are focussed on producing unique world-class fine-art letterpress. Peter's background includes two National Endowment for the Arts grants (1981, 1985), teaching letterpress master classes in the US and EU, and developing the Drawing on Emptiness seminars. Peter has been printing on and off since the 1960s.  See Peter's complete bio

See the gallery for pics of previous fine-art projects printed at SlowPrint.

Also see slowprint.com and fraterdeus.com for more images.

Detail from Arcadian Stories II, limited edition print, 15"x22" on Italian mould-made Revere paper. Original drawing by Vladmir Fokanov (Belarus), published by S Egorov (US) printed at SlowPrint Letterpress by Peter Fraterdeus, 2013


Details from the ATypI São Paulo 2015 banner printed with wood type and metal on Japanese Cloud Dragon (Unryu-shi) paper. This piece is included in the perks for larger donations. Peter uses his own "monoprint" inking on the wood type, making each one unique
Also shown are the results from Peter's recent Master Class, a two-color two-sided coaster (prior to die-cutting). Workshops are held at venues across the US and in Europe. A private workshop for up to 6 people is the perk for the largest donations.

What We Need & What You Get

With a successful campaign of at least 80 subscriptions, we will print Julian's design from photopolymer plates on fine handmade Japanese and Italian Mouldmade papers. The print will be produced on our large format Vandercook 219. Sheet size approximately 11"x15" (28x38cm)

Pre-subscriptions will be available for the first 100 pieces in the edition. A total of 175-200 sheets will be printed, with the numbered edition consisting of 150 excluding any Artist's Proofs. The first numbers from 1-50 will be printed on handmade Japanese paper, with the remainder on Italian mould-made.

The Japanese paper is lighter in weight, with a magical translucency to the sheet. The Italian is heavier, allowing for a somewhat deeper impression.

Each print in the edition will be inspected by the artist, numbered, and signed by the artist and the printer. 

We expect the prints to be completed in March 2016, signed and shipped by mid-April.

We have no reason to think that the edition will not be completed as described, if the campaign is successful. If we do not receive enough subscriptions, the piece will not be produced.

The Impact

Your purchase of these prints (one or more) will enable us to sustain the operation of the letterpress studio. The Driftless Letterpress and Book Arts Cooperative was conceived to preserve the facilities, and provide access to qualified practitioners and students in the future. At this time, we are not yet incorporated, nor are we not-for-profit. Ongoing costs of the cooperative will be shared by the members, who will be encouraged to produce their own works in the facility.
Funds may also be used to retire obligations to current shareholders.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign! 

Copy and Paste — http://igg.me/at/DriftlessLetterpress-JulianWat...

More about Driftless Letterpress and Book Arts Coop on Facebook

Peter's Twitter and Instagram @ideaswords
story_txt:
Thanks SO MUCH for your interest in our Campaign!
We appreciate every level of support, whether you are pre-subscribing for the limited-edition print, or simply want to help us preserve and sustain our fine-press studio.

We're very pleased to present our first limited edition print of our Sustaining Campaign, a stunning calligraphic tour de force from Julian Waters. Julian is world-renowned for his work, both commercial lettering, type design, and calligraphic fine-art. He continues the lineage of late German master calligrapher and type designer, Hermann Zapf. See  Wikipedia and Julian's Biography at Adobe.

The final design is now shown here, with Julian's elegant uncial script in red as counterpoint to the powerful fraktur. The quote "Letters are Symbols which turn Matter into Spirit" is one which resonates powerfully with all letter people! Calligraphers, type designers, typographers, printers and beyond!

We need your support to publish this fine edition, and to keep Slow Print/Driftless Book Arts going! 
Julian has generously provided this work in support of Driftless Letterpress and Book Arts Coop, and the funds raised (after production expenses) from this and future projects will be used to sustain the studio, improve the facilities, and retire outstanding obligations. We are planning a continuing series of similar collaborations from other extraordinary artists and designers.The edition is a gorgeous two-color design using Julian's personal "fraktur" script, which is rooted in his historical studies of the writing of the 16th century German writing master Johann Neudörffer. Limited to 150 total, of which 100 will be available to supporters, and the remainder will go to the artist and printer.  The Fraktur form is perhaps the epitome of the calligraphic form, with enormous vitality exhibiting the essential nature of the 'chisel-edge' pen written letter.

Driftless Letterpress and Book Arts Coop is a letterpress studio in Dubuque Iowa. Founded by Peter Fraterdeus in 2007 as SlowPrint.com, we are focussed on producing unique world-class fine-art letterpress. Peter's background includes two National Endowment for the Arts grants (1981, 1985), teaching letterpress master classes in the US and EU, and developing the Drawing on Emptiness seminars. Peter has been printing on and off since the 1960s.  See Peter's complete bio
See the gallery for pics of previous fine-art projects printed at SlowPrint.
Also see slowprint.com and fraterdeus.com for more images.
Detail from Arcadian Stories II, limited edition print, 15"x22" on Italian mould-made Revere paper. Original drawing by Vladmir Fokanov (Belarus), published by S Egorov (US) printed at SlowPrint Letterpress by Peter Fraterdeus, 2013


Details from the ATypI São Paulo 2015 banner printed with wood type and metal on Japanese Cloud Dragon (Unryu-shi) paper. This piece is included in the perks for larger donations. Peter uses his own "monoprint" inking on the wood type, making each one uniqueAlso shown are the results from Peter's recent Master Class, a two-color two-sided coaster (prior to die-cutting). Workshops are held at venues across the US and in Europe. A private workshop for up to 6 people is the perk for the largest donations. The Japanese paper is lighter in weight, with a magical translucency to the sheet. The Italian is heavier, allowing for a somewhat deeper impression.
Each print in the edition will be inspected by the artist, numbered, and signed by the artist and the printer. 
We expect the prints to be completed in March 2016, signed and shipped by mid-April.

The Driftless Letterpress and Book Arts Cooperative was conceived to preserve the facilities, and provide access to qualified practitioners and students in the future. At this time, we are not yet incorporated, nor are we not-for-profit. Ongoing costs of the cooperative will be shared by the members, who will be encouraged to produce their own works in the facility.Funds may also be used to retire obligations to current shareholders.

story:
All good products start with the design and our focus was on style, features and comfort. This is why we started with high grade  stainless steel and designed the case from scratch, with 20mm lug width, for the perfect fit on your wrist. We chose to use 6 screw on the case back for ease of access and a crafted look.  

Next we chose Swiss Ronda Quartz movements for their accuracy and reliability. Both are Swiss made and both have a 3 year battery life. A simple trip to your local jeweller is all that required when the battery does eventually need replacing!  

Premium Sapphire Crystal, with anti glare coating on both sides, was an obvious choice for us. The clarity it gives is second to none, and its almost bullet proof in terms of durability.

We chose Swiss Super Lumi Nova for the hands for both its brightness and longevity of its afterglow. We wanted our watches to be stylish and practical!  

There’s a choice of 3 types of straps across the range – leather, mesh & link bracelet. Each one designed for style and comfort, and each one interchangeable across the collection. Additionally, they all feature a quick change spring bar so there is no need for tools to swap them over!

There’s nothing worse than a scratched watch glass. Well, apart from a broken one! Which is why we’ve used the best quality sapphire crystal we could find. Second only to diamond in hardness, our crystals are clear and tough, giving you the best view of the dial and hands.

It’s those tiny details that matter, which is why we made the decision that our watches would have not one, but two coatings of anti-glare on our wonderful crystals. One coating on the inside and one on the outside.

The result is a dial that is readable in any light, every minute of the day.

We didn’t want Argo and Eclipse to be daytime watches only. So we use the best lume on the market - Swiss-made Super-LumiNova - to ensure the hands on our watches are visible on the darkest of nights. We use C1 - the whitest Super-LumiNova - and GL-NL3, the blackest.

We love simplicity at Nation of Souls, but sometimes you want something a little bit more.

The sunray pattern on our Argo models adds an extra layer of intrigue to the dial, while the guilloche pattern on the Eclipse is a real statement that subtly shimmers as it catches the light.

Of course, what's going on inside a watch is just as important as the outside, which is why we partnered with market leader Ronda to put their 1 and 7 series movements in our watches. Both movements are gold plated, the Argo’s 7 series has 5 jewels and the Eclipse’s 1 series has 6.

Jewels are used in place of bearings in the movement, not only to look great but to enhance the lifetime of the movement. Jewelled movements last longer and are more accurate than other, cheaper movements.

Changing your watch battery every 6 months is a pain that you should not have to put up with. Our watches take either a Sony 321 or 364, providing each watch with 3 years worth of charge.

Once we decided on stainless steel for our watch cases, the choice of 316L was simple. This is just purely the most corrosion resistant and durable stainless steel out there for watch manufacture.

Your Nation of Souls watch comes with the strap shown in the gallery image for that individual model. However, all of the straps in the range are interchangable with any of the watches, so you can personalise by adding additional straps (Check Add Ons Section). And there is no need for any tools as every strap has a quick change spring bar.

Our leather straps are made with the highest quality full-grain leather.

Full-grain leather is the most durable and strongest leather available, making it a great choice for watch straps. This leather is then vegetable tanned, a natural process that is better for both the leather and you. The strap is then waxed to add to the durability and water-resistance, giving you a watch strap that looks great and lasts.

Our link bracelets use a premium butterfly clasp that significantly reduce the size of the catch. This makes the fit on your wrist much more comfortable than other bulky styles of clasp.

Our sleek, modern and flexible mesh straps are built for durability and comfort and made from 100% 316L grade stainless steel. During the development stage, the mesh material we use for these straps was upgraded to a much tighter weave. This not only gives the straps a smooth silky feel to the touch but also tremendous flexibility which, in turn, makes it very comfortable to wear.

When we started creating our Nation of Souls watches back in 2016, we studied what other watchmakers were doing. We loved some of what they did, and strongly disliked other things. Some watches were beautiful, but that beauty was superficial. Inexpensive but lacked premium quality. Impressive rhetoric but clearly just words when you handled the products.  

Which is why we wanted to make watches that gave you the quality you would expect from a large brand, but at a price point closer to these modern watchmakers.  

Our watches go direct from us to you. There are no middlemen to mark the price up. So you can have high quality watches at a very sensible price.

It's true to say that you don’t always get what you pay for with so called “premium” watches. We spent a considerable amount of time studying many different types of watches. This also included purchasing from a number of competitors in the market. We wanted to find a way to make our watches better. This is how:

Ours is not a story of a sudden movement, of a wind of change. It took us 18 months to go from conception to first prototypes. We did not want to create another watch that promised the world but delivered a lemon.

Every part in our watches was considered and chosen with care.

We studied other watches, how they worked, what was great and what wasn’t so great. And we found some wonderful watches. But none of them offered the right balance of classy elegance and quality of finish. The quality you would expect to see on a luxury watch.

We’ve taken delivery of more than 80 different prototypes since those first versions landed on our desks in November 2017.

In our quest for perfection, we wanted to be sure that every part was fit for the purpose it was designed for, and wouldn’t fail.

We chose our manufacturing partners because of their experience in creating watches for some of the world’s most respected watch brands. We count on their experience, while the quality of their standards and attention to detail match our own.

And the results are watches that we are extremely proud to put our name to.

Our watches are crafted with an attention to detail bordering on obsessive. We did spend 18 months getting them from concept to prototype after all! And this attention to detail, coupled with our belief in simply doing things right, is at the heart of what we do.  

Get the latest news, special offers and unique content on your favourite everyday watch on our social media channels.

story:
Hi Guys,


Thanks for stopping by my IGG. I appreciate you coming even this far. I’d like to start this off by introducing myself.

My name is Josh Welch, some of you know me as Juice. I have been an embroiderer, screen printer, and designer for close to 9 years. I have worked in some of the finest embroidery shops in Wisconsin and have even started my own. Over the years I have developed a large customer base and have met and worked with some very wonderful people.

Due to recent events beyond my control, I have lost access to my entire shop. To put it very plainly, I have nothing. No equipment, no supplies, and no storefront. Thanks to some amazing colleagues, I have embroidery machines at my disposal until I can get my own shop back up and running. Obviously, going from ground zero to a fully equipped, fully supplied embroidery shop is no small feat. This is where you guys come in! I am not usually one to ask for help, but I am reaching out for some now. I cannot stop doing what I do. I love helping all the bands, businesses, clubs, and people I work with get their patches, hats, jackets, and other embroidered goods done with the highest quality imaginable.


I have set up this IGG in hopes of being able to continue helping out all of the wonderful clients I spoke of and continue to make my living doing what I love!

What you're helping with:
  • $4,000 - $9,000 for a new machine.  I plan on buying a used Melco Amaya.  Depending on the age and condition, the price could be anywhere up to $9,000.
  • $2,000 + in Supplies, Supplies, Supplies!  Embroidery isn't cheap.  I will need needles, thread, twill, hoops, backing, and other miscellaneous shop supplies. This will also go towards making the promised perks!
  • The remainder of the money after all is set up will go to helping me recoup some loses from these few months.

With your help I promise to continue putting out products that I am proud of, and you will be too.  You are helping a small business get back on it's feet and helping me continue living my dream.

Thank you all so much.

Josh

story:
Our Story

We are working with local painters and carvers in India to bring to life six of the little known heroes from Hindu mythology before they get lost to time, including their amazing backstories. We worked to bring their looks up to date in modern toys, bringing the emotional impact of Western design to the intricate detail of Indian craftsmen. The result is that they are adorably lethal!


The toys are all made from local, sustainable materials by people who have their skilled craft going back for generations. The materials we use create museum quality pieces that can hold up to a child's rough play. We worked with the artisans to create designs that truly capture the heroes and add a new twist to them. These characters are so little known that even experts will likely learn something new about how the mythology all comes together.


What We Need & What You Get


We want to make these characters a reality, but as each toy is handmade, it costs a lot of money up front. That's where we need your help. Each toy is being fully handmade in a limited edition of 30, including the packaging and a card detailing the character's story.We are blind boxing each of the toys, which means we can keep the cost low and you get a surprise when you open it, just like your birthday! One out of every 5 toys is a special edition with extra vibrant colors and designs. You can also buy packs of blind boxes if you want a variety or to increase your odds. 


If you really have your eye set on one of the characters, we have the option to buy that as well, or the complete set (which your room or desk at work is really not complete without). There is also an extremely limited run of 10 sets of fully hand-carved versions of the characters that are truly stunning pieces of art. There are a few more variations you can get, leading up to a completely customized toy of you made by us. Find the ones that speak to you and we will make sure to put them aside for you.


Here are some samples of the toys themselves. These are just prototypes. The final versions will have the heads and bodies connected by magnets (so you can mix and match!) and some will have crowns connected by a little spring, so they wobble around.


In addition, here are some samples of the intricately hand carved pieces for collectors, which will also have magnets and bobble crowns.

There are many more to come, including color variations and more characters! We'll be sure to keep you up to date at every step along the way.


Each of the characters has a deep mythological history and an amazing story. Here is a breakdown of the six characters we have breathed new life into, along with some tidbits about their history.


Other Ways You Can Help

After you order the toys you want, tell your friends about these toys! Send them a link here so they can see the half-animal warriors for themselves and help our cause. We are keeping a journal of every step along the way at http://LittleKnownHeroes.com, where you can see all of our successes, failures, early prototypes, stories about each of the characters, and more as it happens. Join in the discussion!


With your help, this limited edition run will just be the first step toward future lines of toys with much bigger reach and you will have the first collector's pieces.

story:
Smartwatches offer a new level of convenience. Great, except for one problem: most people already have a watch! So why not make your own watch smart?

 Trivoly is fully developed and ships February 2016.


Trivoly is a tiny disc which fits effortlessly and discretely underneath your own watch. The disc works with the high-tech Trivoly app on your smartphone and is widely compatible with other apps.

  • Works with any watch
  • Works with iOS 8 - 9 on iPhone 5 and above
  • Works with all Android 4.4+ phones, marshmallow is not supported yet but will be released soon.
Silent vibrating alarms - Multi color LEDs for intuitive recognition - Sleek ergonomic design - Hypo allergenic: certified skin friendly - Water resistant - FCC and CE certified - Designed, engineered and manufactured in The Netherlands





Advanced fitness tracking

Trivoly's optical heart rate sensor and step counter give advanced fitness tracking, empowering you to keep up to speed with your fitness goals.

Data is sent straight to the Trivoly app, which cleverly filters out the stats to your favorite fitness apps.



Notifications

With the Trivoly app you can easily set your preferred color and vibration pattern for each notification. There is even a discreet setting to customize your Trivoly to avoid unwanted interruptions, by filtering priority contacts and silencing others. Because sometimes, you just want to be in touch with a select few...


Remote music

At the tip of your finger, Trivoly becomes a personal remote control for your music system. Skipping tracks, pause/play and even volume control! Trivoly works with Sonos, Spotify and iTunes.

Manage your music from your wrist!


Take amazing selfies

If you're bored of the same old 'selfie, Trivoly helps you snap that photo from a distance - up to 25 ft away!


Trivoly One and Trivoly Two



Risks and challenges

International Shipping

We will ship Trivoly worldwide. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region. 

Estimated Delivery

Production is beginning of May 2016. 
Indigogo Perks have the highest priority and will be shipped to you, our contributors, first.

Warranty

We stand firmly behind our products. Each Trivoly device comes with a minimum 1 year limited warranty.

Need help? We're here for you.

If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign has closed, you can always reach us at info@trivoly.com

Risks and challenges

We have already produced the first devices for testing, certification and – of course – this campaign. All the Trivoly devices shown in the video’s and on this page are real. We’re currently ramping up at our factory and are ready to meet the estimated delivery times.

Forecasting Risk

We’ve done our very best to forecast demand and create a solid production plan, but sometimes forecasts don’t always hit the mark. Should we miss projections, we’ll let you know why and make it right as quickly as possible.

Supply Chain Risk

Component delays and unexpected shortages can occur. If this happens, we’ll be sure to keep you informed and work to quickly solve the problem.
story_txt:
Smartwatches offer a new level of convenience. Great, except for one problem: most people already have a watch! So why not make your own watch smart? Trivoly is fully developed and ships February 2016.Trivoly is a tiny disc which fits effortlessly and discretely underneath your own watch. The disc works with the high-tech Trivoly app on your smartphone and is widely compatible with other apps.

Works with any watch

Works with iOS 8 - 9 on iPhone 5 and above
Works with all Android 4.4+ phones, marshmallow is not supported yet but will be released soon.

Silent vibrating alarms - Multi color LEDs for intuitive recognition - Sleek ergonomic design - Hypo allergenic: certified skin friendly - Water resistant - FCC and CE certified - Designed, engineered and manufactured in The Netherlands






















Advanced fitness tracking

Trivoly's optical heart rate sensor and step counter give advanced fitness tracking, empowering you to keep up to speed with your fitness goals.
Data is sent straight to the Trivoly app, which cleverly filters out the stats to your favorite fitness apps.


Notifications
With the Trivoly app you can easily set your preferred color and vibration pattern for each notification. There is even a discreet setting to customize your Trivoly to avoid unwanted interruptions, by filtering priority contacts and silencing others. Because sometimes, you just want to be in touch with a select few...






Remote music


At the tip of your finger, Trivoly becomes a personal remote control for your music system. Skipping tracks, pause/play and even volume control! Trivoly works with Sonos, Spotify and iTunes.
Manage your music from your wrist!







Take amazing selfies
If you're bored of the same old 'selfie, Trivoly helps you snap that photo from a distance - up to 25 ft away!









Trivoly One and Trivoly Two
















Risks and challenges
International Shipping
We will ship Trivoly worldwide. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region. 
Estimated Delivery
Production is beginning of May 2016. Indigogo Perks have the highest priority and will be shipped to you, our contributors, first.
Warranty
We stand firmly behind our products. Each Trivoly device comes with a minimum 1 year limited warranty.
Need help? We're here for you.
If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign has closed, you can always reach us at info@trivoly.com
Risks and challenges
We have already produced the first devices for testing, certification and – of course – this campaign. All the Trivoly devices shown in the video’s and on this page are real. We’re currently ramping up at our factory and are ready to meet the estimated delivery times.
Forecasting Risk
We’ve done our very best to forecast demand and create a solid production plan, but sometimes forecasts don’t always hit the mark. Should we miss projections, we’ll let you know why and make it right as quickly as possible.
Supply Chain Risk
Component delays and unexpected shortages can occur. If this happens, we’ll be sure to keep you informed and work to quickly solve the problem.

story:
We would like to present to you a very unique cufflink. It has an inlaid piece of oak wood, carved from an old whisky barrel. A barrel that has been used to age the finest brand of scotch whisky

 

Bundled with the cufflinks comes a small book with the entire history of the oak. Where it was cut, by whom, how it was made into a barrel, what kind of beverage was aged in it and how it got shipped to Scotland.. We will even tell you the age and brand of the whisky it contained! 

 

These cufflinks are the first accessories from OAK. A new brand for the elegant gentleman who appreciates a truly fine whisky. 

 

OAK will not only make you look good, it will make you feel even better. This I can promise since we plan to support the fight against prostate cancer, by donating at least $10 per sold cufflink to the cause, as a tribute to our fathers. Unfortunately these donations will start after the campaign. We are not allowed to do it as long as it is running. 

 

 

We have used 3D printing extensively to test the size, function and look of the cufflinks. We can confidently say that this will be the finest pair of cufflinks you have ever owned. Continue reading and you will understand why.

  • The face is inlaid with a piece of oak that has been carved from a used whisky barrel - For style, passion and soul.
  • The backing has a curved surface - For easy fitting and elegance.
  • Fixed solid neck - For stability and ease of use.
  • Curved neck - For a better fit and to prevent rotation.
  • The perfect neck length - For less wrinkling of the cuff.
  • Neck with an oval cross section - For stability and to better fit the buttonhole.
  • Flat surface on the inside of the back - To prevent accidental unbuttoning.

 

 

Each pair of cufflinks will have a unique serial number. Use this number when you register at our website to identify the barrel where the oak originates from. This in turn will open up all kinds of possibilities. One of them will be to purchase the whisky from that same barrel. This, however, is a future feature and won't be available upon launch.

 

You love whisky and care about people and appearance. Well, that or you know of someone who does and would love to get one of these as a unique gift. You might also be one of those people who want your things to mean something. To be something more than what it appears. To have a history, ambition and a soul of its own.

This is just the beginning. Join us and be part of it all.

 

It would be really really helpful if you would give us 30 seconds of your time and share this campaign with your friends. Even if you don't, you're still awesome!   

 

Well, here we are. Two friends full of ideas and a will to accomplish something. We decided that if you read this far you deserved to see all the awkward photos of us, not just ones where we were beautiful and awesome... 

We then spent hours upon hours trying to shoot some really crappy ones.. but you know, it was almost impossible. Eventually, these came up. Enjoy! 

Credits: 

Photos: Magnus Orwell and Villjam Edström
Video: Villjam Edström
Cufflink design: P-A Gustafsson and Villjam Edström
3D model: P-A Gustafsson
Special thanks to: Andreas Scharin

Web: oak.company
Facebook: @oakcompanybrand
Instagram: @oak.company
Twitter: @OAK_Company
LinkedIn: Villjam Edström, P-A Gustafsson
Collaborators: Command Partners

 

Risks and challenges

To minimize the risks involved, we have made sure that everything works perfectly from the casting process to the final assembly and shipment from the factory. On top of that we have made numerous small changes, and really scrutinized the final prototypes. We can with confidence and pride say that you will receive your promised cufflinks, and that you will be amazed!

story:
ME

From the busy capital of England. Where everything is always moving. A real place of diverse culture. Unfortunately , I'm still at school doing the best i can to get by. We all go through it , unfortunately I'm still in the midst of that process. A massive fanatic of fashion and designing. Also very into football & of course i support Arsenal !

I'd really like to be able to unleash my artistic designs on the world ! I have many designs that I haven't been able to manufacture due to monetary factors. 

Seeing so many brands out there that produce high quality products but place them at an unreachable price margin saddens me. I love to spend money on high quality clothes but most brands make it hard for me to do so !

I WANT TO MAKE HIGH QUALITY CLOTHING AT AN AFFORDABLE PRICE !

I'D BE EVER SO GRATEFUL FOR ANY SUPPORT !

It would mean i would be able to manufacture samples and actually get this clothing out to friends , family and most importantly the whole WORLD!

To share my creative designs with  all would be the dream accomplished!

THE SUPPORT FROM EVERY SINGLE CONTRIBUTOR IS AMAZING ! 


STEPS TO PROGRESS


Well. Firstly i'll be getting these sampled with a local company who have been very helpful with filling me with everything i should possibly be aware of in the fashion sector! They'd help me with pattern grading , sizing , and finally create a sample for it then to be produced a bit more!

Here's what I've managed to get produced with a very thin budget !


- Above is an image of the MS V APPAREL LARGE ORIGINAL LOGO TEE

- Designed & printed in white vinyl on a comfortable 100% cotton Tee.

- Above is the Zebra Slouchy Sleeves & Chest Panel Tee

PART OF OUR ZEBRA COLLECTION WE HAVE IN STORE !

- GRAB THE WHOLE COLLECTION IN OUR PERKS !

- Finite Material , Sown with extreme care

- Zebra Cotton Inspired From a Trip abroad !

- THE MSVA BLACK AURA PRINT DESIGN

- Black Vinyl on a Comfortable White Cotton Tee

- AN EXCLUSIVE DESIGN , DRAWN AND CREATED BY US !


YOUR SUPPORT COULD HELP RELEASE AND MANUFACTURE THE GARMENTS ABOVE AND ALSO GET STARTED ON SAMPLING FOR THE SEVERAL DESIGNS WE HAVE IN STORE 


From then on these samples will be manufactured more & hopefully shipped out to everyone of you ! ! !

I can't wait to get some of these designs out there.

In certain deep moments of my fairly short lived life inspiration has driven me to create some really special stuff. With special materials which i found in different countries & different ideas from a few other creative minds , just writing about it sparks EXCITEMENT at my fingertips!

I just want the opportunity to share this with you guys !

If i do fall slightly short of target its no biggy we've all gotta start somewhere right !

and i'd make sure the donations really did begin something special!!


CHANGE

Its sad , but the reality is that a lot of high end streetwear brands place there items at an extremely high price. They dont actually get happiness from seeing people wear there garments. For them its all about the money.

A brand has to change something, make a difference.

That's what MS V APPAREL strives to do , provide high quality clothing at a reasonable price for everyone ! WORLDWIDE.


I have so many designs i would like to spring onto a garment and get produced . I'm itching for people to be able to wear some really unique stuff. It can be hard to do so on a very small budget while studying ! I need your your support to get this art , moving !

Once off on our feet i will be releasing everything I've already designed on paper every 3 months or so ! The aim is to be able to provide a higher quality of clothing at an affordable price which a very small quantity of companies do right now.


DONT FORGET ANY SORT OF INPUT IS APPRECIATED A LITTLE WORD HERE AND THERE ABOUT US OR EVEN CLICKING THE SHARE BUTTON!


THANK YOU

story:
Jars come in varying heights but spoons mostly come in the standard avg. 7 inch height. This makes it hard to leave a spoon in a jar to reuse. After scooping contents from a jar, we are forced to either discard the disposable spoon or wash the metal spoon each time. We wanted to rethink this and create a simple solution that could save resources.


What if there was a convenient way to use a single spoon for any jar? And that's how OneSpoon was born. OneSpoon is a BPA free food safe, dishwasher, microwave and freezer safe, one-size-fits-all spoon designed for reuse.

Over 30 Billion plastic utensils are used just in the US each year. This only grows many-fold across the world. Each OneSpoon could save on avg. 15-30 disposable spoons per jar or spoon washes respectively. Imagine what a million spoons could do! 


Patent pending curve design avoids inadvertent breaking during regular use.






Each OneSpoon can save 15-30 disposable spoons or spoon washes depending on the size of the jar. Can you imagine how many resources a million OneSpoons can save? Our vision is to create every piece of cutlery with a similar design as OneSpoon, while keeping the cost close to regular disposable spoons. Your support will help us get there by mass producing OneSpoon and creating a sustainable future. We are raising these funds to invest in dual cavity molds, procure materials and most importantly to prove the interest in the concept. 

We're very excited for you to try OneSpoon and share it with your friends and family.


Although the idea sounded simple, we encountered complexities, such as
  • Getting the right snap with a clean look after the snap
  • Maintaining the core strength despite the snap-grooves
  • Avoiding inadvertent snapping with regular use
  • Avoiding food getting stuck in snap-grooves and many more...
Thanks to our experienced design team, we were able to find innovative solutions. We went through 10+ design iterations and 100+ snap tests to get the precise product.


1) What material is Onespoon made of?

OneSpoon is made from BPA free Polypropylene. It's the same material used to make baby bottles.  PP is a very safe food grade plastic.

"Polypropylene containers do not leach harmful chemicals into foods or liquids" - Livestong (http://www.livestrong.com/article/158674-which-plastic-containers-can-i-safely-use/)

2) Is OneSpoon Dishwasher safe?

Yes. OneSpoon is dishwasher and freezer safe so you can wash and reuse if needed.

3) Can you attach the snapped pieces back to the spoon handle to increase height again?

No. The OneSpoon is designed to keep costs comparable to disposable spoons. The attaching mechanism would increase costs and also the strength would not be the same as original.

4) What is the future of OneSpoon?

We are currently investigating bio-plastic and wood options for future. However, these materials are not BPA free for long term storage, quite brittle and snap inadvertently. Our goal is to invest further in R&D and create such products in the near future. We will also extend the design to other cutlery.

story:
WE WILL CONTACT YOU

AFTER YOU PRE-ORDER

TO PICK YOUR COLOUR

CHOICES :)

Oh and if you're thinking - "I can't possibly buy these as I need a prescription lens" ... we can do prescription for an extra £25! Bargain.



OK cool video now briefly tell me what these are?

  • Sili Sunglasses are a pair of sunglasses you can customise yourself with interchangeable arms, frames and lenses. You can stamp on them too if you like and they won't break. Take that Rayban! BOOM POW!
  • Sili's are made from a high strength lightweight polymer, enhancing their durability ... it's incredibly flexible as well! 
  • With interchangeable arms and lenses you can customise your sunglasses as and when you wish. Either swap with friends or simply buy new arms frames or lenses separately!
  • Sili's utilise detachable arms not only for customisation but also to increase the durability of the glasses ... the arms simply detach on impact (whether you step, drop, sit etc) and can be reattached with a simple click.
  • Sili Sunglasses will launch in 10 different colours
  • 5 Polarised, polycarbonate lens colour options. 100% UV Protection. Scratch Resistant.
  • 10 arm and frame colour options
  • Create over 5,000 different styles
  • Sili Sunglasses are made to last FOREVER! We believe in our product so much that we will offer you a lifetime guarantee with every pair.


    What do you need and what will I get?

    • We need to raise £8000 for our first production run. This will enable us to purchase our first minimum order and give you the chance to grab your very own Sili Sunglasses.
    • With each purchase of Sili Sunglasses you will receive an additional pair of arms of your choice so you can start to explore the different variations from the word GO.
    • Sili Sunglasses come with a lifetime guarantee on all parts so if you manage to break a pair of Sili Sunglasses we will replace the parts and get you rocking Sili once again! 



    We'll be launching with 10 frame/arm colours initially.

    All of them will be interchangeable so you can create your favourite mix!

    Colours are being finalised as we speak so the shades shown above may change slightly but we'll show you finished colours before you make you final choice once the gig is over!

    We've come a long way with our frame material ... a really long way!

    To cut a long story short: we've made some pretty shocking glasses along the way but we've now found a material that we think is pretty much perfect,

    Our material is extremely flexible. It bends but bounces right back to it's original shape. It doesn't warp in the sun and the colours look fantastic. It's lighter than conventional sunglasses plastic so makes our glasses comfortable to wear.

    We needed a plastic which would be hard wearing enough to endure countless removals of the arms and lenses. We've popped our lenses out and snapped the arms on and off hundreds of times during the testing of our samples with no wear and tear to the plastic whatsoever. Our frames are made to LAST.


    Our lenses are made from a shatter resistant polycarbonate plastic resulting in an extremely durable and tough lens.

    Each side is protected with a scratch proof layer to keep your lenses looking clean and fresh.

    With UV400 protection you can be safe in the knowledge that your pair of Sili's will keep your eyes protected even in the brightest of sun.

    We ONLY offer polarised lenses as we don't want to lessen the quality of our product with cheap lenses. The vision clarity is excellent and you'll get a slightly varied tint on life depending on the colour lens you choose.

    There will be 5 lens colours to choose from at launch:

    Carbon Black
    Midnight Blue
    Fire Yellow
    Purple Gaze
    Green Envy

    And because we've made them easy to pop in and out you can interchange as and when you want ... you could even have each lens a different colour if you really want to go crazy!


    The Impact

    • Sili Sunglasses aim to change how sunglasses are used in the industry. No longer will you have to worry about taking your favorite sunglasses out when wanting to do sports or general activities in fear of breaking them.
    • We aim to be a major player in the mid-range sunglasses market. The sunglasses market is monopolised by one main company. There is space in the market for a custom sunglasses brand like ours and we know we can make waves around the world!
    • We have been into extreme sports all our lives and struggle to find any sunglasses that we can use and don't break when pushing the limits! Sili changes that.
    • Sili's have been designed around YOU the user - with style, durability and customisation at the forefront of that design.
    • Sili Sunglasses are like pets. They're not just for Christmas they're for LIFE.


    Why should I help you guys?


    • We are ready to roll with this and have our manufacturer on hold just waiting for funds. Once we get the money in the bank and the product ordered you should have your glasses sometime in December 2014.
    • We are both from marketing and design backgrounds and have all the skills to take this brand to the next level. We'll be working on new designs and enhancing the technology used as the brand develops. We both run businesses already and if you help us launch this we WILL make it into a worldwide successful brand. We promise.
    • Our biggest challenge is funding as without this we can't take Sili to the top. We need your help to start our first production run. After a LOT of time, money, sweat and tears spent sampling and getting the right material we are reaching out to you to help us make Sili Sunglasses a reality.

    Any other ways for ME to help?

    • Please remember that EVERY LITTLE HELPS. Just by clicking the SHARE, LIKE, & FOLLOW buttons you're helping us spread the word to 1000's of others
    • Buy a wristband! It's only £5 with free shipping so if you can't afford to help out by buying the glasses, maybe help out by getting a wristband :-)
    • Also please remember word of mouth - if you can mention our campaign to anyone and everyone to help us create awareness we would be extremely grateful. 

    We hope you love Sili Sunglasses as much as we do and thank you for taking the time to check out our campaign!

  What do you need and what will I get?
 
We need to raise £8000 for our first production run. This will enable us to purchase our first minimum order and give you the chance to grab your very own Sili Sunglasses.
With each purchase of Sili Sunglasses you will receive an additional pair of arms of your choice so you can start to explore the different variations from the word GO. 


Sili Sunglasses come with a lifetime guarantee on all parts so if you manage to break a pair of Sili Sunglasses we will replace the parts and get you rocking Sili once again! 











We'll be launching with 10 frame/arm colours initially. All of them will be interchangeable so you can create your favourite mix! Colours are being finalised as we speak so the shades shown above may change slightly but we'll show you finished colours before you make you final choice once the gig is over! 




We've come a long way with our frame material ... a really long way!To cut a long story short: we've made some pretty shocking glasses along the way but we've now found a material that we think is pretty much perfect,Our material is extremely flexible. It bends but bounces right back to it's original shape. It doesn't warp in the sun and the colours look fantastic. It's lighter than conventional sunglasses plastic so makes our glasses comfortable to wear. We needed a plastic which would be hard wearing enough to endure countless removals of the arms and lenses. We've popped our lenses out and snapped the arms on and off hundreds of times during the testing of our samples with no wear and tear to the plastic whatsoever. Our frames are made to LAST. 



Our lenses are made from a shatter resistant polycarbonate plastic resulting in an extremely durable and tough lens.Each side is protected with a scratch proof layer to keep your lenses looking clean and fresh.With UV400 protection you can be safe in the knowledge that your pair of Sili's will keep your eyes protected even in the brightest of sun.We ONLY offer polarised lenses as we don't want to lessen the quality of our product with cheap lenses. The vision clarity is excellent and you'll get a slightly varied tint on life depending on the colour lens you choose. There will be 5 lens colours to choose from at launch:Carbon BlackMidnight BlueFire YellowPurple GazeGreen Envy And because we've made them easy to pop in and out you can interchange as and when you want ... you could even have each lens a different colour if you really want to go crazy! 





  The Impact Sili Sunglasses aim to change how sunglasses are used in the industry. No longer will you have to worry about taking your favorite sunglasses out when wanting to do sports or general activities in fear of breaking them. 

We aim to be a major player in the mid-range sunglasses market. The sunglasses market is monopolised by one main company. There is space in the market for a custom sunglasses brand like ours and we know we can make waves around the world! 

We have been into extreme sports all our lives and struggle to find any sunglasses that we can use and don't break when pushing the limits! Sili changes that. 

Sili's have been designed around YOU the user - with style, durability and customisation at the forefront of that design. 



Sili Sunglasses are like pets. They're not just for Christmas they're for LIFE.






  Why should I help you guys?
We are ready to roll with this and have our manufacturer on hold 
just waiting for funds. Once we get the money in the bank and the 
product ordered you should have your glasses sometime in December 2014.

We are both from marketing and design backgrounds and have all the skills to take this brand to the next level. We'll be working on new designs and enhancing the technology used as the brand develops. We both run businesses already and if you help us launch this we WILL make it into a worldwide successful brand. We promise. 

Our biggest challenge is funding as without this we can't take Sili to the top. We need your help to start our first production run. After a LOT of time, money, sweat and tears spent sampling and getting the right material we are reaching out to you to help us make Sili Sunglasses a reality.

  Any other ways for ME to help?
 Please remember that EVERY LITTLE HELPS. Just by clicking the SHARE, LIKE, & FOLLOW buttons you're helping us spread the word to 1000's of others

Buy a wristband! It's only £5 with free shipping so if you can't afford to help out by buying the glasses, maybe help out by getting a wristband :-) 


Also please remember word of mouth - if you can mention our campaign to anyone and everyone to help us create awareness we would be extremely grateful.  
 We hope you love Sili Sunglasses as much as we do and thank you for taking the time to check out our campaign!

story:
Garry Tonon - Metamoris 5 Walkout Shirt:

Pro Jiu-Jitsu player Garry Lee Tonon will be laying down the leg-locks once again at Metamoris 5 on November 22nd in Long Beach CA at the Long Beach Convention Center. Hand-Printed on premium cotton/poly blend  crew-neck that wont shrink, with a fashion fit that is comfortable and long lasting. These shirts are Hand-Printed and limited edition, order before November 18th to get your shirt in time for the show.

  • Heather Blue
  • Crew-Neck
  • 50% Cotton (30/1 Ring-Spun Combed Cotton) 50% Polyester
  • Slim Fit

Hand-Printed shirts have a unique quality that is hard to reproduce, creating a worn in look with slight variations in design appearance.

All Brawlsy shirts are Limited Edition and go very fast, don't miss out...

 Made Exclusively in the U.S.A.

Unlike other Cotton t-shirts on the market, ours is made with ring-spun combed cotton, giving it an ultra soft, worn in feel and superior drape. Shirt should be washed before first use.


Just a heads up...

This deal is only here, and when the perks are gone, they are gone, simple as that.


Risks & Challenges

pfft! We don't need no stinking Risks & Challenges... no seriously, shirts are ordered and being made; if you put your money down, you will get a shirt... and on time. How about that!

story:
We are MANAVA, a social enterprise founded in 2016 which was created to support a sustainable and financial future for Cambodian artisanal women. Working closely with our artisans we create carefully designed handwoven rattan quality products such as bags and baskets.

MANAVA is not only about creating beautiful products, it is also about how these products are  impacting the artisans lives. Together with you as a conscious consumer, we can significantly improve their lives.

Each product inspired by a Kbach symbol and has a story to tell. For example, the ‘Fish tooth' basket is inspired by the Kbach fish tooth symbol. We used this symbol to create our own unique pattern.

Cambodian women living in villages are often unemployed and even if they do have a job, the average income is between $50 to $70 per month. With most of the families having between 4-6 children, it makes life difficult.

FACTS AND FIGURES:
• 72% of Cambodians live on less than $3/day
• 70% of women work in vulnerable employment
• 30% of men perpetrate physical or sexual abuse toward their partner
• 60% of women have not attended secondary school 
• Women in Cambodia are at an economic disadvantage in terms of wages and incur spousal economic abuse

OUR CURRENT SOCIAL IMPACT
• We currently provide fair incomes to 15 artisans
• Since joining MANAVA, our artisan income and family contribution has significantly increased by 75%
• We empower the creativity of our artisans by offering quality level weaving training and we promote personal development

With MANAVA, the women understand that their opinions matters and that they can work in a fair environment where companionship, crafts, and happiness flourish.


ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACT
We work with a rattan palm material called “pdau” and willow grass called “la paek”. These palm and grass are fast growing and found throughout Cambodia. Because we believe in sustainable harvests, we carefully limit what we reap in order to provide for continued future growth season after season. 

We use non-toxic powder dyes entirely derived from plants and flowers. These raw materials are all organic and free of pesticides and herbicides which helps to keep our environmental footprint to a minimum.


With your support we can provide 35 new women professional weaving training and a fair job. With a total workforce of 50 weavers we can meet demand from large clients and build lasting relationships. The goal will be to foster better lives for our artisans and share the beauty of MANAVA’s products.

Furthermore, the funds will allow us to offer a life skills program to all of our weavers. The life skills program will be in partnership with a NGO called Women’s Resource Center which will provide education in financial management, healthcare, family planning, domestic violence prevention, English literacy, and more.



WITH YOUR SUPPORT WE CAN REACH OUR GOALS
MANAVA is launching a Indiegogo campaign with the goal of raising $10,000. Each purchase will help support our goals​. Please join us and together we can make a significant difference in the lives of these Cambodian women and their families.





We will send you 3 unique photo prints of Cambodia. These prints will be on banana paper made by Ashi, a partner we are collaborating with. The banana paper is made from 70% banana fiber and 30% recycled bottle fiber. How cool is that? 



A classic tote bag for all your groceries and shopping. Made especially for this campaign, we have designed a tote bag with one of the Cambodian Kbach (art) symbols. This particular Khmer character represents Kesol, which signifies the stamen of a flower. The design is printed by a non-profit social enterprise that contributes to creating a sustainable future for former Siem Reap street children and their families.




Exclusively for this campaign we have created a unisex T-shirt displaying one of the Cambodian Kbach (art) symbols. The symbols written in Khmer characters represent Tronoung Neak, which means the spine of a dragon.  Available in small, medium, large, and extra large sizes. The design is printed by a non-profit social enterprise that contributes to creating a sustainable future for former Siem Reap street children and their families.





New product! Use these natural and indigo blue colored coasters as a placemat or a coaster for things such as drinks, plants, candles, etc. These coasters/placemats are hand-woven by our artisans. Diameters: 10, 17, 24, and 31 cm.



This compact rattan cross-over bag is great for every day use and makes a wonderful present or just treat yourself.  Handwoven by our artisans, this bag features a soft black fabric lining complimented with a durable exterior leather handle. Dimensions: 21 x 12 x 7.5 cm.

 











Ka-Lai Chan and Baraing Tho met each other in 2016 and shared the same vision. Ka-Lai, a Dutch designer and entrepreneur for 10- years, decided to leave The Netherlands in order to pursue her dreams and desires of empowering artisans in a developing country while also creating a unique product collection. Baraing is a young local Khmer man who has worked for several creative and reputable NGO's, such as Silkscreen printing lab and Cambolac and was just about to start something on his own. His heart lays with helping people. 

 

Where can I see more photos?​
View our extended product collection with close-up of the products here.

Can I contribute without claiming a perk? 
If you want to donate to our campaign without claiming a perk, your entire donation will go directly to our weaving training. Simply click on the pink "Back It" button at the top of the page, next to our video and follow the instructions. 

Where do you ship? 
We ship worldwide.

Who is responsible for duties/VAT/custom charges?
Backers will be responsible for any applicable custom or duties.

How is the employment your offer sustainable? 
We provide the weavers with paid training, supplies, and materials. In addition, allowing them to work from home, they can also care for their families. By focusing on creating high quality creative products, we hope to ensure sustainable sources of income and careers for the future of these women.
