story:
Everything started about one year ago when I bought a Nintendo Switch for my son. Because of its unique shape, it didn’t fit well in any of his bags. I asked if he’d like to go shopping for a new bag, but he replied: “No, I want the bag that Papa designs!” And so began the journey to make the perfect bag to carry the Switch around town.

We designed a minimal bag with a focus on protection, accessibility, and quality materials that was just the right size to carry your Switch and a few daily essentials. The removable center divide not only protects your screen but it also holds 12 games. And because it’s removable it means your bag will have a life beyond the Switch, opening up the possibility to carry a variety of things -- even a mirrorless camera and a spare lens.

We wanted to make sure this bag will be useful beyond the life of the Switch. What do you carry in your Switch Bag?

       

The Standard Switch Bag and the Pro Switch Bag share these remarkable features:

  • Vegan friendly
  • Durable water resistant fabrics
  • Removable shoulder straps with 38mm webbing
  • Matte gunmetal hardware: including a custom tri-glide with an engraved Séfu logo
  • Removable center divide: protects your screen, holds 12 games, and is held in place by magnets
  • Protective foam
  • Extra strappy things: attach your bag to your belt or bike handles!

 They’re pretty similar to each other, so let’s break down the differences.

Our Pro Switch Bag is made with 500D Cordura Brand Nylon 66 fabric, available in Black and Space Grey. The Pro bag also includes a layer of of Poron XRD Extreme Impact Foam along the sides and bottom. It is a no compromises bag that uses the best materials we could find.  

The lid on the Pro Switch Bag uses two 25mm magnetic snap buckles. It’s a one-of-a-kind technology combining the advantages of strong magnets to make them easy to close and secure snap functionality to ensure a high locking force. 

 

The lid on the Standard Switch Bag uses simple magnets for closure. It’s the fastest solution for opening and closing your bag, and strong enough to keep your valuables inside. The 600D Polyester fabric and is available in fun color options. It uses standard EVA foam instead of Poron XRD. 

Both the Standard and the Pro Switch Bags include two strips of 38mm webbing with velcro on the back of the bag. Like the rug in The Big Lebowski, it just kinda ties the room together — but it’s not without its functionality!

Take the velcro and attach it to your bicycle, or thread your belt through the loops and wear it as a fanny pack. Maybe attach some carabiners and hang it from your backpack? It’s up to you!

Our Deluxe bag is made from a cowhide exterior and a lambskin interior. Each bag is hand-cut, hand-sewn, and hand-finished by skilled artisans. It features brass alloy hardware with a classic brass finish. At launch the bag will be available in three limited colorways. 

This is the perfect bag for the fashion conscious gamer. It's the kind of thing that will look better as it ages and with proper care can last a lifetime. Because it is hand-made our rate of production is limited, and so our reward tiers will be limited as well.

We made our first few prototypes in our own design studio. We've been testing some version our Switch Bag every day for the past year and have brought them with us around the world. Finally we are at the point where we feel confident that you will love your Switch Bag as much as we do.

Shipping and VAT

We're trying hard to limit Shipping and Taxes for our backers. There will be no hidden fees for backers in the USA and in the EU (your VAT is included in the price of the bag). For all other regions, please be familiar with your country's import policies and know that you may be responsible for customs duty or VAT when you receive your package. More information will be added here and in the FAQ and Updates as we gain volume in other regions. *Note: Early Adopter (Not Early Bird) Reward Tiers may have to pay EU VAT.

Want More Than One Switch Bag?

Additional bags will be available via a Backerkit survey at the Early Bird pricing after the Kickstarter. You can expect reduced shipping on your second bag as well!

Bag Colors

You will select your bag colors after the campaign finishes via a Backerkit survey. If we hit certain stretch goals we may also make other colors available and open up the floor to voting during the campaign.

We are a functional fashion brand. We design products that solve problems, are easy to use, and make you look cool. Our name is pronounced ”Say Foo”. This sound has a few Japanese interpretations that are relevant to our brand, including: “Safe”. With the Séfu Switch Bag we created a simple bag that is protective, stylish, well organized, and easy to access. Now you can bring your Switch with you everywhere you go!

Thomas Grové, Founder and Creative Director
Hey! I'm Thomas Grové. Before becoming a fashion designer, I was a videogame designer. I also collaborated with David Sirlin on the Yomi card game.

Our Switch Bag project is near and dear to my heart for several reasons: First of all it was inspired by my son who told me that he wanted "a bag that Papa designs" for his Nintendo Switch. Next, I'm just a huge fan of the Switch. My most recent game design job was in freemium mobile games which -- I have to be honest -- I like premium games with real buttons! The Switch has captured our imaginations, it has great design, and has proven there's still a market for premium games. And finally, this project has been a way for me to connect my past three years of fashion design experience with my ten years of game design experience. 

For more information about Séfu and our bag for the Nintendo Switch, please check out our website: http://sefu.jp and please follow us on Instagram: @sefustyle, Facebook, YouTube, and Twitter: @sefustyle.

story:
We are launching 4 styles with their own unique design and personality.

 

Our product is intended for current and future breastfeeding mothers who want to protect their intimacy thanks to a beautiful and quality nursing cover. Its functional side combined with its design makes it unique on the market. 

 

Easy to put on,  Easy to remove, Easy to carry, So you can use it anytime, anywhere...

 

The Sweat Summer, vibrant yellow, with black pompom sleeves is perfect for summer days.

 

The Boho Chic, sleek, with a touch of lace suits all your feminine outfits by giving your styles a little bohemian side

.

 

The Black Evening, sexy and classy with its swiss muslin and lining, will suit all your outdoor activities.

 

The Pink Street, streetwear-inspired cocooning, with its hood and embroidered logo, goes well with jogging pants or jeans

 

We selected the best fabrics and the best professionals to create our products. 

 

Close to you, baby feels safe. He's protected from the wind, the dust and the sun. 

 

One size fits all. From XS to XL, yes, we did the tests.

 

Dorothée - Founder

"When I breastfed my children, I sometimes felt the need to protect my intimacy and I did not find the accessory that really suited me
So we tried to create something feminine and refined. 
An accessory that goes with all women, in which they feel beautiful and intimate. 
We first looked for soft and comfortable materials to wear. 
Then, we worked on the styles, so that each nursing cover has its own personality, that it is functional and beautiful. 
The most important thing for me is that every breastfeeding woman has the freedom to choose her intimacy while still using a feminine and trendy product created especially for her.
That's how "Emma Moe" is born."

Our nursing covers are shipping in July 2019 ! 

 

We would love to get in touch with you, so do not hesitate :

info@emmamoeandme.com

www.emmamoeandme.com
story_txt: We are launching 4 styles with their own unique design and personality. Our product is intended for current and future breastfeeding mothers who want to protect their intimacy thanks to a beautiful and quality nursing cover. Its functional side combined with its design makes it unique on the market.  Easy to put on,  Easy to remove, Easy to carry, So you can use it anytime, anywhere... The Sweat Summer, vibrant yellow, with black pompom sleeves is perfect for summer days. The Boho Chic, sleek, with a touch of lace suits all your feminine outfits by giving your styles a little bohemian side. The Black Evening, sexy and classy with its swiss muslin and lining, will suit all your outdoor activities. The Pink Street, streetwear-inspired cocooning, with its hood and embroidered logo, goes well with jogging pants or jeans We selected the best fabrics and the best professionals to create our products.  Close to you, baby feels safe. He's protected from the wind, the dust and the sun.  One size fits all. From XS to XL, yes, we did the tests. Dorothée - Founder"When I breastfed my children, I sometimes felt the need to protect my intimacy and I did not find the accessory that really suited meSo we tried to create something feminine and refined. An accessory that goes with all women, in which they feel beautiful and intimate. We first looked for soft and comfortable materials to wear. Then, we worked on the styles, so that each nursing cover has its own personality, that it is functional and beautiful. The most important thing for me is that every breastfeeding woman has the freedom to choose her intimacy while still using a feminine and trendy product created especially for her.That's how "Emma Moe" is born."Our nursing covers are shipping in July 2019 !  We would love to get in touch with you, so do not hesitate :info@emmamoeandme.comwww.emmamoeandme.com

story:
The Nordgreen take on the Chronograph is a celebration of the Danish tradition of Science for Humanity, a concept established to create positive change for humankind and nature, thus celebrating the sustainable future that we dream of.

We as Danes are proud to be one the Pioneer's in sustainability, and through the Chronograph we are inviting others on a journey for a better future.

The clean space around the dial is a reflection of the environment that we want to live in, while the third hand stopwatch (Chrono second hand), which has a red tip inspired by windmills, is a reminder of the bond between Nordgreen and the sustainability of its motherland.

The watch comes in three dial colors - blue, black, and white - and three case colors - gun metal, silver and rose gold.

Jakob has re-imagined the Native which is inspired by Copenhagen and the unpretentiousness of the Danish way of life.

The re-modeled Native comes with invisible minute marks, because in Copenhagen, we don’t count the minutes, we enjoy quality time. We also bring you the Native Lille, a smaller 32 mm version for the female audience, in addition to the existing 36mm and 40mm watch faces. The new models will be available with white, blue and black dials, as well as a new gold and gunmetal case option, adding to the current silver and rose gold case colors.

With every watch you are able to swap your straps out with a different one, allowing you to define how your express yourself and your outfits. Simply detach the straps on your watch, and you are ready to change to any style you are in the mood for. 

 

Jakob Wagner is an award-winning designer with over 25 years of experience, working with the likes of Bang & Olufsen, Hay and Muuto. Nordgreen’s sustainable approach was one of the core reasons he chose to work with us: “What has become really important to me is to work solely on something… on conscious projects; ones that mean sustainability is a given. To make something that has intrinsic value and that we want to keep for a long time.”  

 

Since launch, The Nordgreen team has grown from just a handful of people to employ over 20 internationals. Our office of more than 30 employees, is carbon-neutral, with 90% of employees opting to cycle to work. Our co-founders, Vasilij Brandt and Pascar Sivam are university friends and watch enthusiasts who envisaged one day owning a business together, a dream made true by the Kickstarter community.

We expect to deliver by mid-October. Incentives our goal is achieved, we’ll work tirelessly with our manufacturers to get you your package as soon as possible.

Hello all, 

We are Vasilij and Pascar, the founders of Nordgreen, and we are back again hoping to bring you something even bigger and better than last year. 

Since we launched on Kickstarter last year we have gone on to sell over 10,000 watches in over 70 countries. 

We owe a big thanks to you and the Kickstarter community, we really couldn’t have done it without you!

In collaboration with our chief designer Jakob Wagner we bring you two new models, on our mission to make Scandinavian design accessible to all, while promoting global sustainability. We hope that you will love the new range as much as we do.

We would be so grateful if you chose to support us again this time around, and join us on our journey.

Much love

Pascar and Vasilij

Is there a warranty and how long is it?

Yes, all watches purchased through the Kickstarter are covered by an exclusive 3-year warranty

How can I select my watch and strap combination?

When the Kickstarter campaign is over, we will send you a survey where you can choose the specific colors

Can I add an extra strap?

Once the survey has been sent, you will be able to add-on extra items

Can I change my order?

During the campaign you can adjust your order / pledge at anytime. 

When should I expect to receive the watch?

We will ship the watches from Denmark in the middle of October

Having any other questions?

Please contact hello@nordgreen.com and we will be more than happy to help you with anything!

If you live outside of the EU, you will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges. NOTE: While we wish we could help get our packages to you faster, we have no control over custom processing times. USA WILL NOT be subject to import taxes and charges

This campaign is promoted by Backercamp. Since 2012, Backercamp has helped 5,000+ creators make their projects a reality, raising over $250MM through crowdfunding.

story:
​

__________________

Our shirts are designed for all of life's adventures. You can wear your new shirt all day while working from home, on your weekend camping trip, or out for a quick workout. It doesn't matter what you're doing, HercLéon's is ready for everything. 

HercFiber continuously destroys all oder-causing bacteria to keep your shirt clean. Now, even though our shirt is effective, we still recommend letting them air out for few hours after a day of use. By the time you’ll pick them up the next day, they’ll smell as fresh as an unworn shirt.

* This should not be an excuse for skipping a shower.

HercFibér is a material that took us over three years of research and development to achieve. Our material blends together ultra-refined beechwood, copper-infused fiber, and high quality spandex. This blend when put in the perfect combination results in the most advance clothing material on the market. Our HercFibér material empowers you to do things that you otherwise couldn't do with your other shirts. 

We've been selling the shirts on our website for the last few months, and they sold out in just a few weeks. Since we ran out of our most popular sizes, we are doing a new production run and offering Indiegogo users and exclusive discount. 

If you'd like to read more reviews, feel free to check out our website HercLeon.com

So, now that you have nothing to lose, what are you waiting for? Pre-order your HercLéon shirt and enjoy the only shirt that you will love more than your mom. 

Thank you all for sharing HercLéon with your friends, families, and readers. You're all making a difference in our fight to push humanity a little bit forward while still wearing super soft, clean, and comfortable clothes.

story:
Hey!

After 2 Kickstarters and over 100,000 wallets sold, we’re back to spread our love of Tyvek® and Art. Showcasing 7 brand new designs by cutting edge artists worldwide, the Micro Wallet is our slimmest, strongest design yet. Not only that, a portion of every pledge will go to support the artists collaborating with us. Join us in our mission to put beautiful art in every pocket.

Micro Wallet is as small as a card when closed, yet fits up to 8 of them easily. A simple yet intuitive clam-style opening allows you to store and access your cards on-the-go with a flick of the wrist.

We know you carry around some bills as well, so we designed an all-new cash compartment. And yes, it fits all kinds of bills.

Micro Wallet starts out at just 0.3mm thicker than a standard credit card. We challenge you to find a slimmer wallet.

 

Micro wallet is made from one continuous piece of Tyvek® smart material with RFID seamlessly integrated into the fold which makes it virtually unrippable and highly resistant to wear & tear all while keeping your private electronic information safe from theft. Apart from being super-durable, the Tyvek® we use for Micro-Wallet is also water-resistant, so rain or shine, you know you’re protected.

 

Don’t worry about loading up your Micro Wallet with cash, cards, receipts, notes, or whatever else you fancy. It’s paper thin, but still expands over time while remaining beautiful and never compromising durability.

When closed, Micro Wallet keeps your private data safe from electronic theft. The 360-degree RFID protection is built in so you won’t even notice it. Where did we fit it all in? Well, that’s our secret.

 

Choose Any Designs. Exclusive Packaging. 30% Off Retail. Share the love with some people you love.

Paperwallet was born out a of desire to fuse function with design and comfort in our everyday carry accessories. In 2015 we launched our first Kickstarter campaign for the Slim Wallet followed by the Magic Coin Pouch. Thanks to our amazing backers and supporters, over 100,000 people worldwide are enjoying our products everyday.

 

We’ve listened closely to what our customers were missing and what they wanted - and designed the Magic Coin Pouch to be the ultimate minimalist solution for coin and cash. Here is what our customers are saying about the Magic Coin Pouch and Slim Wallet.

 

We are extremely grateful for the support we’ve received from our crowdfunding community. We love what we do, and its you that makes it all possible.  

Patent no. 14536350

story:
Don't you think it's about time the world smiles!?

Well so does OLD DUKE CLOTHING!!

OLD DUKE CLOTHING promotes:

PEACE, GOOD MUSIC, LOVE FOR YOUR SELF AND OTHERS, MULTI-CULTURE, FREE-WILL, FUN, RESPECT, SEX, BEING YOURSELF, REBELLING AGAINST THE SYSTEM, MOTIVATION, NOSTALGIA, LIVING LIFE TO THE FULL, PARTYING AND NOTHING BUT POSITIVE VIBES............. THIS is what OLD DUKE Clothing is ALL about and i want this message to be in all of my tshirts so you guys can go out there and show the world!

Basically I need the money for printing costs! all these screen printers charge a shed load for their expertise and I want the Tee's to be a nice brand of garment I'm thinking either continental or american apparrel because they have the best quality garments out there!

Obviously you will be rewarded somehow for your donations! for example for every $30 donated I will send you the "Overdose on Life tee" and the more you donate the more rewards you will get! 

So please please help me spread the positive message of Old Duke Clothing by helping to fund my first collection! If this is succesful then i will create another collection ASAP and you guys will be the first to know! 

MUCH LOVE

SCOTT DAWE (OLD DUKE CLOTHING)

story:
Short Summary

    Frankie and Sue was started by two best friends who moved from the concrete streets of NY to the ocean side of LA. It is the product of two girls with a clear vision and desire to create a stylish, trendy and inventive clothing line for young girls. The name Frankie & Sue derives from the combination of the owner’s middle names and is also a representation of two very strong personalities. Carol “Frankie” was the epitome of a tomboy with her blonde bowl cut and brother’s hand-me-downs. She liked to be comfortable and edgy, tough and trendy. Alicia “Sue” was the definition of a girly girl. Always in dresses, from her brown ringlets to her shiny bow shoes. She was head to toe “pretty and polished”. Frankie & Sue prides itself on being sewn here not flown here having everything designed and constructed right here in the U.S. 

    The money we raise here is going toward our showroom fee for our Spring 2013 Collection, Spring 2013 samples, & Spring 2013 production. With the money we are able to contribute ourselves and the money we raise with all your help, we will be able to put together a wonderful 2nd season collection to really get Frankie & Sue off the ground. This clothing company has been a dream of ours for the past 5 years and we are forever grateful for the love & support to make this dream a reality. 

     We are continually humbled by the overwhelming support we have received and cannot express how much this means to us. Frankie & Sue is something that we both have poured our whole heart into and look forward to what the future holds.

    

What We Need & What You Get

    The amount that we need to raise here to really enable us to go forward with a well put together and professional collection is $8000. $$800-1000 of the goes toward the cost of renting a showroom in downtown LA fashion district for market week beginning the first week of August. By putting ourselves around all the top children’s brands it gives us the opportunity to be picked up by all the major high end boutiques here in LA and southern CA. $2000 is going toward the cost of our Spring 2013 Sample set. This money is divided up by patterning, cutting, grading, sewing, 1st sample, & 2nd showroom sample costing. The other $5,000 goes toward what it costs us to produce these garments once the orders have been made to our factory in LA based on orders and commission. The process itself costs around 14-16,000.

    We have come up with some wonderful perks to those of you that are able to donate towards our clothing line. We are so appreciative of all your help that we are happy to be able to send your some wonderful Frankie & Sue goodies. These perks include stickers, website shout outs, and items from our Fall 2012 collection.

    If we are unable to reach our final goal we will be putting the majority of the money into the sample sets for Spring & Production. It is so very important that our samples fit properly, look professional, & are exactly what we as the designers sought out to achieve aesthetically. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

    We completely understand that not everyone has the means to financially support right now. There are so many other ways that you could help spread the Frankie & Sue love just by word of mouth. Tell your friends... your families.. coworkers... teammates. Please feel free to share our indiegogo link with others that you feel would be interested in the cause and or the company. You can share our webpage at www.frankieandsue.com also our facebook/twitter/linkedin/tumblr pages can be reached through our site. 

Thank you again from the very bottom of our hearts. We appreciate you!

story:
FIRST:  Thank you for your interest in this project which I am very dedicated to.  I studied fashion at the UCLA Extension Program and with the love of travel and fashion of the 40's and 50's I started RetroWhere?.  With the direction and help from SCORE (Service Core of Retired Executives) I started the prototype/manufacturing process. My current buyers have told me that their customers who have already purchased my current designs are asking for more! More designs are on the sketch pad and I'm very excited to get them out as soon as possible. Quality, excellent service and professionalism for my buyers is paramount.

MY CURRENT BUYERS are all over California and Hawaii, including the Hyatt Regency Maui.

THE STORY:  The inspiration for these handbags was my father's old suitcase with travel destination stickers on it.  When I was little that suitcase inspired me to see the world and experience other cultures.  I hope my line will do the same for others.  So being a creative person it popped into my head one day that that would be a great idea for a handbag because I know if I saw one, I'd want it!  So I started with a European version which, of course, is the"European Vacation" design (destinations include: Rome, Paris, Great Britain, Venice, Suisse Air, Greece and Deutschland) and thought a tropical version would be great so I designed "Tropical Getaway" (destinations include: Fiji, Hawaii, Tahiti with a brass logo tag and plumeria flower charm shown below).  I created a prototype and walked around with it to test it out. I am stopped all the time and asked "I love your bag, where did you get it?"  

HOW YOUR CONTRIBUTION WILL HELP ME:  Your contribution will allow me to produce at least 3 more styles/designs in which I will introduce to large retail groups for airports, cruise ships and hotels.  I also need to have sales reps help me broaden my exposure as quickly as possible. I can't go further than where I am without your support.  I have many great ideas for designs and can't wait to create!  Please help me get there....

Again, your support is so valuable and appreciated I can't even put it into words.

Thank you!!

Karen

retrowhere.com

More designs are on the sketch pad and I'm very excited to get them out as soon as possible. Quality, excellent service and professionalism for my buyers is paramount.
MY CURRENT BUYERS are all over California and Hawaii, including the Hyatt Regency Maui.
THE STORY:  The inspiration for these handbags was my father's old suitcase with travel destination stickers on it.  When I was little that suitcase inspired me to see the world and experience other cultures.  I hope my line will do the same for others.  So being a creative person it popped into my head one day that that would be a great idea for a handbag because I know if I saw one, I'd want it!  So I started with a European version which, of course, is the"European Vacation" design (destinations include: Rome, Paris, Great Britain, Venice, Suisse Air, Greece and Deutschland) and thought a tropical version would be great so I designed "Tropical Getaway" (destinations include: Fiji, Hawaii, Tahiti with a brass logo tag and plumeria flower charm shown below).  I created a prototype and walked around with it to test it out. I am stopped all the time and asked "I love your bag, where did you get it?"  


HOW YOUR CONTRIBUTION WILL HELP ME:  Your contribution will allow me to produce at least 3 more styles/designs in which I will introduce to large retail groups for airports, cruise ships and hotels.  I also need to have sales reps help me broaden my exposure as quickly as possible. I can't go further than where I am without your support.  I have many great ideas for designs and can't wait to create!  Please help me get there....
Again, your support is so valuable and appreciated I can't even put it into words.
Thank you!!
Karen
retrowhere.com

For Translations

Pour voir la traduction de cette campagne, cliquez ici, puis cliquez sur "Traduction" en haut de la page et choisissez votre langue.
Ð”Ð»Ñ Ð¿Ñ€Ð¾ÑÐ¼Ð¾Ñ‚Ñ€Ð° Ð¿ÐµÑ€ÐµÐ²Ð¾Ð´Ð° ÑÑ‚Ð¾Ð¹ ÐºÐ°Ð¼Ð¿Ð°Ð½Ð¸Ð¸, Ð½Ð°Ð¶Ð¼Ð¸Ñ‚Ðµ Ð·Ð´ÐµÑÑŒ, Ð° Ð·Ð°Ñ‚ÐµÐ¼ Ð½Ð°Ð¶Ð¼Ð¸Ñ‚Ðµ ÐºÐ½Ð¾Ð¿ÐºÑƒ «ÐŸÐµÑ€ÐµÐ²Ð¾Ð´» Ð² Ð²ÐµÑ€Ñ…Ð½ÐµÐ¹ Ñ‡Ð°ÑÑ‚Ð¸ ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ð°Ð½Ð¸Ñ†Ñ‹ Ð¸ Ð²Ñ‹Ð±ÐµÑ€Ð¸Ñ‚Ðµ ÑÐ·Ñ‹Ðº.

Our Story

The current world is truly a melting pot of all cultures whose history and story we have yet to fully explore.  Similarly,  fashion is seen as just a trend or style, but it encompasses many cultural and historical aspects that the general public is not aware of. LeSueur LLC has developed the brand TLeSueur as a women's luxury clothing brand that fuses the elements of  historical dress  within various cultures and their art, and hsitory.  Our goal is to inspire you to learn, to unleash your imagination and to create a new experience; so, embrace your creative beauty, you inner explorer and let us help you become the work of art that you are. 

 In 2011 TLeSueur created its first capsule collection and since then the company has continued to refine its brand and define niche within the fashion industry.  The brand strives to envision what luxury would look like if for example, the unique cultural dress of an Inuit tribe and a Mayan tribe were brought together; better yet lets add in a dash of darkness from the Spanish artist Goya.  What do we get?  Innovation.  The ideas above may seem incompatible, but that is the discovery of it all.  The brand not only seeks to innovate but to bring an element of social education to its consumers by motivating them to learn more about the "fused" inspiration behind what they are wearing.  Likewise, as a brand we are intent on helping other designers to achieve their dreams by providing design opportunities and creating a community in which they are able to network and find educational resources.

The Impact

This campaign is the first round of funding for TLeSueur.  On last year we were able to create a small capsule collection and a basic web site from personal funds, but in order to reach the goals that we have on this year we need greater funding.  As a donor, you will be helping to create a new luxury brand that recognizes the value in each culture, their history, and the art around us.  Furthermore, you would be be a part of encouraging others, along with TLeSueur, to a life of continued learning and understanding of different cultures.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are asking for a total of $45,534.  When you donate you are helping us to do the following:

  • 10,000 Website Redesign Stage One
  • 20,750 Pre-Production and Post Production Activities
  • 8,000 Materials
  • 6,784 Product Launch Event

Any amount that you are able to give is much appreciated and to show our appreciation please review the perks that we have provided.  If we are not able to obtain the full amount in this campaign the project will be delayed or scaled back considerably as this is currently our only funding source.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

The best way to help us, besides giving, is to pass on this link by posting to your Facebook page, relevant blogs and forums, twittering, pinning and emailing; urging others to give as you have.  Also if you would like to donate any in-kind services or have any contacts within the fashion industry that you would like to pass on to us please let us know.

Thank you !!!!!!!!!!!

 

FAQ's

Q.  When will the collection be available?

A.  The collection will start selling in the Spring of 2013.   


Q.  If you don't raise your total amount what will happen to the project?

A.  If we are unable to raise the full amount we will have to adjust the number of pieces in the collection.  Additionally the web site redesign will be delayed until the needed funds are raised.  What we are able to do heavily depends on how much is raised during this campaign.


Q.  What type of products do you sell?

A.  TLeSueur sells women's luxury clothing.  It is our goal to produce two collections per year, spring/summer and fall/winter; in the future we will branch out into other areas.  We will also provide opportunities for emerging designers.


Q.  How/Where is your product sold?

A.  Our products are primarily sold through the online store.  This website is our "flagship" store and it is very important for us to provide an interactive, unique, and efficient shopping experience for you.


Q. What are pre-production and post-production activities?

A.  Simply put pre-production activities are the steps taken to bring a fashion concept into reality through research, design, testing fabrics, drafting patterns, producing a sample piece and showing/selling it at market/trade shows.  Post-Production comes after the product has gone to market or orders have been taken for the clothing; this involves buying the quantity of material needed to fulfill the orders, making any needed changes to the pieces, producing the clothing in the sizes and colors needed to fulfill order, shipping and warehousing.

story:
- ROOT, A Unique Designer of Watches & ECO-FRIENDLY Fashion -

PRE-ORDER SALE ENDS OCTOBER 29, 2013 AT MIDNIGHT


HOW DOES IT WORK?

THIS IS A ONE TIME OPPORTUNITY TO PRE ORDER!! Indiegogo offers our customers a secure way to  PRE-ORDER / Pledge funds for our products before they are available to the general public at full retail price. If you like to purchase multiple items just add the cost of each and contribute that amount, instead of selecting individual perks at a time. We will send out forms asking you to select the items and colors desired once we complete our funding campaign. We guarantee to delivery you great products and on time.

                All purchases must be made by October 29, 2013 at Midnight.


HOW IT ALL STARTED:

Our passion for handmade wood furniture gave us the idea to incorporate wood into our favorite accessories like watches, sunglasses and wallets. The first products were a pair of bamboo sunglasses, bamboo wallet and a watch made entirely from wood. As a company we sought to create a brand that would set itself apart from the rest. Our designs are fashion forward pieces made to last while providing you with an exceptional look and feel. We spent the last 18 months working on designs, sourcing movements and making all the adjustments on final prototypes before we start our first production run. In order to turn these products into reality and send it into production, we need your support. It's your opportunity to get the first round of products at a remarkable discount. We need as many people as we can to raise their hand and tell the world about these amazing products. It's a great opportunity to be the first to own one of our trendsetting unique products. Show your support! Help us reach our goal...and look good doing it.

WHAT'S NEXT?

You simply make a pledge and depending on the amount, we will offer you one of our products at a remarkable low price. If project is successfully funded you will receive your product within 55 days. This is a one time opportunity to show your support and receive the product of your choice at a great price. Free delivery within the U.S is included with any product purchased.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word and share with friends and family.

CONNECT WITH US ON FACEBOOK, INSTAGRAM, TWITTER.


                     - PRE-ORDER ANY PRODUCT AT A DISCOUNTED PRICE -

                                                  SOFT BAMBOO FABRIC T-SHIRT


                                   WOOD GRAIN GENUINE LEATHER WALLET

                                       1 YEAR REPLACEMENT WARRANTY


                                BAMBOO WATCH & GENUINE LEATHER BAND

                                     - FINAL WATCH FACE SKETCH DESIGN -

                                Choose a black or brown genuine leather band



    MAHOGANY WATCH BOX

HANDCRAFTED WOOD WATCH BOX W/ SOFT VELVET INSIDE AND GLASS TOP




                                            BAMBOO TEMPLE SUNGLASSES

                             Choose from Red Wood, White or Black PC Frame

                                   - BLACK FRAME & BAMBOO TEMPLES -

                              ( All sunglasses are coated with a water proof layer )

                                     - WHITE FRAME & BAMBOO TEMPLES -

                             - RED WOOD FRAME & BAMBOO TEMPLES -




                    MAHOGANY WOOD SUNGLASSES W/ POLARIZED LENS

- Made from Mahogany Wood              

- Polarized Lens UV400

- Handcrafted Bamboo Storage Case / Coated with a water protective layer




                                MAHOGANY & MAPLE WOOD WATCH                                


      Watch is made from Mahogany & Maple Wood / Miyota Quartz Movement




                                      HANDCRAFTED BAMBOO WATCH BOX
   ( Included with any "CEO Collection" or "Root Handcrafted Collection" Watch )




                                  " THE ROOT HANDCRAFTED COLLECTION "  

                             WOMEN'S SIZE AND STYLES - QUARTZ MOVEMENT

A. Rose Gold/Maple   B. Rose Gold/Mahogany   C. Gold/Maple     D. Gold/Mahogany

                                                       OUR FIRST PROTOTYPES


                                 " THE ROOT HANDCRAFTED COLLECTION "

             ( MEN'S SIZE & STYLES - QUARTZ MOVEMENT - 50.0 MM CASE )

S/S & MAHOGANY   BLACK S/S & MAHOGANY    BLACK      BLACK S/S & MAPLE






                                     " THE CEO HANDCRAFTED COLLECTION "

                           - AUTOMATIC 8215 MOVEMENT  & SAPPHIRE GLASS -

ONE OF A KIND TIMEPIECES!

The CEO Collection Watches are an upgraded version of the Root Handcrafted Collection. Upgrades included a European Sapphire glass on front face & back case and an Automatic 8215 Movement. In order words, you never have to spend money replacing batteries or a scratched glass face.

                          THE CEO COLLECTION   -   CHOOSE FROM 4 STYLES

                           European Sapphire Glass & Automatic 8215 Movement 

         S / S & SAPPHIRE GLASS BACK CASE   -   AUTOMATIC 8215 MOVEMENT

                        LADIES WEARING OUR CEO COLLECTION WATCHES

                        

  We would like to thank the following people for making this photo shoot possible

                          Gianni, Danielle, Sarah, Richard, Russell and George                         


THE BAMBOO WATCH WILL BE OFFERED IN THE COLORS BELOW, IF WE REACH OUR FUNDING GOAL.

story:
About Vessel Clothing

My name is Charles Pangus, I have been designing for over 5 years. Creating something people can wear has been a passion of mine since I was a boy helping my dad at his small print shop; I never wanted to stop since. Vessel Clothing started from my dream of having a successful clothing brand, my positivity in daily life was a natural piece I wanted to incorporate into my designs and the longevity of my brand. I got tired of seeing weed plants on shirts or curse words; I want people to wear something cool without it having a negative effect on peoples lifes that see it every time that person wears it. With the support of everyone I can start a clothing brand that not only creates appealing clothing, but also brings forth a positive message with every shirt. Vessel Clothing wants a positive present and future generation and I believe we can do this by showing the world great things can happen by being positive and living your dreams.  As a dreamer myself, my message to people that buy a shirt is " Dreams Never Sink". 


What We Need and What YouGet

$2,000 is all I will need to make my dream of having a clothing brand come true. The funds will go toward designing and printing original Vessel Clothing merchandise so we can start reaching out to evryone worldwide. My goal in the future is to put back what I received into the community. 



Other Ways You Can Help

I am very grateful for everyones support, even if you can not afford to donate you can still be a part of this campaign of bringing positive clothing to the masses. All you have to do is tell someone about us whether it be in person or on your social platforms. 

You can follow us here

www.facebook.com/vesselclothingofficial

www.instagram.com/vesselclothing

www.pintrest.com/vesselclothing

story:
Namaste!

I am a yoga teacher who embraces all aspects of a balanced healthy life. I often work with my husband, teaching yoga, meditation and wellness techniques in various studios and homes around the Los Angeles area.

I've always been an 'upcycler'. When I was a kid I was turning my old jeans into purses and backpacks. More recently, I've been taking recycled and sustainably sourced materials and creating new jewelry with history and meaning, as well as healing properties from the stones I selectively source.

My goal with this line was to create funky yoga jewelry. Striking a balance, embracing both sides of the spectrum, I wanted to incorporate my love of all things eco-friendly with a stylish, bright, and cheerful fashion sense.

All of my pieces are handmade, using a mixture of recycled and sustainably sourced materials. I want people to feel like when they purchase something from me, that they are being 'green', without sacrificing their sense of style.

You can have both consciousness and style!

Namaste - is a greeting that translates to ' the divine in me honors the divine in you'

Steezy - new slang combining 'style' and 'ease'

Mala necklace with tigers eye, recycled glass neon orange beads, handmade tassle using vintage embroidery thread



Karma!

I've been investing all of my own extra money into this thus far, and it's been growing little by little. However, if I had a little extra push, it would help tremendously in getting this off the ground!

How funds will be used:

  • Purchasing materials from my earth-conscious suppliers
  • Creating larger stock for availability to yoga studios and boutiques in the area
  • Advertising (facebook, google ads, etc)

Mala necklaces are traditionally 108 beads, and I sell them for $108 US - Get your custom mala for $54 - half the price! Choose your favorite colors and I will create something that reflects you!

Charm bracelets are normally $45-$81 US - They are $27 with your contribution!

Recycled glass Pura Vida charm bracelets come in vibrant stunning colors and normally run for $45 - They are $18 with your contribution!

Recycled wood mala bracelets normally run for $36 - Just $11 with your contribution!

Eco charm bracelet with turquoise, howlite, rudraksha seeds, recycled glass, natural shell and tibetan silver bells.



Environmentally Friendly & Stylish

Since all of these pieces are made with earth consciousness in mind, you can feel confident knowing that you've made a contribution that is both 'green' and stylish all at the same time.

In the past I have worked for many 'green' companies. I spent a fair bit of time working for an eco-friendly and organic children's company, designing organic cotton baby clothes, and working with eco-conscious suppliers to fill our store with toys made from wood and recycled materials, BPA-free and glass baby bottles, bamboo furniture, etc.

I understand the need we have in today's society to be environmentally friendly, but being 'green' doesn't mean you need to be 'granola crunchy hippie'!

Yes, you can have your vegan, gluten-free cake and eat it too...

Recycled wood mala bracelets, handmade tassels using vintage embroidery thread, tibetan silver 'ohm' charm


Recycled Glass Pura Vida Charm Bracelets. Neon Orange, Moss Green, Ocean Blue, Fiery Red (colors not pictured hot pink and vibrant lemon-lime)


Grow & Blossom

I know there's so many people out there making little charm bracelets for yogis. What sets Namasteezy apart is that everything is eco-friendly, vibrant and stylish. Not only that, but each piece is handmade and unique wearable art, with history and a story behind it.

I feel like with a little help from my friends (you!), I can get the necessary traction to grow and blossom this little love child of mine :)

Organic cotton & bamboo blend yoga tanks



Little Karma Chameleons

Even if you can't contribute today, please help me to spread the word via Indiegogo Social Media sharing tools! I am so grateful to you for taking the time to read this, and hopefully to spread the word!

Namasteezy my funky friends!

Love and Light,
Ashley
xx
story_txt:
Namaste! I am a yoga teacher who embraces all aspects of a balanced healthy life. I often work with my husband, teaching yoga, meditation and wellness techniques in various studios and homes around the Los Angeles area.I've always been an 'upcycler'. When I was a kid I was turning my old jeans into purses and backpacks. More recently, I've been taking recycled and sustainably sourced materials and creating new jewelry with history and meaning, as well as healing properties from the stones I selectively source.My goal with this line was to create funky yoga jewelry. Striking a balance, embracing both sides of the spectrum, I wanted to incorporate my love of all things eco-friendly with a stylish, bright, and cheerful fashion sense.All of my pieces are handmade, using a mixture of recycled and sustainably sourced materials. I want people to feel like when they purchase something from me, that they are being 'green', without sacrificing their sense of style.You can have both consciousness and style!Namaste - is a greeting that translates to ' the divine in me honors the divine in you'Steezy - new slang combining 'style' and 'ease'Mala necklace with tigers eye, recycled glass neon orange beads, handmade tassle using vintage embroidery thread  Karma!
 I've been investing all of my own extra money into this thus far, and it's been growing little by little. However, if I had a little extra push, it would help tremendously in getting this off the ground!How funds will be used:
Purchasing materials from my earth-conscious suppliers
Creating larger stock for availability to yoga studios and boutiques in the area

Advertising (facebook, google ads, etc)
Mala necklaces are traditionally 108 beads, and I sell them for $108 US - Get your custom mala for $54 - half the price! Choose your favorite colors and I will create something that reflects you!Charm bracelets are normally $45-$81 US - They are $27 with your contribution!Recycled glass Pura Vida charm bracelets come in vibrant stunning colors and normally run for $45 - They are $18 with your contribution!Recycled wood mala bracelets normally run for $36 - Just $11 with your contribution!Eco charm bracelet with turquoise, howlite, rudraksha seeds, recycled glass, natural shell and tibetan silver bells.  Environmentally Friendly & Stylish
 Since all of these pieces are made with earth consciousness in mind, you can feel confident knowing that you've made a contribution that is both 'green' and stylish all at the same time.In the past I have worked for many 'green' companies. I spent a fair bit of time working for an eco-friendly and organic children's company, designing organic cotton baby clothes, and working with eco-conscious suppliers to fill our store with toys made from wood and recycled materials, BPA-free and glass baby bottles, bamboo furniture, etc.I understand the need we have in today's society to be environmentally friendly, but being 'green' doesn't mean you need to be 'granola crunchy hippie'!Yes, you can have your vegan, gluten-free cake and eat it too...Recycled wood mala bracelets, handmade tassels using vintage embroidery thread, tibetan silver 'ohm' charmRecycled Glass Pura Vida Charm Bracelets. Neon Orange, Moss Green, Ocean Blue, Fiery Red (colors not pictured hot pink and vibrant lemon-lime)  Grow & Blossom
 I know there's so many people out there making little charm bracelets for yogis. What sets Namasteezy apart is that everything is eco-friendly, vibrant and stylish. Not only that, but each piece is handmade and unique wearable art, with history and a story behind it. I feel like with a little help from my friends (you!), I can get the necessary traction to grow and blossom this little love child of mine :)Organic cotton & bamboo blend yoga tanks  Little Karma Chameleons
 Even if you can't contribute today, please help me to spread the word via Indiegogo Social Media sharing tools! I am so grateful to you for taking the time to read this, and hopefully to spread the word!Namasteezy my funky friends!Love and Light,Ashleyxx
